item.text: rgya gar skad du/ shig byas m dza ma hAtan+tarA dzanAm/ bod skad du//
dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyirgyal po chen po/ dpal rdo rjesams dpa' l
phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de
de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi snying po rdo rje
btsunamo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas
kyizhing gi rdul phra rab snyad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po
thon pa rgyal ba rdo rjadang/ byang chub sems masadapa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
sku rdo rje dang/ byang chusems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rjedang/ byang chub sems dpasams dpa' chen po
chen po rgyal ba rdo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pos ngodang/ byang chunganams dpalasaras pa'i tshe/
po chungo dang/ byang chub sams dpalasams dpal chen pom sde dang/ byang chub sam sa dpalasams dpa' chen po smra
rdor dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mamakha' dodzad ng/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chor po
@#// gzugs rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dang sems dpa'
chen po dri'i dang/ byang chub sa ra sa yapa'i s nas dpa' chen po ro rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpalasams dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rjedung/
byang chub sems dang lasoms dang kha ra po nges kyi ngabyings kyi ngo bo dang rdzong/ da dga' sogs snga 'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'/
chen po brjod kyis re bzung nga de yang brjed kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi ge rdzul phra rab sang rnams dang/ da bzhi na ya/ shegs panam
mkha'i dbus dang mnyam pa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje laspyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam par snang mdzad
dang ngo bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen dpal dang/ de bzhin bshegangs ba rdo rje nga dang ga tu med pa dang/ de bzhin pa shes
tsami za ba dang/ de nga ba la sogs pa nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs la ni/ 'di lta sta/ dpar na
til gyi gang bu bzhin du/ de pa zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu gang bar snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur te// de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu/ la la ni mA ma kI lta bu/ la la ni gos dkar mo lta bu
la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma lta bu/ la la ni gzugs kyi ngo bo lto bu/ la la ni sgra'i ngo bo lta bu/ la lani 'i ngo bo lha bu/ la la na ro'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni rag gi ngo po lta bu
der yang dag bar gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ bsung dang/ thugs kyi snying
chapo rdo rje btsunamo'i b+ha ga la dmatshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdul med pa gru bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu rgyas// sangs
rgyas sbyin pas kun tu khyab// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas kacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhag par gyur to/ de nas de bzhin gshegs/
pa mi bskyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
par snang mdzad rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyis de rje de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas nam mkha'i

sgyu 'phrul chen po don sgrub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dgag/ sgyu 'phrul chen po mag 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzang chon chang ba bstan/
pa sta// brtson 'grusaMchen po pha rol gnon// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs chab// smon lam ye shes rgya mtshos// byams chen rang btsan

dpag tu med// snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// thabs chen khyad pa chen pa ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen pa char grags
pa stobs chen parol gnon pa po// srid pa'i ri bo chen po' joms// mkhregs shang rdordzachen po 'chang// drag po chen po drag shul che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po 'ogis mchog chan ngo

sta3 bla ma gsang sngags chab mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// thag pachen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad cho// thub pa chen po thub chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las

'byung ba// gsang sngags chen po bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po/
sa dacu lanirab tu gnas// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcukhyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don rol 'aa byad//
na nyid kyi dam tshig rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de/ phyal du 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dus pa gsang ba pha ba/ [-]zhin gshegs pa
kun gyi gsang// rdo rje snying bo 'dus pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sams rdo rje s/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so// 'on kyang 'di ni de pazhin 2/shegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom
bskye bar byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te/ the tshom thams cad
gcod par mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa'i ng de
[“ ]khazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheng
pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje des tsheg 'byung ba'i tshig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid ba myong ba ragyi ]
kha nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang/ mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par pa spyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshesatwA
pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas ye shes kyi sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi sAng po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// badzra d+haMka
de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi paskyod pa'i phyog rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thab kyi
nag po dkar po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi dmatshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gti mug gi rigs kyi mchog snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung
ngo 4 dzan=ke/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi
sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dmar po nag po dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa gdon mi za ba'i mchog dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po
di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ pra// de nas 'di byung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/
sprugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa gdon mi bra ba'i phyag rgya chen por sbyar ba'i thabs kyis/ lta khu dwang/ nag po dang/ dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/
gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste// rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis// 'dod dang/
thar pa rab sgrub pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin rjes su mnyes par byed ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ tha gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// de khar ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom
phyag rgya chen por spyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dkar po nag po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhupa sa
se de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin pa che 'byung pa'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i tingang 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi
mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rad+ma ka/ de nas 'di phyung tha ga tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor bas nam mkha'i gnas kyis/ ser po nag po dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
sku dang/ gsung dang/ phyogs rdo rje'i lho phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rgyun 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i sing po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo//a'o ka/ de nas 'di phyung
ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ 'jig rten dbang phyug ga rig pa'i bdag po'i phyag rgya chen por/
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud mad kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ shar phyogs
tshakyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs
ba thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dung/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// ma ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcos ldan 'das de ba nyin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi bag khrugs 'dzin pa la gyur te/ lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// danas bcom ldan 'das de
khazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su chags pa byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags
tshag 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rA ga ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud mad kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang
ba'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// badzra ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
ba thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ byang phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog dmatshig phun sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'a khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// ya man+ta kr-ita/
de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
bsangs par byed pa'i tshul du shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
[p ]@#// zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo//
warnyan+ta kr-ita/ danas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ rdo rje'i dam tshig bsnyangs
ba'i tshul du lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'a dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob ba zhes bya pa'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/
shugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// big+han+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig ba'i skyes bu de nyid/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi tshul du byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs
mnyis par byed pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi bdag pa la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sku dang gsung dang
thugs kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// bla na mad pa'i byang chub sems// bcom ldan snying po bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cang spyams kyis yongs
su rtog pa'i ng thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyis sems lus lta bu dang/ lus sems lta bu dang/
la sems zhig tu brjod pa lta bur spyod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs
nam mkha' lta bur sbyar nas/ ched dubarjod pa 'di med du brjod do// ema'o kun tu bzang po yi// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can// skya ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// skya ba 'di ni rab tu
bsgrugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjed bzhin gshegs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par
rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ dngos bo med pas sgom pa mad// bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min//
de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjed bzhin gshegs pas
gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang skya mched dang// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs la// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas//
rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
ba rdo rje mi bskyod ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khrod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyisams 'di gsungs so// dngos pa 'di rnams ma skyes pa//
chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur pa dag med pa// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan
'das pa bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga'ani la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungasaso// chos rnams
thams cad dngos med cing// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// bdag med chos las kun tu byung// byang chub tshulaM 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen

dpa la gyis gsungs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer bar ba rdo rje sgronam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'digasaa so//
maskyes pa yi chos rnams la// ngo bo mad de sgom pa'i ng med// nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor pa yis// dngos po dag tu rab tu bsgrags// zhes bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas gzhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdonami bla ba pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon ba cho rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyisams 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dam pa nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub mad cing mngon rtogs
b+haM med ngo byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gangshegs pa grub pa gdon ma bla bas gsungs so// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngor tsang du ba/ rmad du du ched

ba yi chos las byung// sangs rgyas khyang chub rdzogs mdzad pa// rnam par mi rtog dmigs su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po thams cad don/ nga chub
sams ni rab bskor ba// byang chub spyod pa rdo tshe// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas byang/

kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas btsam ldan 'a das de bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsungadang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa// de bzhin

'od dang mnyam// 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgo/
nas su// gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya//
tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis// bsdus dang gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mi bskyod pa yi rgya mchog dang// dkon mtsheg dpal gyi rgya che na dang// tshe dpag
mad pa'i 'od byed dang// thogs med grub pa'i rgya chen rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rab
'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gtsags la 'jigs 'jigs lta// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa// rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/
sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par bskrun// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu 'khrigs/[… ]de yi phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par sgom// ma du yi
'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// kun tu 'bar pa'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin chen bsnams par sgoms// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// gtso bo 'dod chags 'khor ba sa 3/
rab 'bar phyag na pad+mapasnyams// 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'od 'dra'i sku// gdon mi bra ba rdo rje can// zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams// sangs rgyas dkyil
'khor bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo ba 'ad rdo rje zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM d+hamad+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma kony+dzahaM/ rin chen chen po
kha dog lnga// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam// sna yi rtse mor ldan tan du/ rnal 'bar gyis ni rtag tu sgom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur yong mi spro//
sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i 'od// mchog rab sprin rnams spyi par bya// 'khor lo zla rin chen dang/ pad+ma ral gri mtshon chen 'dzin// phyong chub sems dpa'i sngonachen rnams//
spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bla 1 la 'khor bri par bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil
'khor bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra par ni// pad+masgom pas bsgom par s+ya/ rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni// rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor
las byung ba// nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul
'thob pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ phugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u sku gsum pa'o///
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi bdag po//
la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi kha gnas// chos kun bdag mad pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du
gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos ni mchog
las byung// ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen pa// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma mang
kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso//
'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor rab 'dra bar// dkyil 'khor rab tu nyams dga'
bshad// de nas blugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// lus ngag sems ni bsgoms pa yis//
shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa// thig skud gsar pa legs bkal ba// tshad ma rab tu mdzes ba yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni

grwa bzhir ldan// sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rab tu zlum po bla bar bya// de nas las kyi tsheg ni// mthong bas phyag rgya dag dod par bya// de'i dbus rdo rje bri ba ni//
in+tanI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa// 'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed// 'khor lo chen po shar phyogs su// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen chen po lho phyogs
su/ 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs// pad+machen po nub phyogs su// pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// ral gri chen po byang phyogs su// 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs// dbus su sprin
dang 'dra ba'i 'od// spyan ni shar gyi grwa ru bri/ mA ma kI yi rigs 'byung ba'i// rdo rje de bzhin lho phyogs su// pad+makha bye sdong bur bcas// nub phyogs su ni bri bar bya// ut+pal mdzes
pa byang phyogs su// mthing kha sprin dang 'dra bar bri// tho ba 'bar ba 'od gsal ba/ shar phyogs sgor ni bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba// be con lce ya phyogs su bya// pa/
'bar ba 'od byed pa// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyol ba rdo rje can// byang gi phyogs su rdo rje ba/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas// lus
dang ngag soms mchod pa yis// nan tan du ni mchod par bya// bud med rab tu mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug len pa ni// dri dang me tog 'a phreng brgyan te//
yon tan ska rags mA ma kIr// shes rab can gyis byin brlabs la// de yi dbus su mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas spos bas// nam mkha'i dbyingasani rab tu brgyan// bshang
gci khu ba khrag la sogs// lha rnams la dbul bar bya// de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang// byang chub sems dpa' grogs chen mnyes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/
gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o/// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa ni// kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi// rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis// spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to//
rnam pa ra mi rtog don las byung// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs// theg pa mchog ni bla med pa'i// dngos grub rab mchog sgrub par byed// rigs ngan smig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod
den don gnyer soms pa rnams// ga chen bla na med pa yi// theg mche ga 'di pa 'grub par 'gyur// sems can mtshams tshad la sogs pa'i// sdig pa chen pa byed pa yang// rdo rje/
theg pa rgya mtsho che/ theg pa mchog ni 'di la 'grub// sing nas slob dpon smod pa dal// bsgrubs kyang lA drub par yong mi 'gyur// srog gcod pa yi sems can gang// brdzun du myul
dga' ba dang// gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang// rtag tu 'dod pa spyod gang dang// bshang gci bas su za ba ste/ de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// ma dang sring mo bu mo la// 'dod pa
bas ni mnyes byas na// theg chen mchog gi chos nyid kyi// dngos grub rgya che des 'thob po// sangs rgya sa gtso bo 'i yum dag la/ rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis// mnyes par byas kyang mi
gos te// de ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsungs zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mig gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad/
ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams thong de skad ma zer cig/ snying po la shes can rnams kyi// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di// snying bo tshes kyi don las byung// byang chub spyod pa'i

mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas// rnam par ma 'gyur snang ba med// rdorje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso// dus gsum dug gi lam du byung// nam mkha'
chen po dbyings gyur pa// nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nam mkha'i sku las yang dag byung// nam mkha'i lam la gnas pa po// nam mkha'i thugs te chos kyi mchog/ spyod pa'i gnas la

cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ blugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni// ngag dang
yid kyis bskul nas su// yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis// dngos grub rab mchog bsgrub par du// sems la dmigs pa bdag med pa// ngag dang lus kyang rnam par sgom// nam mkha'
bzhin dumanyam pa'i gnas// sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgrub par bya// lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na/ ngo ti 'di ni dmigs su med// sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la// byang chub mad cing/
sgom pa'i ng med// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ni mdor na rnam dpa8nas// sngags kyis pa pa'e tig 'dzin// byang chupa sbyor ba bsgom par bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//
de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun mchog[”]kun mkhyen gyis/ bskos pa'i mchog saka 'a h+phul te// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i
kyil 'khel bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgos pas 'bras mo'i sbyor ba na ka pa// a me mor pu prab+haa/ sam/ 'gro dang me 'gu yungs karal// yo
shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba// gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtags spyi nyams pa dang sa babs pa nas ra// rje'i dkyil 'khor bskyom par bya// sangs rgyas sku
(yi gnas bsgoms te// de yi stang du gnas gzhag go/ 6 nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sngargyun gyi tshul du sbyor ba la//

sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba sogs// 'khor yang khyad par dag tu sngo// ut+pal mthing kha'i mdog
'dra ba// rtsa mo lta pa khyad par du// nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis// sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsan ka yi 'bru tsem la// 'dab ma brgyad pa ga sar bcas// sna yi rtse mor 'di
shas te/ bsgoms pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du// sgom pa der ni brtag par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga' byang
chub gnas 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas rnams ni// de ru mdor na sngo bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan ma yi// chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje
'dzan// de nyid don kun ston pa po// spyod pa kun yachog legs dag pa// gsang ba'i dam pa khaka'i stsal to// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// shes rab can gyis zla drug sgam// gsang ba'i
de nyid mchod chen gyis// legs par mchod nas bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// rjes su bshang gci wesan ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa/ yang dag bla med grub
par 'gyur// zas susha rnams za ba dang// sha chen dag ni rab btags na// sku phyung gsung thugs gsang ba yis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i sha dang rta yi
sha ngod pazhin dam pa khyi yi ba/ khras kyi byes pa na bar bya// za pa 99 pa ni ma bris na pa sems dpa' blo can dang// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur// 'di lta
bu yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'ang khama'ang phyug 'jig rtenu na/ 3go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur// gtso bo gzi can stobs dang ldan// mdangs bzang
mthong na yid du 'ong// mthong ba tsam gyis skul mad par[3-]ba/rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur/ [']di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste// yang dag sngags kyi

po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di ba gsungs so// 'dod pa'i la ngas spyod thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod par bstananani// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//
'u// sangs rgyas myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ji ltar 'dod par bstan bya ste// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan
la mchod par bya// bka' thub sdom pa mi bakhrad pas// bstan kyang 'grub par mi 'gyu gyi// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// bstan na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// slos mo khra
zhing mi bzla ste// slong la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ 'us dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ bde bar gnas na byang chub
'thob// gzhan du dus min 'chi pa dang/ ngaskyal bar nges par spos par 'gyur/ sas skyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dkadas kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams// chos mchog mi g.yo bar9 pa yang/
'dod pa thams cad bstan pas so// chags can ya shes 'dod pa yis// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga rnams bstan// byang chub sems dpal mnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags par bya// gzugs la
pa rnam gsum shes byas nas/ mchod par byed pas mchod par bya/ de nyid bcom ldan stsa tshogs pas// sangs rgya rnam par snang mdzadu gzhi// sgra la rnam gsum bas byas nas// lha rnams ni dbul
bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas padatso// dri la rnam su shes byas nas// sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya/de nyid bcom ldan sa ka/ pa//
