rnam gsum shes byas nas/ bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod pa yi tshul brjes pa'o// gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la// rtag tu sams ni sbyar
bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o// gzugs sku drisob saM sngags pa yis// lha nyid du ni rtug tu bsgom// yang na de la bsgom pa ni// rigs
kyi tshul du rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor// chos ni rjes su dran sgom pa// rdo rje rjes su dran sgom pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams sgom// rigs ni rjes su dran par sbyor//
khro po rjes su dran sgom pa// lhan rjes su dran par sbyor// bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur// bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// le graa bcu drug len pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas
gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya// dpang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub/
thob par 'gyur// yi ge hU~M dang o dag dang// adang phaT kyang rab brtag bya// 'od zer rnam lngas khyab pa yi// pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba
bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na bu ga la ni ling ga gzhag/
sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// de snga rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas sbyin rnams so// de la chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bu gu la ni lang ga gzhag/ rdo rje chos ni/
bsgom par byu/ ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas ches kyi sprin rnams spro// de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par sgom//

kha smra rnams kyi bu ga nas// rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugasani rab tu sgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas//
mkhas pas rigs kyi srin rnams so// de la khro be rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ khro ba'i dbang po rab tu sgom// ba pa rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas khro bo'i
na rnams spro// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bdag gi rdo rje par ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// rang gi khu ba'i thig pa yis// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'
mchod// de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na dbang po gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu dbyung// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor

tshul du bya// de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin// phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas// sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin gyis// bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig/
de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin// gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshigs kyang de 'dra sta// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/
de la sgrugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni// nga dag gi sems kyang de 'dul gyur// de la
sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// sku dang sa gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod
gyur cig/ de la sngags thams cad kyi gzugs dang/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin// gsung gis sku yang rnam sgom pa//

bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar// sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig// de la ngas tshag rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe nA/ dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na// dngos grub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran par ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba//
[F ]@#/ thams cad ma skus zag pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med// de la ma skyas pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ thams
cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// mtshan mad mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin// gnyis med gnyis su med min ni// shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin// de la zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa
asu dran pa ji ltar sgom zhen bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// le grangs bcu gnyis lon rad pa// rigs kyi skor bas rab bsgoms te/ bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// rdo rje 'jin pa'i grub sa dang ni// chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// sa dang gsung dang thugs kya nga 'a grub// nga gzhan phra mor
bshad pa rnams// ngo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te// bzlas pa tsam gyis de 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba
pa'i dus pa las/ sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad [”]kyi bdag po/ dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje 'jin pa chen po labastod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che// nam mkha'i spyod pa rnam
sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// rdo rje theg pa'i rab ston pa// nam mkha'i dubyings dang mtshungs pa'i
mnyeg rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol// thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas// sangs rgyas sal mchog dag pa'i bdag// mi mchog mchod pa bshad du
gsol// byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i sbyin// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams
cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'a yin// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i mchod pa'i mcho ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa// sku dang gsung
dang shugs sal mchog/ rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad// na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed [S]la song las kyi kha
rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am// rgyal nyid skyes zhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su// bshang ba/ ci chu la sogs pas phyug pa 'am/ rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya//
nu ma'i dbas bar spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar// cho ga shes pas mang na rkang pa'i bar// lte brked pa gsang bar rgyal pa'i sras// jigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus//
gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par// mkhas pas snying khar bsgom par bya// zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// bsdu ba dag kyang r/
tu bya// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la// 'od zer 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ tsha shas rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas de yin par rnam par bsam// bdag gi ba spu'i bu gnas// mkhas
pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro// mkhas pas ut+pal dag dang// pa rnam pa lngar shes bya// dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// ma rtog kaN+Di kA ra dang
mal+li kA dang yu shrI kA// me tog ka ra shrI ra bsam// mchod pa thams cad ratu brtag/ dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas la// rnam par mkhas pas
kyi rtag par ni// rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pad+ma rdo rje dang// ral gri u la mkhas pas bsgom// dpag tshad bye ba'i khyen tsam du/ gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi// mchod
rgyu rten rin chen sna bzhi pa// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams thams cad mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis gnas su bsgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ de la mchod
ba rgya mtsho brtsam// rin chen na bza' la sogags pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis/ rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas na chung/
mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs mchog gis brgyan// sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// zhing 'di ren chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang la// dngos
grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir// nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// bdag po'i phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la//
rig pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas khar// dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lus// bla cha bshang dang gci bas mchod// bzhin
bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi// na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu brtag/ mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba blangs nas
bza' bar bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang// sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ bshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams
cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ dbang phyug dam ba kun don gyis// sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye
shes can gyi gsang// nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de rje mi bskyod rab
bsgoms nas/ lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya/ da'od 'phromang po 'apar ba dang// 'od ze sna lngas skung// dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams// bsgoms nas rdo rjes byamar brlag/ skyagasung
thugs kyi longs spyodani// jo rjes phyir bar ba su med gyur pa/ bsam gtan mchog sde bsgoms na ni// phyugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu s// sems can thams cad

bsad na ni// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de khon ste/ rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho yin par bya'o// de nas rgyal po
rdo rje 'dzan/ mishes thar pa lta sgrub pa// ngo bo nying dab gos pa med// byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa yi/ yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings
kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i gzugs
ni rab tu brtag/ nor rnams thams cad thogs nas su// rdo rje gsum du rnamabasgoms na// nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang//
thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// 'di'i rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las// gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal bo rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags thar
ba rab sgrub pa// gsang bdage ba dmigs med pas// dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpag med tshe
ni rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad ngagang// bud med lta bur sbyar ba ni// dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de ru bsgom par bya// 'di na rdo rje'i tshula mchog
go/ dbang po gnyis mnyam sbyor bas// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// 'dini rdo rje thams cad kyi// mi phyed sku gsum sgom pa'o// 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste/
sngags pa rnams kyis bsgos pa/ bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de tshe sngags kyi don sgrub pa// bdag med yoshes las byung sa// gsung ni 'di skad bka' sul te// ma mal
dpyings kyi dbus gnas par sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de tsho thogs med rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad gzugs sum bsgoms nas//
rdo rje tshag gi brdzun sla bas// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang// rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa// yongashes blo can kun
tha @#/ gyi gsang// sngags kyi dngos grub thob bar bshad// 'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig ga de kho na nyid de/ don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya 'o// de nas rgyal po
rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas// rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' su la to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
dkon mchog dpalani rab bskyoms te// gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang// rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// bstan na ye shes thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gagshegs pa
thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mas ngo mtshar du
gyur rnying/ rmad du gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pas//
ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du/ 'di lta bu'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsung/ de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo sAd kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje
bab/ dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang/ smad pa'i 'du shes de lta bu 'ang ma skyed cig/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi sdod pa ni sprod pa'i mchog go/ 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi sdod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor pa'i// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpal na
nam mkha 'a ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o// chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na
mi gnas/ ba zugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas / 'byung ba chen po bzhi la'ang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu ches thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni
don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyenanas chos 'chad par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de ltar nam mkha'i tshag nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam
tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi pu 'di lta ste// dper na gtsub shing dang/ gtsub stan dang/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba 'byung bar 'gyur bod kyi/ ma de'ang gtsub
shing la'ang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la'ang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la'ang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
sa @#// la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so//
rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang// rnam par mi rtog dag pa las// kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/
thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshab chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga 'tshal/
te 'di skad ces gsol to// de nyid sngags sing kun bsdus pa/ sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba' bsgrags/ dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ yang dang/ bcom ldan bshad du gsol/
de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag po sngan yangs pas/ gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal do// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// rnam par mi rtog
mi dmigs pa// gang na'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i sgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin pa ba las kyi tshul
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ mi bskyod
pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la rol ba ston par mdzad de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams many+dzas kus pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing dgyes par yongs su spyod pa yod kyang/ de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la/ kye ma
'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi chos rdzogs par gyur to snyam nas spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ste/ de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag la spyan ras
kyis btso pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba sngags thams cad kyi song pa kun tu skal bar byed pa zhes bya ba rab tu
gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dam tshig
la dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dam tshe ga la dmigs pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ rgyugs rdo rje las tshig gi
lam nges par brjod pas sngags sdug pa 'di lta bu gsungs so// oM A/hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun//
ba rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// rdo rje sam sa dpa' rjesaM su dran/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i dbyas
kyi dbus gnas par// dkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus pa nas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag/ rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba// rnam par
'phro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs// drangs par de yis rnam bsgoms na// dam thug tu de 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa'i
rgyal po che// kun gyi gtsobo dbang phyug mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes/ skyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po rdo rje bsdus pa yin// rang
la/ sngags skyes bur bsgoms nas ni// gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul// zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// kha dog gsum du rab tu sgom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad
ces bka' stsal to/ de la 'di'i rdo rje mchog gi gsang ba'o// snying kha'i dbus su phra mo yi/ dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya// yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig/ de yi dbus su
bsam par bya// rdo rje chen po rtsa lnga pa// rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rdo rje kye ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya// de yis sing khar ga rub byas te//
lha rnams ji sAd bskul bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs la sogs// rdo rje kyo ba rnam sgom zhing/ snying kha ru ni
bskul bar bshad// 'di ni rol mo'i 'byung ba ste// rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun bar du byas na ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsung// sku dang gsung thugs 'grub
bar 'gyur// mchog stsol ba dag rnam par gzigs// yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// yid la ma gu zhing dga' gyur pa'i// dngos grub rgyu chen stor bar 'gyur// sangs
rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog sgrub pas// rmongs pos 'da' bar byas na ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ rdo rje
gsum gyi ston pa mchog/ 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs// dbang po
gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshag sgom pa'o// rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la// rdo rje'i sbyor
u@#// ba ra ba sgom zhing// chags la chags pas blta bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal pa rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin ga shegs pa kun gyi sras/
thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas gtsos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ji snyed yod pa kun// phyag rgya che sogs sbyor ba
yis de dag thams cad 'bar du// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas gnas ni der sngo bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//
rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i// byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rjesams dpa'i tsha des 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcupa'o//
yo de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ dngazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sngags kyi skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nga
'a dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi rdo rig pa'i skyes bu'i le'u 'di gsungs so// rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya chen po

0/ rnam sgom pa// byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// oM ni ye shes snying po ste// rdo rje'i sku ni thob byed pa'o// kAni byang chub bdag med pa// rdo rje gsungan klong/
byed pa'o// hU~M ni sku gsung thugs nyid de/ derdzami phyed gsum thob ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces
bka' stsal to// nam mkha'ardo rje'i dbus gnas bar// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun skyes bsam// de sbyin ni'aphro bskyod pa// de ru yi ge hU~M bsam mo// de la 'di ni ya shes rdo rje'i snying pa'o//
g+haM rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus la gnas par// hU~M zhes bya ba rab tu sgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge oM ni rnam pa'i bsam/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//
yi ge Ats+tshani rab tu sgom// yi ge hUM gyis gnas bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa// so ni sangs rgyas sku/
yi mchog/ o Ani sangs rgyas gsung gi lam/ A/ hU~Mni ye shes thugs kyi 'jing// hU~M byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa//

ye shes rdo rje sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung// 'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste// sngags kyi rig pa zhes kyang bsgrags// rdo rje mi khyod gsum bsgom pa'i// dam tshig dag gis rdzogs
par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugakyi nga tshig de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// dban zhing
rab tu nyams dga' bar// sbyor ba 'di'i kun brtsams na// rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs// zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te//

rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed// yi ga o ni snying khar gzhag 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu sgom// 'di yis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor
'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni// sangs rgyas skun 'dra ba'i mdog/ rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ zla ba phyedakyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka'

stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od re ra bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu

bskyed// Ats+tshani ngag gi lam bzhag ste// kha dog lnga yis pad+ma che// 'jig rten dbang mchog bsgoms pa yis// dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te// tshig gi dam tshig lnga yi mchog/ ches kyi tshig gi lam
gnas pa// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bstanAnani// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la//
sems la yi ge hU~M gnas pa// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid ni// kha dog rnam lngar bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba//
ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i thugs gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsa la te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin te// e shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya//
lus rnams kun la khams dmigs na// rdo rje ye shes mkha' mnyam 'a gyur// khaM / sangs rgyas byang chub sams dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang/ bskal pa gsum du dam
tshig gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' rdo rje dam tshag gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ska dang/ gsung dang/ thugs mi snang ba 'byung ba
bkod pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang sngags skyes bu rab bsams nas// snying khar rdo rje hUM zhes pa// gzhag ste 'od zer rnam par sgom//
haM 'jam dpal a tshig longs spyod la// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpar de 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ye
shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge hUM// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// mtshan mchog rdo rje'i lus dag gis// rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra
bar 'gyur// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni dngos grub
thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la// ye shes
o ni bsgom par bya/ o rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra dang//
gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sku dang mnyam par mngon pa 'byung ba'i dam tshig
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms la// rin chen o ni bsam par bya//
o rdo rje dmatshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dkon mchog dpalagyi 'od dang 'dra// de ni bdag med byung chub dang// ye shes
gsang ba 'dir gnas 'gyur khacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs khardo rje dkona mchog dpal gyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rin po che'i dam tshig longs spyod pa rdo rje'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam kha bsam// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// chos kyi o ni bsgom par bya// o rdo rje dam tshig
gsum pasems pas/ lo gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems lo yis/ 'ong ngapa
ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag tu yod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'od kyi dpa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin// nam mapa ste
dbyes kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khe'i dam pa bsam// rdo rje pad+ma bsgoms la// dam tshig son rad tu sgom// oM rdo rje pas tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gdon ma
'gyur// lus dang ngag sams rdo rje yis// rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho// sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za bas de
[5]@#// skad ces bka' stsal to// gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'od skur gyi kha shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'a dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs/
rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje snang mdzad rab bsgoms la// sku gsum o ni rab tu sgom// o rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rnam par snang mdzad mnyam par 'gyur//
lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yi// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub// sa gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de
skad ces bka' stsal to// lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnam par dbon pa'i ri bo dang// klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni// dur
yi gyi khrod la sogs par yang// bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag sgom// mi bskyod pa shes dag la sogs// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas
mchog gi gnas su sgom// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig che na po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po ba ba lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan//

gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// ma stag mang po 'khrug pa yi// rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje lnga yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar gyur//
rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil nyid du// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug pa rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
dbus gnas par// bdag gi lus la snang mdzad gzhag/ seng khar ya ge o bsams la// sngags la rnam par shes pa sgom// 'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du// gang tshe de la skyo 'gyur na// sangs
rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa// yid bzhin dpal ldan lta bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu sbom// snying khar yi ge hU~M bsgoms nas/ sems
ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ sa sa rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// snying khar yi ge A/ bsams te// rdo rje thig ler gyur par bzhag/ 'di'i dam tshig
mchog gi mchogaM/ rdo rje yi phyed gsum sgom pa// 'gog pa'i dmatshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur pa// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge o// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// go ldan m mkha'i dbyings gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi
ge A// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge hUM// bsams na de ni bskal par
gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ba gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rnal 'byor 'a dir gyur pyin chad ni//
klog gam yang na sams kyang rung// de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'a drar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/gde nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ bslad pa la
shes mchog sgrub la// dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum// rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam gyur pa// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin/
dag pa las/u0f7c/ rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom// dgon ba chen po'i sa phyogs su// me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa
sgrug/ maM lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom// lus dang ngag sems la smras pas// rdo rje 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// rdo rje 'bar
ba'i 'od dag gis// rgyana rnams kun gyi brgyan pa yi// dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas// rnams kyang mthong bar mi nus so// rdo tshe pa mchog gi dam
tshig mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung// bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni// lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te// khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya// sangs
rgyas kun gyis mi phyed pa'i thugs ni de ru ra ba bsgoms na// rdo rje 'jim pa'i 'od 'dra bar// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ro// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can// rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms
ga/ sas rgyas thams cad ba zhugs pa'i gnas// bsgomasanas nigs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de yi rjes
su 'brang bar 'gyur// 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms nas// rdo dzakun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na
don 'dra bar 'gyur// ring ba sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yodapa yin// de skad kyis ni bud med rnams// yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa// khams gsum
dordzachen bor 'gyur/ rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyud la// rang sngags rdo rje bsams nas su// chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin par/ bsams na tshes dang 'dra

bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyad yod ba yi// sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed// pad+momanyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/
grubya// ye shes lnga ldan rab bstanan// bskal pa gsum du yun du gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang pa gsum la bsnyen bkur byed// 'od zer lnga yi mdog/
'dra'i 'od// rang gi sngags kyi ral gri sgom// mig yangs lag na thogs na ni// rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing// tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa
stong gsum n ni gcig pu pa// mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur// gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje'i thugs las rab tu byung// de lta bu yi dngos grub
star// ral gri thams cad kyi dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// o ni ril bu tsan ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams tu khar bcug rnam bsgoms na//

'o/ da ni de ma thag tu mang// byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing// 'dzamA chu bo'i gsar gyi mdog/ Ani ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tsha da tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus
su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgomasan// de ni de ma thag tu yang// byang chub ya shes 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing// 'dzam chu bo'i gsar gyi mdog/
hU~Mni ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms/ da ni de ma thag tu yang// rdo rje'i sku dang 'od 'drar 'gyur//
mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dbus gnas par// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom/ lag tu 'khor le rab bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te//
sangs rgyas skur ni 'kha sbyor zhing// ma shes 'di ni rab sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rje dug gis bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje rab
bsgoms na// de rje'i ga pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje chon po'i rigs bsgoms te// rdo rje'i sku ni rab sbyor zhing// rdo rje'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rin
chen dbus ga/nas par// rin chen rdo rje rab tu sgom// lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin po che'i rigs bsgoms nas// rin chen skur ni rab sbyor zhing//
rin chen mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// rdo rje ye shes dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// lag tu pad+mor ba bsgoms na// pad+mo'o rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur
ba'i rigs chen bsgoms nas su// chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor zhing// pad+mo'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdorje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings dam tshag dbus gnas par// gdon mi za ba'i ye
shes sgom/ lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas// thogs med dam tshig rab sbyor zhing// dam tshig mchog 'di sgrub pa ni//
ye shes rdo rje dpag gis bya// rtse gsum ye shes lcags kyu sogs// rdo rje khyad par gyis bsgrubs na// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yi// bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur//

bcom ldan 'das dmatshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// lam gyi bzhi mdo'amangashing gcigi drung// mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su// rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis/[0f10]sgrub ba
pos ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams kyi// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu bsam// sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi skye ba btang/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas

pa sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa/ rdo rjes bkug nas nye bar spyod// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdo rje dam tshig dang ga pa'i cho ga 'o// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo ma//
tshag nga rje pad+mo la sogs pas// rgyal gnas lcags kyi bsams nas ni// dam tshig dgug mchog kyi pas bya// khams gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku ni
rnam bsgoms la// lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// kyo ba la sogs rab tu sgom// 'di dag lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i

skuni rnam bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor bas lce bsgoms na rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ rnam ba'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu bsgrub bya bsams na ni// rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar
'gyur// gsang gsum dmatshig mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pas mchod nas rab tu sgrub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin// bcom ldan 'dus gsang ba chen po'i dam
tshig gis de skad ces gsungs so// sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni// rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya// bshang gci dam tshig mchog giso ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bar 'gyur// glang
pa'i sha yi dam tshig gis// mngon shes lnga drag thob par 'gyur// myu sha dag gi dam tshig gis// mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur// khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub thams cad
'grub par 'gyur// ba lang sha yi dam tshig gis// rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// sha rnams thams cad med na yang// thams cad bsam pas rnam par brtag/ rdo rje sbyor ba 'a de byas na
sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sku gsung thugs na rdo rje can// snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang// dbu rgyan rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas
thams cad mnyes gyur pa// dam tshig mchog gis bya ba ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya// dam tshig thams cad ye shes rdo rjer gyur pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin te// lce yi dam tshig rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje can gyis hU~M bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// zos na rdo rje gasum theb 'gyur// Ats+tshe dang o gyi dam tshig kyang / 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul
mchog ste// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mi phyed 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dam tshig bdud rtsi 'phrang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/
ma sku gsung rdo rjecan du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/ nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtsho ra la gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// dordzo'i bdag nyid snang bar byed// 'khor lo'i dam
tshig grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+ga'i bye snyed thams cad du// grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod/ dam tshig dum pa [”] thams cad kyi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso por 'gyur/
sh+tsa1 rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms pas// thams cad dmatshig mchog tu 'grub// mi snang gyur pa spams cad la// stong khams dag ni snyang bar byed// sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa dang// lha yi bu mo
mchog la spyod// gang+gA'i bye sud sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa// rang lagaskya ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rjemag gis mthong bar 'gyur/ gang+ga'i bye sAd zhing rnams na//
k+kha sgra bsgrags pa ni ji snyed pa// mngon shes rna bas thos pa ni// rnaba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin// gang+gA'i bya sAd zhing dug gi/ sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan
ba yi// rol mo las byung soms rig 'gyur// bsal pa gang+ga'i bye snyad du// 'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi// sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams// zhag gsum len pa bzhin du dran//
ga'i bye ma snyed kyi lus// sangs rgyas srin la sogs brgyan pa// bskal pa gang+ga'i bye snyad du// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gas 'gangs// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen bas
da skad ces bka' stsal to// de la mngon par shes pa lnga ni/ rdo rje'i spyan dang rdo rje'i sAn dang/ rdo rje'i thugs dang/ rdo rje'i gnas dang/ rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas mngon shes
lnga don 'grug/ sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ga'i bye snyad grangs med pa'i// 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs kyis// 'jig rten khams kun bgrod

par 'gyur/ bstan pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang// nye pa ra sgrub pa 'byung ba dang// sgrub pa'i don gyi dam tshig dang// sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi// rdo rje'i bye brag shes byas la// de nas las mas
bsgrub par bya// bsan pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor la// byang chubo mchog ni bsgom par bya// zhabar sgrub pa grub mchog la// rdo rje sku mched rnam par spyad// sngags kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yis//

sgrub pa'i tshe na bsku la bar gsungs// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam// ye shes rdo rje 'grub pa la 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi
dag/ thams cad du ni brtag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang// rab tu rnam pa ra dben pa dang// nga ri nags 'dab
chu ngogs su// rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis// brtul zhugs brtan
pas bsAn pakhya// sku gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dus bzhi dag tu rab sbyor bas// blo dang ldan pas gnas lnga ni// ma shes rdo rje yi ge so//
bsgoms na sdom pa yin par bshad// zhag bdun dang ni zla byed dang// zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni/ dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhug grangs bye brag rab
zla bskul ba// nga yis rgyas bar rab tu bstan/ gsang ba mchog las byung ba la// zla ba khyod kyis 'grub par gsungs// de la 'di ni nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// sangs rgyas sku
'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te// rdo rje sku dang ldan par bya// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcur bzhugs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de la sku yis mtshan pa yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// de la 'dini sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul go/ chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo N+Di/
mi phyed gsum 'byed la// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas byas te// rdo rdzogasang dang ldan par bya/ rdordzomi khyod gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ de la
0 ]gsung las byung ba yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas ma dzad do// de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// khyin
gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te// rdo rje thugs dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// de la thugs las byung ba yis// byin gyis
brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang na chos kyi sems dpa' da rung// rmongs bas 'da' bar byed na ni// tshal par 'gas par gdon mi bra// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste
bcu gnyis pa'o//de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs kun// ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sems can kun don yang dag 'byung// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis//

thub ba dan kun rdo rje can// ston pa che la phyag 'tshal nas// dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la// mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// a la 'o sangs rgyas tshul re ba zang// e ma 'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog

e ma 'o chos kyi tshul re zhi// e ma 'o sngags kyi tshul re brtan// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni// ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can// rnam par mi rtog yang dag rig/ ye shes 'byung ba rab tu bshad// yid 'ong
sngags rnams kun bsdus pa// rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che// sku gsum mi phyed dkyil 'khor dang// sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba// rdorje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i///
rdo rje bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// rigs dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// gsang sngags zlos ba de ring gsungs//
ye shes rgya mtsho gsan pa dang// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjecan// sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung rnams// rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba// bcom ldan
'das kyis bshad du gsol// donas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// ma mkha' rdo rje ye shes 'byung// byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtsos// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// sngags kyi don kun bzlas
pa ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan// rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya// rdo rje bzlasapa 'di
yis ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'a gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjes byas nani// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'dra'i 'gyur//
sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjes rab tu@#// 'di ni byang chub mchog thob ba'o// yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis// so so ngag tu sngo
na/ par bya// sku dang gsung thugs bdag med ba// ye shes sems kyis yang dag spro// brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni// rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya// 'di ni ye shes sbyan glu ba'i// sangs rgyas
rnams ni kun gyi yin// sku yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa// sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad// de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad// gsung gi dam tshig rdzogs
byang chub// sgra dang sgra min nam dpyad pa// gsung gi rdo rje zhes bshad de// deni gsung gi bzlas par bshad// blugs kyi dmatshig rdzogs byang chub// gnas pa'i rdo snum dpyad pa/ khrug//
kyi rdo rje zhes bya ste// da ni thugs kyi bzlas par bshad// don gyi rjes 'gro ba zlas pa ni// ngo bo nyid mad bzang po yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnam dpyad pa// de ni rin chen bzlas par

bshad// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// sku yi sprin rnams spro ba dang// bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje'i don// de ni thog med bzlas par bshad// khro ba'i dam tshig ye shes kyis// rang gi rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor grags// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa// de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad// 'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur pa// kun tu skyob cing phan par dga'// sems can gti mug gnas
la 'jog/ de ni gti mug bzlas par bshad// 'dod chags rdo rje las byung rig/ lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can 'dod chags mtshor gnas pa'i g de ni 'dod chags bzlas
par bshad// zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sams// lus dang ngag sogs la gnas pa'i// sems can zhe sdang gnas la bzhag/ de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad/ dam tshig de nyid
rdo rjegasum/ dbu ma dam tshig rdo rje can// de nyidadam tshe rdo rje yi// bzlas pa mning zhes bya'o/ 'dod chags de nyid don sgom pa// rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni/ sems can kun la phan 'dod
pa'i// 'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad// rig pa chen mo spyan la sogs// rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bstanan 'grub//
zla gti mug dam tshig las byung ba// jig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can// mazhing dag gi gnas grub pa// dngos grub dam pa rab tu star// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag/
sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la// gsod pa'i na gyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' la to// ya shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi// 'khor la
snying kha'i dbus su sgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// dbus su 'khor lo'i don sgom mo// ye shes rdo rje can rnams kyi// rdo rje snying kha'i dbus su sgom// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
par// rdo rje'i sngags don bsgom bar bya// rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi// rin chen snying kha'i dbus su sgom// zha chen dkyil 'khor dbus gzhal//rin chen grags don bsgom par bya// pad+mo yi shes can
rnams kyi// pad+mo snying kha'i dbus su sgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+mo'i sngags don bsgom par bya// ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi// ral gri snying kha'i dbus su sgom// dam tshig
dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su/ sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya// 'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis// sngon byang chub thob
par 'gyur// sngagasa rnams thams cad sngo ba ni// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags// sku gsum rdo rje bye brag gis// phyogs pa dang ni bsdu ba tu// lus kyis sku yi ngo ba nyid// sems kyis thugs kyi
ngo bo nyid// ngag gis gsung gi ngo bo nyid// mchod nas mched pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis// rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya// dbus su bdag po bsam sa nas ni//

sku gsung rdo rje rang gi gzugs3 rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs dag gis// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu// kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la// sri nga khar sngags kyi don bsgoms na// rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi

las// bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed// 'di'i sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu bzang po yin// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul// rgyas la rdo rje pad+mo can// dbang la rnam par snang mdzadu gnas//

rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// gsang ba sku gsum las byung pa// sngags rnams kun ni sprul pa ste/ bya ba'i rol mos mtshan pa'o// ma dang smra ba'i sems can dang// rdo rje slob dpon
spyod pa dang// gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang// rab tu bsal ba 'di bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal de// khams
a gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas skul ni rnam bsgoms la// dgra bos bsad par bsams nas su// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par ka
do rje rtse lnga kha bzhi pa// ma pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// de sams dpar rnam par sgom// dus gsum dmatshig las byung ba// sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la// sangs rgyas 'khor
la stobs po che/ da lag pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sa yi bye brag gis// bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis su// rang gis lus la de dag gakhrung
sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo can// slar yang spro bar rab tu bya// khro bos 'khyug pa'i khro bo rnams// mi sdug 'jigs su rung pa'i gzugs// mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa// gsod pa'i
pa don gyis don sems pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam// gdug pa chen po gsod par byed// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol ba'o// rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas// nyi ma bdun du 'di

byas na// sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// rmongs pas grub pa mi stong na// 'chi bar 'di ni gdon mi za// rdorje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// namayakha'i
dbyings kyi dbus su ni// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan// rnam pa'i mchog ni kun dang ldan// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen ni
rdo rjem stag 'phro ba can// de yi phyag na bsnams par bsgoms// phyogs bcu nas khyung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od khre tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi lus la byed/
spro ba rdo rje spams cad kyi// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor
la rab sbyor pa// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// sku gsum las byung dgas par bgyi// zhig par 'gyur bar gdon mi 'tshal// 'khor le'i dam tshig seshes

du rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor de tsho can// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// gshin rje'i gshed kyi 'khor lo che// rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas
sems pa rnams//sku gsum dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa dag ga/ gshin rje'i gshed kyi mdog 'dra ba// slar yang gangs rgyas spro bar bya// dus gsum la bzhugs sems can dang// gdug sems
can gyi dgra bo rnams// khros pas thams cad gsod par sgom// 'di ni rdo rje bka'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig thams cad las byung ba gshin rje gshed kyi sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga
'dzin to// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'am// rang sdugs don gyi yon tan nam// yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis// bka' yi 'khor la sbyar bar bya// sngags kun
srung phyir ya shes mchog/ rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste/ 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// byang chub bsrung ba'i don chen bya// bcom ldan 'dus rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i
dbus gnas par/ chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las// byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig dag/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// bsams nas gdan du de rab brtag/ mkha' dbyings
zla sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yongs su gang bar rnam par sgom/ rang sngags yi ga'i gnas yushas// thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni sams tsam du// bsgoms

yanas slar yang rab tu bsdu// thugs kyi rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir// sku gsum la ni de dag gzud// rdo rje'i sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// rnam pa'i mchog rnams
kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab tu sgos// sangs rgyus rim bzhin bkod nas ni// chu yi steng du bcug par bya// rkang pa mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis// spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa sgom// bcom

ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgomasanas ni// dbus su khro bo rnam bzhag la//
las kyi rdo rjerkang pa yis// de yi spyi bor gnon par sgom// mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thoms cad kyi 'khrul 'khor bganon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de rdza gsum mchog khro bo'i
tshul// gsar sar bo'i mchog 'dra ba// thams cad ri yi rgyal po ltar// bsams nas spyi bor rab tu sgom sa[E/]sazla sa dngazung yang gnon byed na// mi dbang la ni dogs pa mad// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs las kyang sa de ka ces bsha ka// dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dgra bo
skrag pa'i dam tshig gi/ bsam gtan rab tu brtag pa 'di// [“]ngas rgyus dag gis yas yang// 'gas par 'gyu bar bar gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo tsha ba gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad
gsungs so// hU~M las phur bu bsams pa ni// rtse lnga pa yi tshad du ste// rdo rje phur bu de yis ni// snying khar de ni rab bsgoms na// khros pas sangs rgyas dbu dag kyang// 'jig par 'gyur ba/

gdonami za// dgra rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram// ljongs dag tu ni rab sbyor ba// nad kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang// 'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya//
dorje rtse mo lnga pa ni/ khar snang dag la rab tu sgom// srog pa'i bskal pa ltar bsams na// sar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya// so ba dag kyang denas ga/ rin chen yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi sprin
ni bsgoms nas kyang// dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gongs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab tu sgom// yid bzhin
nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas sprin dang chos chen dang// rdo rjesams dpa' der spro bya// bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// 'di'i sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o// nad thams cad mad par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to/ khasams gnas las byung dam bcas pas// gnas gang du ni yang dag
spyad// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yisani// gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// de rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// rdo rje phur bu rab tu sgom// ma stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor
gdab par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsams// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsam sa nas//
rang gi thugs kar 'dod pa gzhag sbyan la sogs ba mchog rnams kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar sgom// bsdus nas 'od kyi gong bu yis// zhad ma la ni dbab par bya// kha sbya'i bu ga nas
saargyas// sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis so// sangs rgyas sprin rnams de yitshe// de la dbang po sku'i ra ba tu stsol// nad pa rdo rje dam tshig gis// skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas
kyi dam tshig da kod pa'i sprin zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'a dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsams// myos 'dzin pa yi gzugs bsams nas// snying khar 'ded
ba gzhag par bya// mkha' dbyings gnas ni nyams dga' bar// dkar mo zhes byas bab tu dgang// 'od kyi gong bur bsdus nas ni// yid bzhin nor bu ren chen 'od// lus dang ngag dang sems
gnas la/ 'dod pa la de dbab par bya// kha sbya'i bu gnas rin chen// sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis sngo// tshes kyi sngan rnams bsgoms nas su// dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje bsam
gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa de// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
tongo nam ma kha'i dbyis kyi dbus su ni// rdo rje'i zla gam dkyil 'khor bsams// de nam mkha' chos mdun gzugs// 'dod pa snying khar gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
yis// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang// 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis// de ni gzi brjid dbab par bya// de ni de ma thag tu yang// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon// 'jam dpal gyi ni
mdog dang 'dra// gnas las byed par de 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba ni dga' so che// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid de stsol bas// bltas tsam spyod pa nyid kyis kyang// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur//
na po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i rdo rje srin po ni// drag cing khro la rab gzhus dang// lha dang bya ga sna tshogs dang// bya rgod khyi
yis gang bar sgom// ma yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dgra bo rnams ni skrag par sgom// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa// bsams nas rnal 'byor sbyakhar bya// mtshon cha sna tshogs
thogs pas min// rgyus khrag dang rlung la sogs// thams cad drangs par rnam bsgoms te// bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur// gal te de ltar rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas rdo rje'adzin/
zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// rdo rje dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa// ston ka'i
ma/ sprin gyi mdog 'dra bsam// dkar po nag po rab tu dmar// thor tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam// nag po dka' bo dmar po'i zhal// 'bar ba'i zer
tsugs dbu rgyan can// 'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o// 'dod chags can ni zhalo gsum bsam// dmar bon gakho dkar po'i zhol// thor tsugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can//
bsgoms na nges par 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo rdo rjepad+mom// g.yas ba'i phyag tu bsnams bar sgom// rdo rje phyag drug mtshon tshani// khazang bo snatshogs bsnams par sgom// sems can kun
la phan bzhes// sbyan ni zhal gsum dag tu bsam// dkar po nag po rab dmar ba// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu sgom// mkha' skyes sbyani rgyal mo che// zhal gsum du nit+tag bar sgom/
gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i tshul// mdzes ba'i gzugs su rnam par sgom// chu skyes spyanani rgyal mo che// zhagasum du ni rnam bar sgom// dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba ste// kha dog
mdzes par rnam par sgom// rig ma rdo rje ut+pal bsnams// zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs// sar dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// bsgoms na la shes thob par 'gyur// khro bo
chen po gshin rje gshed// zhal gsum drag po' 'ad bzang ba// rnon po 'jigs pa'i ng 'a rdzogs par byed// kha dog nag po rab tu smos// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che// drag tu bzhad
pa'i sgra 'byin pa// zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag/ rab tu 'phro ba rnam pa bsus// khro ba chen po rta mgrin ni// bskal pa'im bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs
kyis mnan// sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu sgom// de rje mi 'chi khre ba ni// 'od zer 'ashu pa rab tu 'khrug/ drag po 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dra// 'jigs ba dag kyang 'jigs par byed// 'dod pa'i
ya shes khro bo ni// zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog/ TAk+ki rgyal po rab tu sgom// stobs po che ni rdo rje che// 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba//
gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed// zhal gsum bar ni rtag par sgom// khro bon po dbyig sngon can// khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed// zhal gsum rdo rje[…]
gsum las byung// 'bar ba rnon po can du sgom// rdo rjes g.yo khri ba tsho// rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ba// zhi ba ral gri zhags pa bsnams// brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum sgom/ gtsug tor chen
po yi ge gcig/ 'od zer dag ni kun tu 'tho// zhal gsum 'ar pa 'khor lo can M/ khasam gtanadakyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gnod sa ye shes mchog 'dzin la// 'jigs pa'i
rgyu rgya mtsho yang dag byed// zhal gsum 'bar ba 'od 'phro can// bsam gtanadakyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gzi brjid phung bo gtsug tor rgyal// gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can// dam tshig
longs spyod 'di rnams kyis// so so dag tu bsgom par bya// ting nge 'dzin ni dpag med pa// sngags rnams kyi ni bshad pa yin// khro ba dag ni rer yang// nam mkha'i stang du shin tu 'phags//
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa khasams// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam// gsal zhing zhi ba/
zla ba bzhin// 'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od/ malong lta bur yang dag byung// khams gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor du// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ bsams na de yis khyad chu la mthong
bsam gtan rdo rab sgom pa// 'di yis sangs rgyas tshe pa'i bdag/ 'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe sa de nyid kyis kha thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzod kyi dam tshig 'byung ba/
mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin te// rdorje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms ka de rje sems dpa' rnam pa bsam//
khrom pa gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra/ 'ba' pa sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'ad// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na//
myur du rdo rje nyid thob 'gyur/ khasam gtan rdoN+Darab bskul ba// 'dis ni rdo rje'i bdag nyid che// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la za ba par 'gyur// dmatshig thams cad 'byung
ba mdzes pa'i dardza zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam ba ni/ nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// chos kyi sems dpa'o rnam par
rgyam// gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi ba ni// rgyana rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'od zer sprin gyi 'kho kho na// rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// 'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsum

mi byed las byung ba// pho shes rgya mtshos rnam par brgyan// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/
nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// spyan gyi mchog ni rnam par sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyun
gyis rnam khar brgyan// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs/ bud med skyama'i ma chog ldan pa// khams gsum dag ni dbang byed pa// ma shes thams cad grub par byed// 'khor lo yade
bzhin nor bu ltar// phyab tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya// spyan gyi dam tshig phyogo gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'od mchog can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i
dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab mchog sgom// zhal bzang spun ni rab tu yangs// u tul mthing kha'i mdog 'dra ba// mtshan ltas thams
cad rab tu rdzogs// nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog rab sgom// khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa//sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang// ut+pal sngo dma' phagan bsnams//
su nam mkha' yum gyi rin po che// 'od kyi sprin rdo rje tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor ma ba ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs nirab
bsgoms la// rdo rje chos ma rab tu sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// pad+ma rA ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i// sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung// 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa mtshan
nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// sangs rgyas thams su da rub bsgoms pa// chos kyi yashes 'byung gnas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang// ul dmar/

bo phyag na bsnams// chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pani// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ sus
rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// sgrol ma'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// zhal bzang rgyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis ma bar brgyan// kha dog ljang sar 'dra ba'i bod// budamad
sgyu ma rab tu myos// rje khyeng nge 'dzin las kyang// sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa// a tal ser bo mdag 'dra ba'i// gsal
dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugasani rab bsgoms la// gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par
gyu dpusnga/ durja28 ta'an las phyung// sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa/ ut+pal ser bo mdog 'dra ba'i// gsal ba phyag na bsnams par sgom// dam tshig sgrol ma mchog/
sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang bo 'phro// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros// spyan dkar mche ba rnam par gtsigs// phyag na ral gri bsnams par sgom// snang mdzad dbu rgyan rnam bsgoms
dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdorje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ gzhan gyis mi khrub rab sgom pa/ 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po can//
sprul gyis brgyan cing sku rags can// rdo rje dgyes pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// kha dog dkar po rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsams na rje'i can dag mnyes// 'di ni me shes khro
can gyi// khro ba kun gyi dam tshig go/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas
gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje rta ni rab tu sgom// khro bo'i 'od zer mang bo dag/ thams cad du ni rnam par 'phro// gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan// kha dog dmar bo rnam par bsal//

rdzogs sangs dpag med dbu rgyan la// bsgomasan rdo rje can dag mnyes// 'dini rdo rje ye shes can// khro ba kun gyi dam tshig yin// rta skyed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/
la/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzub sa ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje mi 'chi rab tu sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zeramang po 'bro// rdo rje'i sprinams
kun tu 'khrug/ khros shing khro bcas gnag ba dang// mche ba rnon po rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na khro bo 'dzin manyes 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyis/ 'da' bar

chadaka' ba'i dam tshig go/ mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'byung pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms
la 4 Taki rgyal po rab tu sgos// khro ba 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gtam// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje 'od ba zang bsgom par bya//
mi bskyod dmatshig dbu rgyan la/ bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur/ 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs bar byang chub pa dga' ba zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni ra ba bsgoms la// stobs po che ni rab tu sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer
mang bo 'khro// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor// khros shing bros ba zhags pa 'dzin/ derdza stobs chen bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na ba tu mnyes bal
'gyur// 'di'i khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting te 'dzin te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam ma kha'i rdo rje'i dbus su
bsas// sangs rgyas gzugasan rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sngon po rnam par sgom// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// gzugs ni rab tu gnag
la rno// rgya mtsho nag po spyod par byed// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i dbyig thegs bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms
na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje dbyig pa'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor dam ba ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par bsgom/ dakhros shing 'jigs pa'i zur gyis lta//
pa 'khrugs pa ral gri zhags pa bsnams// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// mi g.yo rdo rje can du sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tumanyes par 'gyur//
'di ni khre bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje nam mkha' dbyings kyi dam tshig zhabs kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// nyima'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//
nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rig pa'i 'khor lo rab tu sgom// mtshon rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// 'khor lo 'bar bas yongs
su bskor// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur dam tshig/ rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyun la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad
ca 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ gtsug tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su/
bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la/ rdo rje sumyu rab tu sgom// ma lce rnon po 'gar pa'i sku// rdo rje'i sprin ni rab tu 'phro// phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba// bsgoms na dngos
grub thob par 'gyur// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyu/ 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' pa ra dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje'i dam tshig
sum+b+ha rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'gog pa khri ba'i 'khor lo ni// sangs rgyas 'khor la bstan pa yis// ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dam tshig bkod pa de kho na nyid kyi don sgom pa mngon par
byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///danas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bdag po/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po zhi
ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ la sung dang/ thugs rdo rje
las phyung ngo// oM ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne a sasgra sA d+hi swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs sos gyis// 'byor pa kun la dgyes pa rnams// mnyes shing rab tu
dgyes gyur nas// sangs rgyas de rjes su dran// sangs rgyus rnams kyi skyi la byung ba// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub cing// rdo rje'i dam tshig bskul mdzad ma// shi ba sos par
byed par gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi dam tshig rdo rje khro po dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'a dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin

thams cad kyi btsunamo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ bsung nga/ shugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// aM gaM kA ra shAn+ti ka re/ gru 'u g+haN+Na g+ha'i ni g+ho tA yin glu ta ya[. ]g+haN+Di ni sAhA/ de nas 'di ni
gsungs tsam gyis// sku gsum dbyer med rdo rjican// mnyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas bud+d+haM/ paN+Di'i shugs ni rjes su dran// rdo rje srung ba'i sbyor ba la// las rnams rtag tu rab sgrub pa// rdo rje
chen 'jigs nyen la// rtag tu stobs ni byed par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ches
kyi sku'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// oka De bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin
'dzin pa rnams// mnyes nas bsam gtan thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i chos ni rjes su dran// rtag tu ches rgyas stobs mdzad pa// rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du//
bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dmatshug kun las 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun ma'a mchog
'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// oM tA re tut+ta re tu re sbo/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun bdag che las skyes// mnyes shing yashes
thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang// sems can khams ni ma lus pa// skad cig gis ni bran bzhin du// thams cad g.yo med dbang du byed// ces bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje du bzhin gshegs pa/ dri ma med pa'i 'od zer kyi sprin rdo tshe
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed po chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// namaH saman kA ya wA

ka tsit+ta badzra NaM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duShA satA da ma ka/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha has/ tsa skyor b+hu dzaM/ tsa tur u kha nga ra Na/ A gats+tsha/ A ga ]ts+tsa/ tsan+d+ra duT+Taphru na
@#pya// a pa hA ri Na/ ma hAbig+ha g+ha ta ka/ bi kr-i ta A nan/ sam+b+ha b+hu ta/ b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT+ThabyA kA sa nadi ni/ bya grwa tsarma ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru sarba karma Ni tsharda tshin/

sam+b+haman tun/ b+hin+da b+hin+dab ra mu dran/ Aka ya A kar+ya yas u0f97b+hu tAn/ ma waM ma tha/ nirma klu ni kla saN+Di dut+tA na/ pra ba sha a pra po 'a ya maN+Da la ma skye/ pho ba snga tI tAn+ta ka la

ma ma sa kat+yaM ku ru ku ru/da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ba laM ba mA bi laM ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ba se Ta ya bi spo Ta ya/ sam+b+hashA ba'i pur ka sargyun nA gA ya ra pAn ka 2
ka ra he he b+ha ga bAn/ kilci ya si/ ma ma sany+dza an+d+hanaM/ sA d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas 'di ni ba gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen pa kun// 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur nas//
rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// thod pa ma chag a gas pa// gzugs mdzes yid 'ong red pa la// rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas// sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya// mA ma kA 'am
spyan yang rung// rdo rje'i rigs chen las byung ba// lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni// de ma thag tu nges par 'gugs// bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad/ dam tshig gi 'od zer stag po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'di//

0nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// na maH sa man+ta kA ya waka tsit+ta badzra N+NaM/ na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA data ka Ta b+he ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la pA ra shu pa sha sa ya/

oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha ti/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+hA/ snyan pad na/ da ha dang// gardza gardza/ pi spo Ta ya bi spo Ta ya/ sarba big+hAn/ bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Napa ti dzI bi tan ka
nA ya swahA/ de nas 'di na gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po ku na// brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor ba dang/
rdo rje bskrad pa'i las rnams la// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dpung dus kyang// tshul bzhin byas n skyod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kyi
'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khro bo pa/ zhan gyi mi thub pa 'di// nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// na ma sa man+ta ka ya
wAka tsit+ta badzra aM/ o hU~M dzan ri baT+Ta hU~M hU~M phaT phaT sa/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che sus kun/ 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur te// byang chub sems ni
rjes su dran// srin po ma rungs gtum po dang// 'a jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa dang// rdo rjesems kyis rab sbyar na// las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa tshe dpag tu mad pa/ dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ pad+mo'abyung ba rdo rje khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung

na po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la/ sems can gang dag gis gsar 'am/ rin po che 'am/ dngul yang rung ste/ gang bsungs pa de dag thams cad bsams
pa tsam gyis 'byor bar byed de/ rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sams la 'ang mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la'ang gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags
[= ]pa thams cad chos thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs/
nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su 'brang
ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang ba de ngo mtshar to// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub mdor bsdus te gsungs pa/ sngags grwams
cad kyi rdo rje mdor bsdus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin/
nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad ni/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs la
mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni bdag gi lus dang/ ngag dang/
sams rdo rje lani gnas so// lus dang/ ngag dang/ sams rdo rje de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs mad pa'i khams na mi gnas/ sems kyang
lus lami gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngag kyang sems la mi gnas/ sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
na gang la gnas ga nas byung/ dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rang gi lus dang/ ngag dang// sems las byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
gsol pa/ sems gang na gnas/ bka' stsal pa// gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ bka' sal pa/ gang na'ang mi gnas so// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'/
de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/
gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///do nas
ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i tshogs

[2/ ]kyis mchod pa byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyal na rdo rje de nyin tshashegs pa / nirjek+kams cad kyi dkyilama 'khor sing ga'i dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang ba sung da/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo//den su yid kyil 'a khor mchog/ thugA kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni
[']kun gyi mchog// legs par rab tu bshad par bya// bu ni bsungug tshad du bya/ wI ltam pa dpal tu so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// su yi rdo rje rab tu gnas// de yi
nang du len le ni/ rdo rje'i cho gas dri bar bya// sngags rnams ku na pa ba gsang ba ma[pi g]pa rgya ro 'i gnas su bya// rdzus su rnams/ snang mdzad gnas// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i ng bri/
sku dang gsung blugs rdo rje mchog grwa rnams kun tu dgod par bya// stong ['', ]a/ ston pa yi// khro ba rnams kyang stsol bri'o// rdo rje ba 4 ba rab bsgoms pas// mchod pa sngags shes pa//
yis bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshashin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku yi
rdo rje las dam tshig/ de bzhin g.yugs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro/ re sus pa snyom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkeng
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di// nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// de nas gsung
gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khruni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa cho
ga bzhin// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// rdo rje bsgom pas thig gdab po// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni// zlum por kun tu bri bar bya// mdo ru phyag rgya thams cad ni// mo ga bzhin du bri bar bya//
tshe dbag med kyi phyag rgya che// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya// rdo rje gnas mchog de nyid du// thams cad yongs su dgod par bya// yongs su gsal bar chog bzhin// dkyil 'khor dam pa
byas nas ni// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya// 'on tang rdo rje can dag mnyes// bshang gci khu ba'i dam tshig gis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
[“]kaM dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas sprin gyi tshogs rdo rje zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gzhung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i// gzugs
