[4 ]na dbus su legs bris pa// de yi dkyil 'khor gan su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i
gnas yi shes gsang ba yin te rab tu gsang ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dkyila 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang/ ba/sung dang/ shugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ grubashus ro las phyung ngo// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi
snying po'i thig gdab pa'i yi ga'i gnas rnams so// oM A/ hU~M rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang// tshon tshu dag ni da glu pa dag/ sngags kyi sems dpas me bya ste// byas n byang chus nga nga ra dka'//
de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas// sngags kyi lha rnam sA thapa nas su// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas bsgoms 82 dkyil 'khong rnams ni rnam par brtag/ rgyal chen rnam pa'i sgyu[…]dzad dang//

yang na spyan li da[”]'byasku yid kyil 'khogs yid 'ong/ rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'thob/ rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// rang gi tshes pa par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rtag pa
yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mam ke yang dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o// de ltar byas na byin rlob cing// yang dbang ba nyid
'byu// gshegs te// rab tu dgyes pa3 gyur nas ni// gsang ba dag gis mchog kyang stsol// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags kyi sems dpas bya ba ni// rdo rje gsang ba rmad
po che// khro bo'i rgyal pos bkug nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje dri med gsum dag gi/ dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya// sngags kyi
dngos grub thob par byed// 'di skad kyang gsungs so/ stags rnams thams rang nyid la yang/ rmad du byung ba'i bag la ma dbul// dngashang gti sha da nga 'bru mar dang// so mas las byung ba'i tsan dan
dang/ khu ba dag gis sngags rnams kun// tshim par 'gyur bar kun tu bshad// 'di na dam tshig mcheg yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o// thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di// ba dag nyid

gang tsho spyod pa na// rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nasasu// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu sgom// yang na rdo rje mi 'chi'i grags// slob ma rdo rje 'od po che// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa yi// las kyi go

la 'phang bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams na// rdo rje'i thig skud dag la dgod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o// rnam pa li shu rtsa lngar ni// tshon rtsi

dag kyang rnam par sgom// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kha sang ba byang chub dam pa yin// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang// rdo rjehU~Mni bsgom par bya// sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog/
gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de ltar rtag tu byas nAni// rerdzami phud gsum las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa// 'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad// de rje bum pa bzhag pa ni// sngags
rgyud bdag pos shes bya sa/ rdo rje sams dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya// dngos grub kun gyis 'bras 'dod pa'i// sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya// bshangagaci
'bru mar ga la so bas// sbyin srog tu ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la// rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin srog dbul// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te zhal du dbab par bya//
'di skad las 4/ sungs so// dbang po gnyis kyi sa tshil ka/ spen po ba rtsa brgyud du zla/ pen sangs rgyas pas/ dkyi// dam tshig shin tu 2da' dka' nga 'o// rnam snang mdzad kyi
sbyor ba yis// slob ma tshe rje gsum las byung/A/ ni lus dang ngag se mas la// bsgoms nas rdo rje gzung bar bya// rgyal chen de[Z] sems dpa' nga/ ga da sa chen rnam pa snang mdzod dag/
sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu// byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu gsol// de la 'dzin dkyil ralor pa ra 'jug pa'i rdo re'i dam tshig go/ khaM pA la hUM/ 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus

dang/ ngag dang/ sems rdo rje'i snying po'o// de la 'di ni rje rje chen po'i dbang bskurapa' ba ]sang ba'i ye shes ba sang ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang ba rab tu snyom/
grubya// rdo rje'i rigasani 'dzin pa yas// sil snyan yi smina rnams sgom// 'di skad kyang bdasungs so// rdo rje sku gsung sngags kyis ni// nyung kar dag gis brdeg par bya// de la
de yi tshe na ni// bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// yang na sangs rgyas bsgom par bya// bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis// bzung bar mkhas pa dag
gis sgom// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzadu bsam// slob ma rtag tu blo brtan la// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can// sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya// de la 'di'i dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi
k+Sha gsang ba slob dpon thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung// khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa// rdo rje dbang
bskur chen po sbyin// de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba bya ba'i cho ga gsang ba'o// byang chub ji rjes sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab
tu bsgral ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol// de tshe de la dbang bskur ba// rab tu dgyes nas stsol bar mdzad// lha yi gablugs kyi sbyor ba yis// snying khar bdag po gzhag par bya//

rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la// dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya// khyed kyis srog chags gsad par bya//
khardzun gyi tshig kyang smra/ ma byin pa yang khyod kyis long/ dad pa dang/ skyabs lam ka des/ (sems thams cad bskul bar bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs te//
'di ni sangs rgyas thams cud kyi// mi ga mcheg tu rtag pa'o// sngags kyis bskul ba smras pas// de sngal shang sbyin par bya// sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang// gsang ba sbyin pa
brtsam par bya// kha nga ro yang bshad pa la// rtog pa'i m du brgyus nas ni/ rong bus ni bak+kha' bar pya na tang dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rnam pa 'de bzhi bsang chen te// rnga cha
can ni kun gyi/ sang// sngags kyi 'khor lo bud med gzugs// sems can don spyod phyir ba/nas pa'o// de 'di na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sngags kyis mnyes par bya ba gsang
ba'i/glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha// sha chen dag kyang bza' bya zhing// sngags rnams kul ba dbul bar bya// de ltas/ na mgon po mnyes// nyin re rdo rje slob ma la// mkhas pas dkyil
'khor bstan par bya// bshang gci sha ya bya ba dang// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gis// sngags rnams kun gyi yi ga/ bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'bar// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rig pa'i
skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa dang// dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang// nya sa rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang// nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya//
mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang// rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog dag kyang// rdo rje sku yi bka' pan du/ dkyil 'khor dag gis thams cad 'grub// bshang gci dang nisha chen
rnams// chani mnyam par byas nas su// kham phor sbyar mar bzhug na gi/ sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs te/ de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rjes dag
gzhug par rab tu sgrub pa'i tshig gi mchog go/ hrin 'bar ba'i 'od bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su pasam/ sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rnam par
sgos// de yi sku gsuMng thugs kyi gnas// der ni sngags kyis dbab par bya// de la 'di ni sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi sngags rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i snying po'o// a khaM d+haM // phyag na
rdo rje'i gzugs chen dang// phyag na pad+mo 'od chen dang// gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag/ bsgoms nas kasang ba'i gnas gzhag go/ de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so// nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor dbus gnas par// mi bskyod bani rab tu brtag/ tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che// rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te// 'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis// thams cad snying pos bskul bar bya//

de la 'di'i rdo rje'i snying bo thams cad bskul ba'o// u0f00mdung rtse che dang rdo rje tshe// lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje cho ga bzhin bskul na// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub// 'di skad
ces kyang gsungs so// nyams dga' ba yi ra dag dang// chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su// zla ba khyodazhi tshun chad kyis// sangs rgyas thob ba gdon mi za// rab sum cu rtsa drug gi rdul
bran ji sAd yod pa yis// de yi 'khor tshogs lhan cig tu// 'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// khrab mo'i
chos kyang thos 'gyur zhing// sangs rgyas sa yang 'thob ya'agyur/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje bzhad pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di'i mngag gshug ba thams cad kyi gsang

pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'o// de sams dpa' ye shes che// de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sku yi dgod pa che// mngag gzhug pa dag brtag tu brtul// de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi
dam tshig gi gnas so// dam tshig bskul ba dang/ dam tshig gtong pa dang// dam tsheg bod pa dang/ dam tshig bcing ba'o// mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag bani// chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyangs//

gong bu'i tshul gyis byed pa ni// rdo rje rmad byung gzugs can no// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig ba rdo rjes mas dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ sangs rgyas rdo rjesams dpa'
yang rung/ gal te dbang du bya 'dod/ rdo mchog gsum 'dzin pa che/ gsakhachen po 'di bsam mo// rdo rje 'jam ba stobs po che/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ mda' lnga'i sbyor pa dag gis ni//
dbu rgyan rtse mo yang dag so// gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas// rdo rje khro bas rab tu dbab// sngangs shing brgyal bar sgom pa ni// byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis// bsam/
gtan 'di ni zla phyed du// gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis bsgom// sngags rnams kun gyis rab gsang ba// rdo rje'i don gyis blo yas gsungs// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// nam mkha'
rnama'i dbus bsam pa// sngags kyi rdo rje hU~M la sogs// de rje gsum la sogs par sgom// o ni mig gi dbus bsams nas// 'di dag cho ga bzhin du bstan// sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni//
sku gsung rdo rje can du mthong/ bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che// sbyor ba 'din nam bsam na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur// rnam par snang
mdzad gzugs chen po// bsams na don rnams thams cad 'byor// khaM ni kha yi nang du sgom// oM na lce la 'dug par bsam// bza' bar bya ba kun gyis gnas// yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa
sto 4 zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel// ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gsheg

pa dba' bo chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje sgom pa'i tshig gi mchog rdo rje'i gsung las byung ngo// bI sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rdo rje sku gsum
sbyor ba yis// bslad de 'di ni rnam par bsam// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// cung zad sar ba rdo rje 'gying// zhi ba thor tsugs dbu rgyan can// bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya//

rdo rje dpa' bo rlabs kyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen ba sgos pa'i tshig 'di//
nyid de sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// tsu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pan// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas sprin gyi me ga yis// rdo rje gsum gyi grags chen/
lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab/ skal byed rdo rje ma sgom mo// rgyun rnams thams rud yongs rdzogs pa// kha dog dkA dzA yarab tu sgom// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// bsam la sngags kyi tshig/

dged do// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin pa sa pa/ bsam pa thams cad rdo rje langs sdod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo'i tshul 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dzaM 4 sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa dgra/ nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje bsgom pas dbeb par bya/ sbrul ni nor sgrub pa// gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya// zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa//
thor tsugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can// sangs rgyas lnga yis cho ga yis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu de yis// bsam gtan gnas la 'dug la dbul/

ba do rdza sems dpa'i cho ga yis// dbu rgyan de la rnam par bsam// de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang// gnod gnas dbang po 'od chen gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdzas sgrub pa'i tog gi dpal zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rje rje 'dod pa nye bar los spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nasaM/ gnod sbyin mo'i rdo rje'i
N+NaM dam tshig gi 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjelas phyung ngo// kI mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu bzang// thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas//
ma ma tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs// gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings ni gang bar bsams// gzugs kyi sprin dag rnam bsams la// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dubab// gzugA/
ni gcig tu bsam par bya// lus gsum rdo rje bya brag gis// de yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya// rdo rje 'jam pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// dbu rgyanal ni khro bo gam// snying khar sngags kyi tshig bsgom la//

rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa bsgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje'i

sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub phra mo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku dang/
gsung thugs yang dag 'grub// sangs rgyus gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang po// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas// ma snang la sogs yang dag grub// 'jam pa'i 'od dang 'dra

bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin rgyal po grub pa che// rig 'dzin dag gi dbang por 'gyur// de la 'di'i rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs gsang ba'i dngos grub rnams so// sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi//
mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// mthong ba nyid kyis dga' bar 'gyur// gtsug tor thams cad grub pa ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs

rgyas byang nub byed pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i de rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyagan rje cha de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs

rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// lus dang ngag sems sgom pa ni// rang tshul nyid kyis de byas te// de ltar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi
'ug/ de rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so// thor tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs// chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra// sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams// tsheg bzhin du thams cad bya// lo/

grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// rgyan rnams kun kyis rnam par klubs// bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring ba/ red nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing// rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgom
! par bya// phyag rgya sngags kyi che ga shes// sngags kyi rgyud rnams legs par bslabs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya// sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas// brtul zhugs chen po dus bzhir ni//

gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya// sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi// khoza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya// 'on tang myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/ khadag po ye shes rgya mtsho che// zla ba drug gis de dag kun// gdonami

za bar 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing// bsad pa'i ng rmad du byung ba dang// 'dod chag gas rdo rje'i gnas slad pa// sdom pa 'dis ni kun tu bsdams// 'dod chags rdo rje lcags kyu mo//
! man tan lug rgyud mA makI// gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog la// 'di ni rnam ba kun tu rdzogs// bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can// rang gi phyag rgya sems kyi bsam// de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen pa//
[“]mas par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas// nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang// kha bas bzang po bstar ba dag de dag ska gnas stor bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum
0 'das nas// rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin// lha ma yin namami mo'ang rung// red nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// rdo rjegasum gyi ye shes bsten// 'di na sngags rnams/
thams cad kyi// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul non yin// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes las 'byung// sangs rgyas byang chub rapa 'jug pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i
bal zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka'u sul to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dngos grub
thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/
pacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che Sha ro/ dbyings ni mkhas pa
rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gas nga nge ni dbyangs la phyag 'tshal le// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsala mchog gi mchog/

ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshwa lo// rin chen rgyal po rdza bra'u rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// snang bzhin dag pas gos pa med// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dpag med las ma// mi rtog nam mkha'
[， ]/rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// dag pa ngo bo nyid
las byung// rdo rje sems dpar phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun gyis bskal ba yi// bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje longs spyod bstod na ni// de yang sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas

[ ]ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse ba// rdo rje gsang ba gsung dag pa// rdo'i gsung ni bka' stsal to// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyis ni yi ge che// rang bzhin 'od
gsal yongs su dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/

gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje la phyung ngo// sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi// dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bar bya// sha chen rtag tu bza' bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ zugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya//
gsung ga rdo rje yi gi che// bshang gci dag ni rtag tu bza'// 'di ni gsang ba rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi
dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rjesams dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya// khrag dang khu ba sbyar ba dag/ brtul zhugs bstan
pas rtag tu bza'// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi brtag pa 'di// rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya// gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba// rje
sems dpa' 'od po che// de yi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa'o// de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam
tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung po/ de yi lus kyi ston pa ni// rdo rje'i sku la rab tu gnas// sems can gzung ba'i ngang tshul te// dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o//
de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag posaM/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ba'o// dge ba bcu yi las kyi
las// byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams// duman par mos pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig 'dini rmad po che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di//
nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// gti mug las kyi lam gang rnams// byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/
bu// danas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ drag po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// khams gsum dag
na gnas pa yi// bud med rdo rje las byung rnams// sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni// dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ khyab
'jug gi dam tshig 'di// nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sems can las byung josnyad pa// dbyar med sku gsum la gnas pa// de rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid
ya kyang// bsam gtan rdo rjes gsad par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rang gi dam tshig rdo rje 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las

phyung ngo// sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur// gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che// khrugs kyi rgyal bo rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi badrag pos/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// khrag dang sha ni za ba dang// rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med spyod//
dam tshig dga' ba 'di rnams kyis// rje chen po mnyes par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dam tshag 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang//

! gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyud ngo// 'o ma 'thung ba phra ma can// de dag 'dod dang dri la 'bad// dam tshig 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje da/
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pas/ lha ma srin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// khro zhing nga rgyal gsod pas non// sos dang ma
tog spyod la dgyes// rdo rje sa 'og dam tshig ste// gdul dka' de rje 'jigs byed pa'o// de nas phyogs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di//
nyid kyi sku dang/ ga gsung dang/ thugs rje rje las phyung ngo// thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar dang// zhag gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyi dam tshig ste// dag byed 'di'i don chen byed//
de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi skudang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// bshang gci dang
na khrag dag bza'// chang la sogs pa 'ang rtag tu btung// de rjemakha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis gsad bya// ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag na rnam par spyod//

sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// dam tshig ma lus da bar bya// khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dmatshig gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
bathams cad kyi bdag pos/ lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'de// nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni// rdo rje las ni
byung bar bya// sems can khams ni thams cad du// rtag par sangs rgyas su byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ ngag gi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi
sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// tshig gi las lam ma lus par// khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te// tshig gi dngos grub yid 'ong 'di// dam tshig shan tu 'da' dka' pa'o//

de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sems rdo lnga'i dam tshig gi dngos grub 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun//

rdo rje brtan pa 'dzin pas sgom// rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi// dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kun tu mdzes dga' rdo rjesams dpas de skad ces bka' su la to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// rang rgyal

nyan thos de bzhin te// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na// phyag 'tshal na ni ma rung 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/

gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi spu dang/ gsung dang/ rmugs rdo rje las byung ngo// kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rje
gsum sbyor bas// sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags sgrub pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/

thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ mdor na sams na khams na0 25 [s] ga na de rjes skal bar bya/ rdo rje gsum gyi phyag 'tshal mchogaM/ dam tshig rdo rje las byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bsnyen ba dang/ sgrub pa dang/ nyabar sgrub pa dang/ sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rje bshang garinam mkha'i dbyings//

yongs su ga nga ba'i rnam par bsam// dus gsumo rje dag dbul/ dam tshi pa rab kyi ya// de nas phyag tu rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de rjemi snang ba thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di//

nyid kyi sgra dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dus bzhir ji ltar mchog bzhin du// rdomo ni nyi'i spyad// yang na rdza sa kyang rtag tu dablog/ dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin gyi dam tshig 'di nga kyi sku dang/ gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjen// dbu rgyan dag la bsam gtan/
'a// bsam// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste// khros pa rnams kyis mi thub po// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi

dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rje las byung ngo// skal rdo rje kha zas la// phyi rol rje 'dzin pa dang// mdo gdo'atshe ga'i bya ba la// rtag par rdo rje chos su bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo

nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsungadang/ thugs kyi rdo rjemanyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs

nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi ri rab kyi rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du cang mi
gsungs bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

sku dang/ gsung dang/ zugs kyi bdag po 'di/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i yi ge'i tshig la/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so//
tha rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di sems pa ni 'di snyam du gyur to// sku ni mi 'gyur ma skyes pa// gsung dang thugs kyang mtshan ma med// nam mkha' rdo rje rtog las byung//
log par gzung pas zin pa yin// de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ gsung rdo rje'i tshig la phyin ci log kun 'byung bar mi brtag zhu gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ni/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid spyod par 'gyur ba gshegs pa dang byon pa'i rjes su 'gro'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ tshangs pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po/

mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes thob pa rnams chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/ ci rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thamA
cad kyi rdo rje'i de khon nyid yongs su ma shes nas/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnams 'chad dam snyam du sems dpa' ng ma mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems
dba' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos te/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba mi 'gyur ba red
pa'i ng sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi byang chub mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'o// rigs kyi bu

sems can chen po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kyim sems can de dag ni sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi
phyir= sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o// de nas phyaganardo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ do bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so// rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas med pa// rtog pa rdo rje las byung ba/ sba bar byed pa snga ma yin///
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'jug/ gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang/ khams gsum ji snyed pa dag/ rang gi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rgyud kyi rdo rje la gnas so// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis sur gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang khams gsum thams cad gang na gnas/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ya shes rdo rje'i bdag pos gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dngos grub dang khams gsum pa thams/
can ni nam mkha' la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gso la pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi bdag nga la bgasungs pa!/ 4 nga na'ang ma yin no//

de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ ama'o rdo rje a rdo rje// e ma'o ratshe yi bshad pa// gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de byung/ thugs ni rnam par sgom// de nas

ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas nas// rdo rje gsum mchog chen po mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyi dbang phyug mchog/ rig pa'i skyes bu sgom pa yi// dngos grub kun sa shag par madzrad// mkha'

dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas da kyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms nas// spyi bor rdo rje rab tu sgom// zhal gsum sku gsum las byung ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya//
tshe 'khor lo 'dzin bsam sa na/ bya chub myur du thob par 'gyur// thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis// gsang ba 'di ni rnamapar bsam// gzhan du rnam par bsgoms na ni// de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur//
bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum las byung rgyal mo ma// mnyes par byed ma rnam bsams nas// rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa///
khyu mchog des namanyes par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di dag sgom pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen rnams// zhag bdun gyis ni gzi che ba'i// sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom
ldan 'das kyis sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya chen pa'i
don rtogs pa// tsha ga bzhin du kun sgoms na// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob// de nas phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi lus dang/ ngag dang/ soms gsang ba 'de/ nyid kyi sku
dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgyami bcing ngo// sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyang mi 'da' lo// de nas ya

phyagan rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rje rje las phyung ngo// gshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// smad pa dag tu yong mi bya// cho ga bzhin du rtag/

tu bza'// gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byung yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// khams gsum dag gi

ma 20 ga na// bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams// thams cad cho ga bzhin duspyad// gsung gi rdo rje snyad do// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes thugs kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ sbugs rje zla 2a

phyung ngo// rdo rje sku gsum la gnas pa// dam tshig rjesAd yod pa kun/ rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis// ma du zhing rim pa dag tu bya// thugs kyi rdo rje mi snad do// bcom ldan 'dus ngas tshig chen po gsum

gyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang phyaka na rdo rje re bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i rdo rje la de nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung
dang/ zub/sa rdo smra sa phyung// mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni// sangs rgyus ltar na rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje'i skye mched nyid dag kyang// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ sa phyag na

rdo rjes khams gsum gyi khe 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ kha/ sung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sa ni sbyargyun zhes bya ba yin// chu yi khamasazhi mA ma kI// dkar dang sgrolaa zhes byu gu/ ma dang myang

du rab tu bsgrags// mkha sna dbyings rdo rje a tshig ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka'
stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang lhugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnas pa zhes bya
'a@#// ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to//
pa de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'al nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba gsang ba 'dus par mngon par dbang bskur pa'i slob dpon la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar
blta bar bgyi/ rig gas kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ slob dpon ni byang chub

tsham kya soms dang mnyam zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu mdor bstan na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyad 'khod cing 'tshol skyong ba
de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mched pas yang dag par mchod nas/ sangs rgyas kyisodir yang 'gro zhing/ bag rje'i yi ge'ang 'di
skad du 'byin to// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma'o zhes bya banas/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston
pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ dbar na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcun ji snyed bzhugs pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku dang/ gsung drang/
thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyad ba de bas kyang/ slob dpon gyi ba sbya'i bu ga gcig gi bsod nams khyad par du 'phags so// de ci'i phyir zhu na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi
somasani sangs rgyus kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'o// skyo ba'i gnas su gyur pa nas/ khroms cad mkhyen pa'i ya shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyodapa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
tumed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshags ba rnam par snang mdzod rnams/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi rdo rje'i ye shes las byung ba de rnams kyang/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon dang phrad na mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de nyid
shul/ ston pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi ya shes kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpachen po de dag thams cad kyis/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dngos gruba rnamasu ci la gnas/ de bzhin
de bzhin gshegs pa zlams chud kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsum gsang pa'i sku dung/ gsung dang/ thugs ni/ rdo rje sub dpon gyis lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems rdo rje la gnas so// byang
bung chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lus dang/ ngag dung/ sams rdo rje gang la gnas/ gang la'ang mi gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur//

rmad du gyur nas cang mi skyabar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams la bas bkalasal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khyed thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kun 'byung
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan gyi dkyil 'khor nyen cig/ de nas yang de ba zhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa// gru bzhi lham par ba tumadzes
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yi// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya// rje rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// 'khor lo can kun bazhugs par bya// mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis// blo dang
ldan pas rtag tu bya// slob dpon snying yar rab bsgoms nas// dbang bskur ba ni brtsam par bya// sangasargyus kun gyisanam mkha'i dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgoms la// dbang bskur ba yi
gnas gsum gyis// thams cad cho ga bzhin du dbab// sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// byang chub 'di yis 'bab 'gyur zhing// ngo mtshar chen po'i dngos grub kun// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par

'gyur// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba bsam gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba//
sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// hU~M hU~M khaM/ sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam//
sku dang gsung thugs gsum snying po// rdor sems dpa' bsgom par bya// drag po mi sdug khros pa ni// ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra// phyag bzhi ba yi cho ga yi// phyag na thod pa bsnams par sgom// 'od
zer lnga rnams yang dag byung// rang lce brtul zhugs can gyis sgom// bsam gtan rdo rje sbyor ba yis// khrag drang ba ni mchog yin no// rtsa gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang// phur bu drag

bo mchog dag gis// sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang// rdo rje'i sbyor bas gdab par bya// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las
phyung ngo// bza' ba'am btung ba gang nyung zad// brtul zhugs can gyis gang bza' ba// bshang gci sha yi sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du yongs su brtag/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cud kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rngamachod pa'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// mchod pa'i yo byad mchog lnga yi// mchod pas de dag mchod par bya//

'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ dam tshig shin tu 'a da' dka' ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/

gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi khu ba la sogs pa// tshog bzhin du kun mchodon// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems kyi sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sa dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rje rdza las phyung ngo// sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi// dam tshig

'dzin pa'i ma rnams l// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje spyad// sdom pa 'di ni rmad po che// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i rdo rje 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las
phyung ngo// lus dang ngag sems longs spyod kyi// gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyas/ bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya// 'dir ni yong la 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams
cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyis dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// mtho gang tsam gyi dpags par ni// spyi bor dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// o ni dbus su gos bsams
nas// bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig dag gis gzi can 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems bder gnas par// 'gyur bar 'din dog pa med// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes
snga ma'adzin pa/ thams cad kyi sa dang/ ngag dang ( sems kyi gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// mchod rten dag gi las mi bya// glegs bam bklag nga 'ang mi
bya zhing// dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjed bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dug thams cad 'byin pa 'am gnon pa dang 'dren
pa'i tha sang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// u0f00 'od zer dkar po'i 'phreng ba can// 'khor lo'i dbus su chud par gzhag/ 'od zer ser po 'khrig pa ni// ser po
'khrud/ lta bur bsgom par bya// rdor gsum 'od zer dmatshig gi/ sa bon gsang gsum las byung ba'o// de nas yang phug na rdo rje du bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus

a dang/ ngag dang/ sems bsrung ba'i 'khor le'i sprugs rdo rje dang ldan pa 'de/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// u0f00 shu lu hu lu/ ti tikA/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da had ha/
a mr-i te hUM phaT/ gro ga la sogs 'khor lo ni// las kyi rdo rje la gnas bar// haM ni dbus su bzhag nas su// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// brgyan te rtag
tu gzhag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdus pa'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de rje any+dzana'i dam tshig 'di/
nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// lam gyi nga zhi mdo shing gcig drung// ma mo'i gnas sum zhi gnas su// de ru rdo any+dza na// thod par rtag tu dbab par bya// tshal chen
pa dang/ khrag dang/ ba gang ba dang/ pad+mo'i skyod pa dang/ arku'i skud pas me mar gyi sIng po byas la tshes nyi shu dgu'i nam phyed na rdo rje any+dzan dbab par bya'o// de nyid la sngags brgya
rtsa brgyad btab na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na
da cha de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ de bzhin/
ga shegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi sdod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ de nga zhin gshegs pa de dag/
la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gas nga ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod
pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de la dad cing sgom par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamA cad kyi thugs rdo rje sku gsum mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/
de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 5tshal nas cang ma gsung bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegA
pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi 'ang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa ya nga 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas//
rgyas mar me mdzad 'das pa nas/ thub pa chen po 'od srus mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po gnas kyi
don bshad pa dri/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa 'di
skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma du ma sAd kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal yang byang
chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de/ gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o//
[“ ]de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge 'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu dusaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khye rnams ma ngu zhig/ sdug bsngal gsum la ma sgom zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ byang chub sems
dpa' de rnams kyis de skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar mi du bar bgyi/ ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi bsgom par bgyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
gsang ba'i yi ge'i ming tsam thos pa'i skal ba'ang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad ma zer cig/ yi ge ni thun mong ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed
rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang/ rigs kyi bu gsang ba'i yi ge 'di
dag ma thes shing mngon par sangs ma rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par
gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod
pa4 sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/ dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis
bzhed na/ sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi//
btsun mo mA ma kIs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ rdo rje 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i mchod pa'i mchog gi yo ga'i tshig 'dis yang dag par
bstod de// rdo rje'i sku khyed bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rjes su khan ston pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag na gson par mchis bzhed na//
'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi sku dang/
gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa/ khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse
bang 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon po gal te da ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// rab dga'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad
du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje
'dzin chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs
rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/[？]
de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin bshegs pa 'dod chags thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegA
pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor les 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ste/ bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku
gsum gyi dam tshig las yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dbal gyis reg nas/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi yashes
can du gyur to// de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po kun tu bzang po zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos
thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ donas de bzhin gshegs pa zlams cad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yang shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshags pa
thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang 'dod chags kyi yi ga'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi
byang chub rjes su rtogs pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad l 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshes thams cad ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir//
gzugs kyi phung po ma yin/ tshor ba'i phung yin/ 'du shes kyi phung po ma yin/ 'du byed kyi phung bo yin/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma yin/ khams ma yi// skye mched ma yin/ de bzhin du
'dir 'dod chags ma yin/ zhe sdang ma yin/ gti mug ma yin/ chos ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i ng ma yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag spams cad kyang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di zung zhig/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pa rdo rje tshes kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang/ gsung dang/
thugs zhugs par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid
khyu/ (la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo zla khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rje rje la gnas shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha
cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rje khams gsum thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba
gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//de bzhin gshegs
lha/ pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan poshad+d+haka ra warma dang/ zhu chen

gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po gi dz+han ka ra bas bshad nas/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis zhus gtugs g.yar khral du
'tshal ba'o// 'dus pa'i rtsa brgyud la letshon gyis bsgyur ba mang du snangana'ang/ 'gos kyis 'grub ces mdzad pa nyung bar snang la/ 'grel pa'i bshad pa 'gos 'gyur gyi steng nas byed pa la rgyud
[4 ]kyi 'gog 'gyur gal che bar mthong nas bris pa'o///de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa h+phams
cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs kyi gsang pa bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la khong du chudazhas/ chos
gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa dag/ rdo rje gsum gyis kun tu ni//
rdo rje gsum la kun tu bzhugs// sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi// rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung// sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o// e ma'o 'di rab ngo
mtshar che// e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das// a ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun// e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no// sems dpa' chen po de de bzhinano// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang
'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang bdang phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyagabyas temagrin gcig tu 'ad skad ces gsol te/
e ma 'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba// byang chub sgrub ba'i tha bas 'di yin// rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud// sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir
dang// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ tshang dag gsung bas gang bshags pa// mgon po khyed la gsol bar 'tshal// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang
chub sems dpa' de rnams la ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang zhig smras pa'i rgyud tshig de// de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// yon tan 'byung
gnas legs so legs// nas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rab tu dga' bas mig bdas te// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas// 'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur// gsang ba zhes 'di gang
la bgyi// 'dus pa zhes ni gang la brjod// rgyud kyi 'grel pa ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir rtsil bgyi// de nyid rnam pa du ru bshad// de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du// gsang chen zhes ni gang la
grwa bgyi// dam pa rnam pa du zhig mchis// byang chub sems zhes gang la bgyi/ de bzhin rig pa'i skyes bu ci// bab+hika ces pol bgyi// de bzhin dzin dzika ni gang/ de la rat+ta dz+hakani gang// de
bzhin A ro lakani ci// bar d+hAka ces gang la bgyi// rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig lags// mo ha zhes ni gang la bgyi// de ra zhes 'dir gang la 'gyi// rA ga zhes ni ci la bgyi// badzra sngags
ni gang la bgyi// ra te zhes 'di'i gang la bgyi// phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags// ya mAn kritadon ni gang// de bzhin wAdzAn krita ci// pad+man krita ming ji lta// de bzhin big+han krita ci//
kun tu spyod pa gang rtse lags// de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang// 'dir ni bzlas pa gang zhig lags// rgyas btab pa zhes gang lawigyi// chos 'byung bzhi ji ltar sgom// de bzhin sdom pa ji
lta bu// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chagasazhes// sems can don mdzad ji khu// dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bgyi// phyag rgya'i dgod pa ji ltar lags// 'dir nim tog ci zhig lags//
mchod rten zhes ni ga nga la bshad// la shes 'khor lo ji ltar shes// 'dir ni gnas shes gang la bshad// mgon po bskul ba ji lta khu// gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu// ji ltar de rnams spyan drang
bgyi// bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar sul// de bzhin rig ba'i bal zhugs gang// bdud rtsi lnga rnams ji ltar bza'// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang lags// dngos grub tha
mal ji lta bu// de bzhin mchog kyang ji ltakhu// de la thabs ni rnam pa du/ de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rdo rjecan kun gyi// bka' ni ji ltar bsu bar bgyi// las kyi mchog gi
tshogs rnams ni// sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nyi bar gsan nas/ byang chub
sams dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// snying rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas// rdzogs
wa pa'i sangs rgyus bde bar gshegs// mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
lus ngag yid ni rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs nidirdzal// bzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po// zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rjes su gsungs pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so//
bde bar gshegs pa legs so legs so// zhes gsol nas/ rang rang gi lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang/ gsung dang/
zugs derjel dmigs te cang i skya bar gyur te// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs rdo rje chen po la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po
de dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum/ gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba// tshogs pa 'dus pa/
yin par bshad// lnga pa dang ni dgu ba dang// bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// bstan pa dag ni sgrub chen yin// bzhi pa dang ni bcu dug ba/brgyad
pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa// slob dpon spyi yis las dang ni// dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin// drug pa dang ni gnyis pa dang// bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa// drag spyod rjes su chags pa
dang// nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa 'o// bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang// bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa// dngos grub zhing dmtshan s ni// bstan pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun
gyi las// tshar gcod phan 'dogs spyod pa dag/ dul dang gdul dka' zhi ba yi// sems can rnams kyis 'jug pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel ba yi// kha snyen pa rje rje cho ga bzhi// thun/
mong dngos grub 'brel ba yin// mchog tu gyur pa'i gzhung nyid do// dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs 'brel ba yi// gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o// bla mas sngags kyi 'am gyis ni// slob ma
yongs su smin bya ba// brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba// rang gi slob ma bdag nyid// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// ston pas yangs su grol ba yin// thabs dang shes rab
snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste// thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do// rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags// rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te//
nubya// gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang// mi 'phrogs pa yis rab phye ba// gzhi dang rang bzhin rgyu yin te// de bzhin mi 'phrob gas 'bras bu'o// gzhini thabs zhes bya ba ste//
gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o// rigs ni lnga dang gsum dag dang// ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya 'o// byang chub rda cha bcas gsungs pa/ de'i phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod// de nyid rnam pa lnga ru
bshad// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// lhag pa'i lha ni gsang chen te// dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya// glogam cham med zhi ba// dngos dang dngos med mi zad gtso// stong nyid snying rje mi

phyad pa// byang chub sems zhes bya ba yin// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// mi phyed bya ba'i dngos po nyid// rig dang lhan cig ldan pas na// rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do// rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras
bu lnga// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// 'chang ba 'dzin zhes grags pa ste// rnam shes rdo rje 'dzin du 'dod// badzra d+hika ni rnam shes yin// yod dang med dang dbus las 'das// 'byung dang 'byung
las gyur las byung// sems can kun gyi lus yin te// skye las rgyal bas ji na dzika/ don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na// sems ni rin po che zhes bya// tshor ba pos ni nges tshor bas// tshor ba ratwA
d+hIka tu brjod// mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid dngos po yis// kun la kun gyis thams cad du// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni// A lika ces bshad pa yin// rnam shes rab mthar phyin byed pa//
gang yin de ni shes ra ba ste// 'du byed sems dpas 'dzin pas na// 'dzA d+hika ces bya bar bshad// rigs ni rgyud ces bya bar bshad// rgyudani thog ma zhes brjod de// mi 'jig skya ba med gang yin//
mgon po don yin par bshad// rgyu 'bras gnyis la sdang bas na// rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad// bams po bcings pa'i rang bzhin pas// gzugs ni gtimug ces byar bshad// bdag tu
rtsom ba'i ngo bo bas// tshor ba dregs po yin par bshad// dngos la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid// rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag nyid can// 'du byed rtag tu
phrag dog yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// srid pa kun 'byung thams cad du// 'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad// dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra
ming mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu// gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la// nga rgyal byed pa rmongs zhes bshad// de la phan tshun 'dzar ba ni// zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad// mtshan nyid
'dod chags zhen pa yin// ma shes thabs ni rdo rjekhashad// dga' ba rdzogs pa'i lengs spyod mchog/ bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs// gti mug zhe sdang 'a dod chags dang// rdo rjel
dga' rtag par gnas// des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs// rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do// mi 'jigs bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid// dngos po kun gyi dam tshig ste//
de nyid gshin rje mthar byed de// rnamang+gashes men bdag chos rnams zhi// don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur nyid// sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste// des na rgyal ba shes mthar byed//
brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ming dang gzugs blo dngos po mad// chos rnams kad gyi dam tshig ste// des na khyab bdag pad mthar byed// mi rtog bdag nyid ches rnams ni// rang
bzhin gyis ni zhi ba'i dngos// rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na gtso bo 'gegs mthar byed// mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa/ brjod du med dang rtog bral ba// sangs rgyas byang chub ye
shes 'di// shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur// bgati mug gtimug langs spyod pas// gti mug zad phyir gshin rjegashed// des na lus mthar byed pa ste// des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur/
nyes pa nyes pa langs sdod pas// nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed// des na sems ni mthar byed de// des na nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur// 'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas//
'dod chags brad pas pad mthar byed// des na 'dod chags mthar byed de// de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed 'gyur// nyon mongs kun bad gang yin dang// de bzhin las ni thams
cad zad// sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni// bgags mthar byed ces bya bar bshad// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrib dag na// las rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ las rnams thams cad rnam
dag pas// las skyes 'bras bu rnam dgu 'gyur// gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni// rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang// rgyunyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste// drug las thugs ni kun tu 'byung//
'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug/ khro bo' dbang por rnam par grags// dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug/ sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags// rig pa'i rgyal po
zhes bshad do// ba/zugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rdo rje bdag po zhes bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdorje las// bdag nyid chen po kun tu 'byung// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i//
phung po khams dang skye mched gzugs// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sngags pas sbyor ba nges byas la// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// 'jigs pa thams cad sngangos nas su//
dogs pa med pa'i sams kyis ni// sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di la mi bya ci yang med// de bzhin mi bza' yod ma yin// smra bar mi bya cung zad med// rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med//
mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du mnyam par 'jog/ gang gis sems kun la spyod pa// kun tu spyod pa zhes bshad do// dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// rkyen gyis
gang dang gang byung med// yid de mAn zhes bya bar bshad// trani skyob par byed pa'i don// 'jig rten spyod las rnam grol bar// gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste// rdo rje kun gyis bsrungs pa ni//
no grubya// sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do/ rang rang gi ni ngo bo 'di// snying po yid kyis rnams bsams te// gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis// lces par byed cing spro/
zhing bsu// sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje bdag/ ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu// byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis/ brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med bzung// sna tshogs bzhin du sna
tsho gas spro// dus gsum sa bon dag gis bzla// brdzus pa smra bar grags pas na// ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la// sngags kun 'bod pa zhes bshad de// de nyid bskul
khar skya ba'o// ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa/ ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no// de rnams spyi bor dbang bskur dang// de bzhin kun tu mchod pa'o// rdo rje'achang ba gang yin
kha'i// rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang// bdag byin brlabs sogs de bzhin te// de yi longs spyod bzhi'i shes bya// dpa' bo rdo rje gcig bu ye// spyi bor dbang bskur re re ste// sAng go phyug
rgya sngags tsam dag/ rang rigs rim gyis rgyas gdab bo// 'bras bus rgyuni rgyas gdab cing/ rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab par// sgom gyis gzhan du dngos grub ni// bskal pa bye/
bar 'byung mi 'gyur// longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// gru gsum du rnam par sgom// kun s ser ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu
/ de dbus rnam par sgom// rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu// ye shes pa ga nyid bcu las byung// 'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing// mchog tu mdzes pa bsgrub par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i sbyin sngos pas//
mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor// de ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni// rang bzhin drimamadazhi ba// bsgoms pas skad cig nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyus spyan ni rab tu 'byung// re can gyis ches bstan
pa rim pa gnyis la yang dag brten/ bskyod pa yi ni rim nyid dang/ de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// sgrub pa dang ni nan tan dang// dam tshake de bzhin sdom pa rnams// sngar ni de kun rgyas par ni//
rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yis// gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa ni// bde sdug gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// rtag tu snying las skye bar 'gyur// chags la 'dod
chags rdo rje chun// rdo rje 'dra ban rin chen 'byung// rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes// 'dod pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs// rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa mad// kun 'gro la bde gsum bdag nyid//

bya ba dang ni da breg pa dang// spro dang rang gi bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag// sa gsum dun bskyod par bya// gsang ba dag la rgyas gdab cing// rdo rje can gyi don byed do// zhe sdang sbyor
ba'i rnal 'byor pas// zhe sdang 'khor la bskyod nas su// rdo rje drag pos bcom nas ni// yishes rdo rje can gyis bsdu// den spro bas bsdu byas la// de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o// 'di lta'i
bya@#/ sbyor ba goms byas na// zhe sdur bdag nyid 'gyur// khams gsum pa na ma lus pa// gsad dang de bzhin gso ba dang// skad cig tsam gyis byed par ni// mngon du
[“ ]nus pa de tsam med// gtamug sbyor pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gti mug 'khor lo brgyad nas nii// rgyan lasogs bkagang ci'ang rung// de dag thams cad rtag tu sku// gcig sems kyi rgya mtsho
sgom// rin chen kun gyis rab tu dgang// gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis// sbyin pa'i cherani rab tu 'bebs// rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par// rab tu sbyin dang dbrog pa nyid// sems kyi rdo rje
brtan po yis// skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// 'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dod chags 'khor la bskyed nas ni// lha mo thams cad phrogs nas su// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa
spyod// dga' sdug bde ba ras pa yis// 'dod pa'i rtsed mor rnam par 'phrul// de nas 'khor lo can kun la// lha mo la btudabul bar bya// khams gsum dag tu byung ba yi// lha dang lha min chung ma yang
skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na// mi yi budasad smos ci dgos// dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang bskur dang// las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang// nyams su len cing byin rlob pa// grub ba'i bgrod pa gzhan
yin no// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes gralags dang// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang// lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa// gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs// phung po skye
mched khams rnams ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o// de ni rtag par rgya dgod pa// dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin// 'dod rgyal khyig sngonastobs mi g.yo// lcags
kyi dbyig pa rtsa gsum dang// ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod// stong du 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes// rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi rgya// sa la sogs pa'i sems

dpa' yi// phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor pa// me long pi wang dung dang ni// de bzhen snod dang sna tshogs ras// chos 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug// rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
dpa' dang// khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo// de nas gzhan yang dpa' po gcig/ rigs ni kha dog dag gis brtag/ lha mo dgu dang nam mkha'i khams// ma rtog ces ni bshad pa yin// sku gsung
thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rigs kyi rim gyis dgod par bya// mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad// yoshes sems dpas gang reg pa// ye shes 'khor lo
zhes bshad do// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/ sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni// sad par byas pas bskul bar bshad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su//
'od zer 'gyed pa gtong pa'o// rdo rje can kun spyan 'dren sa// rdo rje can kun spyan drang ba'o// rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi// 'od zer gyis ni rdo rje kun// bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su// bcings
pa bcing ba yin par shad// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs kyis rgyas babasta// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag/
par bya// dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du// rgyud 'di la ni rab tu brtag/ bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste//
ma/ bzhi pa de yang de bzhin na// mig yangs sngagasakyi snod du rung// ma rtog bcas shing sa bon byung// blangs nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin// nam mkha'i

dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// drinu rkang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje pad+mo'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// de dag thams cad snying kha sku// rdo rje'i
lamanas byung nas su// slob ma'i bar ni dbab par bya// 'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi// dbang bskur ba yi ge rayang mchog/ las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang// gsang sngags phyoms cad 'grub
tsha sa par 'gyur// mchog tu dad cing shes rab che// gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'// sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms// dam tshig dag gi dam tshig na// bla ma la ni slob ma yis// yon rnams
rab tu phul nas ni// bla mas de ni byin brlabs te// sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya// rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid sbyor// gti mug dga'i dang yang dag ldan// gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na//
gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid sbyor// zhe sdang dag dang yang dag ldan// zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskuran// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// chags la/
'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor// 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ 'dod chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor
dga' dang yang dag ldan// ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur// rigapa'i lha mo de nyidani// rdo rje can gyi slob mas blapa// lag par lag pa bzhag
nas ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams dpang byos la// slob ma'i mgo bor lag bzhag stu// bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsko// thabs gzhan gyi ni 'tshang mi rgya// de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin//
chos kun gnyis su med pa la// dngos po gnyis su btags pa yin// de bas 'khor ba rnam bral ba// rtag tu khyod kyis mi bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul
zhugs bla med pa'o// rmongs pa gang zhig 'das gyur na/ de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'grub/ tha mal lus kyi chos lani// dri ma lnga rnams snang bzhi// ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas//

bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad// sbyar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang// snang bar bya dang gzugs snang ba// sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje hU~M las byung ba ni//
'a@#/// bar snang la gnas bsam par bya// Alas byung ba'i pad+ma ni// de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya// oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni// de yi dbus su gzhug par bya// rdo rje pad+ma
mnyam sbyor ba// 'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim par bya/ shel dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing// ye shes nyi ma gnyis par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// mtshon cha mchog
gis drangs nas ni// bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang// bza' ba'i sbyor bar babla' bar bya// bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'// yig gsum sa bon las
bskyed bya// gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'grub// mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni// tha mal pa zhis bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas nyid sgrub sangs rgyas kyis// dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin/

thabs ni rnam pa bzhi po dag/ byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bosngags// khasnyan pa'i cho ga dang po sta// nye 'ab+ba sgrub pa gnyis/
la pa yin// sgrub pa yang ni gsum pa yin// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// thun mongo mchog gi bye brag gis// bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// rdo rje bzhi pa thun mong ste// yabs bdud/ che/
yin no// dang po stong nyid byang chub ste// gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa yin// gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste// bzhi pa yi ga dgod pa'o// rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis// tha mal sgrub la
bsnyen pa bya// mchog ni ye shes bdud rtsi nyed// sbyor ba drug gis bya ba yin// bstan pa yan lag drug gis ni// byas pas sgrub pa mchog tu 'gyur// gzhan du bsgrubs par gyur na ni// dngos grub/
mchogani 'byung mi 'gyur// so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang// srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang// rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu bshad// dbang po bcupo rnams
kyi yang// rang gi 'jug gnas thams cad du// 'dod pa so sor sdud pas na// so sor sdud pa zhes bshad do// 'dod pa lan mdor bsdus nas// sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor ba yis// ga
pa bsam gtan zhes bshad de// bsam gtan de ni rnam ltar 'gyur// rtogo dang dpyod dang dga' bo dang// de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang// sems kyi rtsakha cig nyid dag ste// lnga bo der ni bsam
gtan bsta// gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du// rnam pa du mar yongs bshad pa// gsang ba gsum byung rtog pa ste// de yi longs spyod dpyod pa'o// dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa sku// bdo bsdus
kha ni bzhi po'o// shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i// rang sems lta par shes par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni// 'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs//

'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni// sna yi rtsa sor rab tu brtag/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad// nga sngags snying khar rasams nas ni//
srog ni tshig ler gyur par gzhag/ rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi// gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad// sems ni 'gog pa rdo rjer gyur// mtshan ma nyera'adzin 'byung bar 'gyur//
mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa ltar// byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin// smig rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste/ du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin// mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// mar me ltar 'bar ba'i pa'i//
sprin med nam mkha' lta bur ni/ rtag tu snang ba lnga pa'o// brtan 'gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni// nam mkha'i khams su smra bar bya// rjes dran gang zhig rnam sgom pa// de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya//
rjes su dran pa zhes bshad de// so sor snang ba de la skye// skyabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas// dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa// gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// dbus
su gzugs ni rnam par sgom// yid kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa// ting nge 'dzin ces bya bar gnas// so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na// sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis rlob// bsam
gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na// mngon shes lnga pa thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzigs// rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyisani// rdo rje
sems dpa'i yang dag 'jug/ rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni// sgrib ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// snying po de ni
thugs ka ru// khru brdo rje'i sbyor bas blta// mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni// sems ni sngags kyi dngos bya sta// sngags kyi gzugs kye tshul gyis ni// byang chub tshig bcad brjod par bya//
cho ga yang dag sbyor sgom pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te// sems de ya[–]shes gzugs kyis ni// sgom pa nye bar sgrub pa 'o// ji srida mthong ba de srid du// rnam gnyis zla ba drug
sgom// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas// thams cad du ni rtag tu bya// khal te zla ba drug gisani// ji skad gsungs pa ma mtho ngo na// ji skad bshad pa'i che ga dang// sdom pas lan gsum
brtsam par bya// de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos// mthong ba 'byung bar ma gyur cing// gang tshe byang chub ma grub na// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// de'i tshe de yi ye shes ni// 'grub pa

nges par nye bar 'byung// rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje phur bus phur du gdab/ de nas dbang du bya ba dang// bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni// yid shes
'khor lo can rnams bsdu// lha mo dgu ni spros nas su// bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod// yongs su gyur las phyag rgya bzhi// dkyil 'khor der ni brtag par bya// bdag nyid dbus su gnas/

byas la// 'khor lo can kun bsdu bar bya// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos byas la// de 'og byang chub bsgom par bya// bskul ba'i glu dbyangs bzhi yis ni// lha mos snying po bskul ba yis// dus gsum rdo rje'i
rang bzhin sems/ ye shes lta bur lus sgom mo// bzhi yis kha dog rnam par dbye// de bzhin nyams kyi snying po ste// dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu// bzhi pas 'bras bu phye ba
yin// sngags kyis tshos byed 'gyur la// rig pa'i ng tshes kyi phyag rgyas so// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dug/ gtsug tor zhes ni rnamaM par grags// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i longs spyod bzhi// rig
pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags/ de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag po rnams// 'dod pa thams cad ces byar bshad// bsam gtan rdo rjes thams cad la// dbang bskur bani rab tu bsngags// chogal/
sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu// sku gsung thugs ni rdorje yis// gnyis su med par khyed sgrub pa// sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni// rig pa'i skyes bu rje rje can//
bdag dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bskyod// skyab pa chen po zhes bshad do// bstan pa'i dus su gtsug tor che// sbyor be nyid kyi gzugs su dmigs// nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni// bdud rtsi
'khyil ba'i gzugs kyi bar/ sngags pa cho gi shes pa yis// sgrub pa rang lha'i sbyor bas// sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni// gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku// 'di ni rdo rje can kun dang//
rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang ba che// de lta'i rnam phyes shes byas nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du bskal pa bye bsani// sangs rgyus skyob pa rnams kyis kyang// dngos grub

mchog ni zhi ba dag/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bsgrub bya sgrub par yang dag sbyor// gang yin de ni bstan par bshad// rdo rje pad+mamanyam sbyor ba// nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do// yi ge hUM
dang phaT ldan pa// bskyod pa sgrub pa zhes bshad la// ngo bo nyid ni zhi de ba// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// bcom ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i kha nas/ sangs
