rgyus kun gyi thabs las byung de nyid chos rnams chos nyid de// las dang rjes 'thun gang gang gis// rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba dmigs// dkyil 'khor de dang de bskyed nas/ dam tshig me
zad bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig dang po bsrung bar bya// de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni// chog ji skad gsungs las byung// las dang gang pa dang / sa 'thun pas//
rang gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgo// bsgrub bya'i las gang yin pa la'ang// dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su// de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la// de yi nyes pa bsgrub pa bya// de nas
de rnams de bcom nas// byung bar gyur par rnam par sgom// dngos pa kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas// dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni// de ni rang gi 'kher ler gzhu// ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas
rnams kyis// de yi gzugs bar n byas nas ni// khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni// rkang pas mtshan ma mnan par bya// de nas bka' mnos khro bo ni// sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams//
/ @#// sgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni// bsgrub bya gsad phyir gtang bar bya// khro bo'i rgyal bo des bskor nas// da ni bcings shing brtag pa dang// de nas brdungs shing skrag gyur pa//
[G ]sgrub ba pos ni dgug par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni// de yi gzugs brnyan la phab nas// sngags pas rdo dag gis ni// spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha ru// phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu gdab//
yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun// sna tshogs yul las byung ba rnams// gzugs de la ni phabanas su// de rnams kyini phur bus gdab// de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis// cho ga ji skad gsungs pa
bzhin// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor la sogs// las kyi dbye bas sbyabar// mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas pa 'am// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gam// bsgoms pas gdug pa'i
sems can ni// zos par gyur par rab tu brtag/ zhi la zhi ba'i sams kyis bya// rgyus la dga' ba'i yid kyis te// dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya// khro bgatum pas rab tu bsgrub// ces pa'o//
denas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi ze tsam thams cad bcad par mdzad nas/ thi tsamaM thams cad gcod
par mdzad pa sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rjel zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen bo de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do// thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsung la phyag
'tshal 'dud// thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// sku gsung thugs ni thob 'gyur bas// sems can
sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam// bsgrub bya su yin sgrub po gang// sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis// ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur// gal te gos
'gyur 'bras bu gang// de nas de bzhin gshegs M pa de dag thamasacad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems
dpa' chen po legs so legs// bdag nyid chen po legs so legs// gsung dbyangs chen pa legs so legs/ mchod pa chen po legs so legs// slob dpon byang chub rdo rje can//
dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin// bskyod dang sdud par mdzad pa po// des na de yi sdig me 'byung// bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin te// gang
'asdig dang bsod nams med// de ni byang chub yin par gsungs// mgon po de yi bslu ba yis// lus can thams cad 'jig mdzad kyang/ ngan 'gror skya bas 'gyur zhing// byang chub kyang ni
red mi dkag/ sngon ni mi bzad las byas pas// gal te mal ba rnams su ni// skye bo su 'gyur de rnams kyi// dmyalab rnams kyi 'bras bu che// byang chub rdo rjes
bsgrub bya 'di// ye shes kyis ni rgyas btab pas// sems can rnams kyis sbyong ba des// mchog tu phan ba tags shes par bya// tshar gcod pa dang rjes gzung las// bdag nyid chen po
de yis khyu// sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da rnams rdo rje can gyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyis chos
thos bas dga'i zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis legs so zhes gsol te// mgon po chen po legs so legs// sgrub pa chen po legs so legs// chos rnams chen po legs so legs//
thugs rje chen pa legs so legs// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// khrugasardzachen po dri ma med// gdug pa mi bzad las kyis kyang// sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang
bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing/ skrag par yang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub rdo rje las byung ba// zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs//
00 sngags kyi rgyud ni bsdus pa dag/ yongs su spang bar mi bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la/
mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid dang thur gyur gang// zhi zhing sgrib med nas mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs
rgyus rnam rgyas byang chub dbang phyug rdo rje can// de lus ngag yid kyis rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang// rnam par shes dang skye mched
dug dang ra bang po drug/ sa chusaM dang rlung dang nam mkha' thams cad ni// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje tshes bcas gad//
rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel bar// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas myos pa'i dngos gyur pa// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// spro dang dga'i dang rnam pa
de bzhin mi 'gyur dang/ rgyudang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems su rjes thogs chos/ rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal le//
gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam dag 'di sgom pa// thabs dang shes rab las byung sngos dang rnam par bral// gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyorab rtag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar
zhi/ @#// blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'disgom zhing// bsenapa'i tsheg bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang// sgrub pa chen pos blo mi 'gyur

la ba'i sgrub dbang po// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byed pa// mi snang la sogs sna tshogis mchog dang doman 'grub cing// bla ma'i
drin gyis 'di na ma nor lam rtogs pa// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig gsaMng 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan ba dang// 'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sams
pa dang/ mchod bar byed pa dung ni 'dri 'am 'drir 'jug pa// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang du zhi sogs las tshogs shin tu brtags pa yis// 'khrul
'khor sngags kyi chog de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i// bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang gis gtso bo sgrubal
po mthong reg pa dang// reg par dran dang ming tsam shes pas thos pa dang/ dad ba'i byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa drug/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal
bstod pa'i tshig zhi ba 'dis// 'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang// byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la// mgon po de dag rjes yi rang// 'dus pa gsang ba las phyung ba// de bzhin
00 gshegs pa kun gyi gsang/ rgyud kun bdag pa'i dbang po yis// rgyud 'di legs par gsungs pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang/ byang chub sems/
dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sku dang/ gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs
rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dus pa las/ gsang ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje'i

nges grol zhing// shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur// dbu dges ming las byung ba ni// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste// dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas// rang nyid kyang ni mi shes so//

kyi bde ba byed// de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// mgon po rnam snang chen po la// de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa// gang shes bya med byang chub ni//

rdo rje can gyis de shes nas// de nas slar yang zhus par gyur// gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i// rnal 'byor zab mo bu med pa// 'di ni 'di ltar sngags pas bsngags// 'tshal/

pa'i don ni mkhyen nas nii// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// gsang sngags tshul ni ma chog 'gyur 'di// gsang ba khyod la bstan par bya// 'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che/
gsang sngags kun donas skor ba'o// ra ni lA yi bdag gyur cing// sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag/ lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni// gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar//
rgyu mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa// dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin// bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i// gsungs pa'i don de ma shes pas// sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag/
de tsho ji ltar byed par 'gyur// don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni// sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// gsang sngags rig pa mchog rnams byed// bdag ni stong dang yang
dag sbyar// yi ge a ni skyang du gnas// phye ma zhes bya gnas byas la// sngags pas sems can don rnams bya// yi ge o gnyis sbyor ba gang// a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs
kyi rnam pa de// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// gang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni// bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos nyid// bdag gis zhes rtogs de 'gyur ba// thogs med rtog pa 'di gnas so//
ston pa po dang bstan dang gnas// phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo de// kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig la// sngags pa rnams kyis thos de 'gyur// shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams
kyis gang mkhyen pa// sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig na// skad cig lardzogs byang chub thob// kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa// gsang sngags ston pa'i chos can te// de nyid kho na bcom ldan
mchog/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes// mi rtoganam mkha' ji bzhin de// gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra// sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni// 'dod pa kun la nyapar spyod// thams cad 'gyur
ba gang gang yin// de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur// de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas// kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa// de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur// 'gro ba yang

bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin bshegs kun bdag po 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su yang// rnam par gzhag ste bzhugs par gyur// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang// don

byin rlabs bla na med// der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs// de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyis// thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste// byang chub sems ni

de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang// de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad l// ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus// phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos// 'dus la gang zhig/

ba dang// khyad par du yang rku ba dang// gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing// smad ba gzhan yang byed par 'gyur// la la dam chos spong ba dang// de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste// sna tshogs

bzhin du// sna tshogs 'gro bar de dag 'gro// mi rtog pa yi sems de ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang// di ni phyin ci log gyur pas// khyi dang bye sbyang glang po dang// sems de ltar yang
'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin dun phag nyid dang// mi yi rigs ni snyig mkhan dang// sma sha can dang rigs ngan dang// bza' dang mi bza' bya kun tu // byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur// khram
ze kha sogs 'jig rten shes// byang chub sems las 'byung par 'gyur// bung sogs dngos po mad 'gyur las// rang gi myong ba shes par 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad// 'jig rten pa ni

byang chub sems// zhi bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas sku ru 'di 'byung ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid// tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje snying
bo'i don gsungs pa// 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig bu la// phyag 'tshal nas ni sa' gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni// byang chub sems ni rab gsungs nas// ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa/
ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs// lta ba thams cad rab spang phyir// khyed kyi chos rnams ston mdzad na// ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid// lta ba de ni rab bstan 'gyur//
dgongs pa'i galarmongs pa rnams/ gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas// gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes// de ni ji bzhin sgrar 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lag
nardordzol gsungs kha/ khyed gsungadagos pa ma rtogs la// 'dri bar byed pa legs so zhes// byang chub sems nicung gyur cing// nam mkha'al ni rnam gnas ba/ sems can kun gyi srog/
gyur gang/ lnga yi bdag nyid bsu ming can// don 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa// ngob nyid rnam gsum du 'gyur// rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems// dbang pakun gyi gtso 'di yin//
ji ltar mi mngon phra ba las// rtag tu gsal ba brjod pa yin// 'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa// 'dir ni de la brten pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod
rnams// de nyid gsum gnas la brten nas// de kun byang chub sems kyi byed// ji srid 'jig rtenabatags pa dang// de bzhin btags pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam rtog byang chub sems
zhes pa'i// rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin// bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi// sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin// byang nubasams kyi ngo bo 'di// phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam//
shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ klog dang bsam gtan rnam sangs par// bdag por bdag nyid zlos pa de// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis//
ni zla rab tu sbyor ba yis// dngos po gud par 'gro khyab ga/ byang chub sams kyi rlung gcig pu// dge dang mi da ga 'bras spangs nas// nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin// 'gro ba'i don ni
shes pas kyang// ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya// dbyangs kyi zung du nyin mor bshad// ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad// dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba las// de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya//
sa ma 'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung// de nyid pagazhan las de nyid gsal// de las 'jig rten pa yi brda// myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pa ni// byang chub sems 'di
thos pa dang// gtso bo rnam snang chen po las// khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa// sems can thams cad skyed pa po// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// de bas dngos po med gyur kyang//
srid pa dag tu rab tu grags// byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa// legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po// skya bo mchog la de bstan gsol// sgrub pa yin thabs tsam
zhig/ shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis phyogs// 'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes// ma 'ongs pa na smyo bar 'gyur// bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag/ yin zhes smra zhing byas pa 'jig/ des ni dgongs
pa'i byang chub sems// ji bzhin don du mi shes so// de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni// skalamed chos kun rnams spangs la// rig pa yang ni mi mthong bas// de rnams la/
grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa las/ byang chub sems kyis nges pa'i don// slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa// nang na ma yin phyi rol min/ gnyis ka ming du 'ang 'gyur ma yin// rtag pa ma
ma// phal ba la nyam zakha pa na// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/
yin skad cig min// de ni so so rang rig yin// mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin du// byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byung/ 'dus/
dung ma 'ongs pa nyid dang// da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang// sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba/ don dam gcig kun rdzob yin// rig byed dus dang me yi sgra// nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can// khazhi
phyir gsum pa dag las byung// byang chub sems gcig dbye ba nyid// de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel// de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang// ha ni sa la gnas pa yong// gnas skabs ji snyad de
bzhin du// ming ni yod pa ma yin pa// de 'di byang chub sems su 'gyur// de rje nang du zhugs gyur pa// bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin// lhodapa gnas zhes bya ba ni// tshig drag bcas pa'i chung

yin no// rang nyid lhod par byed pa'i mchog/ de ni srog dbang yi kyang yin// nga rgyal dang ni de bzhin blo// de dang ldan pa byang chub sems// bzhir grags chalas yang dag byung// yod med rab tu zhi ba can//
dngos po mad pa'i sams 'di ni// rang rigagacig pu'i spyod yul yin// de nyid don ni rig byed pa// dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di// chesakyi yi ge mchog
thos nas// byams pa zhes la sogasapa yi// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar rmad byung legs skyes nas// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas a ma'i chos//
la ma'o tshos ston mdzad pa// dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu// dag pa'i de nyid don dag ste// rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag mad chos las
yang dag byung// byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa/ gang ba med cing dmigs su med// byang chub lamasal phyag 'tshal lo// kun bzang gcig las yang dag byung// dgongs don byang chub ster ba po
byang chu ba stoda mchog rdordzi'atshog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal le/ dag ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig/ byang chub sems
la phyag 'tshal logo/ dgos pa lung ston la dpa'// gang gis yid ni bzod gyur la// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las// des ni de bzhin byab yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//
rgya bcu ga'i 'og ma rgyud/do gsum gyi gsang ba las// yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa/ le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad////de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje// gsum/
dang tshul gsum lam gsum mchog/ rnam thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa// 'bro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje dang//
ting nge 'dzin la snyomus zhugs te// de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs// rdo rje dkod pa mchog 'di yi// le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyen// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun// phra mo rnal 'byor
dag pa zhugs// a ni gcig dang yang dag ldan// A r+ya tAni gnyis pa ste// dzAn zhes ni gsum pa yin// badrazhes bya bzhi pa'o// swa b+hA ba at+makalnga par grags// a hazhes pa drug
par brjod// de ltar bder gshegs drug pa ni// skye bo mchog la bstan ba yin// o na rgya sku zung dang po'o// dzAn badzraganyis pa yin// sra b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM gyur// de nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags
pa'o// de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par// mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no// mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni// 'od zer sprin gyi tshigs chen po// yi ge ma yin 'od kyis khyab// kun
nas yongs su zlum po'o// 'dod yod lnga yis kun tu khyab// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya
mchog/ de nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan// yang na rdo rje gsum mgon kyi// phyag rgya yang ni rnam par bsgom// mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che// tshogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang// dkon mchog dpal gyi
rgya chen dang// tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang// de bzhin don yod gzugs rus rgya// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tupasgom// rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ rab
'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gcig la 'jigs 'jigs lta// 'dzam bu chu po'i gsar 'od 'adra// sangs rgyas spyin gyis rab tu 'khrigs// don phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgoms/
shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan// rab 'bar lag 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mar gad ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas
rnam par brgyan// 'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshog sakyis khyab// rin chen de la rnam par bsgoms// 'dod chags chen po rdo rje can// pad+ma rA ga'i ma dog 'dra zhing// thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan//
phyag na pad+ma bsnams par bsgoms// sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za// 'od chen sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba// zhi ba sangs rgyus dkyil 'khor du// phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgoms// de ltar rnal
'byor bshar pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag pos thos nas ni// phra mo'i rnal 'byor cha dag kyang// de bzhin gshegs bdag la zhus pa// phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs
pas bka' stsal na// mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur// cig shos phyi rol du bsgoms pa// dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas
ming can ni// dngos po med pa'i dngos po la// sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag/ mgon po phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'di// dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol ces// gang zhig ma 'ongs pa rnams ni//
'di ltar mchog tu'ang som nyi 'tshal// lag na rdo rje grags ldan pa// phra mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes// 'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis// phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// rnam lnga
mngon par byang chub 'di// ma 'ongs skya bo rgyur gyur te// chos ni yang dag sdud 'gyur gang// ji lta ji ltar ston par byed// phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur// khyang chub don gyi rkyen las byung/
de yang de bzhin gshegs bshad pa// de nyid gnyis mad spor bas so// ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni// blo yi de ngos grub ston pa po// thog mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni// phra mo zhes ni bya bar brtag/
mi gsal gsal bar yang dag sbyor// dngos med ngo bo las skyes pa'o// gzod ma nyid nas rang grub pa// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// rten 'brel chos zhes grags pa ste// dngos
po thams cad gcig tu byung// bdag nyid 'di 'dra byas nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin sor// dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste// bzhi bzhi
gcig tu sbyor ba yang// gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri// de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas// zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min dang// stong dang thad ka mnyam dang 'og/ ji lta ji ltar gos
dkar sogs// ma dang rlung dang dbang chen dang// chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la// bco brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad// de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad// ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni// mar
gsar gnas par gyur pa yin// de bzhin gos dkar la sog la// zhi ba nyid ni de gnas so// gzugs la sogs pa nang gi tshes// mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin// mi bskyod la sogs
grangs ji bzhin// rtog pa dag na zhi gnas yin// 'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i bdag/ de bzhin nyid ni zhi zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs
par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub du byung// sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid// shes rab thabs la gnas nas ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlus// bya ba thams cad nyid du yang/
rnal 'byor rig pas nyal sogs la// ming med brjod du med pa dang// dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla// gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa// brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga//

bzhi pa legs par bsgros pa yis// sbyor bzhis bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu// dgu brgyadag tu gang bstan pa// rtingashu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyisan// de ni so sor 'byung ba las// nyi shu chig stong drug brgya 'o//
de 'dir gsang bdagongs pa yis// phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin// klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi// 'on kyang bzlas ba yin par bshad// de ltar rnam pa mang po yi//
'gro la phan pa'i gsung thos nas// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus/ gang zhig bsgoms nam 'ongs 'gro// thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba// rdo rje gsum gyi snying
bo mchog/ snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nyid gsum gnyis med sbyor ba// de ni phra mo'i rdo rje sgom// myur ba la sogs gsum spangs pa'i// rnal 'byor par ya nga bdag cag 'gyur//
de ni bdag rig yid ches shing/ dazhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur// phra mo'i rnal 'byor gtso sangs te/ log pa'i rnal 'byor kun tu bstan/ ston pa po yi sbyor ba bzhin// phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni//
ma 'ongs dus nasos 'gyur ba// de nyid de ni nges par byed// de nas rdo rje 'dzin sA ba'i// lung bstan pa ni gsan pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// chos nyid ngo bo nyid ces bya'i// ting nga/
'dzin de kun sanI/ snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad// dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas// gsang sngags 'di ni bka' stsal to// skugasung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad// khyad par du ni
byin rlab pa// gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// de ni yang dag bshad par bya// o ni dang por shes par bya// d+harma zhes bya gnyis pa'o// tu zhes bya gsum par bshad// spab+hA bar grags bzhi pa ro/
AtAkaThani lnga pa yin// a ha du gyur drug par 'dod// sngags 'di brjodran s de 'og tu// sgom pa bdag nyid can gyis bsgoms// rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshodatsam/
nyams dga'i ri 'bartse mo ru// rnal 'byor pa yis rtagrwa par bsgom// rin chen mi g.yor gyur nasaso// mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi bya// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba// mchog rab sprin rnams
sngo bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang// pad+maral gri mchon cha mchog/ byang chub sams dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas por//
rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// khazlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba yang// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du// dngos la brtson pas rin chen bsgom// dkyil 'khor

sbyor ba las byung ba// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du bri bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/ phra mo rdo rje gsum sgrub pa'i// rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o//
dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi// lung ston dam pa 'di la ni/ gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni de bzhin byed pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// rdo rje phra mo de nyid las//
di ni rdo rje dkod pa'i mchog/ le'u gsum pa nyid yin no///de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad// gnyis su med par gyur nas ni/slar yang rdo rje gsum bangag la//
bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'khas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa// chos kun gcig tu bdag med pa// dkyil 'khor/
mchog 'di bshad du gsol// yongs su rdzogs par yang dag brgyan// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// ye shes
spyod pa'i don las byung// zhi ba'i chos ni sbyor ba pa// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dngos mchog dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// rang bzhin gyis ni dri mad dag/ sems ni kun tu /
bzang po nyid// sems can kun gcig tshoba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po// 'jig rten gsum
mchog rdo rje mchog/ 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o// nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la// thugs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor
dam pa bka' stsal to// de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje ye shes ba 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang lhugasa rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad pa'i pya// 'di ni gsal ba'i
bdag nyid mchog/ legs sgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o// sna tshogs lung gi mtshan mani// mtshan ma bzang ba'i de bshad do// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dge/ gnyis su mad pa mdzes pa yin//
shes rab 'den thig yin te// skyabs ni de yi rjes 'jug pa'o// shes rab zla bas kyi thig gcig gis// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni// sems kyi dkyil 'khor sgrig gang ba ste/
rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gru bzhi yin// bsdu dngos bzhi grags sgo yin te// re re'ang bzhi yi ming can no//
chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda// 'khor lo'i nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// mi phyed ye shes mtshan ma ste// rdo rje a nI la rgyu// rnam pa lnga yis rab phya ba'i// rtsa mo 'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o//
shar nas ma yong ngo bo ni// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// lho ru kun mnyam ye shes len// gcig gi ming can rin po che// nub tu so sor rtog pad+ma// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba//
byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin// 'gro ba'i rnam rtog 'joms byed pa// bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur// 'od 'phro 'ba' ba 'dra ba'i mdog/ shar lho byams pa'i ng sbyan yin te// sprin
sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od// lcenub snying rje zhes bya ba// mA ma kI ni rigs rje rdzo/ nub byang pad+ma zhes bya ba// dga' ba legs par gnas pa bzhin// byang shardza ut+pal ltar snang ba'i/ dbang
snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra// de bzhin shar sgor spyin pa ni// the ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas// de bzhin sAn skya zhes grags pa// dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje'abar// nub tu don spyod ces bya
rtamagrin gyi ni pad+ma'o// don 'thun pa ni rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'khyil ba'i rdo rje na// phyag rgya dgod pa'i mtshan nyid de// 'di ni legs par bshad pa yin// ji ltar dbyis kyis mchod
pa ni// rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur ba yin// dang por chen po de da pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang// shes nas 'gro la phan par
'gyur// rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung// de tshe bla gzer 'phrangab yi// skad cig la sogs dus dbye pas// lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming// ma skyes par 'byung gi bani// bud med ces ni nges par
bshad// zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa// mdangs bzang 'od ni yin par ba/sungs// na 'brelabag chags dri yin te// ye shes kha phye ma tog go/ dngos po med par rigs yin te// kun mkhyen ye shes
y+Yo/ dbus nyid do// chos dbyings nyid kyi bud mni// shes rab 'di 'drasamanyes par byas/ nang nam yin phyi ma yin// gnyis kar ma yin gzhan nas min// gnas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur// de bas
mAm kIr bshad de// de yi ngo bo de gcig la// byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do// nam mkha' nga ni gcig tu gnas// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de bas yul du rnam brtags pa// bsdu kha
dag ni bshang ba yin// ye shes dbang po stong pa gcin// rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag/ rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags pa// de nyid lha rnams zhes bya sta/ 3/
dngos med pa ni dbul ba yin// de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa// de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid// mi phyed rdo rje
gsum bsgoms pa// gsar ba nyid du bkal legs dang// shin tu tshad ldan mdzes pa yi// thig ga mkhas pas thig gdab bo// blo ldan dkyil 'kher brtag bya ba// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad/
tsam la// dngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya// de yis dbus su 'khor lo ni/ dgongs pas dang por bshad ba ste// de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'di na 'jig
rten pa rnams rtogs// gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas// de ni gzungs kyis dbang bskur ba// dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dag/ yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs// das pa 'jig rten shin tu
'dus// 'khor ba dang ni cig shos spung// len pa ma yin gtong kha min// med pa ma yin gnas ma yin// blo ldan kun tu 'di shes pa// rnal 'byor thams cad reg pa mchog/ lugs kyi dkyil 'khor
le'u 'di ni// ngas pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad// dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa// de rnams shes rab zabs dag ni// ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed//
gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las// lhugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le 'u ste bzhi pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ rdo rje gsum bdag 'gro ba'i khro//
slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la// sngags spyod dan gyis de nyid zhus// sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa cig/ khyad par du ni bsrung bsab pa// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung/
spyod pa bcom ldan bad du gsol// de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig/ gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu// gsus pa'i don can bka' stsal to// mi rtog
na las yang dag byung// zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin/ dngos med la gnas gti mug ste// 'dod chags 'dod chags las byung ba/ 'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin/ theg pa mchog
ni ba med pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad// dngos grub de ni 'di sgrub bo// rigs ngan gyur bar shes par bya/ smig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin// mtshams mad
byed pa ba nyis ka ste// gsod pa den gnyer sogs pa po// theg pa chen po khu med pa'i// theg pa mchag 'de 'grub par 'gyur// sems can sdig chen byas pa dang/ gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa/
po gang yang slob dpon smod pa yis/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'di nyid dad pas myur du ni// zhe sdang dag la gnas pas gnas/ gang zhig phung sogs dngos med par// zhi gnas
las khyung sems kyis byas// de ni srog gcod byed pa ste// thag pa mchog la gnas pa yin// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag/ rten 'brel gnyis su ston pa ni// de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste// gnas med
la ga nas rnal 'byor pa'o/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi shes gang/ ro ni rdzas su shes bya lta de 'phral ngang tshul gang yin pa// gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod// gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig la/
de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba// sems can de de 'dod la dga'/ sgrub pa mchog la dam par 'agyur// de yi stong nyid gti mug la yul ni bshang ba zhes grags te// dbang po gcib zhes bya la// de

dag zhi ba khra ba yin// theg pa chen pa tshos mchog 'dir// de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// de tshe brdzun du 'dod pa dang// bshang gci zas su byed pa'o// shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab// tshes kyi ska ni
ma gcig pu// gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// dngos med so 'dod spyod pa// le ngas spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin// de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// gsang
sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya// bshang gci bras su byed pa yi// sprul sku'i gzugs can bu mo de// sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya// ma dang sring mo bu mo ni// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mes byas//

theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la/ dngos grub rgya chen des thob po// ji ltar mi rtaganam mkha'ani// kun tu khyab pa'i kha nas gyur// 'di ni sgom ba zhes bshad de// ting 'dzin bsam mi khyab ces bya// de nyid
'jig rten par byung ba/ rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can no// sangs rgyas yul gyi ma shes la// 'dod spyod gsal ra mi 'gyur te// rnam pa mi rtag sbyor gcig gis// myur du sangs rgyas des theb 'gyur//
de nas bcom ldan 'das gsungs ni// sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches// thos nas ngomatshar rmad du gyur// 'di ni bdag po
bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ ceyi slad du tshig ngan pa// de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung// 'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang// gti mug bral ba
rmongs bcas dang// zhe sdang bral ba sdang ba cas pa'i// rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing// gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes ba dang// 'tsho ba la sogs yongs spangs pa// 'di ni de byed soms can
rnams snod yin zhes ni thu ba gsung ngam// de nas mgon po thugasaNe can// sems can kun la phan dgyes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs
ba 'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa// sems can kun 'a jin gcig pu pa// chu khams rtog dang bral ba po// sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin/ bdag po mi yi gzugs can te// khams cud lnga
bar nyabar sbyor// de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig lu// bcom ldan sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs// thams cad snang zhing bro ba po// de nyid bdag nyid bdag
yin pa'i// bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing// sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyis/ byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di
yin// de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa/ brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyam de// sgrib pa thams cad sal la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches//
kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de sbrams cad// gcig tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to// de nas gsang dbang de rje gsung// gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun kyis/
byang chub sems dpa rgyalob tu// gzigs nas gtsal 'di skad gsol/ mgon pa sgrib kun srol la sogs/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi mas dpa' che// rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta
bar// 'di rnams bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ mi g.yo ba 'di gsang ba ste// zhi ba gcig pu bdo ba'i mchog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa// 'di ni dgongs bas gsungs pa yin//
da nges po med cing 'khrug pa med// yid 'ong rdo rje tshig gcig pu// 'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis// bye brag mang por gyur pa yin// nam mkha' mtha' yasasbyor ba yis// gzugs la sogs/
pa mtha' yas te// de yang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang// byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur// de las skye zhing bsdu ba dang// zhi ba nyid las la sbyor bas// ye shes lus can la shes na//
brgyal lo zhes ni shes pa ni// yan lag dbye ba gang dang gang// 'gro ba zhes ni grags pa dag pa// de de rang lha'i sbyor ba lasaM// dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rang sa gang
yin pa// de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu// 'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la// byang chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur/ des ni bden 'de ma shes pas// dbyangs bcas
rgyal la bskal ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che rgyal ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba rdo gsum/ dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa dag/ de rje 'dzin pa'i tshig
gsan nas/[“]ting nge' dzin ni mngon du mdzad// gnyis su med par mnyam rdo rje// 'gro la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i/ 'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa po// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs/
mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yi// 'od gang chen por gyur pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' des reg pas// rang gi stan la gnas par gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// ngo mtshar rmad du
gyur skrun dang// dgyes shing mgu ba skyes gyur nas// chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o chos la ma'o chos// a ma'i chos kyi don byung ba// bdag med chos ni yang dag dag/ chos kyi
rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don// dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// mi 'gyur don las yang dag byung// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// thuba mchog gcig pu de bzhin
gshegs// dus gsum dag gi lam du byung// rdo rje dbyings gcig rdzogs longs spyod// nam mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs ni nam mkha' ste// spyod pa'i mchog ste
tshes gcig ldan// de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa// spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// dugongs pa lung bstan la tha/nas nas// gang zhig spyod mchog 'di rten pa// gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag/
de ni ci dga' bar yang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsum gye re ni mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi/spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin//de nas
dpal chen gyi bskyod pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'i// gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin// zhes bya ba dang po/
yin// sarba ta b+hA ga ta gnyis/ tsi t+ta gsum par yongs su brtag/ badzrab zhi pa'i gong mar ldan// srab+hA wa At+mako lnga pa// a hiM dus kyi ming can yin// sku drug gsum pa'i ming can no//

de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyomasazhugs nas// sku ni khyen gyis brlab pa gsung// o zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis ka
kA la chags thogs dbang phyug ste// badzrarig byed yin par bsgrags// srab+hA wa At+ma ko 'dod lha// a ho skam byed ces brjod de// dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags// shes rab dbye bas
dbya bar bya// de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i// kun tu mi gnyis rdo rje can// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// gsung ni khyin gyis rlob pa gsung// o na dang por bsgrags pa yin// sam+bar
b+ha ga ta gnyis// buka ces bya ba gsum pa yin// badz+dza dus kyi ming du 'gyur// sra b+ha wa At+taka pa// a haMzhes lo drug pa ste// gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams// re re/
ning drug gsum du bshad// thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung// ma dang rim gyis min pas gsung// bdag po las ni gcig pu las// rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung// yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung/
de nyid ga sum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de bas 'di ni sgom pa mchog/ g.yel ba med par rdzogs par bya// 'di bshad pa yi blo ldan pa// rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas// sgom pa'i bdag nyidacan gyur cing//

sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya// de nas dkon mchog dpal 'di yang// sgron mardo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// on zungagi dang por ldan//
sarba ta thA ga ta zung// de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs// thams cad me longami ngacan no// a nu ra ga skye medade// de ni gsum pa yin par gsungs// rkyen dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'i/ kha yang ni
bzhi bar gyur// dngos mdu bdag nyid can serashes// su b+hA wa AtAkazhes bshad// ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// a haM so son rdzogs longs spyod// dngos po med
ba'i rang bzhin can// bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa// mchod pa drug pa'i ming can no// dngos med gnas pa'i bdag nyid na// de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog/ de lta'i chags pa'i de bzhin gshegs//
mgon po thams cad mnyes par bya// de nas dpal chen gdon mi za// don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// sa ni gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM zhes bya ba dang por

ldan// sarba ta thA ga taganyis// pU dza rnam par thar pa'i ming// padzrasems ni rnam sgrom pa// sAmU wa At+ma ko zhus bshad// a hiM ba rol phyin zhes bya// lnga pa drug dang gsum du bshad// gzugs dang
sgra dang dri dang// reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings// de dag dngos med gyur byas pa// de nis ngas rgyas mchod mchog yin// mig sogs zhes las yang dag byung// mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes//
mchod pa lnga bshad 'di rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje'achang// so sor khyang chub ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po khrub pa chen pos
yang gsungs pa/ sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la// gang tshe ming ni ma gyur pa// de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba// dngos grub rab mchog de thob 'gyur// bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing//
lus dang ngag kyang rnam par sgom// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas sgom zhing// sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par@// rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na// shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin// sngags kyi rang bzhin
sbyor ba yis// smos pa med cing byang chub med// rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du// mdor na rnam par brtags nas su// sngags la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin// gnas la gnas mo nga bsgom par bya//
de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po'ang// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis// bsgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal te// nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas// phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// lus ka gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// sna yi rtsa mo'i bdag
nyid can// rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan// de'u gnas par mkhas pas bsam// blo ldan ser shes kyis nga rtogs pa'i// gsang ba'i ye shes gnas bsgom mo// gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste//
de nyid gsum nodam tshig mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pas// nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor sgom// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgom te// de yi stang du gnas bzhug go/ dbang phyug chen po
skam khyed de// ga zhi phyed nam mkha' mtshon pa dag/ bdud rtsi zhes ni btags pa gang// den hU~M zhes bya bar 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyis kyi dbus gnas par/ 'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong sgom//

spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+mo gnyis sgom pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du rnam par smyos//
nam mkha'i dbyis kyi dbus gnas pa// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid sgom// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas dgod pa// 'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskol// ut+pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse molnga

pa 'od po che// nas kyi 'bru tsamanan tan gyis// ri rab rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsan ka yi 'bru tshod kyis// 'dab ma brgyad pa gsar bcas// sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse// byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya///

'khor la la sogs sgom pa ni// de yi khyad bar dag tubartag/ yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas// byang chub gnas mchog bu med pa'o// sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs// mdor na nga ni spro bar bya//
gang tshe chos nilegs mtshan pa// rdo rjegacig ni bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po// dag pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog/ 'gro kun don du ston pa pos// gsang ba mchog ni/
paka' stsal to// skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang// zla phyed zu ba lo la dus// bskal pa grangs mad gsum po na// skad cig gcig tu mnyam par bshad// zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin// dngos
mad rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o// skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste// dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// rnal 'byor pas na zla drug sgrom// mchod
chen de ni byas nas su// gsang ba'i bde nyid rnam par sgom// yul dang dbang po sams pa ni// bshang gcu khras su byed pa po// byas n de 'dra'i dngos grub ni// bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o// de nyid
'di ni bla med pa// byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o// rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing// mi rtog don ni 'grub par 'u gyur/ ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de// sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o// bsam
@#// gtan de ni da bar spyod pa/ sha zhes bya bar da bshad de// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni// shachen de ni yin par bshad// gsang ba pa yi ge 'phang mchog/
jo rje gsum ni myur du 'grub// dam tshigachen po byung chen rta// de bzhin khyi la sogs pa'i sha// phung po la sogs rigs rubya bas// gang gsungs mnyam pa'i gras kyis so// gang zhig rnal
'byor gnyis mdo bras// bsang gtan dga' ba'i mi gcig pu// 'jig rten rgyang 'phan 'jig rten pa// bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen brtag pa dang// de bzhin drod
gsher las skyes pa// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// 'di dag zas su kun tu bshad// de nas de'i gsum dgongs pa// btsalaM ldan 'das las shes pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pa kun
bdag po// lagan rdo rjesatshig gsol ba// nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang// phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad cing// mgon khyong 'jig rten pa dang ni// 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs//
chu dang 'o mgacig 'gyur bzhin// khyod ni chos rnams ston khar mdzad// 'jig rten 'ga' las yang dag pa// ngang pas 'o ma ji bzhin len// ji ltar sgom pas gdungs pa yin/ d+hAny+tsas bu la 'a de bsres
'thung// de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu dus// chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams 'thung// dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du// gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di// ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// mgon po/
gsal bar bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis// grags ldan lag na rdo rje la// bu khyed legs so che legs te// bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya// rkyen dang nyan thos zhes
grags dang// de bzhin mdo sde la sdod rnams// 'di dag 'jig rten pa rnams te// khya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas// rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rtan gnas// 'jig rten 'das par gyur pa yin// dani ting
'dzin rnal 'byor yang/ de dang 'dra bar byed ma yin// gang yang 'jig rten shin tu'adas// rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid dngos cig/ 'khor ba dang ni cig shes spangs//
brtul zhugs baTang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing// blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis// byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dod khams kyi ni dbang phyug dang//
rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ gzi ldan stobs kyis phyug pa dang// mdangs bzang mthong na dga' ba dang// mthong ngam tshig gi bskul ba las/ 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed// gsang ba 'di
ni mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin// de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/ do rdzagasum las 'das pa'i mchog/ dag ngas pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// skyes bu gang zhig
gnas gyur pa// gsang ba yang dag srung ba po// de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun dam ba ste// dam tshig lasani dam tshig mchog/ dorje gsum gyis byin barub pa'i
le'u drug pa yin par bshad/ gde nas rje rje gsum gsang dbang// dam tshig chen po de nyid ga cig/ ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog/
rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so// danyid dam tshig bzhi pa gang// 'dod pa thams cad ces bshad// de rnams longs spyod ldan pa yis// ci 'dod par ni bstan par byag/ rang gi lhar ni bdag
sbyor bas/ bdag dang gzhan na mchod par bya// de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba// 'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba nyid// dka' thub myur ba de yin la// sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod// mi zad pa
na gnyis ka ste// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang// gzungs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod// de dag bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grub// tha dad yi ga song mo/
'i yin// de 'don pa ni kha ba ste// gang zhig sa la dga' ba da// de dag slong mo za bar 'dod// dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing// sdom pa mi bzad khyed kyang yin/ 'dod gsum de nyid longs spyod cing//
sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas// derje gsum dbye bde gnas na// sngags rig byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan du dusamin 'che ba dang// shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub
sems dpa' dang// gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang// mi 'gyur chos ni bcos pa yang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas// 'dod pa'i
yon tan lnga rnams bstan// byang chub sems dpa' mas bya zhing// byang chub pa rol phyin chagasabya// de ltar gzugs la gsum shes nas// mkhas pa yisan mchod par bya// de nyid/
gtso bo bcom ldan 'das sna tshog sa rnam par snang mdzad tshe/ sku la rnam ba sum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbus bar/ 'di ni bcom ldan sna tshog sang// sangs rgyas rin chen
khyung gnas gtso dril rnam gsum shes byas nas// lnga rnapa'i kono pul bar bya// de nyid bcom lcas yo gas do rlags chos ni' dzin pa'i gtso// bal rnam gsum shes byas
nas// lha rnams la ni dngul bar bya// de nyid don yod rdo rje gra ya sa// sna tshog d gtso bo bcom ldan das// rig la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ rang gi 'ben la da du 'bar du// de nyid
bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod ma long ga zugs can no// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang// gnyis karjes su mi dmigs pa// gzugs la sogs gsum de yin te// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//
gzugs sgra la sogs pa la// sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa'i// sIng po sangs rgyas kun sbyang// mkhas pas gzugs sgra la sogs pa// lha nyid duni rtag tu sgom//

da ba zhin rigs su sgom pa ni// sgom pas der ni pasgom par bya// nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dron por bshad// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor pas kyang// chos ni rjes su dran pa sgos//
rdo rje gsum sgom rnal 'byor bas// rdo rjes dran sgom pa'o// rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang// ches dang longs spyod sprul skurakhyung// gas ni rjes dran sbyor gyur pa//

de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o// de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig/ rje rje gsum nyid mdachos nyid// lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste// de sgom byang chub thob par 'gyur// khazhi po dag ni re re bzhi// ji lta
ji ltar mgu bcas sogs// de nyid lo yo gangs yin te// bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa yi// bud med lo grangs bcu drug pa/ gzugs bzang phra dang mchod
pa ni// dben pa zhes byar brtsam par bya// byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba// khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che// spyan sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya// bsgrub

i bya de nyid yang dag sbyor// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'a gyur/ yi ge hU~M dang de bzhin oM// phaT kyang derani bsgom par bya/

sku de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid// ci rigs par ni rnam par spro// 'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i// rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste// gsang dang snying kha sna rtse ru// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di ba sgom bya/
'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar// shes rab de ni rtag tu smos// gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur pas// de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o// gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bar// bzhi mtshubasag cig
tu sbyor ba'i ga/ sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chu ba 'dod bas bsgom par bya// nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan/ lha ga zhib gcig bu'i ming// rang gi de nyid gnyis chod byung//
rdod bdag nyid du spyir// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste// b+ha ga ling ga yan par bsgrags// gzhug pa gnyis mad sbyor ba sa// sangs rgyas kazugs su sgom pa 'o// de las blo ldan gyis spro ba// ba

su'i bu ga'i rtsa ' gnas // mnyam pa med pas khyad par du// sangs rgyas sbyin rnams der spel// chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang// rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas// rdo rjepad+ma dang dag sbyar// bya ba'i
long gar brtag pa'o// de nas ba pad+ma'i bu ga las// 'bad pas chos kyi spyin rnams so// de ni de bsam kun rdzogs khyad pa'i// 'di nyams dag pa yin// rdo rje rjes su dran pa sgom// dngos mang ba/cig

bu kha sbyor ga stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur// b+ha ga ling ga zhes bshad do// de nas ba spu'i bu ga nas// rdo rje sprin rnams kun tu // rdo rje byang chub sems sgom nyid// myur du dngos grub 'thob
bar 'gyur// rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las// de bzhin rnal 'byor pas sbos nas// rigs kyang dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// khro bo rjes dran sbyol

la'ang// stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i// khro bo'i ba spu'i bu ga nas// khro kho'i sbyin rnams spro bar bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la// rjes dran sbyor
ba'i dgongs pa ni// grub ba che la spur zhus pa// grub khyed kyis ni gang gsungs pa// b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// 'jig rten 'dus pa'i sbyor 'di las// sangs rgyas la
sogs snga gyur pa// tshul 'di ma 'ongs skyo bo la// phyi dus kun rmongs skyes pa ste// bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni// ci phyir gsungs zhes de rnams s+sa// 'gro bas namamakhal mtshan
ma can// rten 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing// de rnams shin tu rmongs dbye bas// ji bzhin par ni rtogs par byed// mgon khyod bde ba chen po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu//
la sku mad srid gsum bdag nyid can// dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan// de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi// yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum// dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum// sa ngas
rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung// khyad 'dir b+ha ge khyab 'jug ste// ling ga drag po'i ming can nyid// khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtags// khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung// dus gsum las
'das rnal 'byor che/ dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid// shes dang shes bya rnam par grol// de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla// de nas rje rje 'dzin pa yis// de la sogs pa'i tshig gsan nas// dam

tshig rjes su dran sgom pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad// rang gi rdo rje pad+ma' ldan// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las// rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rjes mas dpa' sgron//
dkyil 'khor rjes su dran par g nyid// ba po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las// rang gi tsha sapa rtag drangs te/ rna lta bur pa 'a la la3 pa/ su dran pa'i sbyor ba dang// sangs rgyus
rnams kyi phung po lnga// sangs rgyas de nyid sems brtag pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar ril// gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga/ de zla tshe pabulhasum tshogs// de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'ag ra//
bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin// thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// bad ga kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sems nya
rjes dran sbyor ba gang// sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid// spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa// de sbyor dran pa sgom
pa ni// de tshe sngags kyi sku gang yin// gsung dang sku na rnam sgom pa// de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid// rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi// sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra'// bdag
kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis ni// de bas tshangs pa shin tu du byung// dngos mad gcig sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du gsung// de bzhin gshegA
mchog che ba ni// dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste// blo dang ldan nga sa 'di bsad na// dngos grub sngags mchog thob par 'gyur// shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyur pa// rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do//
pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa// yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o// thams cad rang bzhin dri ma med// ma skyes pa dang phrad pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ 3/
khams med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o// ma skyasarjes su sbyor ba gang// der ni ci yang brjod yin zhing// ma skyes ming ni gcig pu pa// dran pa de ni yin par bshad// ji ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal ba/
mchon ma mad cing 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing// gnyis med gnyis su yod yin zhing// yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang// zhe sdang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i ming// sangs
rgyus kun gyis bstan gyur cing/ den rogasarjes dran zhes bya// rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs ste// bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las// rang gi khu bas mchod par
byang dngos mdu bdag nyid dag pa gang// de ni dog par bshad pa yin// de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro// 'di yis lus la mchod pa dang// khyad par du ni de bzhin
gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs// chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs ni gang dag grub// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// gang bshad rigs ni dman pa shad pa// de la'ang
tshul de grub par 'gyur// de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid// de bzhin so sor rab tu brtag/ mi phyed rdo lnga'i sbyor ba yang/ gsung gi dbang bskur ba nyid gsal// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas//
gang zhig sems ni rmongs pa// mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin// de ni ci dgar spyod pas byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rde rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste// sngags spyod pa yi
mchog gyur pa// le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan///de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs// dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//
bla ma rje rje gsum gyi bdag/ mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po// dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la// bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btab// nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog/
rdo rje sams dpa' sgrub pa che// spel/ pa chen po'i rnam snang ba/ kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang// das kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog/ rigs mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung//
rgyal ba'i dam pa'i ched pa'i mchog/ mchod pa kun mchog bshad du gsol// 'dod chags chen po zhi snang che// la ti mug chen po blo gros che// theg pa gsum po rab ston cing//
gleg pa ston pa po// nam mkha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog/ ye shes rgya mtsho bla ma che// rdo gsum pa chags med pa/ rgyal gnas mchod pa bshad du gsol// rdo rjegasum po lam gyi mchog/
sbar lam gcig pu ston pa po// sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// dngos po kun gcig shin tu dag/ byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho// chos kyi 'khor lo
gcig bskor ba// rten 'brel shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gcig rnam dag don// sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad// bdag med mang ches shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal
rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// khams cod nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// khrams cad dbang bskur kun dbang po// kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin pa'i ng// na chung mig
'tsha yangs btsal nas ni// gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa// rnyed nas me yi sku gnas brtag/ rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yi// sa phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid/
zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas yid 'ong// bshang gci chu yis byugs nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o// rtag tumachod pa nyid bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi// phung po zhes bya sna tshog
skyos// rdo rje gasum pa mi phyed khams/ rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// kun mkhyen ye shes lang tshos// len pa mi gsal la sbyor la// de nyidan chung yin par brtag/ 'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed
rgya 4 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa// gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa// mtha' skyong ba bzhin du brtag pa yin// gtsang bas dag saMms yin te// rnam par dben pa dngos mad pa// sani spyan zhes khyu
ba yin// sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin// zhi ba sna tshogs res 'khung ba// zhiba'i gnas ni myur la sogs// khashang gci yul dang dbang por grags// chu ni shes rab la sogs drug/ 'di dag gis
gang byugs gyur pa// rdzogs longs sbyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa// dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid de// mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa yis// bkod pa'i yan lag/mtshan
nyid bshad// 'jig rten shin tu 'a des spyi bo// 'jig rten 'das pa'i si pal ru// rkang pa'i bar dang lci ba dang// kod pa gsang ba 'jig rtenapa// rgyal sras rnams kyi bkod pa ni// rigs ni/

lnga po bya ba yin// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ya shes rgya mtsho rnam par sgom// bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par// brtul zhugs can gyis snying khar sgos// chude sbyong bar gyur pa ni// mu
ma kAl ni yongs su khag/ zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas// bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya// rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni// 'od zer sna tshogs nyid kyis brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus ba/sum pa// gnas

de 'u ni bsam bya ba// blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las// ji lta ji ltar sngo bar bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'a byor mchog gzhol bas// mchod pa'i sprin ni des spo bya// gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod// rnam lnga gcig

la rnal 'byor ma// de yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni// de yang mi gsal zhi la gnas// sgron mar ut+pal nyid gyur pa// rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o// 'jug dang gnas dang skya ba dang// de bzhin sdang ba'i ming snyan no//

da nyida rnam pa gsum byas pas// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// de nas blo ldan gyis dbul la// lha rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las//
kub// me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni/ ro rje can gyis thung chen zhus// ma dang rlung dang dbang chen dang// nu ru yongs su brtag pa yin// re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya// ma rtog de la gsum
tsa du bshad// bya rgod me tog za ba dang// bung ba gza zhes zer zhing// me tog 'di yi dgos pa ni// ma 'ongs su khes mi shes so// ma rtogs pas ni de rnams kyi// dngos grub ring du gnas pa
'gyur// 'di ltar bdag ni skal yin zhes// sku zhing de rnams bdag nyid smod// de ltar bdag nyid kyis smad pas// sangs rgyas thams cad smad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas//
mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro// gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min// phyi rol namin gnyis kar min// tshogs pa las ni ma yin te// rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag la gnas// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs
sangs rgyas// lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las// gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus// des na bdag dang de dag snod// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// dgos pas de ni bshad du
gsol// rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na// mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa// nyin dang mtshan mo dbye ba yis// ma tog donani
bshangapar bya// pad+ma ut+pal nyin mor bshad// dza ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad// lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig/ gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur// de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad/
mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// 'jug tu 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur// de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang// dgongs pas yongs su brtag pa yin// di'i sangs
rgyas su nga por 'gyur// de bas lha tshogs kyis de min// rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams// dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson bya// dgongs pa byin rlabs rgyu yis ni// de rnams kyis ni 'grub
pa ra 'gyur// gang zhig rlung ni bzhur grags pa// de ni pad+maut+pal ming// de nyid ces grags rdo rje gasum// dzA ti gcig pu ba gsum du 'dod// kar ni ki dang ma laka/ phug te ka ra bI ra ni//
go rims bzhin tu spyan sogs te// sa la sogs par 'di'i sbyar ro// dngos med go 'phang la bkod pas// lha rnams kyi ni sku raspyor bas// gcig tu sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i// mchod pa chen
po de 'a gyura'o// ltapo'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhag/ lnga bcudag ni gnyis 'gyur byas// de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni// dpag tshad brgyayi dkyil 'khor ro// der ni mkhas pas rtag
par ni// rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// pad+ma 'khor la rdo rje dang// de bzhin ut+pal rtag tu sgom// dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa// dpag tshad rgyu khyen de nyid gsum// byams pa la
sogs gru bzhir 'gyur// mdzes pa phung pos brgyan pa yin// gru bzhi de ni gas su gyur// zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can// mchod rten ye shes sems rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dris
med// rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni// shes rab can gyis gnas sgomamo// mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams// de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal// rin chen mer shes/
spro bdag nyid// gos ni bsdu ba zhes bya'o// mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis// byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya// shes rab can gyis mched mchog las// lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya// sbyor
gcig de las yang dag byung// rin chen 'byung gnas na chung min// dga' mdu yang dag ldan pa yin// dngos grub shan tu grub pa'i phyir// nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya// rin chen thams cad
dbul bar bya// chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung// rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni// sa bkang ba yi zhing 'di na// shes rab thabs gcib/ las byung ba'i// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir//
zhing de nyin re dbul bar ni// nam mkha' many+dza' yas rnal 'byor pa'i// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de// phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam bzhag ste//
'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la// reg par yang dag sbyor ba dbul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa sgom// bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku// yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa// dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung// yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i// bshang gca ji lta ji lta bar// de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod//
skal ba'ang bzhin ni mdzes pa yi// bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang// gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor ma de phyin brlabs la// byas nas gzhis mad sbyor gcig pu//
rang gi lus ni nang du gzhug/ spyan sogs ji lta ji lta bar// byin gyis babs pa'i gnas bkod de// mig ba zang dag pa'i bya ba yi// rang byung khu ba blangs nas mchod// gang zhig de ltar rtog
pa de// blangs pas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang// spyan lasogs par rab brtag pa// de ni 'jug sogs sbyor yang// den khu ba zakher 'gyur//
'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// de yang shes can gsang gi/ gsangasngags dngos grub byed pas mchog/ rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/
dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nus// gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las// bshang
gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i// le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad///de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso// thoms cad nam mkha' ma 'a gyur tshe// sangs rgyas dbang
bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin// de gsum nyid las spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig ba'o// gsang ba nya

bsgos// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang// 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang// dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung// bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyodani// rdordzas
phyor brlags med gyur pa'i// thugs kyi dngos grub byed pasam ba/ tan// bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur// de mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje gsang ba 'de lta bu// rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni//
sems can thams cad bsad na ni// de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras su skyo bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rigs chen de nyid kyis// zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa
tshes gcig pu// gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi// mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// 'di ltar dngos med mchog gyur pa// khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa
'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis// mgon khyed ci phyir ston par mdzad// gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa// ji ltar
[©/ ]rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ de ni phyir brlags gyur pa las// ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur// chos sku gcig pu las byung las// lhag par zhes byo gyur nas su// dus gsum 'byung ba'i
sangs rgyas rnams// phye mar brlag par ji ltar nus// khyor brlag byed bs dngos med pas// bya ma nyid kyang khyad par du// sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa// nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la//
de 'dra bar ni phyekharlag bar// sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so// sems can gyis ni sems can bazhin// sangs rgyas phyir brlag bsA// 'di gnyis khyad par medado zhes// ma 'ongs skye bo slu bar
'gyur// sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar thug pa// min zhes mi rnams nges sna zhing// gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bzhin// rab tu song bar byed par 'gyur// theg bzang bsgrubs na
'tshang rgya ba// dgongs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog/ de ni bcom ldan myur sbyor las/ mi bskyod zhing du skyes 'gyur ram// sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa// de tshe zhe sdang che sku 'am//
snying rjes gsad par bya'o zhes/ sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong// 'das tshe stong par gyur pa dang// da lta rjes suston mdzad dang// mnye bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub
stsol ba'i// mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis// de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi// de nyid sna tshogs don ldan tshig/ de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs// gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras
rnams// dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 'gyur// ma 'ongs su bo'i don du ni// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'dzin sna yis// 'gro la phan pa'i tshig gsan nas//
bya// de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang// khyab bdag gisani slar gsungs pa// legs so bu khyod chen legs te// kun tu bzang po khyod legs so// dgongs pas bshad ba'i don du ni//
ma khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa// gsungs don ji lta jilta bar// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa// sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing// sngags dang phyag rgya'i

sbyar ba yang// dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu bstan/ 'khor ba mi bskyod ming can te// de'i sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba// mi gsal rje lnga zhes bshad de// dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid// des bshig pa ni bsad
pa ste// sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du// sna ni tshogs kyi dbang po yi// khani rang bzhin nyid du g.yo// rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur pa// 'gro ba rlung gi ming can no// mi bskyod rdo rje'i sbyor
tsho ba nyid// lag tu rdo rje gzhag nas ni// de tshe myur la sogs bya ba// klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid// phung sogs brtag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs las yang dag 'byung// de yi

tshur ba yan lag phung por bshad// de na phyir 'gyur bsod pa yin// 'di ni zhe sdong rigs yid 'ong// mi bskyod ye shes rje rje nyid// de yi zhing spyod dam pa yin// dngos grub chen po des 'thob 'gyur// de nas
