samasani dad gyur pa// gsang ba 'bad de yang dag srung// de ni rtag tu legs par na// rdo rjegasum gyi gsang ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang// de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba// le'u
banu pa yin par bshad// de nas ston ba bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsal ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog cig/ nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog ces
bya// ting nge 'dzin la soms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun sde yis// sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// le'u 'di ni bka' stsal to// sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che// rdo
gsum gyi ye shes sgos// rtogs dang bri ba zob ba'i phyir// rdo rje ya shes dag gis kyang// mos pa la sogs yang dag bshad// ye shes snying po dam pa ste// rdo rje
gsum sogs bshad gyur pa// sku yi ro 'thob byed pa'o// A dang zung na gsung rdo// byang chub bdag med 'thob byed pa'o// hU~Mni rde rje gsum mtha' nyid// sku gsung thugasani 'thob byed
pa'o de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid nga// ldang ba dgatu rab tu bshad// nyi shu lnga sogs ming can gyi// skyes bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro// de bas de re'ang gsum nyid de// rdo rje gsang
sngags nyid du gyur// brjod mod sa bon brgyad pa las// de ni nam mkha' las rgyal 'gyur// brgyaphyad rlung ni gcig pu la// de las nges par nyi shu lnga// skyes bu nyid du byung ba na// mgrin bcu
zhes bya'i ming can dang// sgra sgrogs gsod pa'i dga' khyed 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa gcig nyid gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po sto// 'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad// 'di dag bsnyengs med
de gcig pu// de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid// de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung// longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa 'o// de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur// mtshan s dang skya
mched nor lha 'o// zla ba zung gcig rig byed de// de la sogs pa'i grongs gyur rnams// de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas// 'di rnams las gcig gzung nas ni// sangs rgyas rol mo bstan par bya//
derje sems dpa' de nyid 'di// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad la// yi ge blo ni des bsamamo// rdo rje sprin niso ba skyid pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi sku//
de dbus gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsos// sngags rnams kun gyi gtsug tor ni/ sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba pa// gcig pu nyid ni bdag po gyur// sngags spyod
donani sgrub pa po// chos 'khor lo gcig ga lakhor lo mchog/ rgyal dang rmad byung gtsug tor// lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin// bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad// sbyor dang bya ba gnyis med bzhin//
sbyor ba 'ba' zhig nyid la 'di// nigatsug tor yin par bstan// ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di// dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan// sngags kyi skyes bu dngos
grub stsol// de rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// go zhes bya bde ru sgom// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ga Aninam bar sgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang//

yi ge hUM ni de ru sgom/ yi ge hUMzhi gnas ming can// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dam tshig de nyid de// rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal to// snying bo dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje
gsum ni mnyes pyad mchog/ sku dang gsung thugs thogam mtho'// oM A/hU~M gi grangs dang mnyam// sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam// thugs kyi ye shes 'jigs su// rang nyid 'don pa nyid
du ni// de'i zhing ni yang dag bshad// sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang/ rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin// byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub ba'os/
rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyus 'bras bu thob byed pa'o// sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrogs pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yis// rdo rje gsum mnyam mi phyed pa// rdzogs kas u0f38sogs
sgomapa yi/ de bzhin gshegs kun jo ni// gsum po ye shes rjestsal// byin rlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i// dmatshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin// rnam par raben dang ci rigs pa'i//

glu stan dag lani sbyar ba bzhi// rig pa'i skyes bu'i yang dag sbyor// brtul zhugs can gyis kun tu brtsam// thabs dang shesa'ab nyi zla phyed// thun gcig tu ni rab tu brtag/ de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis//
ro rje gsum ni nges par 'grub// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid// 'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log/ rdo rje gsum sbyor snyol dngos grub// grub par 'gyur bze tshoma med// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus
gnas par// phramo'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa 'bya// rang gi sngags kyi dmatshig dus// bskyod pa yi ge o bsgom bya// sbyor bzhi yi gtan tshigs gang// snying por yongs su brtags pa yin// sna rtse dang

ni rtsa ba nyid// spyi bomatha' ni dga' ldan gnas// gcig dang gsum gyi dngos po' 'gyur// dag pa'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba// phyed ga pa gsum gyi ming can ni// rigs kyi dbye ba rde rje gsum// sna yi rtsam sbyor
ba yis// ngo gsum sbyor brtul zhugs can// kA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas spyan// 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas// rdo rje rnam snang de
las ni// dngos grub chen gsol bar 'gyur/ sas rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba// skad cig der 'grub rnal 'byor pa// ye shes lnga po bstan nas nii// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas // ye shes 'das
dang ma 'ongs dang// da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum// de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa// grangs med ces bya de nyid do// sku yi gsang ba de nyid 'di// 'jig rten 'das ba'i rim par gsungs// zhi ba'i
bde las shes bya ba// rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de// sku ye gsang ba mchog 'di'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs// de 'od zer bkod pa yi// ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal te//
a dang u ni lkog ma'i dbus// rkan gyi steng gi ming can no// i dang tsani lag g.yon nyid// u dang muni g.yas par brtag/ ri dzu 'di'i gsang bar dgod// li te rkang pa cig shos la// dkyil 'khor gcig
ni de nyid do// dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa// hani lus skyes gtsug tor dang// gtsadani gsum po gcod pa can// yon tan bzhi yi bzhi po de// lnga pa'i lnga po de 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rdo
gcig phyedasbyor// de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur// rig pa chen po de nyid 'di// ma zhes bya ba de yongs bsgrags// dus can bdag nyid sbyor dbang pa// de yi rang sbyor gakhrugs can gacig/ a ni
khabs 'gyur spro ba ni// dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog lasam pa/ rang sngags skyes bu bsams nas
ni A ni ngag gi lam du bzhag/ kha dog lnga yis kun nas ni// brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgoms pas// mtshig ye shes bsgom par bya// gsungagi dam tshig
sngos par bshad// khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste// thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa// zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes// chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
ya shes lnga ldan bsten ni// de rje gsum gyi bskal par gnas// gsung gi gsang ba 'di nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs// dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin du yongs
su bsgrags// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas mchog/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// der ni rang snga ba sa skyes bu dag/ shun soms la gnas rdzogs bya/ dam tshig chen po de nyid can// kha dog rnam

ba lnga bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rje'i thugs 'dra ba// yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho// ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni// rdo rje bskal pa
gsum du gnas// lkog ma rkun dang de nas mchu// spyi bo sa yi ming can te// ro sa gsum khrugs gsang ba gcig/ de nas hU~M las zhugs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// dam tshig
rje zhes bya ba// rje rje ye shes gcig las byung// ting 'dzin ba sang bar bshad pa yin// ma shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo chen por bsams nas// lus kun la ni khams dmigs na/
rdo rje le shes skyo bar 'gyur// dngos po med don gsal khyed pa// khams nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad/ rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las// khaM du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub
sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// so so ru ni yang dag gnas// nam mkha'i
rdo rje dam tshig che// chos rnams de ni mi gzigs so// sangs rgyas kun niganyis med dang// mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yin// dngos po med pa'i gnas thob// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so//
sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung// mi sna ro sngagasum 'di yin// de yi bkod 'phrang zhes bya ba// ting 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs// ma 'dres pa yi chos bdag nyid// sku dang ldan pa'i 'od po che//
rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// rang sngags skyes bu bsam pa khya// haMni rdo rje bzhi bshad pa// snying kha ru ni yaMms pa// rtag tu sbyor bas gzhug pa ni// 'od zer rnam par bsgom bar bya///

sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyodani// 'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rjecan// sa khacu 'gatu gnas niani// dgos don de tsho kun tu byung// ye shes nyid ni khru ba 'di// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// snang
khrud can zhes bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// ni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba// mtshon mi mchog ni rdo rje yis// rdo rje sku dang
'dra bar 'gyur// 'dini rje rje mkha' 'dra sbyor// dam tshig bkod pa'i gnas gyurang// ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i// phyi ni yang dag 'byung ba bshang// sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas pa// ma
spyi tshig tu ni yang dag bshad// mngon shes lnga dang 'dra bani/ da ni skyes bu mchog tu'agyur// sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa// 'di ni dam pa yin par bshad// de yi das grub thams cad
kyi dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyis kyi dbus gnas par// sa sa rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la// yi ga o ni bsgom
par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// yi ge oM ni mi zad gtso// 'di'i mi phyed sbyor ba yis// bsgom pas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur// mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig mchog/ de sku byang chub rdo rje can//
ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// de ni skyes bu dam pa yin// mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni// gsung thugs rtse gcig 'dzin pa las// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rodzin gyis mchod la
'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te// de nas rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ dam tshig gsum
bsgoms pas// dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing// dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi// bcom ldan dakon mchog dpal 'dra zhing/ sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis//
ye shes gsang pa'i gnas su 'gyur// ting 'dzin dang/ gamed las byung ba// dre rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur// longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba// rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung// de nyid gsum
gsang dgongs pa las// rin chen rdo de gnas 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la//
der ni chos kyi o sgom mo// chos kyi mo ni ri mo yang// rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// dzodapag med 'dra ba ni// bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can// lus dang ngag gsamasarje rje yis// dpag
med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don ni re ba bsgrub pa/ yengashes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan/ 'gro don gcig tu 'byub 'gyur// don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog/
sems can don ni skyab gyur pa// 'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i// ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// sems can khams ma lus pa'i// longs spyod kun tu 'gyur ba yi// nam mkha'i dbyings
kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// de ni rnam snang ror bshad// 'od zer de ni rab tu sgom// rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge o// 'od chen der ni rab tu sgom// de nas
'di ni rdo rje ba gsum// rnam par snang mdzad 'adra bar 'gyur// de ni bcom ldan mgon pos bshad// rnam snang rje can de yin// rdo rje gsum gnyis mar sbyor las// rnam par snang

a mdzad 'dra ba'i 'o// de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub// rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po// sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub// de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can// ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid phyogasar ba// 'gro ba'i
don ni rab sgrub pa'o// tshig gcig la ni sna tshogs don// sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la// nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes
bya kha thub pa che la slar yang zhus// oM A hU~Mni gsum la sogs// khyu sogs thog mar gnas pa yis// sku gsung sbugs kyi rdo rjecan// sngags kyi skyes bu de 'gyur ro// oM ni rnam snang rdo rjer
N+NaM 'gyur// Acha ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gtso// hU~Mni de sems dpar bshad// skyes bu re can du 'gyur// blo gas kyi mchog tu gyur// khaMni nges pa mi snang ba// haMni 'jamadabal yang dag
bshad// k+Sha ni rdo rdzobakod ces bya// rdo rjesams dpa' rin po che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsolo// de phozhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad// o la sogs pa lnga las skyes// oM A/hUn de nyid
gsum// rnam snang de rje can gyur pa// sku gsung thugasakyi rdo rje grags// shin tu rnam par nges par bshad// gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa// lnga kho bde la yang dag bshad//
khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba// gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba// gsang sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang// ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin// sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya gcig
par dkyil 'khor te// de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni// dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung// dga' ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming// dadag ji ltar rtogs pa'i 'gyur// mgon po rkyen dang
bral ba'i mi// pi wang sgra ni mchisam lags// de bzhin phyag tshadapani// gsang sngags dngos grub mi 'byung ngo// brda gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di// gang gi don du ba gsungs pa// lag pa'i
sbyor bas rab sgrub pa'i// phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mad// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba ni// phyag gcig bu'i sbyor ba dang// gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces// khyod ni chos rnams ston par
mdzad// 'dir ni sngags sbyor gcig pu las// phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na/gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grubani// 'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar sgrub// sngagasal dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur pa/
lha rnams kyis kyang sbyor las byung// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// yid bzhin nor bur lta bur 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa zhes khyu dang// yang na shin tu 'jig rtan 'das// mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams
kyi ji ltar 'gro la da phan 'grul// spyan drangs pa dang gshog sa su gsol// 'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod// gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub// lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu// 'di dag/
'bru// ma 'ongs skye bo yis// gang zhig shes na yang dag par// nges pa'i rnam rtog med 'gyur la// mi yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs// de nas mgon bo bcom ldan 'das// dgongs
pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste// phyag rgya'i nges pa 'jig rten pa'i// phyag na rdo rje la gsungs so// rnam rtog sna tshogs lcags zhes bya// nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las// gsang sngags skyes bu'i
sbyor ba yis// de ni mi mchog dag tu 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis// lcags ni gsar du byed pa yin// de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis// mi ni bder gshegs byed pa rten// shes
A byas sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni// zhi bad dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya mang pa'i sngags gcig pus// sngags kyi skyes burar gyur ba yin// dngos med pa las yang dag skye// sngogs
kyi skyes bu 'byung ba ste// 'di ni phub rgya chen po ste// 'gro ba'i don ni lab sgrub pa'o// sngan drang bar na bzhugs pa yis// myur ba la sa nagshegs su gsol// gnas pa yisazhid sgrub pa'i//
s+sa yid ston dngos grub dam pa yin// de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgyache dare gcig sgrub las// myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa// de ni phyag rgya yin par bshad// 'bad de bla mas slob ma yi//

rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya// myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang// gnas pa'i rjes su sbyor ba rnamase// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol// 'di dag phyag rgyur yang dag gyur// sgrub pa la ni myur la sogs//

ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar// phung po la sogs chos rnams kun// nga yi rten phye la 'as phyung ba// ma klong zhing de pa zhin sbyor ba las// chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur// 'dir ni gsang sngags sbyor

'gyur med// phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin// de lta na yang 'gro ba'i don///yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed// 'on te rje rje 'dzin gang zhig/ sbyor ba la gsum dang ldan pa'i mi// spyan drang pa dang gshegs su

gsol// de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o// nye ba'i tshig na spyan drang pa// ring nas lag par phung tu spro/ de bzhin gsang sngags de nyid kyang// gnyis ka la ni yang dag sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis//
phyag rgya bud med yin par bshad// sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni// 'jig rtan par ni sna tu brtag lcang gi mtshan ma'i yang dag sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis// phyagargyas s gsum la
gnas pa// sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang// brtul zhugs can gyisams kyis da dul// ba/ tsug[']'i rim pa nyid dang ni// de rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid// dngos med de nyid gcig bu yis// 'gro ba
thams cad dgug pa bya// gzhan yang gsang ba pa yi mchog// sems kyi rkyen nyid ltos dang// dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la// gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med// 'jig rten na ni rtog/
n+tirnyed// dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba// de ni dngos med sems la/ ga[： ]anulor pas na skad cig rtogs// byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la// de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur//
nubla/gnyis ka las min gzhan las min// mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur// sems can bsam pa'i dpang gi stags/ gsang ba 'dini rab ston te// de ni sgrub//gnyis las man
rang bsgrub bya dang// rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o// sems can kun gyi longs spyod du// sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam par dben par rang tu partage/
gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan// klung dang 'bab chu la sogs yin// mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba/ dur khrod la sogs pa yi ming// 'di ni sngags rig mchog rnams kyi// bsam gtan
bsdus las spyod pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir// 'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o// mi bskor deshes la sogs pa// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil dubasas// mngon shes lnga pa sbyor ba yis//
sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su sgom// rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che// yatshig mchog tubaka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rab mdzes pa// rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'bar// rang bzhin lta bu sbyor ba yis/
('a man shes lnga po 'gyur ba yin// mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la// gnas nas bla na med pa brtag/ gtso bo ma stag mang pa 'khrug/ rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rje la rab dgod byas pas//
rdo rje mngon zhes skye bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lus la rnam par snang mdzad gzhag/ snying khar yi ge so bsams na// sngags la mngon shes sgom par 'gyur// 'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems//
nam zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes// sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung pa ya/ tapal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// der ni mi bskyod
rab tu sgom// na seng kha'i zla gnas par// gnas la sems ni der gzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor// A snying kha'i sgrig
ler gnas// khasams 'a de rje'ang yang dag gzhaka/ 'di ni dgongs pa'i ma lag gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes/ 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes de// sangs rgyas ma na grub

a ku ha gnas byang phyogs gnas// yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// gsang sngags bsam pas mi khyab gsungs// de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa// rang gi mtshan ma cig
shos nyid// gzugasamad 'di la gnas yod pa// cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur// stong 'og phyogs kyi tshams su// dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas// dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang// 'gro bas
tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las// smon lam la sogs bsgom bya ba'o// 'gro ba don gtogs 'dod pa'i yon tan grub rnams la// dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' pa'i 'dod pa
mdzod// sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon las rab mchog dgongs nas ni// thub pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog rnam par dbye bar gsol// nor bu rin chen dag gis rnam brgyan sku yi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don byed sring mo

0 bdag la brten par mdzad// lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku// padagan yongs su bzung la chos rnams don med mdzod// sring mos kyang ni khyad par du// de ltar bskul ba tsam gyis//
de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de// rig pa'i pad+madapal du mdzad// shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni// phan pas myur du 'gro kha gnyis med 'dir snod gyur// bla ma bdag ni gal te gson bar
mchis bzhed na// dga' ba las byung chos dga' ba dag la dgyes par mdzod// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong dang gnas pa tsam 'di ni// nam yang lhod par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags// kun tu song ba'i
bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ston// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod// dgongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis// sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg
de bzhin 'khrus// dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags ba mdzad// 'dod pa med cing tshags la zhi// de yang don dam dag gyur yin// sngon dus de bzhin sdugs pa ni/ khozlas brjod dngos po med pa yin//
bsangs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan// mda' dang 'ag byed yon tan dang// thung dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gzhag par bya// ha yi sde tshan ka sde dang// bcu gnyis phyed phyed dag tu
sbyar// gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'di ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod// de nas sngags pa mduna'adug ste// dgongs pa'i don gyis brtag par bya// phung po khams la sogs lab/
brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin// ma byin len pa byang chub sems/ kun rdzob bstan pa bsnunas ba// phung po srog chags gyur pa ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin//
mi spyin tshig dang rkang pa ste// de bzhin rten nyidakyang ni// dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru// sngags pa yis nid bya lo// bshang ba zhes ni yul la bshad// gcib zhes ni dbang po yin// de dag
za bar bshad pa ni// ma skyes gcig pur mthong ba'o// khragazhi pags par yang dag bshad// sa bon lus zhes bya ba yin// rkang ni sams kyis kun rtog pa// za ba dngos med gyur pa'o// smon lam dbang
gis 'di rnams ni/ bi mu ra shu pa sa 'di// lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos nyid du// bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin// dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la// byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog/ rdo rje theb ga la
gnas khyod kyang// chos nyid de yang mi shes so// rtog pa kun las rnams 'das pas// chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs// de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang phan pa// mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par
byed// yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig/ 'gro lags l bar rtog byed pa/ 'gro don gcig pa'i sbyor ba las// de nyid kyis ni de nyid mthong// gang zhig rnam smin smin pa yi// sems ni dngos
grub la gzhol ba// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las// dngos bo med pa nyid du byung// bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs// kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por 'byung// sprul pa'i lus
las pasngags pas ni// sgyu ma bzhin duston par byed// gsang ba'i dgongs pa de med 'di// 'jam dpal ye shes dam pa'o// de gsum gnas sbyor ba yis// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgom//
nam mkhar brtags pa'i rnal 'byor la// phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yani// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag bsam shing/
dngos grub sna tshogs ma rtog ldan// sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni// dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba// re rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya// thung sogs
yan lag thams cad de// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur// sngags 'don par ni gang gyur pa// bsdus pa sngags ni gcig pu pa// lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni// rdo rje 'jam pa
bsgom par bya// lus la sogs pa rdo rjegosum// de nyid gsum nas snga bar bya// rdo rje gsum dang legs sbyor 'as// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// nam mkha' mah+phal sa yang dag rtog/
sams sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin// lcabcu gnyis gyur gang yin pa// brgya po rgyab nas mngon phyogs la// ci rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs// sna tshogs rje rje 'bar gcig sol// dpag tshad

brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis// sa la sogs pa brgyan pa ni// da ni snang ba zhes bshad do// tshangs pa dbang po la sob sa lha// dad pas de la thug kyang byed// 'di ni mi snang
byed pa ste// ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo nyid// rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing// ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par// mi bskyod la sogs
rab tu brtag/ bshang gci sbyang las der gyur pa// gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o// ma rmog ru bya de dag mchog/ mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas// dkon mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te// bag
med pa yang bsgom par bya// dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum yin// bdag med ces bya kha yin te// gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du// banug pa ril bu yin par 'dod// sangs rgyas rnams
kyis mi phyad pa'i// sgom pa sems kyi dam pa lo// de lta'adi nyid shes bsgoms nas// skad cig gis 'jam rdo rjes 'gyur// 'khor lo 'ad 'phro mtshungs par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyis a
bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad// sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i// ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams// de dang de la rjes 'brang
rnams// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya 'o// gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste// sna ni ri rab ces bya 'o// bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun// nam mkha' spro ba bsam mi khyab// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste//
'di dag 'khor du gyur pa na// 'jig rten pa yi ngo bo ru// phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya// 'khor lo dngos grubarud slab// skad cig

sbyor bas sgrub pa'o// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms pa// rdo rje kun gyi gnas mchog ste// thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran
ji snyad yod pa yi// de snyed bud med de yi ni// gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che// drag po yis ni phyag byas 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting
'dzin 'di ni yang dag bshad// pad+ma chen po 'a dab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba// chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa drug gzhas/
sbyor ba'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs sAd kyi// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni// dkyil 'khor la ni bdag nyid 'jog/ gos med mnyam nyid yashes kyi// rde rje pad+mo gru bcas sbyin/ so sor rtog
pa zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// shin tu grangs med bskal par ni// grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni// gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin// de yi ye shes lngar ldan pa//
sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs pa ni// 'jig rten phan phyir gsungs pa rnams// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i// yon tan gsum n yongs su brten// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra
ba'i// rang sngags las byung ral gri ni// blo ldan lag par de bzhag na// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyi khongs rgud 'di// hahahU~M de khams gsum pa/ pas nags pa'i rmongs
'u// pa cher// rnal 'byor pa de 'grub yin// khams gsum kun gyis ches mchod cing// tshangs dang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu// dbang
chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur// thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rje las// da ni de ma thag du 'thob// rang gi rdo rje ting 'dzin 'di// dngos
mad gcig pu yang dag byung// byang grol la yang de mi gnas// ral gri kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur// oM na roli'u tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi
gzugs// bsams ti khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes 'od po che// blo ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam// nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i//
tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam// yi ga'i dam pa Abasam mo// de yi dbus su lha yi gzugs// khar bcug nas no rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes 'od po che// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur//
'dzam bu chu ba'i gser mdog dang// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// nam mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi// tsa na ka ya 'khru tshod tsam// yi ge hU~Mni rnam bsams te// dbus su rang gi lha bsams
nas// khar bcug nas ni nam bsamasan// rdo rjesams dpa' 'od po che// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzamaM bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i//
rnam par snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la// lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba
yang// 'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o// 'khor le chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i//

nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi phyad rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo nga bsgoms na ni// de rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/ de rjesku yi sbyor ba las/ de tshe rigs kyi mchog
bsgoms pas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ri chen la ni rin chen sgom// de nyid lag tu legs bzhag na/ rin chen rig pa 'dzin pa 'a
'gyur// na chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// rin chen sku yi sbyor ba las// rin chen rigs kyi mchog bsgom pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'o//
che dpag med pa rab bsgoms lo// lag tu pad+ma bsgoms na ni// pad+ma'i rageg pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+mi mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// pad+ma'i skur na sbyor ba las// pad+ma'i rigs chen
bsgoms pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la// lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin
par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog ni 'di sgrub pa// sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las// dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa// ye shes rje rje dag gis bya// bsgrub bya'i rdo rje'i dbye pa yis//
mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyusogs// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis// bsam gtan nyid kyis sgrub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yis// dmatshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i// mi phyed rdorje
gsum dbang phyug/ sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid// 'gog dang lam ste bzhi po ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad// sgrub pa po ni gnas ming
can// shing gcig drung du yang dgartog/ chos dang rdzogs spyod ming can du// sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgod// mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no// 'byin dang rtsub pa nyid dang ni// gnas
pa yis ni nyer mas pa// yid ston pa yi mnyam sbyor la// rab tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas su// dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'as// rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par dang// sgrub pa po ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor
gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni// sbyor gsum rdo rje can bsam pa// sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu 'o// sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi// mi gsal gsal bar yang dag ldan// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo/
las// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sangasargyus dgug pa dam pa yin/ gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas//
[d ]'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyodakyang// mi bsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed// gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni// mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams// de nyid rje rje bkug nas ni// sngags ri ga
pas ni spyad pa'i phya// nam mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di// dam tshig chen po rdo rje can// sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las// lcags kyu de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig rnams ni gang dug
pa'i mgo/ rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// rnam par sna ma 'khor kA maM/ rdo rje pad+ma sob sa// ma long lta bu'i sngags pas ni// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par sgom// lag tu
sku dang gsung thugs kyi// lcags kyu sogs rab tu spros// de ni sbyor la 'di nyid kyis// de nyid las ni lha rnams dge da// de na de ma thag tu yang// dngos grub kun ster las byed 'gyur// sku
dang gsung thugs thams cad ni// mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya// lce yi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// gsung gi rdo rjer de mnyam skom// brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang gnyis// gsang ba'i rdo
mchog mchod do// dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis// ji lta jiltar rab sgrub pa// dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa'i// de ni yang dag yin par bshad// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa/
yis// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod// bcom ldan dam tshig chen po yi// rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs// de nas phyag na rdo rjeni// go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs// gang
zhigangashes na rnal 'byor pa'i// mnyam gzhag mchog ni 'thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang dbang de nyid dam pa yi// de ni de yis yang dag bshad// rnal 'byor chen po
gcig bdag nyid// nam mkha' dang nim nyam pa'i gnas// byas na dam tshig mang dag pa/ ]sha chen la ni yang dgaspyir// dngos mad pa yig chen gyi// dam tshig mchog la gnas nas ni/
blo ldan bdag nyid sgom pa ni// rdo rje dngos grub longs spyod steg/ rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang ba yin// de nyid ye shes dbang po gci// dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
gtso bor 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs bung las byung ba// glang po'i sha ni de ba brtag/ dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor las// mngon shes lnga bdag thob par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni
ba ste// dngos med re nyid las sbyor las// dam tshig gcig tu legs phyogs na// mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// dgongs pas cig shes zlos pa yin// zung sogs yan lag gang
gyur pa// dngos med de nikhyingasha yin/ mtshig ga cig tu yang dag sbyor// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas can ng la sha// khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur/
des tshig la gcig tu yang dag sbyog/ rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o// 'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las// dgongs pas cig shos khazlog pa yis// shachend ni'ishang gci dang// glang po rta khyi ba lang
rtag/ mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis// dam tshig gcig tu de 'grub 'gyur// brtan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni// sngags kyi las spyod rnal 'byor pa// rje sbyor pa'i gsang ba yis// sgrub pa 'di/
dang ldan par 'gyur/ de ni sangs rgyas byin rlob cing// rnam kun rdo rjetshan ba dza sum dang// snying khor ye shes dam tshig dang// dbu rgyan lani rdo rje'adzin// sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur
ba'i// 'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o// dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog 'dis rab tu bya// dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste// rdo rje bras kyi ting 'dzin no// de nas 'grol
phan pa'i mgon// gtso bo nas snang chen po la// gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang zhus// gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni// gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des/ ni ba/
sum cu rtsa drug tu// mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshalami 'gyur// rang gi bstan bcos ba yis ni// phyi rol pa de rnam rtog la// ting 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang// 'di la rang gi ngo bo med//
tshangs sgo mdzad kyi rgyud la ni// ri rab gcig dang bcas pa'i bshad// byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa// gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'dis// rdo rje can la sngar
gsungs pa// legos so rdo rje legs pa che// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa// rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang// 'dir ni nga yis gsal bshad pa// sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag/
theg kha chen po mthong ng tshod yod dang ni mos chad pa'i/ rang gi lus la gang bshad de// ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod// khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya 'o//
ma nam mkha' dang mnyam ye shes// rdo rje theg pa bla med la// mchog sbyin ng gi byed bzhin du// rgya chen de yis mi mthong ngo// derje theg pa rgya mtsho ste// de yis yang dgam mthong bas//
rang gi lung nitshar m yis// gzhan yod pa ni min zhes smra// theg pa che la gsang ba rnams// srang la bcal te de skya ba// de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes// nga yi tshig las bltas te
zla smra 4de nyid sasu gzung ba'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyus la sgom pa rnams// gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// sngags kyi de ni don byang chung//
sna tshogs dngos grub 'bras bu ltar// dgongs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni nga yis yang dag bshad// dam tshig rdo rje lce lani// rdo rjecun gyis hU~M bsams te// rnal 'byor pas ni bdud
tsi lnga// zos na dordzagasum thob 'gyur// Ats+tshe dang o gyi gsang ba dag/ 'di ni rdo rje gasum mchog ste// 'di lta bu yisbyor ba yis// rdorje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyur// 'di ni de la
bdud rtsi yi// 'phrang 'gyur dam tshig de tshor bshad// rdorjesems dpa' yang dag 'byung// ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin// rje rdzagasum gyi dam tshig mchog/ sku gsung dordzi can du 'gyur//
de nyid sems can h+phams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/ rdo rje/
bdag nyid de snang byed// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad du// grub nas 'don der sbyor ba'i// rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro// sku yi rdo snyom bdag nyid//
grub mchog dam tshig la gnas pa// mi snang gyur pa kun gyi mchog/ stong gsum dag gi snang bar byed// lha yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mar logs sbyor// gang+gA'i
bye sAd ces bya ba'i// rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun// dpe de dang ni grangs gcig pa// sangs rgyus dus gsum rnam spangs pa// lag tu sku myur gzhagapa zhin// rdo rje mig gis de
mthong 'gyur// sangs rgyas shing ni gang dag tu// sgra grag pa ni ji sAd pa// rnab la gnas mnar bar// skad cig gis ni de kun thos// gang+gA'i byas d zhung dmag dang// sku la sogs pa gsum/
gyis mtshan// soms zhes bshad pa'i sgom pa mchog/ sems can rnams kyin nyid rig/ bskal pa gang+ga'i bye snyadadu// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gis lags// de bsam mi khyab sngon 'gro//
rang gi rna ba sems bcas la// gang+ga'i bye ma'i ming can gyi// gnas kyi dngos po bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon shes nas// 'di ni lang dag bka' stsal to// mngon shes drug/
ni don grub bo// de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// 'kher rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas// sa sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni// 'jig rten
khams rnams kun tu spyod// yid rton bden gcig bstan ba ste// de nyid gsum saMnyam gnyis med pa/ brten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa// ye shes 3bar sgrub pa'o// yid rton mnyam
'a pa'i sbyor ba las// sgrub pa yi ni dam tshig 'gyur// 'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde pa// 'di dang len pa rab tubasngags//
sems la dmigs dang 'dir sbyor ba// skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur// bstan pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang// zhe bar bsgrub par gang gyur dang// sgrub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni//
sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin// 'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba// ji lta jiltar 'jig rten sogs// sa dang shing gi rin chen sogasaM// lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag/ chos kyi dbye bas shes
pa'i bya// rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po// bstan pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor// byang chub mchog ni rnam par sgom// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bu chos rnams la// dngos grub mchog
ni rnam dpyad pa// de ni nyeba'i sgrub par 'gyur// sngags bdag gang yin bsgoms nas ni// bskul ba sgrub par 'gyur ba yin// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// 'di'i sgrub pa chen por 'dod//
bstan pa rdo rje bdud rtsi dag/ sngags pas kun tu brtag pa'i bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni// dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang bsam// 'din sngags rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsum
gsang yang dag 'byung// sngags kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'i// sgrub pa pos ni dban pa bstan// sna tshogs lung gi yang dag rtog/ sngagasan dgon pa chen por 'dod// de yi dpag bsam shing

thob// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don// bdag la bstan par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje 'phrang ba'i ming ni ci// 'dus pa ci zhig stong pa ru// thig le'i dbye ba dang ni sgra// gsang ba dang ni dam

tshig dang// sdom pa dang ni sgra tsam dang// rlung gi de nyid bde chen ci// deNi pad+mo mnyam sbyor dang// sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rlung rnams dang ni 'khor lo dang// grangs ni ji tsam gang du
gnas// ma 'khyer lus la rtsa gang lags// rnam pa sna tshogs sogs skad cig/ dga' ba bzhi dang rdzas dang ni// sngags dang rlung dang thig le zhes// yi ge gsum gang de nyid gsum///
de bzhin sna yi rtse mo gsum// lus kyi stong nyid ye shes dang// lha rnams kyang ni ji ltar gnas// de rnams kyi ni ming ni ci// 'char ba dang ni nub pa ci// mgon po dga' rnams ji ltar ni//
bya// yang dag skyab gsal bar gsungs// sngar bshad rtsa rnams rtag tu ni// rdo rje'i lus la jilta'i rgyu// mtshams kyi rtsa gsum de dag ni// gtso bo ru ni ji ltar gsungs//
wa rlung rnams ji ltar snang ba dang// gtso bo de rnams ji ltar thim// de ni mkha' 'gro ma sdud pa// gtso bo ji ltar yang dag 'thob// rnam rtog rlung gi rab bcad nas// rnam rtog med par ji ltar
'a 'char// rtsa rnams ji ltar nub pa dang// sbyor ba drug gis ji ltar rtsom// dus kyi mtshen nyid ji lta bu// gsang ba'i yang ni 'bras bu ni// chos kyi dbyis kyi rdo rje dang// rigs kyi bya ba ji

lta bu// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig/ phung po la sogs skye mched dang// phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci// de rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang// bdag gi sgra ni gang la gnas// stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dang/

stong pa nyid ni gang dus// nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang// A li kA li brda dang ni// mtshams kyi 'char ba ji lta bu// rgyud gsungs sngon ni bstan pa sogs// cho ga nyi shu'i las dang ni// rgyu mtshan
ma ci zhig 'bras bu'ang ci// mchod pa'i cho ga ji ltar gsungs// de bzhin lha mo'i rang bzhin dang// lha mo'i ming ni ji ltar gsungs// rgyud du thog mar gsungs pa// 'di skad ngag sogs rje
lta bu// 'di skad ces sogs dang po'i ngag/ don rgyas pa ni ji ltar 'gyur// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin srag ci/ bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba dang// rnal 'byor ma tshogs 'dus pa dang// de nga zhin gsang
ba'i brda dang// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas dam ches dge 'dun gyi// rnams ngashad pa ji lta bu// bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang// jo
'chang ni bshad pa ni// slob ma'i yon tan gang ldan na// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi snod du 'gyur// de yi byed pa'i dbye ba du// de saM sa bu nga lta bu// zhi pa rgyas pa dbang dang ni// de bzhin gsad dang
bshad pa dang// rengs par byed ba nyid dang ni// bsgrub bya la na mngon srid dang// sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhi ga dang gon po khro bo'i bzlas pa ci// dngos grub brgyu da ni thob pa dang// mngon
shes lnga ni ji ltar thob// rnal 'byor rnams kyis de nyid mthong// skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub// lus bka na pa dang rgyas pa med// btud kyis len gyi sbyor ba dang// gser 'gyur sogs
kyi sbyor ba dang// rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che// 'gro ba'i bla ma ji ltar thob// lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang// de ni rang bzhin ji lta bu// 'dis ni gnas sogs ji ltar gnas// thim
dang las sbyod bdag po dang// rlung na gang gi mtshan nyid ci// de dag 'jig par ji ltar 'gyur// de ltar dri tshig rdzogs pa dang// lag na rdo rje thal sbra te/ 'gro ba'i bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas//
lus kyis phyag byas te sa ni// gtso bos rdo rjesams dpa' la// legs so bya ba byas nas ni// tshangs dbyungs thub mo sAn pa yis// 'gro ba'i mgon pos gsungs pa yin// rnal 'byor chen po'i
rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ gsol ba gdab pa dang/ dri ba dang/ slob ma'i las nyid la sogs pa rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang
de nas bcom ldan rje rjes gsungs// de nyid gsung gi 'gro mgon gyis// lag na rdo rje la bos te// yang dag dris pa des bshad pa// snying po'i don ni don bsdus pa//

dbye bar dka' ba'i dngos po kun// khyod kyis dri bar byas pa rnams// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang chen bdag/ bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud rnams dang// rnal 'byor rgyud ni gang du yang// mchog tu gsang ba ma gsungs pa//
rje'i dbang phyug de nyid mchog/ dris pa'i lan rnams gsa' par ni/ngas par nga yis rab bshad bya// skad cig gis ni smyan phya la// mchog tu rmad byung ston mdzad la// thugs rjes khyab par de/
skad gsungs// de phyir khyed ni legs par nyon// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes thugs brlan cing gle tsam thams cad gcod pa la/ phyag na rdo rjes gsol bar tab ste mchog tu gsang ba'i
tshig gis bshad pa gsungs pa ni/ dbang bskur ba ni gtso ba ste// dngos grub thams cad rtag tu gnas// nga yis ji bzhin don bshad kyis// de phyir thog mar yang dag nyon// thogamar slong
la ]ma gang gi tshe// blo ldan yang dag dbang bskur na// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la// de yi tshanasnod du 'gyur// yang dag dbang bskur gyis dben na// sgrub pos rgyud kyi don shes kyang
slob man mtshungs par ni// mi bzad dmyal ba chen por 'gro// de phyir yang dag bla ma ni// rab tu gus pas bstan nga kur bya// dbang bskur thob cing de nyid shes// blo ldan snying rje'i bdag
nyid can// zab cing rgya che dri ma med// gnod dang 'aaM ba rnam pa sangs// skal bzang lus ni rdzogs pa dang// mtshan dang dpa byad rnams par brgyan// chags pa che la gcig tu dga'// yul
laphrag dog rnam par spangs// bag yod rtag tu dga' ba dang// rnal 'byor ma yis mjal nas sa// tshe rje theg pa gcig tu mos// theg pa dman la rgyab kyis phyogs// de la sogs pa'i
yon tan ldan// bla ma slob mas bsnyan bkur bya// yang dag bla ma red nas ni// slob ma'i rang bzhin dri ma rnams// dag dang rtogs dang smin byas nas// ji bzhin ye shes bzung dang ldan//
ji ltar rin chen brdar ba dang// gsa' nibasregs dang bcas pas brtags// de bzhin du ni slob ma yang// lo ni lo druganyis bar du brtag/ de phyir phan tshun de lta bu s// dus kun tu ni de ltar brtag/
gzhan du bgegs ni 'byung 'gyur te/ dngos grub 'joms shing sdug bsnga' che// dug ni sngags kyis 'joms pa pazhin// sngags kyis dge lus bcud len byed// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis//
sngags kyi slob ma rtogs byas nas// bla ma dbang bskul sogs kyis// dngos grub phyir ni ji lta'i don// de phyir dbang bskul slob ma// ma dag pa yang dag par 'gyur// rdordzasems dpa' bde
chen l// de la lag na rdo rjes zhus// dbang bskur ji ltar rgyud du ni// gcob ru ni gsungs pa lags// rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen// the tshom thams cad gcod/
mad pa// de kho na nyid mkhyen pas ni// lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// don de ji lta ba bzhin du// nga yis yang dag bang+gashad kyis nyon// dbang bskur ba yi dbye ba ni// dang po'i dbang ni gtso bo/
sta gnyis pa gsang ba'i ming can no// gsum pa kun nas sbyor ba ste// bzhi pa'i don ni ngam pa'o// gtso bo dbye ba bcu gcig ste// bcu gnyis pa ni gsang ba 'o// bcu gsum pa ni/
yang dag sbyor// bcu bzhi pa ni don dam ste// dbang bskur 'ar sa re 'o rnam pa gsum ni rgyu yi dbang// bzhi pa 'bras bur shes par bya// dga' ba la sogs rim pa yis// thams cad
lani nga yis khyab// mar ngo yi ni tshes gsum dang// de bzhin tshes bsu tshes bcu bzhi// yon tan bzang ldan slob ma la// bu mas cho ga bzhin dbang bskur// lus phra lo ni bcu drug lon//
gzugs dang skal ba dag gis brgyan// sngo bsangs mig ni yangs pa dang/ snying rje'ibasam ldan yang dag mos// ngag snyan dbang bskur thob pa dang// rnal 'byor rgyud la lhag par mos//
yang na lo niti nu lon// nyams dga' bde bar byed pa ste// de las lhag pa skalamang 'gyur// de ni dngos grub ring du byer// lhag par 'jam pa'i bu mo la// chung ma'am yang na sring mo 'am/
yang na bu mo 'ang dad pa yis// bla ma la ni dbul bar bya// kha sel dang rin chen gos dngaraM// ma rtog 'phreng ba sna tshogs pas// mchod nas bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas// slob ma ya sa ni
'di skadabarjod// deng nas brtsams te bdag bran du// gtso bos bdag mchod pa bzhes// de lta'i rnam pas mnyesanas nii// bdag nyid kun gyis bla ma mchod// bla ma'i ngo ri rdo rje
'chang// de phyir yang dag bla ma mchod// de nas bcom ldan yum phyug rgyu// dag mchod nas bstan par bya// bstan pa lasani gang byung ba// ltung ba skal bzapakha la ni// sbom po
zla stag sbyor ba yis// yang dag par ni longs spyod bya// de las skyes 4 we yo shes ni// bde ba chen pos rang rig pa// 'byung rngub pa ni lo gcig cing// rab tu dga' bas mchod par bya//
shu paN sngagasani nor bu'i sgor// kod de de rje rab bskyod bya/ dga' rnas ji lta ba bzhin du// skad cig de la skyes gyur dang// dga' ba'i sems kyis nga de ba la// rje btsun mo'i kha nas
brjod// de yang slob ma'i lag tu ni// gtad nas gsal bar 'di skad brjod// ji ltar pad mchod bya ba ni// byas la a ba mchog gi gdong// gang phyir rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ rang nyid 'di
yi snying la zhugs// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i dngos de yang// bde chen rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rab tu 'bad pas
tha @#// bstan par gyis// lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyidani// dbang bskur gtso bor gyur pas na// thams cad ji lta ba bzhin thob// rnal 'byor chen po 'i rgyud dpal rdo rje
'phong pa'i mag par rtogs pa las/ slob dpon dang slob ma brtag pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// kade nas de nyid gzhan yang nyon/ rdoNi 'phrong pa'i
tshe// den gsal bo// rgyud rnams kun dusbas pa ni// dri ba gzhan la brjod mi bya// rdo rje'aphreng ba zhes bya'i ming// de yang sa ni bcu gsum pa// dga' ba bzhi yi don gyi gnas// thams cad
ra stong ba dga' ba ste// ngag gi spyod yul rnams las 'das// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// skal bzang rnal 'byor kun gyi mtha'// rnal 'byor ma yi ngag gi tshul// stong nyid/

ye shes rdo rje dang// rdo rje 'phrongab zhes bshad do// stong nyid rdo rje gsang par// rtsa ni rdo rjedabyings dbang phyug/ ye shes mchog tu bde ba che// lhan cig skyes dga' rmad byung ba// de rjed yang
rnam rtog rnams// 'bigs par byed par yongs su grags// 'phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun// byang chub sams kyi rdo rje rnams// mi phyed pas ni rdo rjer gsungs// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas
bani// gang yang rung bas brjod mi bya// de ni dbusasu yongs su grags// 'phreng ba rgyun no mi 'chad par// dag pa rab 'bab bdag nyid kyis// rnam rtog rlung kun 'bags pa'i byed//

babasarlung la 'bigs par nus so// nyin dang man mo rtag tu ni// brgya dang nga nga lhag gsal nga ra yang// dus rtogs rang bzhin rgyu rnams ni// 'char ba dang ni'ajoms ba dag/ ji lta ba bzhin rab dbya/
yis// rlung rnams kyi ni ming nyon cig/ btang bzung rang ni pa phur dang// myos pa ni blo ngan dang // bsil phyed dang sdeb 5'a ba dang// ngar rnams dang ni sta re dang// gzigs pa chu srinadza shag
dang// rnam par gtsigs dang myos pa'i dus// 93dod myos pa chu sa// snatshapa sa skyong dang ya nga// nyams dang rnga dang sgra sbyogs dang// rlung lha dang ni nad 'bigs dang//
sa dang dusadang ci bgyi dang// rdo rje mchog sbyin tsu ta dang// srung ma dang ni zla ba'i 'od// kan lo dza dang ral pa can// yungs nag rab bkram dul 'gugs dang// sdig pa dang ni g.yon can
rten/ grimasamo dang ni mgrin pa dang// na sel mchog ster smos byed dang/ nga rgya matso dang tshogs bdas dang/ rtsangs pa dang ni sa yi bo// theg pa pazang dang mchog tu skyas//

mid phrug gu nyi ma dang// gsal byed dang ni nyi ma gnon// stobs bzhin nga ro dang ni dus// sdom pa dang na mchongs nas 'gro// sprang ma khyi dang mtshan ma dang// thod dang sbyar po drang po dang// sa dang

sa la 'gro ma dang// bram ze dang ni sna 'gyur gnas// ma mo'i rigs dang lci bskyod pa// mi sna dang ni rnga sgra'i sprin// dga' bar byed dang mig yangs dang// dri med 'od srungasane tso dang//sna tshogs
nubya//mchun ma gab/mchu dang mig mnyam dang// mdzes dang chos kyi dbyigs pa dang// 'gro kun snying stobs bstan pa dang// za yod bung du snyom las dang// kha gdangs sgra chen stobs kyis rtsa//
rtsa bran dpang byed g.yo sgyu can// gtso bo che dang rtag tu dga'// glog 'phrang dang ni dga' byed dang// dbugs 'byung ra ga lce dang ni// bde mchog u dum bar rmongs// pa'i dra pa pad+mabaskor//

dgra sta rmabya rlung dang ni// rdo rje dbang phyug rdung gi ming// de ltar nga yis bstan pa yin// bcom ldan dris pa'i rung rnams kyi// gnas rnams kyi ni dbye ba yis// de dag gang las ldang ba dang// mched pa
rnams su bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'khor lo drug la khyab pa'i rlung// chos kyi 'khor lo rtag tu gnas// srog ces bya ba'i
zi 'gro la khyab// rnam rtog med pa mtshan phud na// nam mkha' mchog las shar nas ni// rlung gi rang bzhin 'joms par byed// rlung de dgu yi rnam par rgyu// chos kyi 'khor lo'i cha na gnas//
mtshan phyed dus nas brtsams nas ni// 'khor lo drug la dgu bdag nyid// nyi ma byed kyi many+dzan sku ni// rlung rnams kyang ni sdang bar byed// nyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas ni// 'khor lo drug
las dag bdag nyid// mtshan phyed kyi ni dus kyi mthar// rlung rnams gsal bar rgyu ba dang// de nyid gnas kyi dbye ba yis// sna tshogs pa yi rtog par 'gro// rnam par rtogapa rnam phye nas//
de dag ming rnams bshad par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// rgyags dang nga rgyal mngon par zhen/ brag dog khro dang ser sna dang// g.yo dang sgyu la cha lugs ngan// blo rgod/
parkam chags gnyid dang ni// the tshom dang ni ngar 'dzin dang// dga' dang chags bral dregs pa dang// 'chab dang srod dang bag chags dang// skya dang rmongs dang 'dod chen dang// rtsod dang rtsa
'angospyi brtol dang// tshul 'chos reg dang kun nas gdungs// rnam 'gyur ma zhishasabazhin mad// bems po log pa'i nga rgyal dang// 'gyod dang khrel ni mad ba dang// gus pa mad dang ches
pa med// blo dmanangos mod dang mching// ngo tsha shes dang ngo tsha dang// mi star ba dang mya ngan dang// yid gnyis dang ni rlom sems med// bsgrims dang the tsam ngal ba dang// dbang dang 'khrul
pa'i snying stobs dang// snyam sems pa dang brgyal ba dang// thim pa dang ni mi bsrun dang// gya gyu snyom dang mos pa dang// rig byed min dang bag yod dang/ gnas ngan len dang nyam chung nyid//

yid mi bad dang lhag par rtog/ skag dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni// brkam chags rol pa khrung khrung dang// 'tsho ba le 'di yon pa nyid// bsam dang sprod dang khas pa dang// kun rdzob de nyid don yod/
dang// star dang dga' ba'i 'dod pa dang// 'jigs dang 'dar dang phra ba ngag nyid// gas pa dang rnam gsal lhad 'a ga dang// 'brel dang rtag pa'i de nyid dang// rus sprul ngomasamad gnod pa dang/
mi gsal ba dang yid du 'ong// gnas med mang du snyab dang// bdag nyid skyes bu nyid dang ni// ya mtshan dga' dang skye kho na// dman pa'i de nyid sdug bsngal gsum// 'khor
ba la ni chags pa dang// rtag tu brgyadang brgyad lhag pa// nyin dang mtshan mor rtag tuni// rlung gi rang bzhin rgyu ba yin// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo 'a phrang po'i mngon par rtogs pa
las/ rdo rje 'brang ba'i tshig gi dbye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o/// de nas rdo'i gsum nyi ma// gsang ba'i pad+ma kha 'byed pa// bde ba chen po'i go 6 1 bzhugs// kadus/
apa'i mchog don rab gsungs pa// 'dus pa 'dres pa zhes ni bshad// 'dres pa nga yis khyod la bshad// 'khor lo bzhi dang tha mi dad// sngags kyi lhan cig tshe ga bzhin// dpa' bo 5 'khyol
wA ma sbyor ba// gang tshe gsang ba'i rtsa gnyis ni// yang dag sbyor ba reg gyur pa// detshonam mkha' rnam rgyas nyid// nam mkha' las ni skyes pa'i rlung// de yis ma ni rab tu 'bar/ rtsa ni stong
phrag bdun nu gnyis// rtsa rnams rab sad gzi brjid kyis// bad ba kun gyi go 'phang mchog/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor khyab// bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// rnam par zhu zhus rtsar gnas pa
rdor gsum rang bzhin gcig 'gyur phyir// khams rnams ro gcig gyur pa dang// phung po rnams ni yongs bzang dang// ngal bso ba la rlung rnams ni// dga' ba rnams ni yang dag skye// de nas
byang chub sems kyang ni// gnas kun nas ni zhu gyur nas// ngo bo gtug tu gyur pa dang// rdzun gaN+Dig gi 'bras bu ni// re gcig tu ni gyur pa la// 'dres pa zhes ni de la gsungs//
phung po khams dang dbang po dang/ yul rnams su ni sbas pa rnams// rnam rtog kun nas zad pas// bde ba chen po nyang dag skye// ro gcig pa ni nga la bso ba// de ni 'dus pa 'dres pa ste//
de kho na nyid mchog gsang ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsungs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rje 'brong pa'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshig lhag par bshad pa'i le'u
ste bzhi pa'o////de nas gzhan yang de nyid na// stong nyid don ni 'bo rgyas pa// stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kun// nang khyab pa'i ng chos nyid de// de ni yang dag shes
pa ni// de bzhin nyid dang rnam mi rtog/ bdag dang gang brag chos rnams ni/ dog med rang bzhin gcig nyid// stong pa nyid dang rang rig dang// thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa// rnal 'byor
gcig pus rtogs pa ste// rtog ge pa yi spyod yul min// chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus pa// 'khor lo drug tu rnam par brjod// de nas nang du'ang khyab pa ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo legs
rgyas pa// de ni nam mkha' khyab cing phra// khyab byed zhi ba'i mtshan nyid tshulta/ dadamigs pa mad cing rten pa med// gzugs med nyon mongs med pa dang// rnam par mi rtag mchog tu zhi/
rang bzhin med cing dri ma med// gnyis su med cing bya ba med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// dus dang dpa las 'das pa ste// ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul bral//
chos nyid chos ni thams cad kyis// jilta ba bzhin mngon par brjod// das dang das med rnam par bral// dge dang mi dge'i srid las grog/ de ni kun nas bsgribs lamad// nam mkha'
'a lta bu'i mchog tu khyab// chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin skyu// de ni de bzhin nyid ces brjod// gang nas kyang ni ma 'ongs shing// gang du yang ni 'gro ba med// rmongs dang 'khrul pa gcig pu las//
glu de na reb tu spro bar snang// bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal spangs// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs mi gos// 'khrul dang rnam par 'khrul par 'brel// rtog pa dang bral dri ma med// bdag dang
srog dang skya ba po// skyes bu de bzhin gang brag dang// shed las skyes dang shed bu dang// byed pa po dang tshor ba po// shes pa po dang mthong ba po// sgro 'dogs pa yi rnam par spangs//
phung po sku mched khams la sogs// ma shes dang na gzungs pa yis// sgrib pa med cing mchog tu phra// nam mkha' mchog la mang dag gnas// de ltar ma lus stong nyid don// brjod dang brjod

bya'i don dang bral// ming tsam gcig pu kho na yang// rang byung mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// brjod pa yi ni kun rdzob tu// de ni nga yis yang dag bshad// rang rig shin tu phra ba'i phyir// de kho na nyidamathobab
chad// bdag nyid rang gi ngo bo zhig kha rdol gzhan gyi spyod yul min// de ni rang rig par bshad do// tshes kun gnas ni zhi ba'o// rnam rtog gis 'khrul rtog ge lagang// mi shes pa yi snyengs pa/
rnams// don dam pa ni mi shes shing// kun rdzob dgu yi mdzod 'dzin m// ye shesa mchog ni mi shes shing// rtog ge stong nyid smra bar byed// rnal 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas// de ni mchog tu/
grwa bar spyod// stong nyid yang dag nam mkha' che// shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// rtog pa'i rnam pa rnams dang bral/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lor brjod// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus//

la kher lo du ga phuganang na// zla pa spyod pa'itshalta bu// stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// khyed min gang ba med pa dang/ ji ltar bgachags chu zla bzhin// rlung gi 'khor le srog tu bshad// mtshan
byed skad cig la 'char// de ltar yang dag sgom pa ni// 'di'i stong nyid sgom byed pa'o// don dam gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// yang na rgyu 'bras sbyor ba'i phyir// de ni rang bzhin 'grub par sgom//
don dma'angagi ngo bo ni// kun rdzob kyang ni de bzhin du// bsgoms pas 'khor ba'ajoms par 'gyur// ji ltar til la tilamar ni// gnas pa nyid la mthong mi 'gyur// de bzhin lus la
stong ba nyid// gnas kyang bsgribs pas mthong bsodo// bla ma'i zhal las 'di shes par// yang dag rig pas ku kun rdzob spangs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par
nyu@#// rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyen// thig le'i dbye ba bla na med// 'jig/
rten thig 'de dbye bas dben// 'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor// mdzodapra'i dbus na gnas pa ni// thig lerludu yang dag bshad// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed// rnal 'byor mdud pa//

de rnams lhan cig rtsa de dag/ zhe sdang gis ni dbang du byed// yang dag bskul byas nas bskul nas de stang gi/ longs spyod mchog tu ngo mtshar skye// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// chags pa chen pos
sha/ dbang byas nas// bskul ba dang ni de stang gi/ spyi ba'i 'khor le'i bde chen du// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed// rnam rtogasal
a/ rgyu byed cing// sna tshogs dbye ba thams cad las// stong ma rnams kyang thur du 'gro// srog gi rab tu bcom nas ni// de dag thams cad re 'i rtser// zhugs nas zur du kha bltas pa'o// de la
'aglu thur du mi 'gro ste// ma rig mdud pa'i 'khor lo ni// rnam par shes pa'i shing rta'i rlung// de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas// mig dang ba de bzhin sna// lcas rnam par shes pa bzhi//
gyur rtsomo bzhi nas phyung nas gi/ bgartsalags rnam shes dang 'dres nas/ rnam shes dbang po lhan cig tu// don ni rab tu rgyas pa byed// sar yang lamade nyid nas ni// jilta ba gi rim pas 'jug 3
de yi dngos nyid de sbyor bas// rnam shes bstan pa'i skad ceg la// de yi chags bcas kyis sun 'phel// 'khrul byas 'khor ba'i 'khor ba las// de ltar bag chags kyis bslad pa'i// nas
a shes las kyi ngo bor 'gro// de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas// khams gsum pa ra ni 'khrul pa 'o// byed po las kyi 'bras bur myong// gzhan nyid du ni 'khor ba med// de phyir 'khor ba gzhon don du/
thig le go 'ang gsalakhar dbye// sgom pa la ni 'bad par bya// ma'i gzhan ni mi shes pa// dbus kyimadud pa de yang ni// de byed nani dngos grub 'gyur// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor grub pas//

sngags kyi de nyid gcig pu yis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob// las chos dam tshig phyag rgyan// dbye ba 'di ni ma gsungs so// 'khor lo'i dbye bas ma yin zhing// de bzhin dga'
pa sogs kyis man// phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la sal// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni thob// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang// gnyis med bde ba de nyid dang// gsang ba'i thig le'i dbye ba dang//
rnal 'byor grub kha'i bde chen bo// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs byed cing// 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo 'joms// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang// rab tu+ed pa mchog tu bshad// sngags kyi
de nyid nges sbyor bas// jigs shing yan lag gsal kha gang// rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang// bla ma'i zhal las nges rtogs 'gyur// man ngag med pa'i bzlas pa ni// sngags kyi
rgyal po rmongs byed// de yi dka' ba gcig pa dang/ nu bsrubs ma ra ni mi 'gyur ltar// de bzhin man ngag dang phral sngags// skyes busaji srid 'tsho yi bar// bzlas kyang de yi 'bras
khug/ cha tsam klog par mi 'gyuralo// miteshes pa yi mi 'ga' zhig/ rgya mtsho'i gzhi yi pha mtha' yi// sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa// lam ni gang yin mi 'dri gang// de ltar bdag nyid/
'gro ba'i khyed// de bzhin dga' ba cher byed pa'i// man ngag dang bral sgrub pa po// 'bras bu med cing mkhas ba yang// sgrub pa po ni khong khro skya// khong khro skyes pa'i skad
cig la// 'bras bu med cing ngu 'bod 'gro// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dad pas bla ma brgyud pa las// man ngag dag ni bslab pa khyu// gang phyir brgyud pa'i lung gis khyab//
brgyud pa'i rim pas gnas par byed// de ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang// bla ma'i zhal las 'bad pa yis// de nyid mchog ni bslab pa khyu// sngags kyi man ngag brgyud pa'i lung// de rjes
lag na rdo rjes kyang// rdo rjesems dpa' bde ba che// the tshom thams cad gcod pa la// phyag byas nas ni zhus lani// khyed kyis bstan pa de nyid ma chog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ni//
sngags kyadangos grub ban mod// gang bslabs skad cig dngos grub 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sngags kyid nyid rab gsal ba// de nyid mchog tu gsang bani// gang
du'ang nga yis ma bshad pa// skam pa med pa bsam pa'i rgyus// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas byas la// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// sngags kyirgyal lo bla na med// sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa
yis// gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur// thog mar uts+tsha'i bla ma khri// dbyangs yig drug las rnamalar brgyan// sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' dang ldan// dbyings med pa yi mdang bcas// akha'i
mtha' la dbyangs yig 'di// dgu pa dang ni yang dag ldan// ma shar ni tshogo drag mchog gi sgra// sngags kyi gtso bo btu bar bya// de ltar yi ge gnyis kyi ming// sngags kyi brda ni rmad byung
ba 'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir// sgra dang thig le'i ming du byas// rlung gnyis kyis ni phyi nas nii// ma rig ma dud pa 'byed par byed// phyag rgya chen po mchog gi sku// mchog tu
zhi ba'i yi ge gnyis// man ngag thob pa'i 'dod pa'i don// gang gis zla ba drug bzlasan// thig le'i sgra yi go 'phang gsal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed// skye bos raben pa lha
mi gnas// sgra yi tshor ma rnams dang bral// bge samad skal bzang nyams dga' ba// skyodamos tshalagazhi bdab che// 'dod pa la yongs spyod pas/ sngags kyi gtsogo'agrub par
'gyur// 'di ni gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas ba nas// gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// sgrub po bde ba'i stan 'dug nas// mig gnyis sna rtsor
gtad byas nas// sna ni lci ba'i tshad du gzhag/ phrag gong bsams la lcetAn sbyar// so dngamamu ni bde bar gzhag/ dbugs kyi 'byung rngub glod nas ni// cung zad cung zad rtsol bral nas//
ji lta ba bzhin 'byung rngubani// rdordzi skyelakrung lags gnas pa// de ltar phyag rgya dang ldan pas// yi ge gnyis nirtagatubablas// thig le'i dbye bas bde ba che// blob chug gis rnal 'byor
mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni dang po 'di// a ba d+hAti dri med gnas// rlung gi de nyid ye shesache// rdo rje sams dpa' yi ni rgyu// ri lural gri
ro langs dang// rgyal po mig sman bad kyis len// dmag dpung re sa dang rtsig ba 'bigs// rig 'dzin Mgyi ni go 'phang mchog mi snang ba dang gtar mthong ba// 'dod dgur bsgyur dang gzugs
mthong dang// gsor 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal// ma yi nang du 'jug pa dang// mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang// yoshes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de ltar skad cig gcig ni// kyang
dachub mtshan nyid go pang ngo// dka' ba spyod pa spangs nas ni// shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan// bshad pa'i bde ba chen po ltar// sdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min// 'phrang ba mi dgos
bgrang ma dgos// 'din bskyud rim dbye mi dgos// gsungs pa'i dka' thub sogs mi dgos// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gcig bu yis// bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa dang// zla ba drug
gi mngon sbyor bas// go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud yal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ thig le'i dbye ba dang rnal 'byor mchog thob par byed pa'i
le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// bla na med pa nA da'i don// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur// sgra yang ma
shigs par ni bshad// rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med// rnam par kun las rnam par grol// lte ba sprul pa yang dag gnas// sprul gyi lce ltar phra ba ni// gnyis med ya
shes rmad byung ba// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang// dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba// de dag deltar rin po che// skyed pa po yi pha dang mas// mi chad cing gong bu med// 'byung
ba chen po rnam par spangs// dus dang rtog pa rnams las grol// skya med zad med rmad du byung// 'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs// sngangs shing lhag ma med pa dang// mchog gaM
mchog sta zhi ba med// dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas// ma rtog med cing rten pa med// kun gzhi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// nyon mongs can gyi yid kyis ni// bems po rnams
kyi sad par byed// mchod ga tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// thob pa'i go 'phang ba na med// gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang// rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten// yi ge ho yis
bskul nas ni// mi yi 'khor losad par byed// dolta'i nA da'i go 'phang don// bla ma'i zhal la yang dag gnas// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyudadapal rdo rje 'a phung ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/
nA da'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa 'o//re nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i don// bla na med pa bshad kyisaM nyon// gsang ba b+ha ga zhes su gsungs//
ku// b+ha gde bzhin chos 'byung ba// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ste// dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu// de rjesams dpa' yi ni gnas// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal//
ye shes chen pa spros pa med// rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs// bral dga'i mtha' sta mchog tu phra// lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas// dga' bral la sogs skad cig gnas//
phra ba yang dag byang chub sems// srog la phan par 'tshob ste// sa mda'i 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas// dus brala rnam rtog med pa sta// stonganyid skyo med 'chi ba med// sprul pa'i 'khor/
ler thim pa dang// bde ba chen po'i 'khor la skye// bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste// chags bral 'gro kun skye ba med// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba thams cad ster bar byed//
rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis// sdu ya dbus su 'dzin par byed// gang de skye ba nyams myong bar// gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags// de nyid gsang ba yi ni mchog/ bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas//

ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o///de nas gzhan yang sdom pa'i don// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// sdom pa srungabar byed pa gang// de ni byang chub sems
zhes brjod// de'i rtse mor sams 'dzin pa// de ni srung ba zhes ni grags// dbang po rnams ni yul rnams la// 'jug cing rtag tu gang gnas pa// de ni sdom pa srung ba dang// dmatshig
srung bar bshad pa yin// gdul dka' tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu can// rmongs dang sems khos g.yo can dang// dad med rtog ge kha lhan cige/ rtags kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang// nyan thos nor la brkam

gtogs pa tsam du yang// de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya// las kyi phyag rgya nyams dga' ba// gal te byas pa'i spyi bo dang// de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni// mi bya rnal 'byor nyams
par 'gyur// skyong nadam tshig dbus zhugs dang// pad snod phyag rgya sogs brtan dang// brkam dang 'brel pas 'jug pa dang// dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya// snodadang cang te'u gri gug
dang// glegs bam dang ni bgrang 'phrang dang// dam tshig med pa gzhan dag la// gang du'ang bstan pa la bya'o// dge slong sdom la gnas pa la// rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba dang// man ngag
rnams ni bstan mi bya// sa ris la sogs mi bstan cing// gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu// ji ltar spyod pa yang dag spyod// bla ma la yang smra minan// gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos//
dbang po yul la spyod pa ni// gang nas de ni bsdams nas ni// stong nyid gnyis medaskya ma las// sogs pas kun rdzob lhag spyad na// shes rab ye shes dbang skur
sogs// nyams su myong ba'i bde ba yis// bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis// dbang po rnams ni yul las ldogaM bdag bstodagazhan la smod pa dang// yaMshes snyams sogs nges sngangs pa//

bya stags ni tshig tu brjod mi bya// mchu 'gul bar yang mi mngon zhing// cung zad mgrin par brjod bya yis// sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas// gsang las dngos grub mtshungs pa med// gang phyir
tshig ren sdom par bshad// snod min nor ni chen po dang// ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs// bla mas bla med dngos grub phyir// 'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya// bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang//

nor ni chen po la chags shing// snod min slob ma man ngag mchog// rmad du byung ba smra ba gang// rnal 'byor shes pa tshe 'di la// de ni dmyal ba ngu 'bod 'go// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'ang
pa'i mngon par rtogs pa las// ston pa'i tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu ba'o///de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// dam tshig don ni bla na med// bza' ba yi ni dam
tshig gang// de ni de yi don bshad bya// bza' ba ru na bshad pa bang// de ni bdud lta ru brjod// rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis// zhu nas re gcig sar yang ni// de rje lam nas stong song ste kha cig tu
gyur ba bza' ba'o// dam tshig lus dang ngag yid kyis// de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang// 'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang// bde ba nyams su myong ba gang// de dang ro gcig rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu

spyod pa bza' ba 'o// byang chub sems kyi de nyid mchog// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang yis// zhu kha rlung gi de nyid kyis// bza' ba bsam gtan bzang po 'o// spyi de bod pa'i slad nas ni// de tsam rnal 'byor

pas rtag tu// de la snying rje btung ba ni// byang nub sems dpa' bde ba che// snod mchog gsang ba'i pad+ma phrugs// rten ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed// sems kyis bdud rtsi 'thung byed na// bdud rtsi lnga ye

rdzas 'thung// de za ba ni rdo rje'achang// glang po rta spyi ba khung ni// byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i khrag/ bsre nas skad cig de la bza'// de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes brjod// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis//

stong pa nyid dugasal ba'i snod// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro// dga' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni// lhan skyes lhan cig snod du ni// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// bde ba
bu// chen po'i go 'apang gnas// rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni// zhi ba'i de nyid snod bzang por// rlung gi de nyid shes pas bza'// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang gnas// phyag rgya
gsum dang yang dag sbyor// phyag rgya chen por bshad snod du// rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'// srog dang rtsol ba'i go 'phang gnas// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis// sgom dang sgom minasog
'a 'khrul pa// srog chen po yi snod du ni// rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon tshogs// phung po'i bud shing snod bzang por// ye shes chen po'i ma yis min// sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas bza'// bdud bzhi
'a khro bo chen po yi// stobs kyi rig pas sgrub pa po// sgrub pos legs par mnyam gzhag nas// rtag tu rnal 'byor snod du bza'!/ rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi// thig le gsum stabla na med//

mi shigs go 'phang snod du ni// zas ni rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro// stong nyid ye shes mtshung med pa// snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni// yo shes chen po mnyam bzhag nas// btung zhing rtag tung tung ba 'o//
phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bshad// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor// de khon nyid mchog skyes gang// de ni skal ldan snod la ni// rnal 'byor pas 'khrungs nyams dga' ba// bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid
mchog/ nyon mongs dang bal lhan cig skyes// phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya// de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs// gzhan ni gang du ngas ma bshad// deche sams dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ bla ma'i
zha las gsal bar rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpa la de rje 'phrang ba'i nangon par rtogs pa las/ dam tshig gi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcung lo/
gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// sgra tsam don ni bshad par bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'pho ba mad pa'i go 'phang 'thob// chos kyi 'kho pe'i pad sbyabs su// sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni//

chags med snang ba med pa dang// gnyis su med cing dri ma med// dpepa bral ba yo ba med pa dang// gzhi mdabla gab med pa dang// lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ 'byung dang rngub par rnam par spangs//

nyid bla na med// mchog dang rab mchog phra ba dang// ye shes chen po mchog chen po// snying po yi yang snying po mchog/yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rku rnam kun tu sbas pa rnams//gsang ba'i go 'phang 'pho ba med//
