nu mtshungs pa med// byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni// yi ga gAlas yang dag byung// rnal 'byor shes pa rmad byung che// de nyid gsum ni 'o gcig don// a ban+d+hu ti'i go 'phang gnas// slar yang dga'
ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'jug pa la sogs rnam par spangs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni// byang chub sems n dri ba med// sna tshogs skad cig dbyemadapo// brjod pa'i bdag nyid byings
bral ba// rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyun gyis kyang// byang chub sems ni 'bab pa ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob// skyo med zhi ba'i thig le tsam// sngags kyi spyod pas sbyad pas na//
ye shes mchog ni rang rig pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje'aphrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sgra tsam gyi don gtan la dbab ba'i le'us bcu gcig pa'o/
00 de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog// den dam pa ni bshad kyis nyon// rnal 'byor pa yis rlung bsgoms na// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// chung yig thig le ye shes che// phra zhing de gnyis go
'phang gsal// dngos grub kun byed nyams dga' la// gnyis med rnal 'ong mi 'dapa// skya che dkun 'gro zhi ba dang// lus rnams kun la khyab pa dang// ma pham stong pa bsam mi khyab//
thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sgoms dang sam gtan rnal 'byor gyis// thig le rang gi ngo bshus// chos rnams bgacig tu gyur pa'i gnas// sngags kyi de nyid kyi ni rgyu/ bag/
chags kun las rnam par grol/ kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsol ba// sna yi rtsa sor de nyidamanob// 'od zer thig la bsam par bya// srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor// rtog pa rnams kyi
grangs ster ba// skal bzang ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lta yi srog ni/ rin chen la yi sbyor ba'i gzugs// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam// thog ma lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos//
ngag gi gras kyi zlos mtshan nyid// yid kyi rnal 'byor la zhen// sa 2 ko ra yang bapa pa// dpugs kyi tshog sani bgrang ba dang// rlung gi rnam par dpyad pa dang// gnas kyi dbye pa rtsa/
rnams kyi// dus kyi dbye ba rtogs pa dang// rlung rnams kyi ni bzlog pa dang// rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste// de ltar mdor bsdus rnam drug gis// 'byung dang rngub pa zhes su brjod// thog
mar 'byung dang jub pa rnams// nyi khri dang ni chig stong dang// de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug/ nyin dang mtshan mo nges pa ni// ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas//
nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du// grangs kyi rjes su sbyor ba yis// grangs ni yang dang yang du brtag/ dus mtshams kyi ni rab dbye bas// de nas rjes su zlos par 'gyur// thun tshod so sor srog
'tsho rnams dang// rtsol ba ru ni brtag pa ste// nyis stong bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni// yang dag par ni nges bzung med// yongs su gsal bar bcad nas ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la//

'a 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin dang mtshan du nges par ni// de rjes gnas ni rtsol ba yis// tha dad du ni rab tu brtag/ rtsa yi 'khor lo rgyu ba yis// 'byung dang rngub pa nges par ni// nges par
gzung ba'i sbyor ba las// rtsa yi 'khor le sbrad par bya// de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// de rjes gnas kyi sbol ba'i sa// gnas kyi dbye bas brtag par bya//
ma gnas ni so sor brtags pa yis// brgya dang brgyad ni lhag pa'i rgyu// rnam rtog mad pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ rtog pa sangs pa'i mtshan nyid can// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ brgyadang brgyad
ni lhag par rgyu// 'di ni yang dag rnal 'byor mchog/ nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis// mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar gnas par rang ngo bo// rtag dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa//
de nas rnal 'byor log nas ni// rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po/// rtsayi 'khor lo rnam par rgyu// de thob nas ni log pa dang// kun nas nyon mongs rnal 'byor bas// nges pa la ni don dam pa//
nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis// blo dang ldan pa log pa las// de nas dgag pa de dag kyang// yang dag rnal 'byor stobs kyis ni// srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam
rtog rnams// kun nas rab tu spangs nas ni// rlung ga de kho na nyid rgyu// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgomalar bya// gnyis med mchog girnal 'byor gyis// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// rlungagi
de kho na nyid rten// 'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa ni// de la rtse gcig sems kyi ni// rtog mad de khon nyid kyis// rlung gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal//
khang bzang byed pa bzhin du ni// thog mar sa ni yongs su sbyang// de stangs bgags dang bral byas la// gnas ni legs pa ra dag par bya// khang bzang bsal ba nyams dga' ba// blo lta/
ji ltar 'dod par bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor spyod pasa mchog/ rlung gi de nyid rnam par sgom// snga ma bzhin du mnyam bzhag nas// srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba dang// rnal 'byor mchog gi ya
shes che// rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par bya// thog mar rlung gi de nyid dang// de nas sngags kyi de nyid gsal// de la rlung gi 'od zer mchog/ gsal ba chen po'i kha dog lnga// de bzhin
gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin// phung po lnga yi rang ngo bo// de ni ye shes lnga dag pa// rlung lnga ru ni rgyu ba byed// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga'i// de nyid mtshan nyidago
'phang mchog/ sna yi rtse mo de nyid mchog/ rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo bo// rlung gi sgrig le zhes ni bshad// yang dag de nyid gsal ba yang// sna rtse yungs kar de yang ni// rgyud gzhan rnams/
su gsungs pa ni// sna rtsar yungs kar de yang ni// srog dang rtsol ba'i brtag pa ste// srog dang rtsol pa la gnas pa// 'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su sgom// stong gi sna las nges 'byung//
tsa/ g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyis ka yang// dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur// nang gi dus ni yin par yushad// ltog ma snying kha lte ba dang/ gsang ba'i pad+ma'i 'gro 'ong sngon// zur nged kyi ni
dus dag tu// go rims ji bzhin gnas pas brtan// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// ma yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba nyid// pad+ma'i mgon po rgyu ba 'o
g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// ljang gsar dag tu snang ba ste// las kyi mgon po rgyub 'o// gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog tu/
snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'kher nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba 'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//
0 rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba 'o// lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung// bya ba kun la 'jug pa'o// 'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste// 'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di// ye sa/
lnga yi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor byas pa'i yul min zhing// rtog ge pa yis mi shesaso// dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa// rnal 'byor kun gyi dngos grub pa// de nyid kun gyi go
'phang gsal// rnal 'byor kun gyi don bsdus pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsal// thams cad bangag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de nyid mchog ni shin tu phra// khu ma'i zhal las rtog
par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//de nas
gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// bde ba chen po'i gsal ba'i tshig/ rdor sems go 'phang mi byed pa// rang rigs pas ni mchog gi mchog/ kun rtog gis brtags kyis stong pa// bde ba
chen po zhes 'di brjod// lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par spangs// zhi ba gnyis mad rnam par bral// dngos po kun gyis rang
bzhin bdag/ bde chen zhes ni 'di la brjod// rdo rje ye shes lnga yi dngos// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin can// lnga ni rtsa nas 'bab pa'i rgyun// stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'phang gsal// rang bzhin
med cing rten pa med// ga'anyis ma da dngos po rnams bral zhing/ cha med can rnam par spangs// rtag tu rtog pa kun las grol// 'pho ba med cing zhi ba dang// zag med bde
ba thams cad gsal// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// bde ba thams cad la 'jug pa// stong pa stong pa chen po dang// shin tu stong pa mchog gi mchog/ stong pa dang gzhan stong pa'i gnas/

nam mkha' lnga yi ngo ngo nyid// mchod mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid// mi tshig pa dang mchog tu 'bebs// sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes mchog/ rang bzhane rje rje zhes ni brjod// snying rjernal 'byor yang dag 'dres
mchog tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di// de nyid gsum po re gcig pa// brjod dang brjod bya rnam par snangs// bde chen zhes bya'i 'khor lor gnas// dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul min// mchog tu gnyis med
rnal 'byor gyis// zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyis thob// rnam 'byor bzhi yi go 'phang gsal// stong nyid lnga yis kun nas gang// chab zhi yi ni rnam bkag pa//

tsha gu rdo rje rtse mor 'dzin pa ni// sems dpa' zher byar gtan la dbab// nam mkha' lnga yi cha yi gang// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod// de nyid bde chen go 'phang ste// bzhi pa dga' ba kun la khyab// dpa' bo

rnal 'byor ma sbyor skyes// mi phyed dbye ba rnam par spangs// de yi ngo ba de nyid de// rang skyid tshor ba rig pa 'o// pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min// dpa bral mtshon par dka' ba dang// rang gi blo la yang
[z]dag gnas// rang rig pa zhes bshad pa'o// gzhon nu ma yin rab dga' bzhin// mchog tu gsal bar nyams su myong// de nyid mchog dang pha rol 'gro// mchog ni thub pa kun la
sogs// rtog pa gsal ba'i go 'phang ni// de ni mchog dang bde ba che// de nyid gsum du mtshan nyid gcig/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
las ni grol bar rtogs// gnyis dang gnyis med rnam dpyod rang bzhin dang bral blo ni zhi ba'i bdag nyid can// gsungs pa'i nyon mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun rtog dang ni bul ba zhes//
shes dang shes bya'i rnam rtog dben pa sngangs shing bden pa'i rang bzhin dang// mthar gyur kun khyab bzhi ba mchog dang mchog rab de nyid 'gro ba bde la sol// dus ni dus kyi mtha' zhes
brjod/ bzhi pa'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba// 'khor ba 'khrul pa'i rtog sngangs shing// mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs// mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por myos// mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan nyid can//
gzungs ba rnams kyi yul rnams zhes// kun nas gzugs la sogs pa las// 'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams// mig la sog pa'i rang bzhinagyis// de dang bral zhing mchog tu phra//
ye shes bde ba kun gyis bdag/ sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde ba sems ni zhi ba nyid// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des//
de las rnam grol 'jigs pa med// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing// thugs rdzazhi bar mdzad
ba'i phyir// mya ngan 'dus pa'i bde mi gnas// nyan thos ye shes zhi pa nyid// gnyis med mchog dang bas ru 'o// de dag bde ba stobs pa yi// de dang bral ba'i bde chen po// dgung
phyir mchog tu dga' ba'i dus// nyan thos ye shes zhes brjod do// de mtha' bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rang rgyal mya ngan 'das pa dang// de ni gnyis med ye shes zhi// bdab yis ni bye brag
byas// dngos po mkhyen pa'i shes che// byang chub sams kyang 'dzin par byed// rtsa rnams kun la bdo ba ni// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de yi bdag nyid de nyidani// bde ba chen
bo zhes ni brjod// rnal 'byor gcig dus danyidani// rtog pa rnam rtog bdag nyid min// bsnyenanas baT+Thas pa sbyin srog min// bsam gtan rlung ni bgegs pas min// bya ba ma yin 'aphrang
tsha bas min/ khaskyud pa rim ba bsgoms pas min// cung zad bzhi pa'i dbang bskur gyis// bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas 'thob// rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni// mchog ba ye shes bde ba che//
rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ bde ba chen po'i tshiga rnam par bshad pa'i le' ste bcu gsupa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad

kyis nyon// rdo rje pad+mamanyam par sbyor// gang gis yang dag dang sa grub 'gyur// tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pas// mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod// de ni rlung du yang dag grags// yi ge a ni phyi ba
yis// rnal 'byor shes pas rtag mchog stsol// de rten snying kha'i pad+ma yis// 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// chos kyi 'khor lo skal ba bzang// thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhug
dayi 'dab ma la skyes pa// rnam shes brgyad ni kun rdzob bo// mig la sogs pa yang dgastan// 'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod// de dag 'arjom pa drung rdo rje// bgegs mthar byed pa zhes
ni brjod// nam shas rnams dang gang de la// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams su brjod// 'jig rten gsum du kun nas khyab// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams gnas// skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis/
bum la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gnas// delarlung gi yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+mo zhes ni brjod/ rdo rje snying rjes shes par bya// pad+ma yang ni stong pa nyid// de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu shes///
lnga pad+mamanyam sbyor ba// rdo rje nyi ma zhes ni gsungasaM// 'od zer tshogs kyi bdag nyid can// de rnams kyi ni 'byed pa gang// da ni pad+mazhes su brjod// de yi rnal 'byor mchog tu shes//

rdo rje pad+mamanyam sbyor ba/ byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur// bang chen 'khor lo pad+ma'o// de la'ang de yi sbyor ba gang// sbyor ba mchog de rmad du byung// bla ma'i gsung ni rdo rje sta// slob ma
bzang gis thos pa'i snod// pad+ma de yi gnas de la// de yi sbyor ba'ang mchog tugasal// zhi gnas pad+mazhes gsungs la// de la lhag mthong rdo rje'o// de gnyis gcig
gyur rnal 'byon// sgom pa yis ni de nyid mtho/rnal 'byor ma zhal par gnas// rdo rje bde chen bla na med// pad+maslob ma bzang gi kha// man ngag gi ni don gyi snod// de gnyis rnal 'byor kun
bdag nyid// yang dag de nyid don mthong byed// blo ldan rnam rtog bral ba yi// rdo rje ling ga zhes ni bshad// rnam rtog bral ba'i blo ldan gyis// b+ha ga pad+mazhes ni brjod// dam tshig gis ban rnal
shu 'byor ma// de gnyis dngos gcig yang dag sbyor// gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed// stong phrag gnyis dang bdun khri yi// rtsa rnams rdo rje zhes ni brjod// byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa//
bad+ma shes ni yosasu grags// de ni kun tu sbyor ba des// dga' ba skyed par byed pa yi// rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan// rang gi rdo rje 'chang pad+ma// de la de gnyis mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyus
shes go 'phangagasal// dbang bskur mchog ni rdo dza ste// pad+ma slob ma snod bzang po// de gnyis mchog ni yang dag sbyor// yang dag de gnyis kyi ni rgyu// ani pad+mazhes su brjod// yig
ba ni rdo rje nyid// thig le de nyid mi shigs pa// de gnyis sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni// de ltar sbyor ba mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad snod sdom pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dang// bla ma'i drin
gyis yongs su shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje'aphrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ de rje pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
sngags kyi de nyid ye shes mchog/ bshad kyis rdo rje can ni nyen// sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa yis// gang gis dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rjeNi
rnams// stags ni gzung bzhin bzlos brjod bya// de yis myur du dngos grub 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid pha mthar phyin// rdo rje'i phyag rgyu go 'phang zhing// phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don//
mchog gi de nyid ya shes che// sngags kyi de nyid bstan pa yin// dmigs pa med pa'i go 'phang gsal// rdo rjesams dpa'i nges pa'i rgyu// sngags ni yon tan kun gyi gsal//
lus ngag yid kyi sdom pa'o// de nyid de skyes yongashes mchog/ de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa// snying kha'i pad+mar mchog tu gsal// de nyid ye shes bla na med// zla drug bzlas pas 'grub
pa ni// 'gyur tagazhan dum yin no// rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs dang ni// rnal 'byor pas ni yongs su grags// dmigs med ces ni gang gsungs pa// de ni don dam par brjod//
sbrul sogs pa yi dbye ba yis// sngagasan zlos pa gnyis su mad// 'on kyang mi phyed de nyid gsum// sngags kyi don kun bsdus pa 'o// bzlas pa'i dngos grub mtshungs pa med// pa dang dgamanyag
khar bzhag bsan// dngos grub mtshungs pa med par 'gro// rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla// sngags don sngags de nyid dang ni// sngags kyi

man ngag kha brgyud pa// sngags kyi man ngag mi gsal ba// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bya// de nas rdo rjesams dpa' ni// kun mkhyen 'gro ba'i bla ma la// jo rje sems dbas yang nas yang// phyag byas nas ni
yongs su zhus// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyi ming dang don// rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba// sngags kyi de nyid man ngag ni// sdugs kyi sdom don ji lta bu// de nas bcom ldan
rjes gsus// rnal 'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid// sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang// gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// snying po song po'i don bsdus pa///

thog mchod cing zhi ba dang// dngos dang dngos mad bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rjedabyer med pa// sngags don rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// nyon mongs mdacing mi gsal ba// rab zhin med pa'i mchog gi
mchog/ ming med rang bzhin med pa dang// rnam pa med pa'i chen po'i mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ khade ba yang dag 'phal bar byed// skal bzang bde ba 'phel bar byed// thams cad shes

shing chadang bral// gnyis med pa shes rnal 'byor skyes// de nyid de ni don dam yang// de nyid de bzhin nyid gzhan min// de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// khyab pa kun 'gro stong
pa nyid// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'joms// drimad dri bral dba' ba dang// rang rig kha yi go 'phang mchog/ dang po'i lha ste nyams dga' bzang// cha yis tshogs rnams rgyas par byed// na ngag//

gnas kyi bye brag gis// 'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya// rtsa dang mgrin pa snying kha rkan// rtsol ba ji bzhin brjod pa yi// de bzhin du ni las bya ba// zhi ba la sogs go rims bzhin// ji bzhin dngos
grub ye shes dang/ ji bzhin nyams su myong mtshan nyid// rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bu// rgyun gyi dbye ba ji lta bu// rig pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas// yang dgabs/
gtan phyag rgya'i rim/ gzugs rdzogs pa la sogs pa yi// bla ma brgyud pas yang dag gnas// rab tu 'bad pas bslab pa'@#// gsaradang do shal gos dang ni// rin chen sna tshogs lon tana mchog/
bran dang las byed gangasam dang/ dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis// ji ltar bzhedapa ston pa la/ rnyed par dka' ba'i dngosa rnams kyis// sngags kyi don ston bla ma// dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya//

phyag byas te rjes sngags pa yis// yang dag gzungs nas 'bras bu'i don// mi yi nus pa'i smyug gu dang// sa gzhi rinatshan kha 'bar ba// yang na dur khrod thal ba ni// 'ab brdal dngos grub skor bar byed//
thog mar dbang bskur blang byas nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor la sogasabya// bgegs mthar bdal gter ma ni// chen po gtsug lag khang dusbyin// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'i// mtshungs pa med/
pa'i sngags btubya// dang po'i yi ge thog ma bri// dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan// sngatshanathama'i mtha' ma ldan// sku yi sa bon du ni brjod// thog ma'i yi ga nyis 'gyur la//
u ra yi cha dang ldan// mtshungs lamad pa'i sngags btu bya// gsung gi rdosnying po mchog/ ud+ma' yi cha dang bcas// dbyangs yig drug par yang dag ldan// sde tshan mtha' yi mtha' char bcos/
wi thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gsum// 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed// rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid mchog/ sngags btub ni bla na med// de nyid dngos grub thams

cad byed// sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa// sngags kyi theg pa kun yin no// rgyu dang mi rgyus nyid la// dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor ye shes bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni//

mngashes bla na med pa'i mchog/ man ngag ji bzhin sngags zlos pa// dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis/ de yi dngos grub rgya chen 'gro// tsha'adi nyid la sngags shes pas// sems shes chen po zhes bshad pa'i//
sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor che// rab gsal sngags ni mtshungs pa med// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod byed// gang zhig sngags mgul pa du// rtag 'chang de kho na nyid shes// rtog pa kun yang 'grub pa/
byed// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang// dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang// blo kha zang 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub// rnal 'byor chen kho 'i rgyud dpal rdordzi 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las//
0 sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa'i le'u ste bcolnga pa'o/// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyen// grangs kyirimapa bla med// ji ltar gnas pa'i rlung rnams kyi/ rim pa ji
ba bzhin du// gang gis thob pa skal ba bzang// srog ni thams cad bdag nyid gnas// gang gis yang dag yongs su shes// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed// rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa//

kha bya/ srin gyi dpal las gsal ba gang// mdor bsdus nas ni dus ni drug/ lo tshogs su ni yongs su grags// sbyor bganyis ni dus yin te// dus de nyin zhag drug cu'o// nyin dang
mtsho dunges pa la// nyin zhag gcig ces yongs su grags// nyin mtshan chu tshod drug nus// de bzhin dbyug rtsa ba'o// 'byung dang rdzob pa'i dus drug la// tsa ga zhes ni yongs su grags//
skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs// de nyid sa gol gtogs pa'i tshad// thang cig gsum la skad cig go/ de la yungs kar bsolab tsamaM// dbugs gsum nithang cig go/blang cigade'i yud tsamamo//

la bde bar gnas// de ni rab 'gyed 'jigs pa brjod// dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad// dus ni phra ba skad cig bdag/ 'das po dang ni da ltar dang// ma 'ongs pa yi
mtshan nyid do// 'das pa'i skad cig gsum du gsungs// dalta yang ni skad cig gsum// ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad// de las slar yang skad cig gsum// dalta'i skad cig gsum gyi ma/
'a/ de lasachagasum de las cha// de srid grangs ni ji srid du// rtog pa stong pa gnyis su med// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par 'gyur// srog gi gnas ni bla na med// phyogs dang dus kyi rtog pa bral//
rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang// de yi srog ni shar nas bris// gnyis med de ni bsdus pa 'o// gzhan yang bshad par bya yis nyon// srog ni thim dang 'char ba yis// gang tshe skad cig la sogs

ts+tshA rtogs// kun nas rab tum zhi ba// de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas// grol ba'i gnas ni mi shes so// bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// ming ni ma skyes cha chen po/ de yang rnam shes dang khral ba//
ye shes lus ni bdag med pa// der ni skye ba mchog gi mchog/ srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu brjod// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo stan// thog mar 'byung ba bzhi po la// sgro 'dogs skyod pa'i ngo

ka bor byed// de tsho rang gi gnas su thim// rnam shes las ni skya ba chung// de las ma ni skye bar 'gyur// ma las muni 'byung bar byed// de las sa ni yang dag skya// de dag rnams las phung por 'byung/
phyir sa mched rnams dang ni// de las rnam shes rang bzhinamed// brgya dang brgyad kyi lhag pa'i rim// ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas// zim nas 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du// rgyags pa bskyod pa'i rlung
chen po// nyon mongs yi ni 'das nas ni// sngags thob nas ni rnam rgyas te// skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed// de las rgyags pas chu yi rlung// rgyags pa bskyed pa za ba'i phyir// phung po rnams

kyang snyad byed nyid// rim gyis lus chen sku sgrogs byed// de las rgyags pa'i mtshan 'byung// rgyugs pa'i chu ni sdud par byed// 'byung pa rnams kyis bsdus nas kyang// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// de la

rlung ni btang bzung 'byung// rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed// de nas kyang ni rlung ni sdud// khyab cing phra ba sgrib par byed// de las mi btang pa zung ba dang// rnam shes skad cig sgrib par byed// bsgribs
nas de las rnam shes kyang// bems por song nas brgyal bar 'gyur// skye mchod cha ni sgrib par byed// dug pa'i ye shes mchog gi mchog/ de las thim par gyur pa'i srog/ rnam shes dang ni
mtshungs par ldan// de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad// srog ni thim zhing 'cha' ba dang// jilta ba bzhin yongs su shes// bla ma brgyud pa'i 'am ba 'byung// rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya//
'i sku ni sgrub pa'i phyir// 'chi ba med pa'i sgrub pa ni// gang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni// thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten// gang phyir sems can tshe thung bas// 'chi med go 'phang sgrub mi nus//
de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// 'chi ba med pa rab bsgrub ga/ bcom ldan magon po mi shes mchog/ rnal 'byor de nyid pa rol byon// rdo rje sems dpas phyag
byas zhus// 'chi ba 'od nyid rigs pa ni/ ji ltar yang dag thim pa lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bya ba kun sgrub go 'phang ni// 'chi ba med pa'i rnal 'a byor che// yang dag
de nyid rnam nges pa// sems can tshon thung ba yis// dngos grub 'grub pa gang ya med// de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams// tshe ring ba ni dge ba 'o// de la thog mar rnal 'byor mchog/ blo bzang
nang gi bdag nyid sgrub// lce nikan gyis dbus sbyar ba// byas sa de kho nyid tshig bzla/ sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ yang dag rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// sna rtsar dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing//
khan gsal bar dgag par bya// skad kyi ba gnas son zla ba ni/ sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyisan zhu// zhu ba rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso nges btung// mtshan pyod kyi ni dus
tshod mthar// ji srid thun gcig ma chad bar// de sridarnal 'byor pas sngags bzla// rdo rje'i lus ni byed par 'gyur sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs bcas pa dang yang dag ldan//
ya yan lag ma nyams rtag tu bzla// sgrub ba po la srog ni'agugs// rdzas kyang rtag tu bstan par bya// de nyid lnga yi rim pas skyo// bzlas pa rdzogs nas rtag tu ni// lus la 'byung ba'i dri ma med//

pa'i sngags kyis ni// lanagasum du ni dag par bya// de phyir bud med gzhonanu ni// rtag tumakhur ba bkang zhing btung// de ni bakhra' ba sbyin pa yang// mar la bstagasapa'i 'bras dang ni// ma sha dang ni ti/
dga' dang// ra yi 'o ma kha ra kar// tila rnams mamanyam byas nas ni// myos pa yis ni sbyin sreg khya// nyal karade la bza' pa sbyin// bla na med pa'i bakhra' ba po// de ltar rig pas chog shes nas//

su la'ang smra bar mi bya 'o thams cad sngon bzhin zhi ba ni// myur du dngos grub ster bar byed// zla ba drug tu'ang gang bstenab// den rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur// bcud kyis len dang gsar 'gyur sogs// tshe
dgag pa ni kha na med// rab tu 'bad pas bstan pa'i bya// phyag rgya che don sgrub pa pos// rgas pa med cing srin nad med// snyoms las med cing skugs pa med// grog skam rlung mkhris nad sogs med//
nad dang 'bras dang 'brum bu dang// shu ba g.yan pa 'brum phran med// mdze nad mtshan bar rdol ba med// dud dang pad dka'adapal lus ldan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar//
ba 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ de ni rtab tu 'gugs par byed// de yi mdza' chen lha rnams te// rnal 'byor rnams gnas par byed/ lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni// phyag bya ba dang
pha mchod par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'brong pa'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste btudug pa 'o//

sbyar gzhal yas khang// rnal 'byor ji bzhin gnas ri bzhin// mdor bsdus sa ni bshad par bya// rlung gi 'khor lor gnas ra 'i rtsa// 'dab drug rlung ni la kha 'bab spyod/ 'dab gsum ma yi 'khor na
bshad// rtsa gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char// de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo yang// rtsa ni bcu drug yang dag brjod// chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa/ kha dan kun la khyab pa'o// de bzhin sprul pa'i

'khor lo yang// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'char bar bshad/ kha de ba chen po'i 'khor lo tshor// rtsa ni sum cu gnyis su bshad// de ltar mdor bsdus rim pa yang// khargya dang sum cu gcig lhag bar// rtsa rnams su ni

mang dag bshad/ gzhan dag tu ni rgyas pa yang// rtsa ni bdun khri nyis stong du// gnas kyi dbye bas bye ba ni// nges par brjod pa 'bum skor gsungs// rgyud ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du// snying po lasazhi snying por

gsungs// smin ma'i dbus nas rlung 'khor le// bye ba 'khril ba mi bzad pa// mi bzang bstan dang mtshan nyid can// rtsa byung drug gi mtshan nyid de// 'dzin pa rtog med gang ba ni// rtsa gsum gru gsum ma
dkyil 'khor// mgrin pa'i 'og tu bshad pa yin// dri ma dang bral ba gsal ba dang// drag po dang ni gsum yin no// yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs// shin tu bzang bo 'gro la//stobs chen dang
ni mi bzad che// mdzes chen mdun du skyes pa che// rgyags pa'i rtags dang rgyags pa'i ma// rgyags pa'i chud rgyags byed// rgyags dang rgyags pa'i rgyu 'thun dang// rgyags pa'i rlan dang rgyags pa/

dag thob// ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni// 'bab pa nyi ma zla ba 'o// mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang// gang phyir srad bu'i rnam par gnas// rgyug cig tu yang shes nas ni// de nyid 'bras
bu rnam pa gnyis// g.yas pa nyi mo'i rnam pa dang// g.yon pa klu ba'i rnam par 'byung// gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni// de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba 'o// gang tshe g.yonapa'i zla ba gsal/ khade kha

gnas// de tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur// gsang gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa// ma dang nyi ma 'char ba na// de tshe lhag par chags pas non// chags pa mchog tu 'dod/

bzhugs// de las 'khor lo gsum dbye bas// rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyisani// gsum phya bdun nurtsa gnyis gsal// de ni stong du rab phye ba//

phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni// 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni// nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brang nas// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ lha yi rim pa'i

ro gcig rang bzhin no// rtsa ni gcig gi brgyun la brten// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhing/ lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs// stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/

chos kyi 'khor lo de las stang// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya ba// nyams su myong ba mchog dga' ste// rnam smin skad cig mtshan nyid do// longs sngod 'khor lo des las ni// steng du byed pa'i skad cig la//
ltams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rnam 'dzomasamtshan nyid skad cig go/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma// lhan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid dang
bral skad cig go/ rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che// rnal 'byomam tshogs yang dag gzung// de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go/ rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che// rnal
'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzugs// de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid gcig ga par ra mtshungs pa'i// rnal 'byor chen pos nyamasasu myong// slar yang mtshan nyid yod par 'gro// rab tu sad
pa nyams su myong// stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid do// bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa// gnyis med rdo rjesams dpa'i gnas// de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba// gzhan du gsal bar ma gsungs so//

rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin gyis// bram rgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang pa'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//
de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le gsum ni blo na med// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis na// rnal khyor pa yi dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa rnams kun tu 'bab pa dang//
byang chub sams ni zhu byas pa// rdo rje mni pad+ma'i rtsa/ rlung gi bzung ba'i skad cig la// rkan dgug pa yi sbyor ba dang// kyi gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob

par byed// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/chos kyi 'khor le nyid mchog/snying kha'i pad+ma'i lte ba la//dbus su hU~Mnibakod nas ni// thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni//dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// de khon nyid lus skyob pa//

'a phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral// stong dang 'og ni rnam pa'i sras// sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas// ngag gi dra ba yongasasu spangs// rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing// rtog pa'i spyod+ma yul rnams dang

khrul// gnyis pa kun las rnam par grol// mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba 'o/ rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog/ kha dog lta pa gsal ba che// sna rtsar sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// kun nas kyang ni bsgom par bya//
yi ge oM ni sngags kyi mchog/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzla bar bya// snga ma bzhin du ya shes lnga// zhi ba la sogs de bzhin sgrub// bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/

rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog/ bsdus nas sur yang dbye ba ni// phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro// rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa// cig la gnyis te sngags dang rung// sngags kyi thig le de nyid mchog/ thig

le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas// slar yang rlung gi thig le yang// thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro// sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes// zla ba nyi ma ma yi rtsa// gsum zhes

bya ba'i mtshan nyid do// la lan dang ra sanA// a ba d+hA tI zhes bya'i ming// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang// de nyid du ni yongs su grags// stong dang 'ogatukhyab pa nyid// sosor lu gu rgyud tshul du//
rtsa rnams kun la khyabanas ni// yang dag man ngag rim pas gnas// de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tuphro// shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi// rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad
byung che// gso sbyor gyis min bzlas pas min// 'phreng bas ma yin 'gogs pas min// grangs min dus min sbyin sregamin// 'byin byed 'gog byed kyis ni min// ye shes chen po'i go 'phang zhi// rnal
'byor gcig pus rtogs par byed// mngon par shes dang lnga dang ni/ de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog/ thig le gsum ninam sgom pa// zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis 'grub par/
'gyur// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// yo shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs// gnas kyi grangs kyi dbye ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// la
byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o///de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// de nyid

gsum gyi go 'phang mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni// yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs// snying po yang ni bshad par bya// de ni rnam phyi khyod nyon cig/ de ni ji lta ba
bzhin bshad// oM ni sku yi rdo rje yi/ snying po ru ni yang dag bshad// yi ge a dang yi ge u// yi ge ma zhes bya pa gsum// A ni chos 'khor pa la// rlung gi 'khor
la khyab// sgrib med sgrib pa'i rlung chen ngo// srog tu gsungs pa thams cad bsdus// ched ma dang bral ba dang// dngos po dngos med dbus na gnas// thig le 'khor le'i zla 'a khyab// nam
mamakha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi don gyi gnas// stags rnams thams cad rab sad byed// sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing// ngag gi 'khor lo rab sad byed// dngos su
'a na gsum gyi ni gzhi// 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed// phrad mang 'phul ba med pa'i gnas// byang chub sa bon bde ba che// gzugs med khams su yang dag bshad// 'khor lo bzhi yi don/
bsdus pa'o// u ni longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// ma dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi// mgrin pa'i mtha' nas spyi gtsug mtha'// khyab pa gzi brjid kyi ni lus// gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar shes/
gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can// bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar nga shad// yi gam ni theg pe tsam// gdong tshad mtha' yi sor bzhi tsam// dga' ba'i gtsug ton gnas na gnas// zla ba'i gzugs dang

'dra ba yi// bde ba chen po 'i go 'phang zhi// rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po/ mi phyad lus kyi go 'phang ni// 'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin// bsdusan gnasaris nyi shu 'o// de ltar nga ni gnasagasum gyi
rtsa gsum gyin ge gnas su 'dus// yi ga oM gyi ba shesan// khams gsum rnam par sad par byed// rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzugs// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu// rnam par rtog pa'i rlung/
gnyis// sna yi bu ga nas ni byung// yang dag nyis zla ba gnyis// sbas pa nang nas rgyu bar byed// ma ni 'bar ba rtsa mo la// smin ma'i dbus su srog gi rlung// de ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad//
gtan pa phab ste de nyid gsum M// zhi ba khams gsum la khyab pa/skya ba'i sa bon rgyas M pa'o// yi ge a ni ye shes mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/ a ni gnyis dang yi ge haM// ring po'
byas te dbye ba gsum// chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa// yi ga A ni sngar bshad zin// gnyis pa yang ni srog gi rlung// stong nyid ye shes ming can te/ srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs
yuladang dbang po bsdus pa 'o// kun gzhidang ninyon mongs yid// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// gsung gi rje rdzabarjod pa'i mchog/ A ni chos 'khor pad+malas/
mgrin par yi ge Anyid 'gyur// srog nyid dang nithun sal dang// yi ge pa yis kun nas ni// mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas pa bcings// A haM kha nas gsal bar brjod/ 3re 'bab pa yi
khrung khrung ni// ro sbyar ba zhes bya bar gsungs// bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed// gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o// ha dang de bzhin yi ge u// de ni yi ge ma dang gsum// rkang pa nas/
ni ma go mtha'i bar// 'khor ye gzhi yi don bsdus pa// khyu ni h+phur sel ming can rlung// bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na ba nas// yi ge A na khyab byed rlung// mgrin pa pad+ma
dbus na gnas/ yi ge ma ni srog rlung yin// dpral ba rlung gi 'khor lo la// de dag gcig gyur snying kha nas// thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod// mi bskyod snying po kha dog gnag/ gzugs med khams/

kyi ming can no// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po gsum du rab tu bshad// lag na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas// slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang// gnas kyi dbye/
kyang kha 'tshal lags na// 'di rnams dbus na bdag po gang// ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs// gtsabo rdo rje 'chang ba che// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// gsang ba'i mchod pa gsungs pa yi//
sbas pa'i don na khyod 'dri ba// rgyuda rnams kun tu m gsungs pa// rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// thugs kyis sa bon bdag lo tsA// kun gyi nang na rnam rtogamed// gang phyir gtso bos gzhan
rnams ni// sgrib dang de nga zhin 'phrog pa dang// rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// lus kun la ni khyab par byed// snayi bu ga las ni rgyu// lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor
lo'i lam// gang gi stobs kyis khyab par byed// gsum pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rnam rtog med par rmad byung tshe// rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na// skyes pa de ni rtogs pa 'o//
0 rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang// yang dag gas pa'i nga yis bshad// sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus// rgyud 'di pad+maganyis su gsungs// drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'dab la gnyis// stong dang/
'og tu kha bltas nas/ sur yang kha tshul du gnas/ srog dang thur sel rgyu bar byed// de nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa// rlung gnyis su ni gsal bar gsungs// sku dang gsung gi snying po ga'is// la la
nA dang lnga sa nA/ daa pa d+hA tI mchog gi gnas// de gnyis dbus ma mchog gi mchog/ rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung// rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab// rnam rtol gang sbub tu ni/ las kun byed cing
mkhas par 'gyur// rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni// brgya dang brgyad la gang rgyal ba// dus kun tu ni 'bal bar rigs// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub//

de yis thob pa'i rgyud 'di'i gsungs// de nigang tshe skad cig thob// de ni skad ciga mchog tu gsungs// de yang jiltar thob par byed// de la rigs pa ru ni brjod// thog mar rnal 'byor pa chen po// blobazang

gis ni zhi gnas sgom// bskyod pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang// dbang po yi ni spro dgu la// thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa// hU~M bzlas pa'i mtshungs pa med/ rna mchog tu rgyun mi

'chad par ni// zla ba gcig tu bzlas byas na// de rjes skad cig de la spob// gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na// snying kha'i pad+ma'ang steng bltas 'gro// de nas gsang ba'i pad+malas// kha sbyor ba ni de bas kyang//
@#// rnam pa rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// de bas rnam par bcas nas 'gro// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen kho// sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas nii// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ste// sngags kyi de nyid
kyis ni 'thob// ab d+hA'i rgyun la gnas// smin dbus rlung gi phyi byas pa// de thob byas pa'i dga' bani// rgyun du 'chang zhing mi zad pa// chags sogs bral zhing zhi bdang// gang zhig bde ba/
chen po 'o// 'dir ni rgyu mtshon bshad par bya// sngags grub pa yi rnal 'byor bas// 'dar dang rngul dang ba spu langs// rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang// gdong ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong// kun gyis

mthong dang dga' ba dang// gra lhags chad pa la sogs dang// 'jig rten chos dang de bzhin gnas// rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni// gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje
'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan
bya bdag nyid sngags sogs byed pa yis// ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams// bdag gi de nyidarnal 'byor mchog/ rdo rjesams dpa' nyid kyi rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sangs rgyas
kun gyi sku gcig pa// kun mkhyen go 'phang mi gsal byed// rigs kyi dbye bas rab gsal byed/ rigs lnga yin m pa gang// de ni phung po'i mtshan nyidaro// phra rags la sogs dbye ba yis//
0 thogs bcas thogs med mtshan nyid dang// 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi dngos// 'din gzugs kyi phung por gsungs// der ni rnam snang ngo bo dang// thams cad spros par byed pa'i rgyu// bde dang sdug bsngal
mchog tu zhi// grang dang dro ba mchog gi mchog/ gang gis shin tu rig pa ni// de ni tshor ba'i phung por bshad// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid kyi mtshan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngos bdag nyid// glang po

bong bu ce spyang dang// rta dang ri dgas dang ni phag/ dza dngam dang ma yi spun// mdza' bo snag gi gnyen tshan sogs// gang gis yang dag shes pa ni// 'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid na/de bzhin gsheg
pa 'od dpag med// de ni sngos pa kun nas gsal// 'gro ba khyab par yongs su shes// dge dang mi dga'i las 'bras bu/ (gzhan yang lung du ma bstan yin// de yi 'du byed du ni bshad// den yod spro
ba'i rang bzhin can// 'khor ba dngos dang dngos med sogs// kun rtogs 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can// rnamashes zhes ni rnam par shes// mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can/ de ltar nga ngo dengs skyes na//
lung dang rig pa'i shes pa skyes// dzin rig dang rat+tAng+gIka/ a ro lika dang phra[KÉ]ga/ badzra d+hug ces bya ba'i sngags// ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes// sbyan la sogs lA zhi po gang/ de khams/
gsum yongs su brtag/ sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas// sa yi khams su yongs su brtag/ gti mug dga' bas mngon par brjod// de yi spyan du yongs su grags// zhu ba ci mchi khu la sogs// rdzas kyi bya
brag yang dag bstan// chu yi khams su rnam par shes// namakA yi bdag nyid can// bro ba bza' btung smin pa dang// gzi brjid phro ba nyid thams cad// ma yi khams shes par bya//

gos dkar skyo ba'i bdag nyid can// 'byung bsnub pa rab tu 'as/ rlung naA kyi ni tshogs kyi mchog/ brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang// stong dang 'og tu byed pa dag/ de ni rlung gi khams su shes// sgrol ma sbe
ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang// rnal 'byor mchog nyid rnam par shes// mo ha ra ti de khar ti// rA ga ra ti badzar ti/ de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ni/ de dag mngon sum
cho ga yis// gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi tshogs// lha ma'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du// rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes// stong nyid gcig pu rgyugacig pu// sngo sar sogasakyi
dbye ba dang// ring dang thung ba'i rnamapa yi// lha mo de gzugs rdo rjes// phyi rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can// mkhar rdzasil snyan sbugs 'ol mo// de bzhin rdzasan pi wang dang// bstod dung skad

sogs sgra dag ni// sgra yi rje rje ma zhes bya// gzung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog/ rnam par shes pa sad par byed// drang ba dang dri bzang dang// sbyar ba'i dri yi mchog rnams ni// dri yi rdo rjemar shes
bya gzung ba'i rnam shes cher dmar ba// ro drug mchog tu ldan pa ni// lan tsha sgyur la sogs dbye yis// rdo rje mar de shes bya// kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o// mig sogs dbang po la
0 brten pa// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyud ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' brgyud du shes// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs//
gzugs la sogs pa ni rigs par// rang gi ngo bo bar byed/ sgra yi rnam pa thams cad nas// bye brag so so ci rigs par// sku yi rnam par shes pa ni/ phyag na rdo rjer dang dag bshad// dri yi bye

brag la spyod pa// so sor ji ltar rig pa ni// sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyidani// nam mkha'i snying po' rnam par shes// ro yi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// lce yi rnamang+gashes mtshon
nyid ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug tu mi shes// reg khya'i bye brag la spyod pa// bye brag so so'i go rims bzhin// reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes// yid kyi bye brag
la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i ga rams bzhin// yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// 'jam dpal zhes bya'i ming can no// rgyusapa kun la yang dag sbyor// dbye bas sa'i go rims bzhin// bag
chags yul gyi bdag nyid can// byams pa ru ni rnam pa shes// rtsa rnams so so'i mtshan nyid can// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can// 'di ni kun tu batrang por bshad//
de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyada mchog/ yang dag de nyid bla na med// mig sogs dpang lo'i rnam shes ni// gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no// rjengar dpum bar thal gong// sgo gnyis dang ni
thams cad kyi// shes pa bcu yi mtshan nyid ni// khyab pa rnams su longs su shes// gshin rje alpa byed shes mthar byed// bar mas+sar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'dod pa'i
rgyal po mi g.yo ba// dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che// gnod mdzes gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur// de ltar de rnams gnas dbye bas// ye shes gsum gyi yongs su gsal// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas
ni yang dag de kho na nyidi rten// gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa// skya mad zad mdami gsal
rgyudang/ 'gyur ba mad cing sgrib pa med// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ sbrul dang btus dang mtha' med dang// mgomad yongs su dbye ba pas// oM dang
hU~M pha spu tsA'amatha'// sbrul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs// btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no// o la sogs pa zhabs med pa// mtha' med ces bya'i ming
can no// snya'i mtha' can a mad pa// mgo mad ces ni bshad pa yin// thams cad yod lao mad pa// mgo mad ces ni bshad pa yin// de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni// sngags kyi de

tsha4 nyid bla na med// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// 'di yi rgya chen don shes bya// ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor//
dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus/ ngag gi rnam rtog kun tu spas// snang ba thams cad rnam par spangs// bdag byin brlabs pa'i rang bzhin can// kun la khyab pa da du byung/ yang rig pa//
yi rnal 'byor mchog/ skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// cha phral kun 'gro khyab pa dang// rnal 'byor byis pa mi shes shing// kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa/ don dam rang gi ngo bo ni
rdzogs pa'i rim pas dbye ba dang// sngags de nyid ni rab tu gsal// a ni de nyid many+dza' thig ler/ yang dag them pa rnam par sgom// thig 'a yang ni a la sprim// a ni mtha' yi da
tsam la 'o// ha yang yi ge hUM la'o// yi ge A na haM la 'o// yi ge haM ya nga o la thim// yi ge a ni thig le ma// thig le ya/ngani sgra la thim// sgra yang sgra tsam lani 'o// sgra tsam mchog ni nam
mkha' la'o// de yang 'od gsol ba la smis/ 'od gsal go 'phang gsal ba ni// shin tu rnam dag chos dbyings te// gnyis su med pa'i shes mchog/ rab tu sad rtser rab tu 'char// ngag
spyod pa rnams dang bral// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// phung po lnga ni gcig pa'i gzhi// 'byung ba lnga ni yang dag bstan// rnam shes brgyudani tshogs dben pa// phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni/
rlung bsus shes pa bdu bsdus pa// de ltar mtshan nyid kun bsdus pa'o// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum// dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan//
'bya/// skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ba// de da ni rdo rje sems/ rdo rje 'jig byed dbang phyug dang// me ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po'i sa ngas rgyas thub pa che// kun tu bzang po
'jam dpal dang// sna tshogs smra ba'i nga dag nyid can// sna tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi// kun nas spyi pa'i rnal 'byor ni// rnal 'byor chen po dri ma mad// ye shes de nyid gsal ba ni// rtog

nga med cing gnas pa med// chos dbyings 'pho nga zhes bshad do// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i mtshabu nyid dag/ skra yi rtse mo brgyud stong 'dra// shin tu thogs zhing 'od gsal ba// lung dang rig pa 'i dbye
ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las ni shes// de ltar de nyid gas tha dam tshig/ zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa spyi// gsang nga yi ni la shes mchog/ bzhi pa'i 2[%]na nyid skad cig mchog/ rnal 'byor chen
po'i rgyudadang la rdo rje 'phrang nga'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ de kho na nyid tha gsum gyi dam tshig ba tan la dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o///de nas yang dag bshad kyis
nyon// sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba snying la gdong sna'i ming// gsum po rgyud las gsal ba ni// 'khor le ba gsum gyi dbye ba 'is// rnal 'a byor pa yi sgos pa'i sa/ shin tu chags
pa'i dbang song ba'i// sams kyi bde ba ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis// sku yi 'khor lo sad par byed// bde ba chen po kun nas skye// khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni// dgug dbang cho ga

ba bzhin du bya// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// lhan skyes skad cig mtshan nyid ni// ro rje rtse mor gzung bar bya// de nyid bde ba chen po ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// kun rtog thams cad rnam par/
sbyangs// gsang ba'i sna rtsar rdzas thig le// yang dgagazungs pa'i bdag nyid can// chags chen san sa ni gcig pa 'dis// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// pad 'dab drug nu rtsa bzhi la// rtswa yi

'khor lo rim bzhin 'char// de yi lte ba sna ni bshad// gsang bar bde ba thams cad sta'//snying kha'i pad+makab ma brgyad/ de yang lta ba sna mi brjod/zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni bsgom// gsang sngags 'ab la'i ye shes sa na//

yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu// ngag ni rtog pa kun spangs la// rmad byung chen po ye shes mchog/ rtag tu sngags ninA da 'byung// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// bsam gtan la sbyor bde ba'i mchog/ man ngag

thob pas bde ba rgyal// zhe sdang myur du dbang byas nas// zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu gcig ni// zla nyi ma ma dang gsum// lam gsum gyi ni dbus nas khub// gdong gi sna ni zhes byar bshad// rlung rnams gnas de
mtshan nyid dang// de la gnas pa'i yi shes che// thig le mu tig gis gnon yin// bsam gtan gti mug mchog las rgyal// dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal//
de kho na nyid lnga brtan mchog/ de yi 'od zer thig le tsas/ gdong gi sna rtser yang dag brten// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gti mug rgya mtsho las ni rgyal// de nyid dam tshig sems rapa' [1]
bu na// shu'u// ming can du ni yang dgacashad// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis ni// gti mug mun pa rnams 'joms pa//

kun mkhyen rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas ni// sna rtsa bug las byung zhing// rlung lnga stong du yang dag rgyu// kun rdzob lngar ni rgyu ba yi// sgo de las ni rnam par byung// g.yon dang
g.yas dang gnyis ka dang// dal ba'i rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi// g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams// ma yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar babazang po 'di// pad+ma mgon po rgyu ba'o// gsan pa nas

tsho ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'as pa// ljang ser dag du snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing sgrub med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel

ltar snang ba ni// 'di ni nu/ dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba 'o// khams gsum las ni yang dag byung// rten dang brten par bzung ba ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te// 'chi ba'i mtha' ni 'byung ba
'gyur// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag ni// mnyam par gzhag pas rtag tu khros// sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyisani// nyin mtshan rtag tu blos pa yin// de ltar rlung ni sna rtsar ni// kha dog lnga pa/
rnam par sgom// gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med// de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni// rimakyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje
sams dpa' 'gromagon la// de nas lag na rdo rjes zhus// thig le gsum gyi gzhung lugs ni// khyod zhabs bsan bkur gyis 'tshalan// 'di la cung zad the tsam mchis// srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar
mdzad/ rdzasang sngags dang de bzhin rlung// thig le gsum ni bsgom pa na// rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid da ni// yang na rnal 'byor so sor sgos// de la tha tshos kun gcod gtso// bcom ldan rdo rje sems/
dbas gsungs// yun rings chags chen dbang song bas// srid pa gsum du skyob pa rnams// de dag 'gro ba'i don dun/ rdzas kyi thig le gsungs pa yin// zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba// mi gang mi bsrun
pa yi ke lus// de rnams myur du grol don du// sngags kyi klog ler gsungs pa yin// gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul// srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob gang// de dag dngos grub brgyud 'bras bu//

thob phyir yekashes rgya mtshon// rlung gi thiga' gsungs pa yin// yang dag de nyid sapani// de ltar yang dag thig 'be gsum// bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin/ 'di nyid la grub don du// sgrib pa thams cad

ga pa'i phyir// rtsa gcig pa yi sems kyis ni// ye shes ba sum gnas nyams dga' ba// ma tog 'bras bu chu yi brgyan// skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rtser// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i// 'bad pa yisazhi bsgrub
par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpalardo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogasal las/ sna'i rtse mo gsum gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/
'u// kyis nyon// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog/ thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// chos rnams thams cad snang bar byed// mtshan nyid
stong pa nyid du 'dod// de las yu nas bde ba che// 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa// gang phyir a pa t+tA tIr bzhugs// yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dod// tshesanams rnam rtog snang ba mched// rtog pa
thams cad gcod par byed// rnam rtog rlung gi ngal bso ba// de ni stong pa nyid du bshad// gtso bo chen po mi bskyod pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni de nyid do// der ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sa// srog
gi la[︽]shes ming can te// gzugs ma da dragapo chen po yi// zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can// de la de shes bde ba che// byang chub sems kyis gang ba nyid// de nyid bde chen go 'phang gnas//
sashes yang dag byang chub sems// de la sogs pa ming gi sgras// brjod bya gcig bu bde ba che// dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod/ khad pa can zhes de la bshad// bad
ba dge ba'i thob mtshan da// gang de bde bar gnas pa ni// de ni bde ba can zhes brjod// tshe dpag med pa'i zhing khams na// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ byang chub sems ni tshe yag med// de las

byung ba'i spyod pa'i 'od// de phye na 'od dpag med du shes// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ stong nyid rdorje dbyings dbang phyug/ de nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni// stong nyid mngashes zhes ni brjod// shes rab
sa bar la la// zla mtshan nyi ma 'bab pa na// de yang stong par rnam par shes//gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// thabs kyi rdo rjer sanA// zla ba shukra rab tu 'bab// de ni ye shes mchog tu
gsungs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ de gnyis sbyor ba mchog tu ngashes// stong nyid ye shes ma zad pa// klu ba ta rang de nyid yin// rnal 'byor ma yi zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i
rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ lus ni stong pa nyid kyi
gnas// lus ni gang gis shes pa ni// lho rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog/ longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang// bde ba chen po yi ni rten// 'khor lo yang ni gang bshad pa// rim pa ji bzhinam lus
bang de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs// thim dang longs spyod bdag po ni// lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su med// yang dag ngo bo 'i go 'phang rten// ye shes chen po go 'phang phyir// bde ba chen po'i yang/

dag rten// zhesdang che dang gti mug che// phrag dog che dang chags dngos kyis// khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog/ 'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa// sa da chu dang de bzhin ma// rlung dang nam mkha'i dbye ba zhes//

gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya nyid dang ni// chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzang dang// rna ba sna dang lce dang ni// lus kyi rnam shes chos dang ni// kun gzhi nyon mongs can gyi yid// dad dang
khru/ brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin// shes rab dbang po'i de bye ba yis// dad stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni// dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'a drin stobs// shes rab stobs ni/
bla na med// ji bzhin gnas su yang dag shes// lus kyi lha ru gsal ba yin// sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis// sngags kyi dbye bas rim pa dang// sngags dkon pa yi rnal 'byor gyis//
rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis// lung gis rnam par nges byas pa'i// yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang// lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// bdag la byin rlabs go 'phang gnas// 'dod pa la la longs spyod
cing// rab tu 'badad mchod pakhyas// rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi// byi ril lha laphyag mi bya// bdag la byin rlabs ris de nyid/ khagazhan du srid pa gsum na med// de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog/
za bdag labyin rlabs sgrib med pa// sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sogs// phyi yi dngos po mi bsgrubs// de nyidathob pa'i rnala'abyor ba// rnal 'byor ma la mchog ni// 'bad pas byin gyis
brlab par 'dod// khadag byin rlob thabs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ lus kyi lha ye shes kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu sku
de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya// 'khor lo bzhi la dbye ba yis// rtswa yi rim pa'i grongs kyis ni// las dang rdo rje d+ma dang//
'khog le la sogs rigs dbye bas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis// cu yi rim bas yang dag bzhugs// 'dir ni lags ni lnga par yang/ de kho na nyid nyams myong mchog/ tshor ba nyams su myong ba yi//
thams cad la ni khyab par gnas// sprul pa'i ng gi rigasalas skyes// lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs// mkhyen ma gtum mo dpa' mo ma// las sgrol ba dang yid gdugs ma// 'khrul 'khor ma dang
'budam dang// snying stob yang dag songs rgyas ma/ rab dang ma dang yid 'ongs// sgrubam la'atshosgra ma dang// gtera'adzin lha yi dbang phyug ma// gsar pang dang dra med ma// rlung gi lu gu rgyud
khyadam// bzang mo dang ni khA yi gdong// gnyid log ma dang mi 'phal ma// 'phar ma sngo bsangs dus mtshan ma// rtse 'joms ma dang skal bzang 'al// na ga dza na byi ba dong ma// chags ma dga' ma rnam

sgrig ma// brtson 'grus 'bal dang dkar mo dang// bdud rtsi lnga ni 'phel bas// dngos 'bebs shin tu dba' mo dang// pad+ma lnga dang 'dod ma dang// sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza' mo dang// skur dang chang gi dbang phyug la//

mi bzad med las skal bzang// ma tog khazang mo bdug rmongs ma// stong gzigs zhal dang rtse gsum mtshan// mdzes ma dang ni sbyang bskyod ma// rtag bam ma dang garam dang// ri dgas mig dang tshugs dga' m//
sna tshogs rmongs parola' mo// dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo/ 'o bran dri med 'gro bstun ma// ralag rnams ni yang dag bzhugs// rtag tu brgyad dang sprul ba'i gras// zhal gsum phyag drug dri ma med//
rigs kyi phyag rgya dbye ba yis// mtshon cha rnams kyis yang dag brgyan// de dag sna tshogs rdo rje gsas// g.yon pa 'gying bas ut+pal// g.yas na 'khor lo rin chen dang//
de bzhin ral gri chos 'byuni// g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la ni 'gyur// sams dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// zhal ni ljang khu rgyan gsum pa// don yod grub pa'i cod pan na// zhal rnams bzhad
pa'i sgom ba dang// bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed// rang gi ming la dbye ba yis// yi ge gsum dang rnam par sprul// sngags kyis kyang ni yang dag mchod// 'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol mdzad// chos kyi

ma 'khor lo rtsa brgyad dbus// lha 'di dag ni yang dag bzhugs// rdor dbyings dbang phyug lA ma dang// rdo rje phyag rgya stobs chen so// rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje la dong// rdo rje chos ma rdo ba zang// rdo rje rol mor shes par bya//

chos kyi 'khor lor dgu ba dag nyid// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa dang// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// g.yas pa yi ni phyag na 'dzin// g.yon na ral gri pad+ma

dang// dril bu 'dzin pa bla na med// sku mdog sngon bo spyanagasum pa// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gatsigs// rang zhing yi ge gsum dang rtsal/ sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod// longs spyod 'dab ma bcu drug la//

pad+ma'i dbus na lha rnams bzhugs// pad+ma'i sgrol ma pad dkar mo// mang+ga ku u du 'phal ma// bad+ma'i spyan dang pad gtsug phud// pad+ma'i 'brang ba bar skyes ma// bdagadanam li dra ba ma// de bzhin pad+ma'i 'od dang ni//

sa/ pad+ma'i sngan dang padu bablang ma// pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pad skyes m// pad+ma'i ge sar pad+mal// de ltar 'di ni yang dag bshad// zhal zasum phyag drug rnam pa can// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhug

g.yas na pad+ma 'khor lo dang// rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad// g.yon na ral gri dril bu dang// rin po che yis rnam par sgog/ spyan gsum rnam par 'char ba dang// pad+ma dmar po'i mder ltar dmar// nyi ma'i
dkyil 'khor nyer bzhugs shing// sams dpa'i skyil mo lung gis bzhugs// rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas// 'di rnams sngags ni bla na med// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lami// pad 'dab sum du rtsa
gnyis la// rtag tu lha mo rnams nibazhugs// rab tu sad pa 'bad pa can// 'khor lo'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan// rin chen sgrol ma pang zhugs m// sna tshogs lasaa bgati mug dga'// zhe sdang rdo rje dga'

chagags ma// rdo rje las chags bzugs rdoNi// sa yi de rdzongodoN+Da// reg bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma// sa na 'dam dang smod dbyangs ma// sna yi snang ba re dga' ma// sku yi rgyal mtshan yid dga' ma//
khams bcas ma dang sgru'abab ma// gshin rje'ajoms pa'i blo yi ni// bye brag rnam pa rargyas ma dang// pad+ma'i ral pa gyen du brdzas// bgagasa rnams thams cad 'dzoms pa mo// sbas pa'i mthil dang
dbyug sngon ma// shin tu bstanam stobs chen m// rang byung sa dang 'khor lo'i gtsug/ de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas shar/ sar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang// phyag drug bde ba 'phel ba can// zlakha'i dkyil
da 'khor la yang bzhugs// dri med pad+ma dkaramo'i mdog/ zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo lcags kyurje rje ma// de bzhin g.yon pa'i

byag gsum la// pad+mazhags pa rin po che// 'char dang 'debs dang sgrig par mdzad// pad+ma dkar po'adra ba'i 'od// spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad 'chang// rang gi ming dang yig gsum ming// 'di dag sngags ni go rims
bzhin// de nyid mchog nirab tu gsal// sku gsung sprugs kyi sdom pa ni// de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog/ lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog/ rtag tu gnyid log lus la gnas// 'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod bstan//

mchod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyis// jo rdza pad+ma'i bde bas myos// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed// de yi zhi sogs byang rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/
bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs sprod dang// sngags dbyibs la sogs byang ni// dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni// bla ma'i lung las yang dag skyes// de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni// 'bad pas dngos grub kyis
mnyes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyur rang la rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas gzhan yang
bshang bya ba// 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa rnams kyi ni rnal 'byor mchog/ dngos grub thams cad kyin gnas// mdun gnas pa yi yul rnams las// yid la byed pas der tsha/ to//

sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa// de tshe dbang po rab tu gsal// de yis de nir ba sad// de rnams rtsa la rim bzhin gnas// rab sad de yis sad byas nas// lcamo'ang yang 'khor 'bo las// de yis 'char ba'i
rim par gsungs// nub pa yang ni bshad par bya// yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med// yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas// bag chags kyang ni sad mi sad// rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur zhing// lha rnams
yang dag sad par ni// de yi phyir ni mi 'gyur te// snying gi dbus nas bde ba'i dngos// sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'odo// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang// da ni 'od zer ba gnyis te// 'od
'phel 'od zer gzi brjid ma// gsal ba 'bar ma 'od 'bar ma// mig la sogs pa la brtan nas// phyi rol pa gzugs sogs 'dzin pa 'o// mun sel 'od ma snang ba mo// gsal mdzes gsal 'od ma
gsal// phyi rol gzugs sogs rnamala'o// drug po 'di dag 'og tu 'dod// lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba'ang// ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin// de yang yang dganub pa ni// de yang mchog tu nub pa 'o//
'char ba nub pa rnams 'chad pa// go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po 'phags par sad// sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa 'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan

nyid do// rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brang nas// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang la rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// de rjesams dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ de ni rtsa yi 'khor lo la// sur/

yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis// 'khor lo bzhi yi yang dag sbyor// rtsa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa// mtshams kyi rtsa yin pa yang// rtsa ni bdudrug la yang brten// bzhi dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab//

ngo rnams dga' ba'i rim pa 'o// cha khams khong du chudapa can// pad+ma'i rnal ma lta bu yis// de ni de yis khyab byas shing// bdebachen po phan par byed// 'khor lo soso'i dbye ba yis// cha bzhi pa yi yi ge tshad//

shin tu phra ba'i chu rtab tu// khyab pa ba rten gyi tshul du ba nas// a ba bzhi yi dbye ba las// rim pa bdu drug dbye bas 'gro ba// 'gro ba'i bdag nyid rmad byung ba'o// lo gcig pa yi ge la'ang 'thob// rim gyis

so sor nyams myong las// sna tshogs chu yi sbyor ba las// rim gyis rgya mtsho chu bzhin du// sbyor ba bzhi yi 'khor lo'i dus// dga' ba bzhi ni de la brjod// rnal 'byor ma rgyud sbyong pa las// go 'phang mchogani
thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dga' ba bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/////denas gzhan yang yang dag

ton// jo rje bstan pa'i lus kyis ni// rtag tu rtsa rnams kyi ni rgyun// de kho na nyid ngas bshad bya// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhin// rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba// byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes// bde ba thams cad rab tu

ba0/ 'phel// rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// khrag 'bab bar ni shes par bya// nyi ma 'bo ba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i// rlung rgyu bar nis/

bar bya// rgyu mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni//lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod// thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjod// re re'ang 'khor le stong stong ngo//

thim pa longs sod bdag 'dor ba/ gtsobo yang ni bsdus pa las// bags rnams kyi 'gros su 'gyur// sur yang bsdus nas 'gro ba ni// gsum po brgyad brgyad dbye ba'angani// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang/ khrun

tshod skad cig spro ba yis// rtsa rnams gong nas gong du ni/ nang du 'gro lar shes pa bya// ga yon pa byang chub zla ba 'bab/ g.yas ba khrag dang nyi ma 'bab// dbus na rlung rgyu ba yis ni// ma sad byed par shes par bya//

la la nA dang ras na// a bat+tAtI zhes bya'i ming// de rnams spro ba'i sbyor pa yis// re re'i rim gyis thun brgyad brgyad// gsum pa nyi shurtsa bzhi'i 'gro// thim dang longs spyod bdag po'i phyi rim gyis gras ni bdunanuganyis/

sur yang de sngo sbyor ba yis// re re'ang stong stong dbye ba yis// rtag tu gros nyida'agyur bzhi// stong phrag bdun nu rtsa gnyis so// gtsobo gsum po slar yang ni// sbyor bar gcig pa nyid du 'gro// dang po las ni rnal 'byor

pas// phra ba de ni shes par dka'// bsam gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni// tshig lenAd rnamakha' slas// bde ba kun gyi gzhigasang ba// srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid dang// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang// dus kyitsani
rnam par bshad// ro gcig go 'phang bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor ma yis rgyud las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'irgyudadapal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtsa'i 'bab pa'i//
mtshan nyid kyi go mazhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum nu pa'o// kad nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// mtshams kyicu yi ngo bo nyid// rtsa rnams sdoms pa 'char ba ni// gang gis shes na

rtag tu ni// mchog tu dga' ba nyamasamyong ba// lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed// lha yi sngags su yang dag sbyar// lha yi rnal 'byor don nges ba// de nyid gsum sbyor drim med// de gsum cig car bdag nyid

sdom// 'jig rten gsum du khyab cing// lus kun lani yang dag brten// ya shes sems dpa' rdo rjesams// gang phyir dam tshig sems dang lta bar// rnal 'bye mche ga shes pa bya// khyab pa'i de nyid rmad byung

ba// mchog 'ba mchog dang phrab dang// rang byung ye shesami zad pa// byang sems su nu rtsa gnyis 'bab// rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas// cha kun bdag nyid rtsa ba ni// de yi

dbus su rtsa gsum ste// gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad// zla ba nyi ma ma rgyu ba// 'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab/ ji ltar ngashing sna cung zad cig/ sa la brtan par gnas pa na// sdong bu yag 'dar phra'u[']
sogs pa yis ni kun nas khyab// rang bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas/ phung po khams lo sogs tshogs la// mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o// rnam par thar nga 'i sgo gsum dngos// de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa//

'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// rang bzhin mtshan nyid dbye ba gsum// mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang// dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dunani// gsum phyadam tshig

mtshan nyid dang// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni// rnam gsum de nyid mtshan nyid do// rgyu dang 'bras bu rtse 'khor ni// rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni// gsum phye khams gsum bsdus
pa 'o// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs mad khams// 'jig rten gsum pa'i mtshan nyid do// rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gcig/ rim bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro// da ni sprul pa gsum du gsal// sku gsung

thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// gang tshe de la rab sbyor ba// de ni gzas zin mtshan nyid do// gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na// de tshe phud 'dzin mtshan nyid do// gang phyir srog ni rlung bcom nas// de tsho 'chi ba'i mtshan

nyid yin// rtsa yi gtso de'ang nyid rnams ni// gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya// rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon
de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rlung skye ba yi mtshan nyidAni// dus kyi grags ni
btsal ba na// ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes// bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid// rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong// don ni shes par mi shes shing// rlung tsam gcig pus rmongs pa'o// kun gzhi
rnam shes bkug nas ni// bag chags nang du rnam par sod// bag chags kyis ni rnamashes bzung// bag chags dang 'dres rim pa las// nang gi bag chags bgos pa yis//

de rnams zla mtshan dus su ni// mngal gyi rtsa la 'jug pa na// rdo rje khu khrag zhu sgrig lo// 'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang// kun gzhi las ni rnam shes sku// ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin// kun gzhi rnam shes
bag chags las// rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni skya// nyon mongs can ni srog rlung nyid// skad cig gcig la yang dag 'gro// thog mar 'pho ba'i dus suni// nyayi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur// 'pho ba gnyis
pa'i dusasu ni// sngar yang khrag dang 'dres pa ni// stong dang 'og gi dbye ba yis// srog ge ru ni gnyis su 'gro// thur sa larlung gi 'gro 'ong la// dus sprul rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas 'pho

ba gsum pa la// khrag dang khu ba zos pa na// thur du sal ba'i rlung gi tshogs// bsams nas gyon du rlung ni 'byung// stong du kha bltos nas ni gnas// phagargoda'adra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur// sa ra yang

ba 'pho ba bzhi pa la// khrag dang khu ba bsgos nga ni/ kun du rgyu ba'i rlung bkug nas// 'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro// sang ga'am pa yas kyang ni// khyab byed rlung ni spro bas byed// de nas 'pho ba lcapa la//
khrag dang khu ba 'phal nas ni// mnyam gnas rlung ni 'dar nas nii// ma yi gzugs red rim bzhin 'gro// mnyam gnas rlung gi khyab khyed lo// gang gis 'gul dang 'da' bar 'gyur// phung po lnga'i rdzog

pa na// de ltar gsungs pa de las sar// 'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la// sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang// khyab byed rlung gis ku rlung spro// rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed/ de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la//

chu yi khams dngasna khug dod// klu yi rlung gis rus sbal rlung// sngos nas gnyis sumad pa spyod// de nas 'pho ba brgyud pa la// ma dang sna yi bu ga 'byed// rus sbal rlung gis rtswa sa srung spro// rang gi rang bzhin

shes par bya// de nas 'pho ba dgu pa la// tshu gi khams dang ro ni tshor// rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos// lha sbyin rlung ni spro bar byed// de rjes 'pho ba bsupa la// lha sbyin rlung gis gzhu rgyal spo//

rlung kun nga sdus pa'i mtshan nyid can// dag pa'i dbus na khyab pa'i khams/ phra zhing thogs dang mtshan nyid can// rtsa dang rgyus rgyus pa'i sbubs// sgo ni dgu po rgyas par byed// lus kyi mchog tu tshor ba dang/
gcig du rig pa'i tshan nyid 'dzin// rab sad mchog ninam mkha' la// 'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas// sas rgyas M rnams kyi shes pa bcu// de lta bu nyid bshad par bya// 'pho ba bcu gis
bcu ste// rim pa yis ni rnam par shas// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// lho ga phyag rgya chen por brjod// byis pa yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// mgo bo'i
skani brags pa dang// rdzu ma'i chos gos dmar po bgos// dpal dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar// spyi bos la gzhugs pa phyag/ mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang// dpa bud nga zang po brgyad cus brgyan//
ye shes chen po legs par sad// 'du byed thob pa grol dang bcas// dpa' bo chen po rnam rtog med// skyed byed shani 'jigs par byed// bdud rtsi lnga ni ye shes che// rtag tu

bdud rtsi lnga myang byed// dngos po thams cad rnams spangs la// rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'diganyis mchog ni gsang ba ste// gang du yang ni ma gsungs so// rmu skye ba yi nges pa ni// bla ma brgyud pa
las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gis bskyod pa skyes bu skya ba 'jug pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rlung rnams mchog tunub pa ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// 'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan nyid no// phan tshun du ni yang dag sdud// skye ba'i rim ltar thim par 'gyur//

rlung rnams yang dag sku bzhi// phan tshun nub pa'i nyi ma bzhin// thog mar lo bcu lon nas nii// rgyags pa'i myos pa'i rlungaskyasanas// gzhu las rgyal ba'i chung zos te// rim gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhin// de rjes

le bcu phyin pa ni// rgyugs chunung gis yang dag skye// lha sbyin zhes bya'i rlung ni// chung gi rim pa snga ma bzhin// gzhan yang lab ru phyin pa ni// rgyugs pa'i chu rlung skye bar 'gyur// mus pa zhes bya'i rlungani za/ des

gzhan yang lo bcu phyis// lolas skyas pa'i rim pa yis// bang bzung chung ni chen po yis// rus sbal rlung ni za bar byed// klu yi rlung dang bdar zung chung// stobs dang gzi brjidra mtshungs pa'i phyir// dus gzhan

kho banur phyin pa na// gnod pa byed par mi nus te// stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir// gang gis gang la gnod pa ni// byed pa nyid du mi nus so// banupa gzhan du phyin pa 'o// long ba btang bzung stobs chen thog//

klu yi rlung ni rim gyis za// de nas b.rupa gzhan phyin na// khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'phel// rgyags shing myos pa'i rim pa yis// btang bzung rlung ni za bar byed// de rjes lo bcu lon pan// myos chu rlung ni bkug

nas ni// tshil dang kha chu rnam par 'phel// de yis btang bzung klu za byed// de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin pa// lo la btang bzung chung stobs skyes// myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed// me dang rlung ni 'phal ba' byed//

btang bzung rlung nyid rnam gyur nas// longs spyod chen po 'phal gyur nas// de nas lo banugazhan lon nas// rlung gis lus rgyas lci bar 'gyur// chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa na// khyab cing sgrib byas rim pa las// de las lo

banu gzhan du phyin// chu shing 'bras bu bzhin dumad// rtsa ba dang bcas med par 'gyur// las kyi rnam smin mtha' yis ni// de ltar rim pa bcu pa yis// klu ba 'amani nyin zhag gzhan// tshan nyung ngur byas nas ni//

srog zad par ni shes par bya// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni// kashin tu rgyas par shes pa'i bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang la rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi rim pas srog zad/
pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// tshan po'i chen po yangs mchog/ bsduba'i mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor mchog
snying pos snying po'i don bsdus ba// gang phyiramakha' 'gro mas bsdus la/ de phyir bsdus pa'i mkha' 'gro brjod// lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa// nyi ma stong dang mtshungs
pa'i 'od// kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed// char pas phung po'i rnam rtog ni// bsregs byas bar chad med pa'i lus// rdo rje khams kyi rnam rtog ni// bsdus nas slar yang rang bzhin gyis//

gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni// de rjes der nis+sar yang sdud// de ltar gang la phya leb bzhin// 'ching ba thams cad sreg par byed// rlung gis de nyida mngon sbyor bsaM// sngags kyi lus kyi sbyor ba yis//
rnam par rtog pa tsam yang ni// srog pa nyid du the tshom med// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi rim shes na// mkha' 'gro yashes rgyas par ni// rnal 'byor bstan par yib/
par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ mkha' 'gro ma bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de nas gzhan dang bshad kyis nyon//

rnam rtog rlung ni rnam par gcod// nyin dang mtshan du shes par ni// brgyudang brgyadani lhag pa'i rgyu// rlung rnams de ni rnam rtog ni// gang phyir rnam par gcod pa byed// rnal 'byor de ni mchog tu zhi// thams cad
stong pa'i ngo bor byed// the tshom thog mar sbyor ba drug/ rnal 'byor rig pas mchog tu sgrub// de nas dbyangs med yi ge ha// shin tu rgya che bzlas par bya// gang phyir mdud pa 'joms byed cing//
tha/ bde ba skye ba ster bar byed// de yis rnamartog thams cad ni// skad cig gis ni gcod par byed// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang// shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// de yi dbye ba bco brgyad//
kyis// dang po sbyor ba bsgom par bya// bcubadun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs// de las dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni// rnal 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga// de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog/ rnal
'byor dbye ba bsuganyis so// de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu// bskyod pa'i rimal bsdus pa yis// mngon sum byed pa'i rnal 'byor ni// de la de rdzapazlus rim mchog/ rdzogs rim rnal 'byor yan

lag ni// rnam par rtog pa 'dzoms byed pa// phra ba'i de nyida' na med// cho ga ji bzhin rnal 'byor pa// blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin bsgom// srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed// rnal 'byor chen po ya shes tshe//

sa par bsgoms pas yang dag ni// rnam rtog rlungani 'joms pa khyed// don gyi rjes 'gror khrus pa yis// dngos med ngo nga gcig pa dang// stong nyid brten pa mngon par zhen// sgom pa nges par brtan par byed// sgrub

pos yang dgabasgoms byas na// rdo rje bzlasarim bla named// de yi ma bzhin ye shes mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpalardo rje 'phranganga'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rnam por
rtog pa'i rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o/// de nas gazhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung shar na// gangashes rdo rjesams dpa' gi// rang dngos
'u// go 'phang bzang po thob// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spras// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sgom dang sgom min go 'phang bral// rnal 'byor/
chen po'i ye shes che// gnas pa med cing dri mamad// phra ba'i cha kun dbus gnas// thig le nA da rnam par spangs// kun la khyab cing zhi ba dang// bdag byin rlabs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig//
mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnams las grol// bag chags rnam rtog rnam par sbyangs// tshigs dang mdud pa'i ma yi lam// sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par sangs// stong nyid yongashes mtshan nyid do//

sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i cha// rnam pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gyis// rgyud rnams la yang bklag ma bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud chen po// bshad par bya ba pas tshig mchog/

man ngag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin// thog ma nyid du bshadapar rigs// de yi rig pa rjes 'gro shes// bla ma brgyud pa'i go 'phang mchog/ rnal 'byor chen pa'i rgyud dpal rdo rje'aphreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/
tsa rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o///de nas rdo rjecan gyis gsungs// rtsa rnams nub pa'i rnal 'byor ni// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// yul dang dbang po

yang dag sbyor// rtsa rnams kyang ni 'chor bar 'gyur// shar nas sngonabazhin song nas ni// bskyod pa'i rim pa bla na med// rnam rtog skya ba de yi phyir// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim// de las skyo dang klu dang na//
'chi zhing slar yang ldog par 'gyur// yul rnams dngos po med pa yi// sbyas pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir// de nyid de la spyod pa'i phyir// dngos su yul rnams dngos med phyir// dbang po rnams ni/
skya ba min// de las gnyis gnyis yang dag sbyor// dngos dang dngos med stong pa nyid// de nas rtsams nub 'gyur te// 'khor lo'i rim pa la mang rten// da rnams bsdus pa lasan zhi// stong phrag gdun

curtsa gnyis ni// kun kyang rtsa yi 'khor lor 'gyur// de nyid kun mas nang du khyab// stong nyid sgom pa rnal 'byor las// yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid// ngesapa ru ni shes pa zhes// rigs pa'i rdo rje s rnam pa
'joms// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang lardo rje 'phrang nga'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis

'on// sbyo'ajug go 'phang mtshan nyid ni// ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag brten// rnam pa drug po de las phud// de bzhin brgyadabargyad de las lhag brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni/

de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal// zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu// stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// byed pa ma yin rdzogs pa yin// chu yi zla bstakhur snang// sgyu ma chen po 'gro ba'i ma// thams cad rten pa'i

mtshan nyid ni// rlung gi 'khor lo srog ces bshad// mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul min// ma yi 'khor lo stong nyid khyab// dbus na sgrig le lta bu ni// mi 'gyur kun tu 'gro ba dang// rang byung kun la khyab pa dang//
hubya/ bad pa yang dag 'tshal bar byed// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnam par spras// 'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa// gcig tu byas na skyed par byed// mi shigs nA da'i go 'a phang can//

rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs// sbrul gyi rtse ltar gso ba dang// tshangs pa la sogs pha mas dang// 'jigs pa ma yin gayo ma yin// yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin// 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs/ 3/

grangs brel zad mad skya ba med// lta ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa// sgra tsas dri ma dang bral ba// chags bral chags pa med pa dang// bya ba byed dang gnas mdab// pand

'tsho gnas pa med pa dang// srog dang rtsol ba rname par sangs// lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ de lta bu yang rnyed par dka'// longs spyod 'khor la mchog tu gnas// 'ching ba mad pa'i rnam pa mchog/ mchog tu khong

du chud gyur pa// rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs// rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis// chang gi rtogs pas myos pa bzhin// mchog ni dang po ma lus pa// dngos po kun gyi nang na gnas// thog ma tha ma lcag par gnas//
