rel dbang// ka ma ya na gyis shig brjod// na garaMni bdag lus brjod// ba ta ka ni nyosashes brjod// a dzaya ni ma zhes brjod// sha la zo ba zhes ni brjod// ra gam 'dir ni cho ga brjod// sha nyakaM

mtshar min// gnas par 'gyur min myur du'agro ba min// gang zhig yod dang yod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs sku yin// bsod nams
sdig gi bdag min mchog gyurayaM// ni h+phams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog/ rdo rje rtse mo byung sems ni/
tsha 'dzin bs lus kyi brtan pa nyid// de yis de nyid byang sems ni// rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas/ rigs pas stong du byed pa ni// rgyas pa yod par the tshom med// go rim bzhin shes pa ni//

[z/ ]'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel// sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi la// 'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod// 'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed// lcags kyi gser ba gyur byas nas ni// rdo rje phyag rgya dngos grub che//
zung du 'jug pas thob par 'gyur// bsgyur pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang// gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur ba// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// 'khor ba dang ni
mya ngan 'das// rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni// gong du dngos po gcig 'gyur ba// zung du 'jug ces de la bshad// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ rtog pa gnyis dang rnam par bral//
gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni// rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod// sems la dmigs
pa thob par 'gyur// bdag la byin rlabs rim pas kyang// dngos grub brgyad nithob par 'gyur// snang ba la sogs dbye ba shes// mngon par byang chub pa la// zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa//
dngos grub sbrams cad bsdus pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis tha tsom med// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher// zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog med par
zhugs nas ni// thob pa 'a di la the tshom med// lus nigazhal yas khang du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis yang dag brtan// zur bzhi pa ni mdun rgyab dang// g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so// stang chog
sgo yi dbye ba yis// sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// sna rtsa bzhi yi dbyigs kyisani/ bas pazhi'i brjod par bya// dra ba rgyu mar yang dus bshad// rgyus ga' gur pa dra ba spyod/
mni zla ba phyed pa dang/ bum lto bar yang dag shes// rjer bar dpung lag rani// ka ba brgyad du yang dag bshad// rig pa rnams ma leng sogs// sgra yi rnams 'o pa'i
shes ma tog 'phreng// rin chen pha ga lce rnams shes// lus kyi rnam shes pas 'phan dang// yid kyi rnam shes ri dgas so// mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang// rna ba kun nas ro rje rnams// snyani/
klu ba dan du ni bshad// lce ni dril bu ru na gsungs// rnga yab la sogs rnam dag pa// lus kyi tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// yid ni dbus kyi pam gsungs// rnam rtog rlung ni yang da pan yos

lnga ni rnam dag pa// re khA lngar ni yang dag brjod// phung po lta ni rnam dag lnga// rnam dag kha dog lnga ni dbya// de dag gzhal yas khang du sgom// dang por sbyor bar shes pa'i phya/ mngod pa ra klu rlung
la rnam pa lnga// rigs kyi dbye bar ng ngo bo// de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjod// dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa 'o// khamasabazhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// gzugs kyi phung po mdor bsdusan//
gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni// mig gi rnam shes sa snying po// phyi rolagazugs kyi rdo rjer bshad// byams pa rtsa rgyus dbus na bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'irgyal po gnyis// b+ho dang lho yi
0 mtshams su ni// ma leng ye shes su ni bshad// rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs drang skyo// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod// tshor ba chu yi khams dang ni//

phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang// rna ba phyag na rdo rjer bshad// rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid// dri yi rdo rje phyirol 'gyur// sna yi rnamo shes mkha' snying po// khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes// mnyam

nyed rin chen 'byung ba dang// dngos dang dngas mad sogs 'du shes// snga ma sa dran mtshan nyid can// 'du shes phung po ma khams dang// phyi roladri yi rdo rje dang// lce yi rnam shes 'jig rten mgon// de
bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// de ni so sor rtog ye shes// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las 'byung// dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyis// bag chags 'du byed mtshan nyid ni// 'du shes phung po rlung

gi khams// phyi rolaro yi rdo rje dang// lus kyi rnam shes sgriba rnams l// kun bzang tshogs kyi mtshams dbus bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// bya banan tan grub ye shes// don yod grub pa'i

rigs las byung// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ yeThashes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod// rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams// yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// ban tu
rnam dag chos kyi dbyis// mi bskyod pa yi rigs las byung// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// gzhal yas khang na 'di dag bzhugs// de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya//

[s/ ]kru@#// sgra rus phyis mchil ma snying// sa ni rnam snang ngadang ga nyid ngo// sgra dang gnas dang nye ba'i snying// sen mo mu yi khams su shes// rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi// rigs kyi rten du shes

'a par bya// so dang pags pa sha dang snying// mi yi khams shes bya bar brjod// 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang// rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya// rgyus pa sha dang rtsibs logs snying ngani don yod grub

pa 'o// dri ma rgyus pa mkhris pa sing// de ni nam mkha'i khams su grags// mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang// snying ni rnamashes lnga zhes bya// re re la yangs sor ni// rnam pa ltani slu ba shes// de bzhin gsheg

pa'i phung po lnga// nang gi bdag sa rdzas phye ba// sha rtsa rgyas pa sha kham tshad/ klad pa dang ni klung rgyus dang// rus pa rkang dang ga'u ma dang// mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang// glo bamachar pagacin dang ni/ bshang

ba pho ba lang ka dang// zhag dang chu sar rnag dang ni// khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang// rang snabs su dang kha spu dang// sen mo su dang pags pa dang// lag pa rkang mig yan lagasogs// 'tshogs ma dpung pa

zhes ni brjod// de dag rim par shes par bya// gzhal yas khang ni rnam dag pas// de la gnas kyi dbye bani// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// pu li ra ni mgo bar shes// spyi gtsug dza lan d+ha ra dang// rnab

g.yas pa orgyan dang// spyi ba'i rgyab ni a'ud// go dA pa ri rna ba g.yon// ra ma shwa ri sminama'i dbus// mig gnyis de bi ko Ta dang// mA la wani dpung pa'i rtsa// kA ma ru pa mchan khung gnyis// o rje nu ma gnyis

[s; ]mu grags// ko sa la ni lte bar shes// dri sa ku na rna ba'i rtsa// kha yi pad+ma ka ling ka/ mgrin pa lo pa karani brjod// snying nikAn khyer shes par bya// rim la ya mdoms su shes// mtshan ma grwa bde ba dang// pra ta
pu'i bshang ba'i lam// brla gnyis su war+Na dI pa// so ra ni byin pa gnyis// rkang pa'i bol ni sin du'i yul// sor mo rnams la nagar// mthe bong gnyis ni ma rur shes// ku lu tAni rkang pa'i mthilag
de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang// sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid// de nyid dang ldan shes par bya// thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// 'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis// rim gyis rje rjesams dpa'
nyid// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ srog gi rlung ni snying khar gnas/ mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes// mdoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni// rin chen/
'byung ldan bye brag skyes// stod du rgyus pa lhag mthar gnas// 'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhimano/ ma dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas// don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no// khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas//

rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs// dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni// srog dang rtsol brgyun 'di dang// dus kun tu sgrub ni// srog ces bya ba yin par bshad// srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang// de bzhin/
du ni khu ba sogs// 'og 'dren 'din thur sel rung// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya// rgod dang za dang bldag pa dang// kun tu 'thung dang 'jib pa dang// gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas dang//
mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod/ dgyen du 'gro zhing snod pa dang// bza' dang myang ba la sogs pa// shes dang lhan cig 'byor ba dag/ gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya//

khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs// gi kun tu ni khyab pa'i phyir// khyab byed cesazhi bya bar bshad// rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod/
snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs// phan tshun du ni gnod ga khyed// nga na ni gzhan la 'tshapa yin// stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gcig ni gcig la thim par 'gro// ji ltar zla ba/
gzas bzung la// rlung rnams rim gyis nyams 'gyur ba// snga ma bzhin dugeng nas gong// rang gi bdag nyid la thim par// btang bzung slar yang 'gro bar byed// ji ltar mas bsrabs dngos
mad dang// rgyu med par ni thim par 'gro// sur yang srog gi rlung shar ba// las kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa// de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang// slar yang 'jig rten gsum du gnas// de las las dang
las skyes// di las chags sogs bag chags dang// da lasaM slar ngan dang skya// de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra// sngon bzhin rdo rje bzlas lasogs// rim gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur//
de nas sams dpa' chen po kun// de nyid mig sman thur ma yis// thams cad 'khrul pa'i long ba bsal// yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong// de nas yang yang phyag byas te// mchi bcas mig gis
bcom ldan la// lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod// a ma ho kun 'agro kun dbang phyug/ nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa bzhes// a ma'i dam tshig de nyid
gsum// mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang// skye mched rnams la mi rten cing// srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing// spros pa
mad cing gos pa med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spu// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyur pa// 'jig rten
gsum 'di rnam par g.yos// bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni// 'jig rten gsum gnas lha las rgyal// khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gtsobo yis// 'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur/

sa yi tshani gang na 'di// rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon brjod pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig rgyud// dus kun tu ni spyod 'gyur zhing// rgyun du de nyid rang nyid kyis// khro bo bcu yis de lasani// rtag tu bu
bus bgegasakun la// bsrung ba'i don du yul 'khor de'// rang rang 'phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni// de rnams la ni gtor ma dbul// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// sna tshogs sbal pa bstan nas nii//
rdo rje sems dpa'i dus kun tu // nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'brema'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i
le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyud pa'o///rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang bo rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba
rdzogs so//thugs dam sa'i snying po tho lang snying po dpol dab med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su prana'i dza na dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba
chen po bod kyi lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phabo pa// ka@#// rgya gar skad du ri bo te pIts+tsha/
bod skad du/ lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa/ dpal rdo rje sems M dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa// shin tu dga'
ba'i sbyor chan la// rdo rje sams dpa' cher bzhugs so// 'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi// gsang chen chos kyi 'byung gnas la// byang chub sems ni 'phos nas su// chos kyi dbyings gnas
zhu mdzad do// zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas// lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// tshig 'di dag ni gsol ba ste// chos kyi nga byings rnams 'phro ba ni// gang las
skye bar 'gyur ba lags// dang pa ji ltar 'ong ba yin// de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags// yan lag med pa gang de ni// yan lag dang bcas 'a gyur nas su// lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lag
mog dang rna ba sna dang ni// de bzhin lce dang lus dang yid// dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang// khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang// ma rig bag chags srid pa yis/ khacongs pa'i nyon/
mongs 'dod chags sogs// rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa// ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags// dngos po med pa sgom pa'i gzugs// gzugs sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams// rang
bzhin med cing dmigs med la// dmigs pa dang bcas dziltar lags/ de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni// bdag gi the tshos lhas bka' stsol// de ltar zhus ma thag tuni// bcom ldan rje sems
dpas gsungs// shes rab zab pa zad med ni// nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya// dpyad du med cing shes bya min// de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen
ni 4 nam mkha'i spyod yul lo// mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na// nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min// spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ni// rang sangs rgyas su sbal ba ste// de dag
kun gyis kyang mi shes// shes med so so'i skye gnas dang// ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang// da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum la// byol song bag chags las byung ba'i// dud 'gro yi dgas skye kha
rnams// de kun gyis kyang mi shes te// sas rgyas spyod yul gsang chen no// snying po shin tu snying bu'i mchog/ gang de kun bdag la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi
gsang tshan ni// lha mo khyod la bshad par bya// byang chub sems dag 'od gsal ba// zla bangashel dang mnyam pa'i 'od// danyid ye shes lnga yi dngos// yungs ka che ba'i tshad tsam mo// de yi dbus
su kha zhugs pa'i lA// mi gas la lags l ba'i gzugs can te// da tsam tsam kyi phra mo'i mchog/ yid kyi dngos pa'i thig le'i gzugs// rtag tu sIng gi dbus gnas pa// 'od zer
chen po 'bar ba can// ji sud dgu pa'i bar du ni// dpral ba la gnas rkang mthil bar// thig le de kho nar bsdu ste// lte ba'i dbusasu rnam par gnas// cha shas lnga pa can yin te// bcuganyis/

kyi ni bla ma la// cha shas drug gis mtshan pa nyid// nga ro thig les brgyan byed pa// rdo rje khong nas phyung nas su// sa bon skya gnas dbus bzhag ste// chos kyi dbyings zhu bar byed// de ni rim par
bya skyod byed na// sgo dgu lani kun tu 'gro// khyab cing khyab gnas 'gro kun la// mi g.yo la sogs goyo dang bcas// tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi// gzhi ni de las gyur pa 'o// gang las gtso bor
skyod byed la// sa dang nam mkha'i de zhes gsungs// ji snyad lus la gnas pa 'i bar// de yis las dang lasayin byed// dge dang mi dag bsam pa yang// bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin// sbyor ba rtag tu
[2/]da gsungs te// mchod pa sgom par gsungs pa yin// gung tshe las kyi lus zhigan// de tshe de yi rang mthu yin// de 'dra'i lus su de 'gyur te// gang gis ga po dang mi g.yo khyab// nam mkha' mnyam pa
nyid 'dra ba// de ni gnas par shes par bya// bcu yi gnyis mtha'i tshig gi don// gang gis rtag tu bsgom byas nas// des na dngos grub rgyas pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur// so dang chu dang/

rkan dang lce// mgul gnas gang la yod pa ni// gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid// de ni zad dang gnas phyir ro// brjod pa mad cing the tsom med// sgra yig rnam par spangs pa ni// rang gi phyi nang de bzhin/

byang chub sems ni 'dir gsungs so// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/so// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mo spyan mas yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//lha mo spyan mas yongs su zhus pa'i le'u smad ng po'o/// de nas lha mo mA ma kIs// rdo rje/
can la 'di zhus te// byang chub sems kyi rim pa yis/ kha sang lte ba gsang ba la// 'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni// de rje chen pos bka' stsal 'al// tshashas rnam pa duzhig gsungs//
gnas kyi rnam pa bskyar ba du// kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs// de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing// pad+mabazhi la yang dag
gnas// snying kha'i po la gnas gnag/ kha yi pad+ma la gnas dkar// ngar lci ba'i pad+mar gnas// gsang ba'i pad+mang ro mtha'// stabs kyi mtha' ru 'gro byed pas// thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu
gnas// bsnam byed pa dang thos byed pa// de tshe mthong byed za byed pa// reg par byed kyang de go nas// bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o// gang las bzhad byed babla byed pa//
de bzhin cho nga dang ngu ba// 'byed pa gcod pa de kha nas// cho ga rnam pa mang po shas// rgyal po don yang byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug yin yang byed par 'gyur// bram ze rgyal bo rje'u rigs dang//
dmangs rigs smad pa'i rigs rnams dang// bud med du ma sprul par byed// dud 'gro yi dgas skya ba dang// gzugs can rnams dang ba gzugs med dang// de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las//
'byung ba thams cad spyod byed pa// de nyid kho na rdzu 'phrul gnas/ ]mo gzugs dang ni pho yi gzugs// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa// dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa/
gang// des ni gsang tshan shes pa ste// gang de bdag nyid kun gnas pa// kha dog med cing kha dog dmar// kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi// thig le'i gzugs su bsgyur ba 'dis// 'grodang phyir
'ong rnam par bstan// gangad rig pa rdzu 'phrul che// mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs// skye dang bsdus dang 'jig pa la// thig le'i gzugs su rab gnas so// gang gis brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i

chos// stong phrag brgya ru shes na yang// de yis de nyid mi shes te// de dag kun kyang 'bras med do// bcuganyiso lnga yi lnga pa yang// brgyad kyi mtha' ru 'byung ba 'dus// sgra yig dang po yi ge a//
lnga ba yi ni yang dag brgyan// snying rje chen po las byung ba// kha mar bltas pa'i drug pas btags// gdod ma mtha' ma med pa'i lha// de ni spyi bar bstan pa yin// de dang/ gsang chen dam pa yin//
lham bdag gis rab bstanano// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha momA ma kIs zhus pa sta le'u gnyis pa'o///de nas lhamo gos dkar mos// yan lag kun
gyis btud nas su// thal mo sAng khar sbyar byas te// rdo rje sams dpa' la gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdu ba dang// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags// lha
yi dbang phyug khyed la zhu// gang gis 'od kyi gong bur bsdu// rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags// gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig/ 'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags// mu khams dang
ni ma yi khams// jiltar ri ni mnyam par 'gyur// ma las skye bo gsum tsam dang// de bzhin pha las skye ba gsum// de dag drug sogs gong bu las// ji ltar mi rnams skya ba lags// sangs rgyas
gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal// thub pa chen pos bka' stsal mdzod// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba shin tu gsang gyur pa// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// skya gnas dbus su
rtsa gnyis ni// g.yon dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste// g.yon du byang chub sems shes bya// g.yas su de bzhin rak+ta'o// de gnyis phrad nas gcig 'gyur ba// chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin//
mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te// rdul nirak+ta byang chub sems// mun pa de bzhin bskyod pa yin// de rjepad+mamanyam sbyar nas/
rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyur// dri chen chu dang shal ma tog// de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems// bdud rtsi lnga dngas gong bur bsdus// de las rdo rjer 'dir gsungs so// cha shas gnyis pa dang
ldan pa// de bzhin dgu pa dag yin no// de skad gsungs pa bdu dang ni// de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te// cha shas gnyis pa lta yini// drug gis btags pa des byung ba// de ni thig ler gsungs
pa 'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ga hU~M// skya gnas pad+ma la gnas pa// de nyid sa bon sAhAmatha'// 'dus pa la ni shes par bya// mu khams pha las skyes shes bya// ma yi khams ni sa las skyes//
sha dang khrag dang pags pa yang// ma las skyes pa zhes bshad do// tshil dang rkang dang khu bani// pa las skyes zhes bshad pa yin// gong bur yang dag 'dus pa ni// de dag tsam du bshad pa yin//
gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang// de bzhin 'du byed rnam shes rnams// sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi gzugs// phung po zhes byar bshad pa 'o// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mon
bza' dkar mos zhus po sta le'u gsum pa'o///de nas bzhad pa'i zhal gyur te// lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas// rdo rjesams dpa' la zhus pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi
sgrub pa ni// gsungs shig rje rje can chen po// rdzas rnams sgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal// de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang// dkyil 'khor rnams ni btags pa dang// sbyin sreg so sor
bya ba dang// de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang// khyad par du yang bka' stsal 'tshal// de ltar lha mos zhus ma thag/ rdo rjesams dpas bka' stsal pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub thabs ni//
nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs// khams bco brgyad po de dag kyang// chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'o// de dag nyid las byung ba'i//
byang chub sams zhes[—]shes par bya// byang chub sems las gong bu skya// gong bu 'as kyang yid skyid do// yid las nam mkha'i khams kyang ni// khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// dbang po

phung po 'byung ba rnams// de ltar dbyings su bsdu ba sta// bsta ba de na bstan byas pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yin// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sgrub pa yang dag spyad par bya// 'di ltar
gal po zhes M dngos kyis// bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtag chos dbyings sgrub pa bshadra nas su// rdzas brgyad yan lag sgrub pa bshad// ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang// sa 'og ral gri'i dngos

grub dang// nam mkhar 'phur dnge mig sman dang// 'chib med dang nad 'jomasaM dang// mi dang glang po che dang rta// glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang// rngamo maha spyang ki rnams// cha ni mnyam por bya ba 'o//
mthebang tshigs tshad tsam du ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas sbyar// dri chen nu dung rak+ta dang/ byang chub sems nas tshad tsam ni// sngags bzlas nas ni sbyar byas te// byin//
gyis brlabs kyang bya ba 'o// phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge A#// dbus su de bzhin A byas// 'bar ba'i phyogs yig 'bar byed nga// dgu po de ni rab tu sgrub// lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags bzlas/

ba nas nii phye mar brtags// yungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam du// lnga dang lnga ni 'byor par bye// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// ril bu rnams ni byas nas su// pad+ma'i snod la bzhag byas te// stongaphrag brgya
ni bzla bar bya// mtshams bzhi la ni bsgom byas nas// nyin dang mtshan du bza' bar yang// de ni bskal pa'i mtha'i bar yang// dngos grub rgyas par 'gro ba ste// gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs brtson
'grus// lnga pa la ni smon lam yang// mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa// ril bu chen po bros phyir ro// rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams rdzogs nas// rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol// yi ga e dang paM
pha yig dang// khaM yig dbus su yang dag gnas// dang po'i mdog ni dmar po sta// gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkar pa// gsum pa kha dog ser ba rnams// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// 'khor lo ltar ni

bskor ba ni// tin phyed dang ni mtshan phyed la// rig pa de ni rab 'byor na// de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub// lha mo lca min bu mo dang// mi yi bu mo rnam pa bzhi// sa yi dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// sngags kyis bkug
nas smad par bya// sgom pa de bzhin rig pa'i sngags// bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bshad par bya// dga' ma sems kyis rtsa gcig rten// dkyil 'khor lus shes
gsungs pa ste// dkyil 'kher b+ha gar bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni// dkyil 'khor gsum du brtags pa yin// brtags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste// gang du gtso bo skyod
par byed// phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs// 'byung ba rig mar brtags pa'o// chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste// zhags pa pad+mang chung byed pa// kha phrad pa ni sgrog yin par// sgra bsgrags
pa na dril bur bshad// sngos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te// ma tog ra zhas 'dod do// mar ma sha rnams kho na yin// dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod// sgrug mo lding gar bstan pa ste//
'phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin// dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan pa dang// gar mkhan ma ni rnal 'byor pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs// de rtogs pa ni skal bzang yin// rtogs pa/
de rnams byams pa sogs// de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs// dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin// sbyin sreg las ni bshad par bya// nyon cig sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi// sbyin sreg phye

dang nang gsungs te// phyi ni sngon du bstan pa yin// nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni// pad+mad+mabazhi rnams 'byor pa ni// lus kyi dbus su nye bar gnas// me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni// dbang chen dang
ninu de bzhin// rlung gis mo ni 'bar byas te// chu yis yongs su smin par byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// gang du ma ni bskyod pa 'o// ra yig mngon spyod yi ge sta/ 1
ya yi dbang gi las kho na// la yig rgyas par 'gyur bsta// ba yig zhi ba zhes gsungs so// gang zhig zas dang btung ba ni// de dag thams cad chu la ste// pad+ma kA yig kha mar lta// snying gi pad+ma

btsud par bya// lte ba'i pad+ma' 'gro phyi rol// kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i pad+mar 'grom thag/ thal bar mtha' ru rnam par bstan// de ltar sbyin srog bdag bshad pa// nyin dang nyin du bya ba
ste rtag par rgyun du zas zos na// tshe 'dir kho nar 'grub par 'gyur// rgas pa med cing nad kyang med// 'chi ba med cing 'bras rnams med// de ni blo bur 'chib mod// 'tshab thams cad zad 'gyur zhing//
rmi lam ngan yang zhi bar 'gyur// bzang po skal bar gsin pa ste/ sems can thams cad dga' bar sna!/ mthong ba tsam gyis skul byed do// sbyin srog las rnams bshad byas nas// lha mo mchod pa bstan
par bya// dri dang 'phreng sogs gosa rnams dang// smos ma zas dang lha bshes kyis// dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor nas// bdag la mchod pa rnams ni bya// bdagazhi thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas
kun gyi gnas yin te/ de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod// gang zhig 'ga' yang bya ba'i las// rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par sgom// zas dang btung ba de bzhin gos//
de bzhin dri dang 'phrang kho nas// rig ma bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i// bdag nyid lha nyid bsam par bya// de ltar bshad nas rje rjed// cang mi gsung ba'i dngos por bzhugs// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams/
kyis// phyag gis thalamo sbyar gyur te// dgyes pas rab tu zhal bzhad nas// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// rnam par mi rtog pa thob sta// cang mi gsung bar bzhugs gyur to// lha mo bzhes yongs su zhus
pa las/ lha mo sgrolams zhus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/// thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa dpal o rgyan gyi
yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs so///rgyagar gyi mkhan po smi ti dzan kirtinyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ badzradz+nyAn samuts+tsha ya nA ma tan/ bod skad du/ ya shis rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'irgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems
dngo' dug song gis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dang/ sems las byung ba dang/ sams zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
'a// gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag pa'i byung ba de'i phyir yoshes/
cha gsum rdo rje'i rang ngazhin no// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo ba ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' brab pa/ 'gag pa

mdab/ skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang/ snang ba lta bar thob pa dang/ stong pa chen po'o// de yang rtogs par dka'aba'o// 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod/
par bya'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/ dAni snang ba mched pa dang/ shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so// sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sams te/ de ni snang ba dang stong pa
sta/ soms dang sems las byung ba dang/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o// gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo'i rang bzhin no// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang
chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi sla bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjes/ byang chub
tshad sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug pa mthen gnas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi burtsi'i phyir cang mis bar gyur pas 'dugo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis
[. ]bcom ldan 'dus kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal tu gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa/ e ma 'o ston pa rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan 'das de shad
du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'od gsal ba las byung ba rnam par shes pa de nyid soms dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/

da ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang gzhan dag tu'o// rnam par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung nga// rlung
las ma'o// ma las mu'o// chu las sa'o// de rnams las phung po lnga dang/ skye mched drug dang/ yul lnga ste/ de dag thams cad ni rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o// de nas rnam par shes pa
gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de/ snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo// de la 'od gsol ba/ gnas pa med pa// 'gag pa med pa//

ska ba med pa// don dam pa'i bden pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni ma rig pa 'o// de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang/ 'khrul pa dang/ rnam par g.yeng ba dang/ brjed ngas pa
dang/ le lo dang/ mi smra ba dang/ mi gsal ba 'o// ma rig pa las soms las byung ba ste/ nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang/ shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyub lta bu 'o// de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang//
dga' bo dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ drag po la sogs pa dang/ kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang/ lha'i tshogs dang/ mtshan ma dang/ rdo rje'i
brda'o// sems las byung ba las sems te/ zla ba'i snang ba dang/ shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu 'o// rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o// kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum

gyi bud mad dang/ b+ha ga dong/ pad+madang/ lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o// rdo rje dang partsayang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las ma'o// ma las chu ste/
chu nur po'i rnam pa dang/ de lasamar mar po dang/ nar nar bo dang/ gor gor po dag go/ de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so// de khu ba dang khrag ngag
gis bskyed pa'o// de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so// 'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste de'i phyir lus te lus

las byung ba'i skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang/ gsung gi phyag rgya'i thugs su gyur pa A li kA li las yang dag pa'i byung ba'i sngags dang/ sams kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma
las ltar dmigs pa'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o// de rjadang pad+mayang dag par sbyor ba ni sa mas dang sems las byung ba dag gi

thabs su gyur pa 'o/ dasams dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sngar ba ni bde ba chen po'i ting nga 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o// de sgyu ma'i dpas 'bar mtshon pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung

gi byem sAd kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dang/ chu zla dang/ mig yor dang/ mig rgyu dang/ rmi lam dang/ sgra ba ni dang/ driza'i grong khyer dang 2 mig 'phrul dang/ dbang po'i gzhu dang/

glog dang/ chu bur dang/ ma longagi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi bang bson po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin no// ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa lasamar dang/ ji ltar til

las til mar to/ de bzhin du rje rdzas ni thabs kyi ye shes zhi bar mtshon po'i phyir dang/ pad+mas ni shes rab kyi gshes lte bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'om dang til dag yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa yod

ba mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du sngag dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba mang par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus so// gang gis lhag dang ling

g.yang dag par sbyorab r mi nus pa des ni bdeb chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mid do//bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni las dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ phyir mi

ldog pa la'ang slobi par 'gyur ro// gang rdo rje dang pad+mamanyam par sbyor ba'i bde bsarang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon pa'i byed pa de ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
'din smras pa'i bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyi'i don ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs/
zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa/ ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i tshigs zlos nas smod par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i smonas bshad pa ngani su'i don du bshad pa gsungs
pa'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la sbyodapa'i chos kyi tshul du mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po sIng mchog dang ldan pa rnams nyon cig/ mtha' ni mu ste// 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul
zhes bya bar mthar thug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthur thug pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// u
po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsum mo// stong pa gsum kyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong ma
gsum 'od gsal ba'i mtha' ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar mas shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi yekashes yun ring/

pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do// ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thamakhar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyi shesa rnam par sbyong bar byed de// jiltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsags pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ya
shes mchog tu myur bas rnam par sbyong bar byed do// de bas na rim pa 'disashing ta la'i lam dang/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du stong pa dang/ shin tu stong pa dang/ stong pa chen
po rnams thar 'od gsal bar 'gyurar// 'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byams pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar logs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang/ dgongs pas yin pas bshad pa dang/ drang ba'i don dang/ nges pa'i don dang/
sgra ji bzhin pa dang/ sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba 'bar bzhag statshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ gang mthar thug pa bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags ma yin pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang/ bar ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya
dbya@#// kha la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o// lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid mad pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ thams cad stong pa dang/ dag pa dang//
'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// ga pur dang/ khrag chen po dang/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+madang phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs

pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang pa'i don te/ ga pur ni khu ba dang/ khrag chen po'i zla mtshan gyi khrag dang/ tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni tsan dan dmar po'o// rjerdzani mtshan ma sta thabs/
so pad+mani b+ha ga ste shes rab dang/ phyag rgya dang/ btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni nges pa'i don to// gnyis ka dang/ spyod pa dang/ bya ba'i rgyud rnams su don
gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta sta/ dkyil 'khor dang/ saMchod sbyin dang/ gter ma dang/ sman dang/ zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang/ de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i
dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni sgra ji bzhinapa ste/ de ni yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o// ke khya/ ke ba/ ko shu/ ko Da ba ko Ta rA ga/ ko la khya/ko la wa/ ko la ko la
ko la sta tha/ 'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te/ de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen ngo sagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang/ gnyis ka'i rgyud dang/ spyod pa'i rgyud dang/ bya ba'i rgyud dang/ rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor

chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong phrag bcuganyis zhes bya ste/ rgyas par byin grangasamad do// gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go/ spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do// bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o//

rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o// de dag ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste/ rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge jisnyad pa ni/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da tsA Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha
ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha 'di dag ni ming gi ya gi'i mtha' ma rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa dang/ tsheg dang/
bsgrub bya dang/ sgrub pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su'ang/ don dam pa'i bden pa las bdug byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dong chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas

rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal

ba rmad du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha'ajug gis rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so// rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dgod pa dang/
klu// de las byung ba'i byed pa dang/ las dang sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa banu rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa gnyis ka'i rgyud la bzhugs so// las kyi bya ba sna tshogs phyag

rgyu chen po ngu ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgyang migs nga 'i mtshan nyid rab tu dpyad pas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so// 'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang/
ye shes sems dang 'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang/ bdag nyid lha'i sAms pa u0f38mad pa dang/ rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang/ skyon gyis rgyu'i rtog pas rab tu spyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni
bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so// sngags dang/ sman dang/ sbyin srag dang/ phyi ma dang/ mig sman dang/ rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyud rab tu dpyad po sgrub par byed pa ni rtog
pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gling bsrang ba rnam pa lnga
ma dang// mtha' drug gis bshad pa dang/ rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang/ bangashad pa rnam pa bzhi dang/ dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang/ gang brag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang/ bden pa rnam pa//

yin de rin po che yi rigs// mu tig 'phreng ba shin tu mas// bu mo rin chen 'dra ba yis// brgyan tu bla ma la dbul ba// yon de pa'i rigs yin no// rgyal po dang ni dbang phyug dang// rlung ma 'phrul

gyi bzhon pa sogs// glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan// de pa zhim ga shegs pa kun kyi rje/ nan tan bla ma dbul bya ba// sna tshogs rdo rje'i rigs yin no// de rnams bzhi dang 'gyur pa dang// mi 'gyur ba yi/
bye brag gis// gsum du shes bya bla ma la// blo ldan rdo rje slob ma yis// ri sta bde ba kun 'dod na// dad mos sems kyis dbul bar bya// yid la gang bsams ma thul lam//
khas blangs de zhig phul na// yi dgas dmyal ba rnam gnyis su// nges par rgyas darlag par 'gyur// de bas de rnams rab phul nas// gsol ba dag ni rab tu gdab// rdo rje dkyil 'khor
chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so// sbyor pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'a9bor bdag
gis de ring mthong// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de nas bla ma de yis kyang// de la dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// dri dang ma tog 'phreng bas brgyan//

ni bsam par bya// rlung ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// de bzhin yid mgyogs rdzu 'phrul 'grub// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dag tu 'jug/ dolus khong stong nyid
la ni/ rang sems yon tan sgom pa'i sems// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyus sgyu ma'i sbyor bas su // dag pa'i bdag nyid ni 'dod par// nga nas ri rab phul nas

gyin+tisus bas su// skad cig gis ni de ru 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal// rnam pa bcu dang drug tu dang// sbyor ba de ni byin brlabs nas// sngags pas de ni san su la
gzhag/ khro be lcags kyu dpung pa yis// zhags pa lta bu gnyis pa 'o// lu gu rgyud kyi kha snga gsum// rgyal mtshan gzhago pa ra khyab par gzhag/ de ltar don rnams rab tu zhugs//

gzhug/ mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas 'dug na// lus kyis ci tsam bskyod pa dang// tshig tu rab tu 'phro ba'i rnams// de dag sngags dang phyag rgyur 'gyur// rtag tu sgom pa'i sbyor bas ni[']

gis gsol ba ba/pa pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ya shes gces pa dri med pa// byang chub sems ni rin po che// bu na mad pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan
'das la de bzhin gshegs pa brams cad kyis gsol bu nga tab par thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin la/

sams ni bstan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo dzi mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis do

nyid sangs pa yin// bdag mad chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis gsungs so// de nas btsum ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rjem lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po sa ba med pa ste/ dngos po ngo bo yod min

yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma'i rdo rje zhes byaba'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin
[4]/ 'od gsal ba// gzod nas dag cing rtog pa med// sems can mad cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin///

ni bstan pa rnams// bdag mad chos las legs byung ba// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems kyi sgom pa yi// mi g.yo yi ge las byung zhing// rmi lam la sogasam skyes pa//
byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang stanani rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag go zhes// dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas// yid kyis hUM
byas rdo rje can// rdo rje sams mas byin gyis brlab// rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya// lag pa stong de bskor ba ni// lcags kyu yis ni nayang drung// byin nas drang por phyogs bcing ste// dam tshig
mchog kyang dbul bar bya// gdan rnams so sor phul nas su// mchod yon 'bul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs// sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya// rnam pa kun gyis mnyes bya ba//
rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyi bdag/ rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang// gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag/ rnal 'byor yin zhes
sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags kyis byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin rlabs yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang// gsang sngags sa bon skya bgyi// phyag rgyatshogs su

'byor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs dri mar bcas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag bya ste// de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar// dag gyur de nus blo yis ni/

yang sngo// ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la// 'os par byed pa'i sngags pa yis// 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khor la kun la pad+mayi// ngo bo yis//

'grub par yong mi 'gyur// de bas nyin de lan gsum du// kha ton gyis ni bklag par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong dang zhugs pa dang// dbang bskur ba la sogs tshul gyi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thob
pa bzhin// byang chub soms dang nyan thos dang// byang dang gnyis ka rnal 'byor rgyud// dgongs gsungs rnams kyis de lta min// de lta bas na sdom pa'i mchog/ nga yis yang dag bstan par bya//

pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyang srang// nyin re zhing ni dus bzhi ru// bu mo legs par goms pa las// ga pur tsan dan khas blangs te// cho ga bzhin du lus 'khor mchod// rol mo'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa//

bu mo skra bzung ste// lha bzhud dang ni dbang po lag/ dkar po dang ni ri sa dang// gru gnon chu yis ba kru bar byas// de nas tsan dan dkar po yis// bu mo lus byugs rgyun

bas bsrung byas nas// bdag nyid langs te de yi'o// yungs kar kyis ni brtsig par bya// de nas de ni babs gyur te// sgrub pa po yi mdun gnas nas// bka' nod 'di skad smra bar byed// sams
can chen po khyod ci 'dod// bdag la yang dag bka' stsol cig/ ral gri mig smanas 'og gam// rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len// mi snang 'gugs pa las ba de dag// bdag gis
gcig cig sbyar bar bya// de nas sgrub po de yis kyang// gang 'dod smras nas cang te'u brdung// de nas ro langs kha do nas// du ba 'thul zhing ma 'bar ba// de nas sbrul nag lta buru// ro 5 kha nag/

rdzas kun gang la bstan// thams cad gsar 'gyur rtsi lta bu// de bzhin thabs sgrub de byas nas// ro na snga mkho bzhin 'gyur te// de yi sbyin sreg rab byas nas// dkyil 'khor yang dgatshim par bya//
de bas 'di ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ don kun yang dag 'grub byed pa// las thams cad kyi gtso bo sta// bcom ldan rdo rjesams dpas gsungs// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ ro langs chen mo'i
le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//da ni nga yi sgrub po yi// dngos grub slob dpon las byung phyir// rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi// slob dpon bkur ba'i cho ga bshad//

yongs rdzogs par// byed cing dang po las 'jug par// byed pa rgyu yi slob dpon no// ri bong 'dzin pa sgul byed cing// de yis sgrub po zhing dag cing// ye shes sgyu ma'i snod rung byed// rkyen gyi slob dpon

bla ma dga' ba dang mos can// shin tu rgyan gyis rab brgyan pa// dad ldan sbyor ba la goms pa// gzugs bzang 'dod chags kyisamyos khyed// shin tu'adul ba khyad par can// bskul ba'i gnas /

mas par byed// mchod rten bshig dang sdig 'dra'i phyir// de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste// snyan dang lham dang bzhon pa dang// 'gom par bya ba smos ci dgos// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// mchog kun de
ga yis spangs par 'gyur// slob dpon smod par byed pa de// rmi lam du yang ma theng mi bya// de ni bgegs dang log 'dren dang// rims dang spyag dang gshin rjes 'dzin// 'chi bar rab tu 'gyur ba ste//
ngan pa gtum po blun chen te// phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur kyang// blo ldan rnams kyis mi bsrung bar// mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha yiso// kha na ma tho byed pa bsad// mdo sogs bstan pa'i
dmul ba ru// slob dpon smad par byed pa de// gnas par 'gyur bar nga yis bstan// de bas bla ma'i zhabs drung du// bag ma bzhin du ngo tsha srung// grul dang dgod pa lud pa sogs//
kha la lag pas bkab nas su// shin tu 'jam par smra bar bya// mgo byed bcing dang tshon byug pa// blama'i drung dume bya 'o// bro brdung ba dang bkam tshig dag/ thos pa'i yul nas mi bya'o//
mdun 'gro ba dang rkang pa brkyang// yang dag nyid du mi bya'o// las ni gang dag byed pa 'am// mnyan par la sogs 'dod pa la// gzung phyir thal mo ma bshig par// gnas nas langs te mthong
yul du// rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste// mtshan mo dang ni chu rgal dang// gcong rong dag stu gnas gyur na// bka' lung gnyer du dgum pa'iphyir// mdun du 'gro ba nyes mi 'gyur// de bas thabs
ni thams cad kyis// rdo rje 'dzin pa bla ma mchog/ rjes su 'thun pas mnyes par bya// de mnyes sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes// gang gis slob dpon yang dag smad// de yis rgyud kun sgrug pa'i
mchog/ gnyid dang 'a du 'a dza rnams sbyangs te// bskal pa stong du legs bsgrubs kyang// dmyal sogs sgrub par byed pa 'o// de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te// bsam pa 'bras bu smin byed pa'i//
sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// sems can dad dang ldan pas mchod// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyis rgyud las/ bla ma bkur ba'i le'u ste banu bzhi pa'o//

gshegs bde mdzad pa// khyod nyid 'di las rab byung ngo// dpal rdo rje sIng po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//
de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// dngos kun cho ga shes med na// sgrub po dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// de phyir 'dir ni brtul zhugs bstan// sbyor ba'i rtsol ba thams cad ni// de nyid
rig pas spang bar bya// rdo rje soms dang des 'dug pa// sngas nas gzhan du mi bya 'o// dag pa de nyed la gnas pas// sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste// bdag med gnas pa'i
[A ]sbyor ba yis// ji srid bar du so sor brtag/ dngosamad go 'phang 'a gnas dang// thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis// rgyud las gang ci 'byung ba rnams// ma brtags pas ni 'byung bar 'gyur/

'jig rten pa spangs te// spyod pa thams cad byas na ni// de la de tshesas rgyas gzigs// kun tu the tsam gcod pa yi// rig pas phyis ba bzhin du spyad// gang tsha chags med rnal 'byor pa// de tsha
phun sum tshogs 'phal 'gyur// sdig pa ma lus ldan pa dang// gti mug sgrib pa rab gnas pa// smyon pa'i rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// zla drug gis ni don yod grub/ rang nyidasas rgyas kun mthong zhing//
'dod pa kun gyis rab tu 'gengs// wadamad gzhom du med pa dang// dang ba'i sku tsha'abyung bar 'gyur// bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog/ 'bad pa med par yang dag 'thob// 'dod pa kun gyi dga'
mos rnams// 'bad bral bas ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro dang 'dug dang gnas pa na// mchog tu zab pa'i gnas la brtag/ 'od gsal ye shes lama mkhan pa// mtshan nyid rtog pa'i rnal
'byor ba'i// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sems kyi rin chen brtan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bzhugs pa// byin gyis brlab pa'i ng mdzad par 'gyur// de ltar gyur
pas zhugs nas kyang// ji srid sams ni mi skyo bar// mnyam gzhag yid ni bzang pa dang// de la 'bad pas bsgom par bya// de 'og la ni ci dga' ga'i// spyad pa yis ni gcig
byas na// cung zad sun phye ba yi mtshon// byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur// dgod dam smra'am 'gug pa 'am// la la rab tu bga' byed par// ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i// sgom pa'i sems
la zhen par bya// de lta'i dam tshig ldan gyur cing// rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis// dus kyi nges pas yongs sngardzus nas// bla mad byang chub thob par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi
rgyud las/ shes byed kun tu spyod pa'i le'u stabcu drug pa'o// de nas mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la
tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin las// 'byung ba'i lha sa khyod mchog pas// sums dpa' kun gyi phyag rgya che// mkha' 'gro chen/
po phyag 'tshal lo// gti mug thams cad 'od gsal ba// mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas chen po ste// gzugs snang chos ni rnam dag pa// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal/
ngargyal thams cad 'od gsal ba// mkha' 'gro ni 'dod skong ba sta//sim sogs chos ni rnam dag pa// rin chen mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags thams cad 'od gsal ba//
skyon gyis gos med mkha' 'gro ma// mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnam dag pa/ pad+momakha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// phrag dog tshes ni 'od gsal ba// mkha' 'gro sna tshogs 'as byed pa// mngon
par 'du byed chos kun dag/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// mtshan mchog 'di yis khyod bstod pas// gang zug 'de yang bsod nams tshogs// yashes tshogs chen yongs
rdzogs nas// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the ltos med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen
pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po mi shigs pa'i zla ba skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rang gi thugs ka'i mi shigs pa'i thig le las shin tu
