mi g.yo zhes bya khri ba cha// gshin rdzo mthar byed gsum byung ba// kun nas sangs rgyas zhes rnams su// khams gsum pa yang nges 'dzoyis byed// khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang// khro gnyer rim par ldan gyur
gang// rjesams dpa' rang nyid kyang// khro ba 'di yis 'joms par byed/ stobs chen bdud rtsi zhes grags dag/ mi shes 'jig cing 'phrog byed pa// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa yang//
the tshom mad par 'joms par byed// 'bum du bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// kun tu son par byed pa yin// blo ldan sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i ng// 'gugs par byed par the tshom med// khro gnyer tso ka Ta
[d/]rig ma// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// lha min chen po sogs sbyor bas// g.yul du rgyal bar byed pa yin// khro bo gzegasami mchog rtsor skyes// sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya//

khro bo'i sems kyis sbyar byas nas// nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'jig byed// lag par de ni yang dag bskyed// mi sna der son bsam pa yi// pha rol dpung ni rings par byed// brgya byin gyi yang the tshom med//
gzi brjid phung po bzlas nas ni// 'bum phrag gsum dulegs bskor nas// brgya byin snga yarengs par byed// 'ga' zhig min par 'joms par bstan// sgrol ma sgrol len yang dag 'byung/ 'ba'
ba'i ye shes dag 'byung ba// 'og gi sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje'i sde yang rangs par byed// duyi snying po'i mchog skyes gang// rigs dang rigs dbang rigs par byed// de dang yang ni 'di nyid du//
sbyor bar bsams nas bsam gtan gyi// ting 'dzin bsgoms pas sor po 'am// gzhan du dmar po nges sbyar bya// bcom ldan 'das rnamapar snang mdzad kyis de skad ces gsungs so// sngags thams cad kyi
byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u bco lnga pa rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u gsungs so// zhi ba rgyas pa
sogs las la// rang gzugs rnamapa bsgoms pa yis// thugs kar yashes yang dag 'byung// cod pan yongashes chos dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// rin chen sna/
'tshigs mtshungs pa'i 'od// rnal 'byor pas bsdus gong bur bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rgyas bsgom bya// khro bo rnams kyi ston pa 'di// de rje 'byung ba sgom byed pa// de yi
ngo bo rnam bsgoms pas// rigs dang rigs su 'di bstan no// rigs kyi de bong phyug rnam bsgom nas// kha dog lnga pa legs mdzes par// bsgoms pa'i go 'phangagis bsgomo bya// slar yang rigs
kyi bdag po'i sngags// 'di nyid bsgom par bya ba ste// gtsug tor yang ni ma bsgom bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dgyes dang mgu bar byed par bshad// dngos grub thams cad byed par
'dod// rdo rje ye shes sogs rdzogs byed// rig ma la sogs thams cad kyi'ang// rig pa'i rgyal po rnam 'joms byed// pho nya mos kyang thams cad kyi// rdo rje sams dpa' rnam bsgom pa// 'dod
'gyur sngags rnams thams cad kyi// rang gzugs rnam pa bsgom pas so// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig 'byung ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis phan 'dod pas// rdo rje dpa'
bo'i mchog gis gsungs// sngags thams cad kun las btus pa'i le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

skyod par byed pa'i las 'di gsungs so// skyod pa la sogs bya ba la// sangs rgyas de nyid yashes can// khro bo gsum po bsdus pa yi// rdo rje 'byung bas grags pa nyid// gshin rjegashed ni ye shes rigs//
wa bsdus pa'i 'don la mchog rtsar rgyas// khro bo chen bo rtamagrinani// chos kyi ye shes rigs su bshad// stong phrag gaman brgya yang nyung// ther 'bum gcig tu bzlas nas ni// rang nyid sa sa
rgyas zhes pa yang// tshe gshes pas spyod par byed// thod pa gsum la kun bzhag nas// lho yi phyogs kyi dur khrod du// 'dod pa 'din yang dag brtsam// rdodang shing gi sbyor ba yis//
dngos po med pas yang dag bsam// rdo dang phub ma yang dag ldan// gza' dang gsal khyeda rnam par sus// khrag dang phabs su yang dag ldan// nim pa'i 'dab mas bza' bya ba// ta la'i 'dab
ma la bri bya/ sngags pas 'khrul 'khor sad par bya// tshor ma can gyis bris nas ni// nim pa'i 'dab ma khar bzhu gnas // sbyor ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya// lha chen po yi 'og tu ni//
dri ma med pa kun bazang bya// cho ga shes pas lan bdun du// mngon par bstags te yang dag brtsam// dgra yi sgo lam yang na grong// grong khyer ram ni kun 'byung nga'i// gnas 'di rnams su phung
po ni// kun nas skyod par byed pa yin// snying po de la mdor bsdus pas// bya ba tsog pu'i rten la 'dug/ dri ma med pa'i gzugs byas nas// khro bo khro bo'i mchog 'byung ba// yon tan stong phrag kyang
bskyang nas// rtag tu sangs rgyas kyang thob byed// nyi ma bdun name so sor byas// gal te 'ga' zhig mi 'gro na// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// mi phyed rdo rje rang gis gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa
Thams cad skyod pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byed pa'i

las 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas slob dpon 'dab bzung nyid// rdo rje'i skyil krung du gnas te// bya dka'i nyabar longs spyod kyis// gang de 'tsho zhing gnas par byed// brjod pa'i lhag ma bstan bar bshad//
pak+Sha/ 'gro ba dang ni gar nyid dang// de bzhin 'bel gtam du mi 'gyur// mthon po min nyid slob ma yis// ches kyi dus su'ang sdig pa sogs// gnas bya gal te rmongs pa de// mnar med gnas su 'tshad par
'gyur// sngags tsam gal te tshangs pa la// lag pa gnyis kyis yang dag brtsam// ji srid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung// mnar med gnas su 'tshad par 'gyur// bud med gsang min brjod bya min// gang
zhig la la slob dpon ched// bde dang lus sems sdug bsngal ba// sbyor ba ji srid 'tsho yi bar// gal te slob dpon rnams kyi bka'// dga' ba'i sems kyis byas gyur na// de tshabadag lasangs
rgyus sogs// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ de lo ji srid 'tsho yi bar// brda yis kun tu gnas par bya// dku ru brtan pa'i lag pa sogs/ ji srid 'tsho bar mi bya'o// dngos grub 'bras bu don
gnyer bas// slob dpon ming nas smosami bya3/ risrid nam mkha' yang dag 'byung// mnar med dmyal bar 'tshad par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes so// bza' ba la yang rang
slobangashes// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya// de yi ming gi yi ge gang// ji srid 'tsho bar brjod mi bya//sangs sa grangs med bsad byas nas// sdig pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags// gang
tshe khacig yon tan 'dis// bstod zhu bsod nams yang dag 'byung// de ni slob dpon rtobs mdangs// gzhan du gal te rmongs pa bdag/ de tshe ngu 'bod du 'tshod 'gyu gang tshadeb/
mA pA ti// gus pas nyan sogs bstanapa gang// de slob ma sngagos zhu dang// ji ltar kha cig slob dpon rnams// bad ba dngos su mthong bar 'gyur// gang zhig la la slob dpon rnams//
bdag 'di klog nag latshod rung 'tshod// de dag du la bod du 'tshong 'gyur// slob dpon gang khyed tshul byed pa/ de ni de la dbul bar bya// gzhan du dngos grub mad pa zhes// khri srid sog ma'i ma rtag
slob dpon gyi// chung ma'i don du bsgrub par bya// yang na sring mo de byin nas// 'grub 'gyur 'dir e tshom med// slob dpon gang zhig slob ma'i phyir// phyag 'tshal ba ni bsgrub par bya/ bskal pa drug
cur de dmyal ba'i// sdug bsngal myong bir 'tshed par 'gyur// de ltar yon tan khyad 'phags kyi glu ba drug gis rab gsal bya// gal te gzhan du bdag rmongasan// mnar med lta bur 'tshed pa'/
'gyur// gang nyid slob dpon tshol byed pa// de nyid so sor bsgrub par bya// rdo rje yenga shes rab bskul bas// dngos grub yangs par de 'gro 'gyur/ yon tan 'di rnams gang gis 'gas/ bsod
nams 'byung bar shes par bya// slob dpon 'di yi rgyud la sogs// de lta bu sogs gsal bya min// de ltar bdag nyid dag pa thob// chos kyi de nyid tshogs gnas// de yi
slob rab gsal bar bya// myur du 'grub 'gyur gzhan dumin// sangs rgyas gnas la gnas pa yis// gang de mgu nas rdor sams mchog/ myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
nyid 'thob pa// de mgu byed pa mchog 'byung 'gyur// de yis 'jig rten gsum 'grub ste// sangs rgyas ye shes nyid kyang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rdo rje sams dpa' manyes par byed pa'i le'u/
bco brgyad pa rdzogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'dasa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sngags thamasacad kyi le'u gsungs so// sbyadamos tshal dang rnam par dben// chu klong rab tu

[W/ ]'bab pa dang// ri dang rnam par bkra b.ru// bsgrub pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya// zla ba gcig gis grub par 'gyur// gal te yin na de 'grub min// dbon dang gzhan pa'i yul rnams su// sems ni gang du ba

dgyes byed// gsang sngags 'bar bas byin brlabs pa// de las sangs rgyas nyida'agrub 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni chu klung che// ri bo chen po'i rtsa rnams su// yan lag tha dad yin sngags bzlas// nges par zla bas

'grub par byed// skatshe dug dang yang dag ldan// rig ta'i shing g sbyin sreg gis// bstan pa sogs ni de bskyed nas// gsang sngags sgrub pa kun spyod bya// de la sdom pa bzung nas ni// nges par 'grub byed
gzhan du min// gsang sngags chog kun thob nas// sngags pas bsan par 'grub bar byed// de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi// sdom pa so sor bsgrub par bya// gang nyid sdom par 'ang dag brjod/
na nyid brtul zhugs can gyis bsrungs// gzhan dunam mkha' ji srid par// mnar mar ngastsal bar kun tu 'byung// ji srid 'tsho bar chog bzhin// slob dpon sngom pa srung ba la// de yi sangs rgyas
nyid du 'grub// sna tshogs 'dzan pakun gzhi yi// mnyam med gsang sngags bzlas nas ni// sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub// zla nyi gcig gis 'jig rten gsum// de yis 'grub 'gyur
the tshom med/ rnam shes las kyang byung ba'i sngags// 'bum phrag dug tu bzlas nas kyang// re sams dpa'i phyag khyasanas/ zla ba nyal de 'grub 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgya'i rab dbye bas//

nges par sangs rgyas kyang theb byed// phyag rgya'i dbye ba rab bkodab// ngas pa lha rnams spyan drangs mod// dag bdag gang nyid tshol byed pa// de nyid rtag tu 'bad bya 'o// mkhas pas 'ba mchog sangs rgyas

la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings byas nas// de rnams sngags ni bakhrus nas ni// rtag tu nges par sbyin par bya// sngags pas rgyal po'i bu mo gang// gal te sangs rgyas bumo'ang rung// bzung nas nyiba' longs

spyang bya// ji srid yid mi tshim par gyur// dug dang sku tshe yang dag ldan// yungasakaratil mar bsres pa dang// rus pa rdzobar yang dag ldan// ma ni daM de phyamar bya// bshang dang gci ba rab bcug nas//
ma[p]// brtul zhugs can gyi khyad par gyis// klu gsum mgrin pa'i ma la bsreg/ nges par myur du 'grub par byed// lha sbyin zhes ni byas nas ni// gang gis 'di ni rab gsal byed//
gal ta 'di ni sangs rgyas rung// gang gis de thal bar byed par 'gyur// mkhas pas mtshan mo phyud la yang/ [”]/nyi ma'i grong la sbyin sreg bya// bskal pa gcig gi bar gyi yang// sbyin byed gzhan du
nam yang min// gal te sangs rgyas sam 'ga' zhig/ rmongs pa'i sems kyis 'dusan ni// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du'ags// byung chub sems ni rang gi gsungs// rengs dang khebs pa dang po
grags// gnyis pa sa zhes bya bar brjod// gsum pa lha yi mchog yin no// bzhi pa 'phags pa'i yul du yang// phyag na rdo rjer grags pa yin// snying po kun gyi sbyor ba yis// bya ba myur du
'grub par byed// rig pa sna tshogs sogs dang gnas// skyed mos tshal dang dngang ston tshe// dkyil 'khor de la bya ba ni// bdug pa byin nas yang dag brtsam// gal to ba byin nam tshangs po//
sangs rgyas sam yang blo gros che// glog shes pas zhag bdun gyis// 'joms 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med// chog shes pas khrag gis byugs// rang nyid rang gi lus su bya// sa grol gnug
tor gyur nas ni// mi sdug mchog gcigs 'jigs par byed// dur khrod khyim du yang dag sbyor// rang gis de yi ming bri bya// stong phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni// nges par sangs rgyas kyang 'dzin/
cho ga shes pas gshar pa'i gos// khro bo'i sems kyis rab zhugs nas// ling ga rkang pas mnan nas ni// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'joms// khyab 'jug lha min la sogs lha// nang par byas/
nas brtsam par bya// cho ga shes pas nyin bdun gyis// khams gsum po yang 'joms par byed// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sngags thams cad 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so//
le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogasaso///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sgrub pa thams cad kyi sdom pa'i le'u gsungs so// bshang dung gib bawa' bar
bya sems can kun la bde ba sbyin// rdo rje 'chang rgyal de nyid ni// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ dgu las ni yang dag byung// 'ga' zhig tu ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal//
kun mchog dbang mo/ 'dod 1 gas bza' bar bya ba ni// phan dang bde ba thams cad sbyin// de ni rje rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ zhe sdang pa bar 6 2 bya ba ni[，]
de rje ye shes rab rtogs byed// de nyid rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ gti mug ba za' par bya ba ni// ye shes thams cad rtog pa po// da nyid na['; ]/sangs
rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// bde sdug bza' bar bya bani// slob dpon ji srid 'tsho yi bar// de nyid zhi ba 'dzin rgyal po// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// spos dupan ji srid 'tsho
khar chos dang chos min bza' bar bya// de nyid rdo rdzo'achang rgyal po// kun mchog de nyid ston pa po// ji srid 'tsho bar 'ga' zhig tu// sems can khams ni bza' bar bya//

da nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ ji srid 'tsho bar smad pa yi// bya ba thams cad mi bya'o// de nyid pad+ma'achang rgyal lo// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug go/ de nas de bzhin gsheg
ba rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi chos nyid dang yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar thob nas/ rje 'chang thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni ngo mtshar

'tsha te gang du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdag po de dag gi ming yang shes par bya ba ma yin na gzhan lta ci smos zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
mdzad chen po'i thugs kar gnas nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin nor bu'i le'u bstan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni g.yo bar byed pa zhes bya ba bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi gnas lngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// byin rlabs la sogs sngags sogs kyis// de nyid sna tshogs rnam sgom pa// cho gshes pas de stong du// yi ge/
bzhi ni rnaa sgom pa// bdag nyid dbus su son byas nas// rang gi gzugs su gzugs mtshon pa// rang sams byang chub yang dag 'byung// cho ga shes pas kun dgod bya// de yis sangs
rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur// sgom pa 'di nyid rab spyan ma// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shel dang zla ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lnga yi yi ge
rnam bsgom nas// yi ge lnga ni rnam bsgom bya ba go bas lus kyi dbus so par// o yig sor po dang mtshungs pa/ 'od zer lnga po kun tu 'khrugs// der son bdag nyid sngags pas/
bsgoms/ dbus su hU~M yig yang dag sbyos// ra ga la pa dang bsgom par bya// 'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzugs bar n tshul gyis bskyed nas ni// mtshan nyid Thams cad yongs
rdzogs pa// yid du 'ong ba sgom par gyis/ sangs rgyas gzugs bar n de rnams su// 'od zer lnga ni ma bsgom bya// rnam snang mdzad gzugs 'od zer gyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang
bar bsams nas tshig shes pas de sa bsdus nas de lta bar bya// klu ba 'char bas mtshan pa yi// mnyam med gzugs na bskyed nas ni// gsal ba'i ral pa 'chang zhi ba// cod pan lnga ni
'dzin pa po// sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// dkyil 'khor du gzhug bsams nas ni// de yis sngags ni rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni de rnams su//
re rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas// gtsug tor de yi bzlas par bya// khro bo gang gzhan 'byung bas kyang// rigs rnams thams cad nyid kyi yang// bskyed pa'i chogar 'gyur ba//
yin// de rje gsum kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani/
gsungs so// cho ga shes pas de thams cad// o yig dbus su rnam bsgom bya// 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas rnam brgyan pa'i// hU~M yig mthar ni rnam bsgoms nas// dbus su rdo rje'achang bsams nas// in+d+ra/
la mtshungs pa'i 'od// zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang// phyag na re chi rnam bsgom bya// rnam par snang mdzad rnam bsgoms nas// 'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od// bsams nas de yi thugs ka
ru zla bar sngags kyi yi ga sgom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen ngos bcom ldan 'das ldan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nga 'dzin 'di gsus so//de bzhin nyid du kun byas nas// dbus su hUM yig sgom pa ni// nges su rang gi gzugs ltar bya// rdo rje dmar po rnam bsgom bya// dbus su chos
'chad bsams nas ni// pad+ma rA ga'i dbang mtshungs pa// phyagan pad+mad+ma'adab brgyan pa// de yi dbus su rnam bsgos pa// thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsams nas sngags ni rnam bsgom bya//
khacom ldan 'das tshes kyi dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi che ga rdzogs so//kacho ga shes pas gzugs byas nas// nges su hU~M yig yang dag sbyar// dbus su rang ga
rnam pa sgom// 'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'dod mchog gabrugs ni bskyod par bya// lag tu mdung rtsa gsum bsgoms nas// de yi sIng khar dkyil 'khor dgodaM// chos kyi dbang phyug
gzugs bsgoms nas// phyis nas bya ba yang dag bsdum// sgron ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i ting nga 'dzin rdzogs so// yong na
brtul zhugs can gyis ni// bsdu bas sangs rgyas gzugs bsgom bya// gtsug tor sngags dang khro ba dang// rig pa'i rgyal po rig bcas pa// las rnams thams cad pa yi sngags// go rims
bzhin du de bzlas bya// dbus su bedag po bsgoms nas ni// nges su lha rnams dgod par bya// snying po sbyor ba de rnams su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yige mchod bsgoms nas//

de yis lha rnams rnam bsgoms pas// thams cad kyi ni lag bar ni// jo rdzo 'khor lo pad+masgom// mdung dang yid bzhin nor bu yang// bsgoms nas myur du sgrub par byed// sngags pas rang sngags bzlas bya ste//

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis// ngos su zla ba yang dag sbyor// dbus su ser po rnam bsgom bya// bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis ni// rang gi lus la dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas//
'di ni rengs par byed pa'i mchog/ dus rnams kun tu m bsgoms nas// nges par bskal par du gnas 'gyur// chog shes pas mi bskyod sogs// nyima'i dkyil 'khor la dgod//
bya rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni// thog ma tha mar bsam gtan 'di// bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya// de yis sangs rgyas nyid sgrub na// yunami ring
bar sangs rgyas 'gyur// de yi rang gi sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgyu shes nas sgrub pa po// chog shes pas bskyod par bya// myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min// phyag rgya chen por rabe bsgoms nas// nyam
mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni// dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i// dkyil 'khor dgi ba bsgom par bya// sngags pas dkyil 'khorolas ngos su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bdag po'i gzugs ni
yang dag bskyed// de yis mi g.yo bsgom par bya// rin chen bzhi byung sgo nga ru// sbrang rtsi mar gyis rab tu dgang// sngags kyi yi ge rnams bsgoms nas// bsam pa de yis sbyin sreg bya// dkyil 'khor
lnga yi tshul gyis ni// dbus su hU~Mgi yi ge 'gengs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i 'thibs pa ni// kun nas rnam par 'phro bar byed// de la gnas pas lha yi gzugs// tshim pa'i dam tshig gsum 'byung bas// chog
shes pas gtsug tor gyis// gtsug tor rnams ni bsgom par bya// bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya// kun nas sor mo bcu gnyis pa'o// ul chen po dag

00 brgyud pa// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// danyid kyis ni bsgom par bshad// rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che// utul sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'phrang ba bcu drug yang dag ldan// rtag tu bsgom bya/
'grub par 'gyur// sngags pas sor mo nyi shu pa'i// rtsa gsum ser po dang mtshungs pa// cho ga nyid kyis bsgoms byas nas// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni zertsomu med// pad+ma las kyi rdo rje dang// yid
bzhin nor bu gsum pa can// bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// myur du sgrub byed gzhan du min// 'khor lo de bzhin pad rdo// bsams nas rdo rje'i cho ga las// sgom pa'i go 'phang gis
bsgrub bya// gzhan du 'di ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rdo rje chen po dung sogs bcos// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// kun gyi las can gsang sngags kyi// brjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas
nas ral gri 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i soms// 'phro zhing 'thibs pa kun tu 'khrug/ khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed// khro bar byed pas khyad par bya// pho nya mngag gzhug sogs sngags rnams//
jo lha'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa de// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las// sgom pas mchog tu mthe bar 'gyur// dbyug pa za ba gru sta dang// zhags pa pa'i sa sbom pas// tshogs bsgom par byas nas ni//
rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ste// rdo rje yashes can gyis gsang// yashes dngos grub can du brjod// bcom ldan
ba@#// 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dongan// cho ga shes pas sbyin sreg bya// de nyid gsang pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// rnam pa
sna tshogs sbyin srag brtsam// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyor ba las// rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed// oM yig sngags kyi dbye ba yis// sgom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhi ba can la
dkyil 'khor zlum// rgyas pa can la zur bzhi pa// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mchog/ dbang bya ba zhu yi rnam pa 'o// zhi la ma yi dbus son par// bdud rtsi lta bu bsgom par bya// danyid lani lha yi/
gzugs// rang gi tshul gyis bsgom par bya// bdag nyid bdag po'i tshul gyis ni// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung// khani rab tu gdangs byas nas// ma stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi// sngags pas lce/
yi dbus son par// hU~M yig de yis bsam par bya// bcom ldan 'das sbyin sreg rdo rjes de skad ces gsus so// cho ga shes pas 'o ma sbyang// mar ni zhi ba'i rigs la sprad// mar khu chen po'i bye brag
las 4 ye shes rdo rje'i rigs su brjod// zhi ba rdo rje slob dpon gyi// sI kha'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya// yid bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas// 'di ni dag pa'i tshula mchog ge/ rnam par snang mdzad
gzugs bar n che// pad+ma'i yon tan 'byung ba la// galus ni 'dod chags rigs mchog ba// gakhrugs ni 'dzong mchong rdo rje ca/ las bzhi'i rab tu byab las// sngags kyi yi ge dged byas nas//
0bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sbyin sreg rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
sngags yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi sngags kun
las btus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i le'u 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po// 'dod pa'i dam tshig dgyes pa po// sngags rnams thams cad yang dag dmigs// de yi bsam
gtan rab bskul bya// dam tshig ye shes sangs rgyus kun// rigs dmigs dkyil 'khel tshul gyis ni// gzugs ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od// o yig ye shes dbye ba yis// 'di
ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o// ral pa'i cod pan longs sod pa// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs pa// me stag 'thibs pas kun tu 'khrug/ rnal 'byor mchod
phyir thog lasogs brgyan cing dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// cod pan du ni rdo rje sams// mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// dbang po gnyis ni zab sbyor bas// 'di ni bsam gtan tshul
mchog go/ sku yi rdo rje sbyor sogs kyis// mngon shes lnga yi rab sbyor las// rkang gnyis mchog de nyid shes pas// thod pa can gyis gtso bo brjod/ sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di ye shes// rigs/
zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid byin gyis rdzob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te/ de thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sIng po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// dbus su gzugs ni rab bag bya// nag po shin tu rnam
'gyur ba// ma rungs zhal ni rnam par gdangs// ma stag 'gribs pa 'bar ba sta// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi pa ste rang 'bad pas// dbang po gnyis kyi ba sbyor las//

rgyu'adi ni rdo rje tshul bstan pa'o// de tshe thugs sogs yang dag grung/ rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya// 'dod chags rdo rje rab bskul bas// dngos grub thams cad bslab par bya// rdo rje dam tshig rjes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag rdo rje sazas cad 'chang ba'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos 'amang ba'i dpal
zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las// dbus su gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// dmarapo 'dod chags 'dzin pa 'bar// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// phyag bzhi pa la

lta yid 'ong ba// dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas// 'ang yi chog bsgoms pa ni// 'di ni 'dod chags tshul bsam pa'o/ gsung gi rdo rje gtso dngos grub// rdo rje chos rab sbyor sogs kyis// snying rje'i bdag

tsam nyid can gyis slab// sgom pa yang ni myur 'grub byed// chos 'chang ba'i dam tshig gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje dam tshig gi rigs byin gyis thob
pa zhes bya ba'i [“]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// gzugs
ni dbus su dgod par bya// khyab bdag zhi ba ser po'i mdog/ sbyan gsum brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// kun tu dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs// me stag tshogs ni kun tu 'khrugs// phyag bzhi par

ni mo ga yis/ bsgom bya myur du 'grub par byed// rdo rje'i mthar thug nor dngos grub// rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya// 'di de sngagasa rnams thams cad kyi// thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin snying po can// sku
gsung thugs kyi bsgoms pa ni// rdo rje sams dpas sprul pa yin// rdo rje mdung gi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to// ji srid gzugs ni kun sbyor ba// de la lha nyid rab tu grags// slar yang 'od
yi tshul gyis ni// skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur// bcomo ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// rang gi sngags yig dbye bas sam// yang na rigs kyi rig pa yis// rigs kyi bdag
po'i sngags kyis sam// brtul zhugs can gyi rig rgyal pos// thams cad las can sngagasakyis dang// gtsug tor sngags kyis rnam bsgom bya// 'di'i sngagasanams thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i
de nyid gsus pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// zhi ba'i las kyi rab dbye bas// rigs kyi sngags su rab tu grags// rgyus pa can la rigs
kyi sngags// sgom pas nges par 'grub par byed// dbang du bya ba'i cho ga la// rig pa'i rgyal pos bsgom par bya// thams cad las can sngags ni// mngon spyod rnam par sgom par byed// skyod par
pa byed pa'i cho ga la// gtsug tor du ni rnam bsgom bya// stags shes pas ni phur gdab sogs// pho nyapa nya mo bsam bya// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes daskad ces gsungs so// 'od zer lnga yi
tshul gyis ni// rtog pas de la bsgom par bya// gzhan du dngos grub mad pa nyid// sgom pa rnams su shes par bya// rigs kyi las kyi rab dbye bas// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgoms pa'o// sngags

kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas// bsgom bya dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sang kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// dkyil 'khor rnams kyin makhasgom la// stong du bkod pa'i dbye ba yis// 'dinabasam gtan tshula mchog go/
dkar gnag dmar po'i sbyor ba las// bsam gtan thams cad du brtag bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// sngags rnams kun tu bzlas par bya// Uyigao yig dbye ba yis// saAhUM yig gzhan gyi
gzugs// bskyed pa'i tshog byas nas ni// bstan ba gang zhig ngos bsgrub bya// rigs gsum la yang hU~M yig dang// mo yig yi shes rigasa mchog yin// sngags kyi yi ge la sogis rnams//dpral

tsa khar bkod nas rnam bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so// thun bzhi'i sbyor ba la sogs kyis// rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs// so ba dang ni gnas par bya// 'di ni dngos
grub tshul bstan pa'o// sgrub bar ng gi lha yi gzugs// rdo can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs// lta ba'i sgrub pa 'dus pa la// 'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go/ bdag gi sgrub pa'i las can la//
budag po'i gzugs dang yong dag ldan// bstan pa'i dus su rab sgrub pa// gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag ldan// ma stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi// rang lha'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan//
rdo rje phra rab dbye ba yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/ grags par ldan pa'i dngos grub kun// 'di nyid kyis ni byang chub thob// de yi mchog tu bsgrub par bya// dngos grub chen po'i yon
tan 'byung// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces ba sungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po gapi'i sngags thams cad kun las btus
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u stanyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sur yang 'dus par gyur nas/ phyagan
pha byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ gsung gi rdo rje chos kyis gsung gi lam nges par bskyod pa'i rdo rje tshul 'di ston par
mdzad do// gsang ba dag pa dmigs pa med// yengashes yon tan kun gyi gzhi// kun nas ye shes bdag med pa// gsang ba'i ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba'i de nyid/
don dang ldan// mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsho che// kun nas 'dod pa yang dag 'byung// rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gso bo'i yo shes ji ltar gnas// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa// rigs kyis
rol phyin pa thob// byang chub spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can kun skyes can gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab bzhugs mdzad// rang bzhin dag pa dag pa'i mchog/ sems can skyob la
phyag 'tshal bstod// chos sku thor pa chen po ste// yid bzhin nor bu mthong ba che// sems can kun dgyes byed pa po// dag pa'i spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang yid bzhin nor bu'i dam tshig
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpas/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i mthong ba'i ngos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par
so sor 'dod par bya ba gang ji ltar lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// the tshom mad pa mnyam
parangashes// sangs rgyas chos sku 'dod bar bya// the tshom med par 'du shes pa// chos rnams thams cad 'dod par bya// the tshom med par 'du shes pa// 'du byas thams cad 'dod par bya//'di lta ste/
rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi sa la rab tu gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod/
rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshom med pa de bdag go zhes chos thams cad kyang nam mkhar mthong bar gyur to/
rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spyad pa spyod par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di don dam pa'i gsang ba la/
dadapar ji ltar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi 'jig rten khams su sas rgyus bcos ldan 'das rnams su yang dag par byang chub
nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ji ltar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa zams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu ma ngen par rdzogs pa
'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang bas gsol pa/ ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di lta sta/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa'i gzhi'i sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag
na rdo rje'i tshul 'dir blta bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sams dpa' de rnams ya mtshan thob cing dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba thib nas de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so// Ama'o yashes ye shes che//
de rje chen po rab tu mthong// rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi// ye shes mag ni rnam sbyangs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjod bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'dus kyis gats+tsha'i klung gi bye ma dang

mnyam pa'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phyung nas/ shun dang lce la sogs pa'i phyogs mngon par brjod du med pa'i yang mngon par brjod du mdu pa'i gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma sAd kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul
phra rang dang mnyam pa'i sku gsum gyi yang shes kyis gong ba mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon nas byang chub kyi sems la de gsungs so/ byang chub rang bzhin yang dge
thob byang chub sems dpa' snying po byin// nam mkha'i khams la langs sdod pa'i/ rdo rje byang chub rab tu gnas// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la// smras pa dag ni yong pa na// rdo rje'i rang bzhin

shes kyi// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ting nga 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ rdo rje chos la thos par gyur to// sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gang yin pa re mazlong

ngam bcom ldan 'das mthong la gas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje skyas bu chen po de'i sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dbye ba rin po che sgrom bu nges par rig nas/ de bzhin gshegs patham
cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi thugs su zhugs par mdzad do// de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang gi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs nam

mkha' lta bur sbyor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to// de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs yongs su dag pa'i ngo ba nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so/
'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/// mkhan chen thar pa lo tsa ba'i phyag

dpa'i gseb nas shog yar lnga byung ba sngar bsgyur ba las/ phyis nyung stong smon 'gro'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpa lhag ma rnams red nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum

gyi tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pa'i dag ba'i bshes gnyen chen po/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i tshulaM la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal
bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing spyin bdag mdzad nas/ bu ston gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan no// rgyud yin rgyud ltar bcos pa yis// chos min sun dbyung bya phyir

[G• ]dang dam tshig snang ba sprul ba'i phyir// ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags// 'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang// rgya dpe'i dpa dpang mared cing// don zab sgron rtogs dka' la// saMspyi tal ma byang bso// sgradon
ji bzhin ma 'byor pa'i// nongs de mkhas rnams bzoda mdzad cing// phyis 'byung skad gnyis smra rnams kyis/ ma dag shesan bcos par zhu// rgyud chen 'din bsgyur ba las// dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa//
da yis mtha' yas 'gro ba kun// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig/ ba/ @#// rgyagar skad du/ AranIlAm bo d+ha rab dzra pA Ni'u dra hridI na taNanam/bodaskad du/

'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag pogasum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam

par 'joms pa bdud kyi sde dang lhan cig tu 'og min gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen po lag na rdo rdzogos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung ga

bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba 'di lag na rdo sa zung zhig cis bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag bye ba dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba mtsho ba

ga gtsigs pa dang 'tsham nga/ mig ma mdang gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs ma lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ pad+madang chu lhas lag pa dang dpung pa brgyan pa/ nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan

pa6 sbrul rin po che 'bar ba'i cod pan thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang ' dga' bo 'bar bas sAn cha byas pa/ rkang pas sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba mnan cing za ba/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ sbrul

nag po si ral khar thogs pa/ bzhin rgyas pa smin ma khro gnyer dubasdus pa/ ya sos ma mchumanan pa/ lce glog ltar 'gyur nga/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ gsus po che sprul za ba/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpage

tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang nga 'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma'i stong na bzhugs pa/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ a la la zhes bsgrags pas skrag par byed pa/ klu thams cad rlag par byed
pa gad rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'dul bar byed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes byang chub sems dpa' phyag na

rje sa bstod nas gsung du gsol zhes sas so// de nas nam mkha' de nyid la gzhal yas khang dang/ 'khor le chen po'i tingang 'dzin dang ldan pa'i dragayo chen pos 'khor bsdus nas/ phyag na rdo rje drag po chu/

rje rje khro ba drag chen 'joms// rdo rje gazi brjid sngags kyi gtso// rdo rje mi thub 'jigs byed che// rdo rje 'phrin las kun don mdzad// thabs 'dul 'khor lo che sku la/[0f7c]'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid che/
'a// mdzes ldan 'od zer can dang ni// mdangs can sgra dbyangs rlung 'byin te// sbyong byed las kun sgrub pa la// 'gugs shing sdud dang sdom zhi mdzad// mtha'i brtul las rnamus/
sgrub pa la// thig le'i rang bzhiname shigs la// kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las// khogegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad nga// 'khor lo'i bdag po khyod la bstod// sa bon rang tu 'bar pa yis//
tha'os dang shes rab bsrag gso mdzad// bde chen rab tu gsol mdzad nas// sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'joms la 'dud// oM a kA ro mu khaM sam+bad+harma NaM A pyanut+pan+na twAtaoM AhU~M/ zhes bcom
ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bsod nas 'dud do// byang chub sems dpo' phyagan rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas 'khor rnams sngos da/ da nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das legs so
legs so// de'i phyir 'di'i gsang sngags sa thams cad sgrub pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa/ drag pa gsum 'dul ba 'di gsung du gsol zhes brjod nas bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'khor
rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dug go/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klungag bum snyad kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig sngags 'di gdug pa can rnams 'du ba'i don du brjod

par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye// i daM nIlAm re d+ha sha rI raM badzra pA Ni hri da yaM/ ya/ sa mA ti kraA tatho/ mA ku la utasA danaM b+ha bi pati/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ bi bud+d+ha'i bud+d+hA/ mAti

kram tha/ ha ra ha ra nAgAnaM/ pra sa ra pra par nAgAnI/ m+mats+tshim nAg sr-id yAni/ b+hi dbyi danAg mam+ma Ni/ bi shItsan+ta nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi spo Ta yanAg na yanAni hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ hU~M phaT/ nAg bi dA ra NA ya hU~M phaT/

nAgotasA nganA yahU~M phaT/ nIl ba sanA ya hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha tAb la par kra mA ya hU~M phaT/ kr-itwaMtI ya hU~M phaT/ kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya hU~M phaT/ ro Sha Na ya hU~M phaT/ trA sa nA ya hu piT/ kuny+tsaN TotasA de nA ya hUM

phaT/ pra tapi shA tsinAsha ka ra ya hU~M phaT/ kA apa snarapinAsha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ has bus/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mAr yAmA ra yA/ nAsha yanAngasha ya/ sam+ba big+hAn bi nA sha ka rA yahU~M phaT/ sam+ba sha trasaM b+ha bi

nA asha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ oM nA lAlpa ra d+ha ra badzra pA NirAdz+dzA pa ya ti swAhA/ de'i chagani gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa latshul sngags btab ste gtor na gtang bar 'gyur ro// klu blug par byed na smag shad kyi
lcag ma 'am/ bal po sa'u'i lcag mas bya'o// yi dgaso dang brjod byed rnams la ni skud pas bya'o// rims nad mad par bya ba dang/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa lani skud pa sngon pos bya'o/
ni'i 'dod pa la zhag gcig paM bar 'dug ste sos bdugs ni rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston no// mchod rten sku gdung dung ldan pa'i drung du ma tog sngon po la sogs pas/
mchod la sngags stong bzlas nas[“]gsol ba btab na gsar gyi dong tsho bdun stong sbyin par byed do// rgyas btab pa 'grol bar 'dod na thal bos bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na nyungs kar gyis bya'o//
'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba la na rtsi mar rnying pa dang/ thal ba dang/ nyungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung nga'i mdud pa//
[G• ]byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun bzlog par

'dong na sas bya'o// dug lani rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o// bdag srung ba mni yid kyis sam chus bya'o// gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pas bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni gcig gam 3
gsum mam/ lan bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ bsgyurtsa brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dang 'a phyagan rdo rje dang/ bdud
dpung dang bcas pa rjes su yi rang ste bstan pa la 'khod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//bal po'i paN+Di ta do
apu N+ya mati ngang/ latsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'i// #// rgya gar skad du/ ru dra dri ta gu phyab wa ra ti bI na ya nAm/ bod skad du

gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba// 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje yis// gsang ba'i don 'di yang dag zhus// sgrub dang gnas dang mtshan

[. 7o nyid gang// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// shes rab snying rje gsang dbang ldan// lcags 'dra'i ri dang bya skyobs dang// nags tshal 'thug dang mchod rten nang// zhal gsum phyag drug 'khrigs
pa che mchob gtsigs pa nag po ste// dkar po g.yas tu khros pa'i mdog/ hU~M sgrogs ma lce 'bar ba'i dbugs// dmar saragayon tu bzhad pa'i zhal// sbyin dmar me dpung dang 'dra ba// zla ba rgyas
pa lta bu'i zhal// nor rgyas dung skyong sar pos dbu// dga' bo nye dga' sAn tshe des na// dpung pa pad+machu lha dkar// sa ral 'dab bzang rigs ldan gnag/ tsham rngam rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang/
thal^amos bdud 'joms sprul nag 'dzin// zhal gsum pa ste 'jigs pa che// sku gsum dag gis rab tu mtshan// pho nya gsum gyis gdug pa 'dul/ klu yi gnyenapa'i gnod sbyin bdag/ bdud

'dul tshangs pa'i pho nya ni// zla dang nyi ma dag gi stong// glang chen kar ka gsar gyi gdan// brgyabyin sar po rdo rje 'dzin// tshangs pa ral gri pad+ma'adzin// klu 'dul sbrul nag 'dzin pa 'o// bdud 'dul
dbang po nyi ma'i stong// gnod sbyin zla dang stobs kyi sde// ku 'dula'i steng rgya mtsho'i nang// sbrul nag 'khyil ba stobs ldan te// mkha' dang ri bos mnan pa'i stong// gser mdog stobs ldan gnyis/

kyi gdan// brgyad khrirazhabs bzhag ri rab mnan// me dpung sku la 'khrugs pa'i 'od// khams gsum khyab mdzad khro ba 'phro// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
ba// ni[…]jo rjem dpung 'od dang ldan/ de nyid mkha' dang 'a byung pa las// dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gnas// bdag po'i sa bon las byung ba// bla ni thod pa rdo rje las// dug po'i rtags/

sngon po can sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM badzra pA Ni ma hA yakAnIlI bar dahani badzrahupha/ gangazhig ting 'dzin rnal 'byor de//
nyes pa kun las rab tu thar// legs ba'i yon tan thams cad 'thob// 'bras bu yang dag mngon par 'grub// sngags ni gang yin ming yin te// gdul bya'i many+dza' dang ldan pa la// mtha' ma las
sngags many+dza' dang ldan// le'u bzhi pa'o///de nas gos sngon po can 'khor lo mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so//
'byung bzhi'i sangs rgyas rab bsgoms nas// so sor las kyis sgom pa ni// ma brgyang rlung gnyis ldan par bsam// chu brgyad dngos po nyid yin te/ de bzhin sa brgyad hU~M 'bras ldan// rlung pargyad ma
gnyis ldan pa ste// 'bras bu rim gyis gnod sbyin gtso// sgrub pa sngags bzhin mngon par 'grub// e dang so so'i mtha' dang ldan// ma la gong masa mngon pa ra 'grub//rgyun du rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
bzlas// le'u lnga pa'o///de nas 'phags pa gos sngon gyis// las bcu mngon par 'grub par ni// ting nga 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//las bcu'i sbyin sreg 'di gsungs so/
zhi nAni'u sa// smras pa lug ru 'o// dbang la bar kaMru'o// drag pa mA la gsum paraldan// thapa khung dbyibs ni las bzhi ste// shing ni rigs dang sbyar bar bya//
zhil dkar po'i shing rnams te// rgyu'agag shing la sogs pa 'o// gang la sa ltangashing bsags te// drag po tshar ma can gyi shing// gzhan ni tsan dan shing sabyas// khrab khung 'dab brgyad dbyibs

hulaT/ le'u drug pa'o///de nas dpal ldan rdo rje'adzin// gdul dka' ba ni gdul ba'i mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can// drag po chen po rab 'bar ba'i// ting nga
'dzin la snyoms zhugs s// 'khor gyi glu tshogs dbang bsdus te// nyin rnams zlog pa'i tsho gar gsungs// gnas khang rim pa gsum dag la// phyi rol sla bsags dbAl bar bya// bar duphyi nang/
khrus byas te// mnyes pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// nang du bum po'i dbang bskur bas// nyen rnams klog la the tshom med// kye ho nyon rnams gdul ba'i mchog/ amo gsang chen drug po che// e ma ma'us
'jigs pa can// e ma gsang sngags rnala'abyor tshe// phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phyogs bral khro bo khyodaphyag 'tshal// le'u bdun pa'o////de skad ces gsungs nas
'khor thams cad dga' ba'i rjes la 'disnyadaces bka'astsal to// thams cad ldan pa'i gtor m la// ra gyis skyungs nas yaM gis khus// khagis bkrus tedag kha la// khaM las bdud rtsi chu rgyu bskyed//
yaMraMdabab pa'i sbyor bar bya// dza yis bkug ste gtor sar bstim// bsam gtan lha mos mchod pa 'bul// de nas 'khor la 'di skadabasgos// ngani khro'i gos sngon can// sangs rgyas thams cad 'os
pa'i sku// sangs rgyas kun gyi khyin gyis brlabs// dbang bskur mchog thob nga yis sku// ci sta nga yis dam 'angasan// gtor ma dug gi rang bzhin gyis// khyed rnams thal ba rdul du rlog/ gal
mtshigaM ma 'dasan// gtor ma ye shes bdud rtsi yis// khyed kyi sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// nges par legs pa'i yon tan thob/ o AkA romu khaM sawad+hamANaM/ ar+ya nuta panan tAta AhUM swAhA/
le'u brgyad pa'o/de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i bdag po des// bsam gtan 'khor lo ming pa la// sngagasakyi nges par bshad par bya// tad+ya thA/

de nas klu dgugapa'i sngags bstan te/ rdo rje lcags kyu rlung gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin ma yis kyang ni 'dul bar nus pa yin// de ltar nus phyir dgug pa'i
ni bshad par bya// o badzrapA Nim AyaM ka nIlaM ba ra nAg hU~M/ grogagrabyAhU~MphaT/ A kar ya A kar ya hU~M phaT/ bsam gtan drag pos bzlas pa bya// bzlas pa 'di la rab 'bod bya// klu rigs du ma thams

bsra zhing dug rnams gzhomo// sman gyi mchog gis gsosanas ni// gang gnodaphyogasasu gshegs su gsol// le'abcupa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// zhi ba'i las kyis/

dkyil du gzir// yungs kar yungs nag sa tsha yis// brdeg cing khra bo'i sal pa sngo/ khra spyang la sogs rtsa lnga'i gsob// gcan gzan sna tshogs mamasngaradang// mchu sngar dbab cing sprul pa go

rgyas mdzad ma// khadza dz+ha pa rA me hU~M/ sArol togam// bdag nyid yongs su bkra mdzad m// badzra pu dza mahU~M/ sIr dri chab ma// bdag nyid dngos po dga mdzad m// badzrag pa dza ma hU~M/ hUM rdo rje
dma' ma ma// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad ma// badzra A lo ka pA dzamahU~M/ ji srid thams cad mchod pa che// ji srid mchod pa bdab che// ji sridamachodapa bla na med// ji srid
mchod pa yang dag che// e maho/ le'u bcug nyis pa'o///donas gzhan yong bshad bya ba// bcom ldan gsang ba gos sngon can// bsdu ba thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/
wA 'khor gyi klu rnams sduda mdzad nas// ma yi 'khor lo soms zhugs tshe// gsangab ma yi sngags bzlas pas// ku rnams ma lus tshig par mdzad// bral nas dpag tshade gnas su bros// slar bsdus bdud
rtsi sman gyis gsos// las bcol soso'i gnas su 'khod// de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol// ma brgyad 'khor lo'i bdag nyid che// rtag tu ma yi ting 'dzin/

la snyoms zhugs khyod ni rgyal gyur cig/ bde ba'i rol mo ma glong du// srog mdzad m brgyud khyod phyag 'tshal// rang bzhin rnam dag khyod phyag 'tshal// muyi ngang la gnas 'dod na// mubargyad ting 'dzin
la gnas te// de tsho 'khor gyis 'di skad bstod// chu brgyud 'khor lo'i bdag nyid che// rtag ba chu yi dkyil 'khor can// 'byung ba'i gtsobo'i chu yi bdag/ chu brgyud mapa'i bdag khyod phyag 'tshal/
rlung brgyud ting 'dzin la gnas ni// 'thor zhi 'bud pa'i bdag nyid che// rlung chen drag khortsal shugs ldan// rlung lha gos sngon khyod phyag 'tshal// sa yi ting 'dzin la gnas nas// mi g.yo
la brtan ba'i las mdzad pa// gser ldan 'ol mo sna tshogs ldan// sa brgyud 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u bcu gsum pa'o/// de nas dpal ldan gos sngon

mtha' 'das rang bzhin med// de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can// 'dod chags ting 'dzin la gnas pas// 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mngapo kun// sngangs dang dus dang brgyal ba las// bslang lta bu
mad don bstan pas// thams cad 'dod chags mngon sangs rgyas// 'khor gyis sku la mngon par bstod// kye ho gsang bdag gos sngon can// bla med rdzogs pa'i klong dkyil na// 'dod chags dag ]
pa'i blo ldan pas// mngon par sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u bcubazhi pa'o////de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// 'khor gyi gtso la mngon par bstod// lcang lo

can gyi pho brang nas// gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can// yon tan thams cad sku la rdzogs// dngosamad dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// 'khor gyi klu tshogs 'dul ba'i phyir// klu brgyad sku la rab brgyan nas/
klu tshogs zhal du gsol mdzad pa// klu 'dul byams pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogis dag pa'i sku mnga' zhing// rigs drug sde brgyud 'dul bar mdzad// skyon gyis ma gos rang sangs rgyas// thogs med/
dkun 'dul phyag 'tshal bstod// ji ltar bsam pa'i dngos po kun// khyod las 'byung bas mi zad gter// sna tshogs yid bzhin 'phrul po che// yid bzhin nor bu khyod phyag
'tshal// nad dang rims kyi gshed po mdzad// nor dang bras kyi bdag po mdzad// 'jigs pa kun las skyobo par mdzad// bla med skyob mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes bstod nas rjes su yi rang ngo//
wA lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa'i ng yid dga' ba'i mchod pas khyab par gyur to// mi la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa'i zhen dang ldan pa thams cad bde ba la bkod do// le'u gtso
'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga de rje be con gyi rgyud rdzogs so///de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'khor de dag la rnam pa
rgyu gzigs nas rang nyid mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lasnyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu srid pa gsum yang rnam par g.yos so//
denas rang nyid su dang gsung dang/ thugs rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje las sngags 'di phyung ngo// oM namo/ gsang sngags rgyal po sbas tsam gyis// sa sngang lha rnams brgyal bar gyur// klu rnams

ka kun tu skrag nas ni// gsang bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje ldan zhing mos pa brtan M// gus shing byang chub sems ldan pa'i// phyogs su 'gro bas yid gnas pa'i// lha dang bla maMmanyamamachod cing
[ma ]brtson 'grus shes rab che ba des// rang nyid dang ni gzhan dag tu// bde zhing nyams dga'i ri phug gam// tshal lam mtsho'am ljongs rnams su// sa yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag paru// byas nas dri chus
legs khyugs nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te// gsang ba'i bdag po bsgrub par bya// gzhan ni ri khrodartsub pa las// dur khrod ya ma'i khang pa yang// 'khrug cing g.yang dang bcas pa dang/
rgyal pos bzung zhing gtum mo rgyu// 'jigs pa'i phyogs nas gang dga rnams/ (rgyal ba sgrub pa'i gnas yin// dus 'dir byung ba'i blo zhan rnams// 'jig rten 'di yi g.yeng ba dang//
gas thams cad skyed par byed/ chags pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid ni// yang dag mi rtog de ni skyon// sprul pa'i glang po dang mtshungs so// stong nyid spros med rang bzhin las// sgyu ma'i sku ni yongs
'byung zhing// dang po stong nyid rdo sku// gnyis pa lani yi ge// gsum pa rdo rje rtse dgu pa// bzhi pa bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ lnga pa lhani yongs su rdzogs// me long dang ni aMnyam nyid dang//
chos dbyings ye shes las grub pa'i// sku niye shes bdag nyid do/ de rdzogs yo shes chen po'o// yo shes sa las ye shes kyis// sprul pa'i ng ye shes nyid du gnas// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs las
'das nas// mi rtog ye shes phung po la// gsang ba'i bdag nyid legs par bzhugs// rnam grol rnam dag grol ba'i rgyu// sngags dbyibase chos bdag don rnal 'byor// skad cig skad cig ye shes las//
smyu ma lta bu'i skyama'i sku// sgyu ma nyid la rnam grol tshe// khyed dpa' bo che// glu yi sgrar gyur 'jigs byed pos// gsang ba'i bdag kho rdadzacan// nyon mongs las rgyas 'jikA/
su rung// dbang phyug khams gsum las rgyal ba'i de bas brtson ldan gang yin des// shin tu sgrub bas bsgrub par bya// bstan pa'i yid sos par byed pas// rgyal ba gsang ba'i bdag po 'o///

de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid das grub nges par 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje las byung ba/ oM badzra pA Ni
sarba arba sid+hi ku ru ku ru swAhA/ lha klu mi min driza 'am// yang na mi yi bu mo yi// dpral bar thig le bris nas ni// lag tu lcags kyu thogs la gzhug/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// brten
nas bum pas bsgrub par bya// rnam par rgyal ba'i khum pa ni// sman la sogs bas legs bkang nas// las kyis dkris la gzhag par bya// rgyun du de las bsgrubs gyur na// zhi dang rgyas sogs

dngos grub dang/ gzhan yang dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po mi 'gyur bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i

stags 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje yang dag pa las nges par phyung ngo// u0f00 nagu nAg bro ti ga ma Ni// tsa ra pa ri ya ra bA ra bya bar ni shrI// rin chen snod du chu blugs nas// sngags kyirgyal po
'di la ni// brgyanas ji srid stong gi bar// brjod na 'gro ba'i dug nad sel// gzhan yang gsang sngags rgyal po ni/ gsang ba'i bdag po sbyor ba dang// khams pas mang du brjod byas nas/
bsgrubs pas ci yang 'grub par 'gyur/ zla ba spyang kis bzung dus su dpa ba bar go ro tsa nas thig le byas te/ kha shar phyogs su gyur nas gsang sngags 'di brjod na ci 'dod pa dbang du byed do/
mngozla ba 'am nyi ma ga bas bzung ba'i tsho klu'i gan nas mi khrag gis lus byugs te sngags 'di brjod na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di la the tsom med do// gzhan yang sbyor ba bshad bya ba//
gur kum dang ni ga'u lung gis// rtsibs brgyad pa yi 'khor lo la// dang po'i sngags bzhi dag dang ni// tha ma'i sngags rnams bri bar bya// mu khyud gnyis la rtsa ba yi// gas sngags rgyal bor rim gyis
bri rin chen snod bzhag mchod byas nas// gsang sngags stong sogs brjod nas nii// rgyal mtshan rtse la gdags par bya/ gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed// gal te char pa dbab par 'dod na

sa'i dkyil 'khoragrubazhi par byas te/ dbus su pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la/ de'i steng du klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyigazugs byas te bzhag la/ rang nyid khro bo'i rgyal po gos sngon po can du byas te/
sma na sna tshogs dang/ 'o ma dang/ 'bras chan dang/ zho la sogs pa rnams dang/ kar dang bu ram la sogs pas mchod nas gos dkar po'agos te/ hu 'brug gi sgra lta bu brjod pas mgo 'dren pa'i
gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brjod bas char 'bebs par byed do// gal te mi 'bebasan klu rnams bsdigs pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor de'i stang du khrag sna tshogs dang// dug/
shing la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// des myur du char 'bebs par byed do// gal temar chas pa 'am/ sor ba gcad par 'dod pas nyar shing dang dug ka da pa'i rtsa ba la yi gi bris te/ dkyil
sh+tsa 'khor dkar po'i dbus su btsugs la yungs kar dang thalab lamang du bzlus par bya'o// gal te mi 'dod nabasngags pa tsam gyis kyang nges par 'byung ngo// rta'i khrag dang dug sa sna tshogs
kyis bskyal ba sos par byed do// rlung zhi bar 'dod na dbang phyug gi gos latsa ta pa la ri rtsa bas sngags bris te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhi g nas/ sngags kyi rgyal po stong la sogs pa ci
rgyunus pa brjod nas khang pa'i stang du bzhag na rlung zhi bar byed do// gal te yams zhi bar 'dod pas gur kum dang/ gi'u wang gis rtse mo bcu gnyis bar bris nas dang po'i sngags rnams dang/
thama'i sngags rnams rtsibs la bris te// mu khyud la sngags lhag ma bris te ma tog dang 'bras bu ser po thams cad kyis mchod cing gsol ba btab nas gtsug lag gi rtse mo 'am/ dge 'dun gyi
'du ba'i sgo gang la ba tags na ci 'dod pa 'grub cing nad yams thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// gal te bu 'dod pas sa'i skya dmar po'i gdong bu la stangadu sbyin srag byas na bu starab r nges so//
0 gal te gter 'dod pas sa 'am rin po chal rnam thos sras kyi gzugs khru gang ba byas nas/ rin po che'am sang leb kyi steng du bzhag nas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul nas gsol ba btaban
zhag bdun na rin po che ster ra byed do// gal te shi bar dogs pas dkyil 'khor khru gang zlum po sar por byas nas/ dbus su bum pa legs par gzhag pa'i nang du smanasna tshogs blugs nas rus
dkar pos kha bkab par byas te/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po mang du brjod nas byis bum pa la dngos grub blangasan ci 'dod pa 'grub bo// de ltar yang yang byas pas tshe'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro//
gal te mchog grub par 'dod pas sa 'am rin po che la phyag na rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gdan pad+madang nyi ma la gnas par byas nas/ de rin po che'i snod du bzhag la/ maN+Dal dkar po
