yis de ni nges par rmos pa'i 'gyur// oM mA nu nga duwan+taM b+hanahU~M/ sgyu ma dbang du sdud byed na// sbyor ba 'di nyid brtsam par bya// ngos 'jam rdul dang zla ba dang// bgegs kyi gnyen po'i khu
ba dang// sgog chen las kyi khu bas su// byed pa gnyis g par sbrul la// de lamathun pa nyid la ni// yongs su bsal bas sbyin par bya// de nas nges pa dus btab la// kha sbyor ba yis
yang dag bsngags// o na kA mA de ba ya ya ya ka5ka ka la siny+tsa b+ha g+ha bi par ta na sAhA/ amu kaM/ 'bum du dang por bstan pa yos/ sbyor ba nges par sadapar bya// nor dag sgrub par 'dod
pan nor 'dzin lha mo yongs su bri// kha dog ser po nyid la// phyag bzhi pa ni bri bar bya// zhal gcig nu ma 'bur ba la// g.yas kyi dang po ting 'dzin pa// gnyis pa 'bras kyis ma
'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po nyid nani// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams// gnyis pas ne'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams// de lta bu yi gzugs byas la// sna tshogs dri yis yang dag mchod//
mchod pa rnam pa lnga drug dang/ na bza' dar la sogs pa yis// yang dag pa ru mchod par bya// zhag grangs brgya rtsa brgyud pa ru/ yongs sukhasan pas sngags bzlas bya// de nas grub par
gyur pa'i rtags// de nyid g.yo bar gyur pa yis// de grub rten ni red par ni// de yis lus n ston par 'gyur// de nas dbyig ni mi bzad pa'i// bdag po ma de nges par 'gyur// ma rungs pa dag sgor
gzhug na// sbyor ba 'di dag nges par brtsam// de yis kun grags nyid dang ni// khu chen sa la sogs pa la// sngags 'di yisani 'bum du bzlas// de nas bsan pa yongs las pas//
yid ches dung la spu gu na// sor bdun dag la dug blugs te// skud pa sngon pos rab brtsis la// nub phyogs dag tu nges par gdags// dani 'byung bsakhaskyodapa na//
mi denges par smyo bar 'gyur// oMm kAlaMya saM b+ha u na ma ta ya/ a mu kaMsalcal swA mi rnams nges par mi gsal bas// rdo rjemo ni yongs su sgrub// sa la phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad
dur mig banu gnyis bris byas la// ma rig pa sogs rtags kyi ni// dngos po yang dag bri bar bya// de nas sngags pas rab bsngags la// bsam pe rab tu rdzogasabyas la// de khyed
dngos po gang yin pas// bsam pa sbyar bas ma tog bor// gang du bab pa de'i gnas la// shes rab can gyis rnam par dpyad// bzang ngan ltas rnams yongs su bar// rig pa legs
par sdus pa yidis/ ba yi lci bas rab gtums la// dang por gnyis su shes par bya// ring du bye brag med pa yis// bcom pa sngon du bzhag byas te// dang por mchod pas yang dag mchod/
'o smang dag yongs su btsugs pa yis/ shes rab bcu gsum bdag nyid can// dmar po gos kyis bskrun byas la// khrus dug legs par byas pa dang/ 'dri yas legs par byugs byas la//
dpral ba thig le dmar po gdab// me tog dri zhim dmar po nyid// de yi lag tu sbyin par bya// de yis de la blang bar bya// de yis dngos po gsal bya ste// khazang ngan ltas su nges par ston//
ta spyiran sna tshogs gdon lani// 'bar ba chen po'i sngags bzlas bya// gu gul nag po'i dud pa dag/ de yi sna ru bdug byas la// nyungs kar gu gulam tog dang// de yi snying pos bsreg par bya/
de yis nad pa gang yin pa// bgegs dang nges par bral bar 'gyur// srin lag nyid la skud pani// sngon bos yang dag bsdam par bya// spyi bo'i sku las srad bu gang// bcings pas sngags
ninges par bzlas// 'khrugs pa'i sde dge rgyal 'dod ni// khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po yis// 'bum du bzlas pas bstan pa bya// de nas a mra'i lo ma las/ yung bas yongs su
bris byas la// gi'u wang gisani rab tu skul// cod pan spyi bor gtums byas la// rang nyid sku ru bsgoms byas la// lag pa g.yas pas 'uras gar dang// sku tshe thul bar sbyar byas
la sngags bzlas sdigs mdzub phyar ba yisaM// yongs su bris par sngo rgyal 'gyur// rnal 'byor po yis bdag nyid la// 'chi ba bslu ba yang dag bya// 'dab gi rgyud la 'chi ltasani// phyi
nang banuganyis yang dag ldan/ bdag gi brang la sha mtshan dug/ dmar po byung bar gyur pa na// sum cu gnyis zhag 'chi 'gyur bus// rig pa'i rgyal pa'i sngags kyis su// de la srog
blugs stong dun//tshang bar byas pas de bzlog 'gyur// de dang cha 'thun gang yin pa// rkan lo 'brum bu gsum pa dang// lce yi rtse mor ba dang// rdo rje las nas khrag 'dzag dang// 'jig gnyis/
dbugs dag gsum pa dang// ri yi rtse mor shu ba byung// nang gi 'chi ltas nges pa ste// stag dang byi ba 'brug dag dang// rtsangs pa bya gag nag po ru/yongs su sbyor bas
rig pa bzlas// gi'u wung 'ug pa rus sbal dang// tsas pa ka dang ut+palo dang// seng ldeng phur bu gang yin dang// 'ug pa'i sgro la sbyor ba dang// bya rog mkha' la 'phur ba yi// dkar pos bdag
la phog pa ni// tshe yi 'chi ltas yin pas na// gong du grags pa'i sar song la// rig pa la sogs sbyor ba yis// yongs su bzlog par bya ba yin// mkha' la sna lta mthong ba dang// chu la mi
gzugs mthong gyur na/ kagin tu sdig pa'i ltas su bstan// rmi lam la ni stag zhon la// mchod rten nyid la 'dzegs pa dang// sang ga'i khar ni zhugs rmis pa// yongs su sdig pa'i ltas
yin pas// logs shig go ra mo rtsa gsum dang// bse ru'i phyogs dang kun da'i 'dab/ yon tan mtsho mtshan bzang dang// sku mched 'phags lam chu srin mo// lo gsum zhag bzhi zla ba
lngarang mi de nges par 'chi bas na// rig pa'i rgyal mo bdud rtsi 'khyil// rten 'brel yi ge ba nga yis// sngags kyis smanu la bsrung ba bya// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'jig rtenamagon// dedug
gi ni sIng po yis// stag sogs so la nges par bzlas/ rma bya chen mo'i sngags dag gis/ 'ug pa'i sgo sogs nges par bsngags// phyagan rdo rje 'jam dbyangs dang// stobs chen khro bo gang
sapa/ dag gis// sngags kyis seng ldeng 'ug sgro dang// ku sha byi la la sogs dang// gsob la sngags pas yongs su bzlog/ gtor m sbyin sreg las kyis ni// yongs su bzlog par bya ba yin// shin tu/
dpal dang dad par ldan// shes rab che dang thos pa bsags// bla ma la gus gtong bar yod// ltung ba la sogs gtsang ma la// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur nas// tshogs kyi 'khor lo lnga byas la//
shes rab ldan pa bstanabya ba'i// gsang ba drag pa'i rgyud rgyal 'di// gzhan la bshad par bya ba min// gsang ba drag po khyod kyis ni// phan dang gnod bya gang yin pa// rim pa bzhin du shes pa yis/
legs par spyi dang bshad pa ni// gnas skabs du ma dang ldan zhing// kun la nges par zhugs pa yis// rgyud 'di la ni nges par brtag/ rgyud 'di gang na gnas pa na// sa phyogs de yi gdug pa rnams//
ring du bsrings pas gnas mi byed// gal te gnas par byed pa na// de rnams kun gyi rgyud tshig 'gyur// drag po rgyud kyi rgyal po la// gang zhig zhugs par gyur pa la// dug gsum sku la rab brgyan nas//
btsun mo'i b+ha ma la gnas te// nyon mongs 'khor gyis rab bskor nas// bde ba chen po'i rol pas gnas// lag nas de nyid du// skad cig tsam gyis bskor ba ni// 'bum phrag gsum du rub
bskor nas// bde bar gshegs la 'di skad gsol// bdag gi rgyud kyi rgyal bo 'di// nges pa'i don dang rab sbyar nas// gsang ba nyid du sba bar bgyi// lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i
rgyud las/ las sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje ma lce'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs

yas kyis 'di skad ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das bdag ges sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung
bar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi'o// char chudus su dbab cing lo tog thams cad bsrung bar bgyi'o// nad dang/ dgra dang/ gdon thams cad gzhom
par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa ltar bgyid pa las bzlog par mi bgyid du// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal la// legs so legs so// klu'i rgyal

khu khe swAhA/rang rang las dang 'brel ba ni// 'bum 'gyur sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur//las gzhan dngos grub ma bsgrubs par// lhamo khyod kyis byed ba yin// ri ni gsang ba ras pa sta//ches gsang
bas kyang mchog yin no//de bas ma khyod la bshad/ khacom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje gasang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ mumasgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhu
drug bgo//dpa' mo de bdams gsol/rdo rje 'chang gi las sna tshog sab sgrub ba ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//mdzesemakhyod kyis zhus pa legs//
zag med bde ba'i 'byung ma// bdagamed shes bam yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis logs khar nyon// sgrub po phunasum tshogs 'dod pas// nga nyid thog ma mnyes bya ste// 'dod pa'i rdzas la lar
'khrigi de yi nang du chud pa yi// longs spyod ming dang sal brisas// bkug la bcug la sngags 'di bzlas// o tsatsAm hA bo Na/ tad+ya thA/ o tsa la pra tsal/ la lA lu te yA/ deb kam hA kA la

ba AnAtshar ya bi sI sAhA/ khri bzlas pas rang ci'aded pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gong bu dbug pa'o// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin bsams la/tapa'i lam la yi rab kyi 'khor lo byas te/zur du hU~M dang 'i bar du bsgrub
bya'i yid khrilo// lte bar sngags bri/ rtsibs la'ang sngags bris te/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan cing/ o tsanamahA ro paNatsamuts+tshidam ka yiwi/ nan hU~M/ btsapa mahU~M// deb dat+tatshegayomo pa shi ro

sahA zhes khri bzlas pas rkang pa dgug pa'o/ u0f00 tsaN+Da ma hA ro paNagag sa'i ga ga pa ta'i sAhA/ sngags 'di bzlas la kha bkrusal/ khyu mchog gi lci ba dang ldeng nges bsres lardo rje'i gzugs byas te/
lte bar 'khrul 'khor ba drug la dgra'i sgo srasan 'chi bar 'gyur// bklags pas 'grub 'gyur nus pa 'di// derje 'dzin par ba zhugs nas// rdza mkhan lag ba'i 'dag pa la// rdo rje'i rnam par/

'khrul 'khor bcar// o tsaN+Da ma hA ro Shachag mo mu kha ti dzI tes/ g+hatshanati/ g+ha daM tuM/ lo lho laM hU~M/ mu tramu rI NaMche ge mo b+han+d+hami sAhA/ sngags 'di khri bzlas khang pa mnan/ nges par
gshags las rgyal bar 'gyur// oM badzra tsaN+Dam hA ro Sha Nam kha be ra ya/ tsir tsari/ ka ta ru tu po namu ri/ tu te paM d+ha si ri kha li sAhA/ rdo rje la ni khrag gis bri/ gang gi phyogs mtshams
smras pa na/ byi ba kha ni 'ching ba yin// oM tsan+d+hamahA ro lamanaMtu na si ri si ri/ kha li khi sAhA stag gi pags pa la bris te// gang la btags pa'i spyang ki srung// o tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaNam

rak+Sha to/ nAsha ka rA ya sAhA/ shing thog la brdzus ra bar spus// smra 'u gnod pa bzlog par 'gyur// otsan+d+ham hA ro Sha nas ni+Da hUM b+ha ya dubu swAhA/ sbrang rtsi bu ram khu ba la/ 'di bzlas byugs

pas dom 'bros so// o tsats+tshAm hA ro paNabA rA ha b+hinaM tuM tuM d+he swawA/ dug dang lan tshwa skatshe dang// yungs kar la phugs bon dang// da du ra dang kal bi dang/ mahe phag dang lce sbyang khrag/

smras la rdo rje brgyad byas la// phyogs mtshams sbas na gnod pa zhi// mtshams gcad pa yi dam pa yin// o badz+dzatsaN+Da ma hA ro nga Nab+hid+ha ti ni kaM b+hi swAhA/ sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na//
nub/ de kun rgyun/ srung ba'i yang mtshams bcad pa yin// oM ba ti pa na hi/ b+hi bi Ta bi Ta hUM hUM swAhA/ sngags 'di gang yin lci ba la// bzlas te ma he bzung ba'i chu// nang bcug zho rnams
brlag par 'gyur// gser me la ma reg pa// g.yumig ma phug pa/ mu tig/ mu men/ gser gyis bris pa'i khrom/ babya/ mu'i/ btsan dug/ gu gul/ gi'u wang/ spe'u'i spus gtums la/

'dzatsaN+DamahAyongaN ga sa tsa le bdud tA mA ra ya/ badzrab+ha ti ga ru Da bag tsi'i dzapra dzanAgar dzamA ra ya hU~MphaT/ sngags khri bzlas te lus la bcangasanaku thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro//o pad+ma
ka pad+ma lnga b.ru Na hUM phaT swahA/ chu gtsam la bzlas te mig bkrus na mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// sug smel dang/ dzAti dang na ga ge sar dang/ a sho ta ka'i 'bras bu rnams la sdug

'di bzlas te dpral bar shu kras thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// oM badzra tsats+tshAmahA ro dzoN dzi b+ha ma ha gi sAhA/ bsgyur rgyud bzlas so// byis pa gsar btsas srung ba na// kham phor

nang du rdo rgyus kyis//rdo rje rgya gram lte ba'i nang/ oM badzra tsaN+NayuhAgong Nache ge molarak+Sha rakA sAnA/ hU~M bcu bris te lha bstim la// mchod sbyin gtor ma sbyin byas te// de yi stong du sbyang bar bya// lus la gu
argyus bris pa'i// 'khor lo gnyis pas bsrung ba/ o badz+dzatsatsamahAko Na bas hadolA lA swAhU~M/ mdo yasAkhatsan mo ha yi satA/ sab dzihAyi nam ta li swAhA/ sngags 'domi tog dang/ gos dang/

shazas dang/ rgyan la mngon par bsngags te byin na dbang du 'gyuro// oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Nanam sa ra namA/ tat+yAt+ta/ d+ha rAmashA[àn]chedu'i de swAhA/ bye ma dang thal chen la bsngags te/ zhing la gtor na srog

chagasakyis za bar mi 'gyur ro/ o badzrasu kha dogi but+tA ali bar tshu liphyiras gagats+tshasA pamahApan+tA li swAhA/ sngags 'dirdzo'i shing dang/ da lasi dang/ an gsum la lan bdun bdun bzlas te/rna ba'i

'og tu bcug na rtswa ra ba thams cad kyis gnod par bya bar mi nus so// mi lus la byas phur bu'i bgegs kyi lus can zhal gcig pa// phyag bzhi thob zhags pa dang// dgra sta rtse gsum bsnams pa ste// dug khrag

lan tshwatshe dang/ rgya tshwa mar nag nang du btso// stobs chen sngags bris nas mas gtums// khyim sgor smras na 'chibar 'gyur// oM badzra kro d+hamahApa la ha na da ha pa tsa bit+tAnas ya ud sA da yamA ra ya hU~M phaTA/

sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i thod pa'i khyi smyon pa'i lce la dgra'i ling ga bris te rta'i da ga pa'i 'og tu bcug la sngags 'di bzlas nas gang gi skor sbyas na bshad pa 'am smyo bar 'gyur// oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha
tshige mo mu pa ta ya phaT/ ces khri bzlas so// shing li dang stag pa lany+dza'i rnam par byas la lte ba'i las kyi rig pa bcug/ pa' bo ga yul du shi ba'i skyo'i gle gus skyed par btags la klad la

bskolan bgegs 'bros par 'gyur ro// groga'i 'dab ma la rdo rje'i nang du chudapa'i lte ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi sngags dang bsrung bya khri// de'i mtha' mar las rab 'byam bri/ de'i 'i bar bstan pa'i 'khor
[rg]// gyi sngags bri/ de'i mthar mngashes lab kyi sngagasakhri/ de'i mtha' mar ma'i tshogs bris te dril la lus la bsus nagadon thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// khyi khung shar
bas sa dang// lug chung rus pa lang ka'i/ sgo lcags khung bu'i shugs byas te/ oM badzratsanamahA Na khur drisanAkaji tshums dang yuT phuT swahA/ sngags de brgya dang brgyad bzlasan/ spyag

wi mas yang lung dag bzhi/ sgo lcags 'bye bar the tshom med// dur khrod sol bas bsregs pas ni// slar yang snga ma dag tu 'gyur// rgya gram nang du chud pa yi// dmag gi gtso bo bro bya ste// sngags dang
la nas snying kha ru// seng ldeng phur pa btab pa ni/ nges par de nyid re sa par 'gyur// byibanag po'i rtog pa dang// shacamar yir dang ni/ khyim spu dag bgrags gyur na// 'bru yi rnam par 'phal
ra 'gyur/ de sogs lasakyirim pa'i// bsam gyis mi khyab jisAdal// khyod la bstan pa minus pas/ sngags grub yis rtogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan/
pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ las snatshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun ba'o// da ba' mo rje bdems gsol/ rdzo'achang gi char bab pa'i cho ga ji ltakhu lags// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// mdzesam khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byus// bdag meda shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// chu bga gnas [}]
pa'i sa yi char// dkyil 'khor pad+ma brgyad pa la// sgo dang rta babasal gyis brgyam tog mchod pas mnyes bya ba/ bram ze'i grod pa gtsang ma gnyis// tshub dag ramatshig klu yi gzugs// gur kum bzang

bos bri bar bya// kha sbyar bar du rdo rje 'ag/ zhal bzhi ba la phyag brgyud pa// pe skrun ltar gnas pani// chudar yang nas 'bri/ rtsib khro bo g.yas g.yon brtag dmar de bzhin ljang khu de/rtsa ba byung

chen zil gyis gnon/ g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa ltar// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang/ lcags kyurigs ldan pad+madang// padachen du skyong khum dang bcas// ga lon pa dril burtse gsum dang// phur bu sinagyi zhags pa
ste mtha' yas nor rgyas 'jog po dang/ stobs rgyu yum gyis bcings pa ni// cha mas cad gtsol thal sbyar te/ sbrul mgo sminachen bzhin du gtibs// 'dab mar ku chen brgyud bskyed la// spyan drangasamachod
pas nas kyang// char gyi rgyun chen 'bab par sem// klu chen rtsa ba'i sngags rnams la// risha la btags to babs// nges pa tsho rgyuna'abal bar 'gyur// gal te 'bab bar ma gyur na//
gu gul dud pas gzir byas nas// 'phrin las sngags kyis srog kyang g.yo/ gal tem baban rdo rje'adzin pa byung la tsha ba'i mar nag gis byugs la sngags bzlasan 'bab par 'gyur/ yang na kham
phor la sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i khrag dang shas lngar ltar byas la sbyar pa'i sol ba'i la sngar ltar bso bar byas/ des nges bar 'bab par 'gyur ro/ yang na gtumapa'i 'bras bu la// sngagrwa kyis btab ste/
klu yi khyim sbyin sreg byas pas 'bab par 'gyur// des kyang 'bab pa ram gyur na//yus ka ras tshosbrangargod dang/ gra ma'i ma tog phye mar byas// ra yi 'o mas ril bu sbya//sdugs

bzlasamatsho'am chu mig tu// brgya dang brgyad du bskyan 'bab// des kyang 'bab pas rgyun// rta ru'i khu bas ril bu byas// mtshor bskyar nges par 'bab pa yin// gal te des kyang m baban// pad+mauN+Dal sngon po

dang// yungs kar zangs phye ba bya dang// dbang po lag pa rgya skyegs shing// du bam ra yi 'o mas bsdus// rgya shug 'bru tsam ril bu la// lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bskyar na// char rgyun mtshungs pa med par 'bab/
mi 'bebs klu rnams mgo gas te// lus ni bskams te 'tshig par 'gyur// nga yi bka'o las gang 'da' ba// skad cig nyid la brlag par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon
par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyalapo las/ char dbab pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//dpa' mo rje rje bde mas gsolapa/ jo rdzo'achang gi sbyin srag gi cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom

tshal ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog// khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// thabs dang rtswa sa dang lha dang ni//sngaglu

kyi rim pa phan yon rnams // rim pas mdzes ma khyod la bstan/ sbyang ba'i lasazhi sngon 'gro bas// so ni nyi shu brgyad pa dang// bcu drug bcu bzhi ba gnyis dang// bcu dang brgyad las chung ba spang/ rim bzhin nad rnamA zhi

[p]/ zhi mor 'phel dang/ rims rnams zhi zhing zhing las 'grub// dbang du bsdu dang rgyus pa dang// gsod pa'i thabs su shes par bya// thur ba sum gnyis kha khyer brgyud mamago/ rim bzhin phyed phyed de sa mtshan//dkar sar
dmar nag ljang khu ste// las dang 'brel bar shes par bya// mchod pa'i rdzas dang yam shing dang// dur ba la sogs bsrag pa'i rdzas// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pa yin// rang nyidaro 'dzin bar bsgyur//
rgyas la dga' dang zhilazhi// dbang la chags pa khro la gsad// gzhan rtsub bskyed pa lasogs yin// marakha ma phyogs gdug pa'i las// bskud pa rlung ste mnan pa ni// bden bral dbang dang dgug pa
mang lho yi phyogs su blta ba yin// gsad dang dbye ba'ang de bzhin te// shar 'i byang phyogs rgyus pa yin// tshu las baspyod pa kha dog dmar// mdzes pa'i zhal gdangs cung zad gnag dbyug gu'il ba spyi
blugs dang// bgrang 'phreng g.yon dang g.yas su bsam// ral pa'i cod panagasus pa che// rgyan dang ldan pa bsams la bstim// bsang gtor 'thor 'byung mchod yon dang/ zhabs bsil la sogs rubul ba
cung ma tog la sogs rim pa ste// gzar bu gnyis kyi dgang blugs dbul// o ag yes/ de rjes ma yi mtshan ma brtag/ mdogarang sgra dang drida'o// dbyibs dang kha dog khalta'adabya// me ni chu
gcig 'bar gyur na// bsam pa thams cad 'grub par ston// gnyis 'bar rtsa gsum mi g.yon// 'ang kha'i 'bras bu thams cad 'dzin// rtsa bzhi mnyam nyid brtan pa ste// rgyas
ba'i las la 'bras bu yod/ zla 'dra snum la dri ma med// du ba med cing brdar 'dra// nad mad rigs rnams rgyas par byed/ chu shel nor bu sdus pa dang/ pad+mad+marAg gsal
ba ni// sdig pa ma lus brad par 'gyur// dmar ser du ri ka dang// ban du kha dog gsal ba ni// rgyal srid dpal rnams 'byor pa yin// udal ma li ushe'i dri// tsam pa ka dang sig
kar dri// ga pur a ka ru yi dris// dag zhing tshe ring dpal gyi gnas// zab pa'i skad dung dung dngani// rdza rnga pi wang Da maru// rda yi sgras ni bde ba 'phel// dpal be'u bkra shis gzugs su 'char/
rgyu rgyalamtshan rnga yab phyag mtshan rnams// rin chen gzugs kyi dbyibs su 'char// dge ba me yi dbyibs su bstan// ngan pa de la ci rigs bzlog/ de rjes rdzas kyi rim pa ni// oM asna ye a chu
kaspyashAn+taM ku ru swAhA/ sreg blugs so/ oM bo d+hi brik+She ya swahA/ a shAd tha'i 'o// oM badzra la tA ya swAhA/ blag sha'i 'o/ o badzra ku be ra ya satwA/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi'o/

o badzra shrI dzA lA ya sAhA/ u dum ba ra'i 'o// o sats+tshapA paM da ha na badzra sAhA/ til gyi'o// oM badzrapu lAye swAhA/ 'bras so ba'i'o/ oM badzrasaM pa ra sAhe/ zho dang zan gyi'o//oM badzra A yu
re swAhA/ dur ba'i 'o// oM badzrapra ti ha ta badzra ya swAhA/ ku sha'i 'o// rdzasa rnams rang sngags ci rigs dbul// bstod cing gsol ba'i las bya ste//ma yi snying khar dkyil 'khoramachod//gsang
[4]la sogs pa rim pa bzhin// sngar bstan pa las shes par bya// de rjes lhag mas ci rigs mchod// zhu ba la sogs rdzas rnams ni lha yi zhal du mchod bar bya// mam shing kungasha la sogs pa//
'od la mchod pa bya ba yin// phyag tu zhal zas 'thor 'byung dbul// ma tog bdug pa dbu dang 'od// thig le snying kha bsang gtor yang// sku la bul te zhabs bsil zhabs/ mar ma la sogs
rim bzhin gnas// dkyil 'khor bsngagshegs rim pa rnams// mkhas pas 'bar brtagasatabya/ dkyil 'khor lhas ni mchog star la// mi yis 'dod pa'i donasgrub byed// lag pan gyis ni
bde ba 'byin// 'o ma sbrang rtsis rig pa'il// gro dang sran mas nad kun sal// dur bas srog ni 'dzin par byed// nas kyis brtson 'grus la dbang ste// stobs 'phelo ma sha ka yin no/ khru
'thal so ba'i las yin to// sdig pa 'dag pa til yin no// 'bras kyis nus pa 'phalabyed pa// zhi la yungs kar ku shas bsrung// dpal bskyod pa ni bud shiso// yum shing gzi byin ster bar byed/
'byor pa laphal ba mar yin no// sbyin bdag bkra shis thab yin te// dngos grub kun star mchod pa'i rdzas// thabs dang shes rab gzar bu ste// bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed b// mchod pa gzhan gyis
ci zhig bya// 'di ni mdzes ma'i yul yin gyis// gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstanaba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyin sreg gi chog bstanapa'i
le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o////dba' mo rdo rje bad mas gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan nyi shu gcig gi bstod pa ji lta bu lags bcon ldan/
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag ma shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyed la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga yi ming ni nyi shu gcig//

dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang// mi 'gyur g.yung drung dbang bskur te// 'di dag mdzasam khyod la bstan// na mo nAlaM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni tsan+d+ha badzra/ namo g+ha dza kaNo b+ho tsats+tshAbadzra/na masu b+hA

pha kan sa blo tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo rata kuN+Da ka ra si tsan+dAbadza na mo b+ha kri phred+hi d+ha sa ra tsan+tabadzra/ na ma Ar+ya gsan+nitsaN+Da badzra/ nam pra sarA yi to sI tsaNAbadzra/ na mo badzral ar wishi sI tsaN+Da badzra/ na mas rUpa mo de

latsaN+Da badzra/ namo dur dAn tu dam kam patsan+dAbadzra/ namo b+ha ba bi b+hatas ru pa b+hi tsan+d+habadzra/ namo gro mo kro d+ha ba gra haru pi b+hi tsaN+Da badze na ma/ mdun sar ri kisin tsaN+Da badzra/namo ma yab lar kra ma tsaN+Dabadzra namo ni

rAtAsaMha niratA tsaN+Da badzra/ na mo a mo g+ha dza ga dam+pakr-ita tsaN+Da badzra/ namo dngashA ki ba shA nir mA NitsaN+Da badzra/ na mo hA satA so nin g+ho ShatsaN+Da badzra/na ma a tsal hi ka dzad totsaN+Da badzra/ nam/ pany+tsa butu ma mu ku Ta tsaN+Da badzra/

rgyu namo badzramahApengasha yud bod tsaNA badzra/rje gtum po'i mtshanyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang yid la byed pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/ 'drir 'jug pa dang/ glegs bam du byas to 'amang ba lani phyogrwa bcu'i

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su skyong bar 'gyur ro// srung bar 'gyur ro// spyad par 'gyur ro// skyob par 'gyur ro// mtshan 'adi rnams 'dzin pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro//

lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar dusems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skya'o// ngan 'gro gzhan yang sangs pa yin no// tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyul// rdo rje 'chang

lnga brgya' nga rtag tumtshan 'dzin pa'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ngo// gdug pa can gyi klu rnams kyis mi 'tshazhing slar longs spyodasna tshogs sbyin no// 'chi ba'i dus su'ang bo cha ma lta bu'i sku lus bstan te rang

gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro// mchan 'di gnas pa'i sa de ni lcang lo can dang mtshungs pa yin no// mi ma yin pa gdug pa can rnams kyis nam yang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro/ grub pa brgyad dang sangs rgyas
kyang ster bar byed na/ gzhan lta'ang ci smos te/ mtshan 'di dag rin po che dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// 'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// ched du brjod pa rin patshe// gdug pa thams cad 'joms
par byed// dbal dang gzi bdu 'balab yin// 'phrin las sgo rnams thogs pa med// 'di ni rdo rje 'chang yin pas// nyin mtshan dus gsum klog pa yi// phyi bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed// nad dang gdon
rnams kun las thar smanachen nyes pa thams cad 'joms// 'byung po kun gyis bkur ba ste// mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin/ 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam// su 'chang lag na dpal gnas te

ru bzhiSh+Tha/ riganyis/ rtag tu mtshan 'di brjod par gyis// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ mtshan nyi shurtsa gcig gis bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu/
ba'o///dpa' mo de 'dems gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud 'di bshad pa dang/ smra ba dang/ ji lta gzung ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag mdabade ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ bdug mod shes ba ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis lags par nyon// phyi ma'i dus su nga yi rgyud/ gsang

bsku gsung thugs kyi gter// bla med rgyud rgyal rin chen 'di// byang chub sems ldan snying rdzache// thesamang shes rab mchog tu gsal// dad pa che zhing lha la gus// khra ma bstan cing dbang bskur thob//
dam tshig sdom pa ma lus ldan// brtson 'grus che la gzhan don dpa'o// 'jig rten de la ma chags pas// rgyud 'dre mnyan dang bshad par bya// de las bzlog pa'i gang zag la/ ming tsam
bstan par mi bya'o// galate bstanapa gyur pa na// sngags pa dam tshig nyams gyur te// nad gdon 'byung po ma lus pas// nye bar gtsas te 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas mnar med sdug bsngal ni//
grangs mod 'das kyang thar mi 'gyur// de bas gsang ba sku gsung thugs// sIng po des pa 'di dag la// rgya yis btab ste mchod pa dang// bstod cing sba ba byas gyur na// yid la re ba kun rdzogos shing/
'jig rten thams cad bde bar 'gyur// glegs bam so ni khacu drug la// rim bdun rgya yis btab nas kyang// rtag tu spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzung// 'di dang bral bar ma gyur na// bstan pa de yin sgrub
pa de// sgrub pa chen po'ang de yin te/ sngags kyang de yin lha yang de// bla mde yin slob dpon yang// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun yang/ de yin bskyod dang rdzogs pa de// ma lus dbang
yang de yin te// 'jig rten bya ba kun spangs nas// 'di la mchod par gyur pa ni// tshogs gzhan ci yin rmongs pa'i rgyu/ ci phyir 'di la 'bad ma byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs te/ yum larjes su gtad pa'i don bstan bani/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo/ de rje bde ma bad star ma// rtog pagacod mdzad yum khyod la// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung// gzungs
ma yid 'ong rgyal ba'is// rnam dag mchod cing sdug bsngal 'joms// ma lus 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal// rdo rje bde ma phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas rgyud gtad do// de nas yum gyis rjes
bzung ste// dus gsum bde gshegs ma lus pa'i// thugasakyi sras po sde dpon che// 'jig rten thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal la'o// gtum po dpa' bo 'jig
bar byed// klu 'dul gzhan gyisami thub pa// drag po 'jigs par byed pa'i lha// rdo rje gtum po khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes bstod nas phyag dang skor bsamanyes par byas nas/ slar yab kyi
zugasaka'i rdo rje'i lte khar thim par gyur to// de nas 'khor thams cad kyis mchod pasamachod cing bstod de/ gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gsungs pa
ba legs so legs so zhes mngon par mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rangs te mngon par bstod par gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das
( phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rgyud ji ltar bstan cing sla ba dang sasu yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa 'o/// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/// gar gyi mkhan po lnga la mgu ru chen po dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis
byang phyogs sham b+ha la'i dpa dang bstan te bsgyur ba'o// sad kyis yul dbus kyi dpa dang/ kha che nas byung ba dang bstun nas legs par gtan la phabapa'o/
rgya gar skad du/ badzra sukha kro d+ha tam rA dza/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bad khros rgyud kyi rgyal po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dapa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'og min gyi gnas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na bzhugs so// de'i tsha'adus pa rnams kyi dang bo sems
dpal chen po yid cher g.yos te/ gus pas bkur sti dang/ rim gro dang/ phud dud dang/ bsti stang du byas te/ a ma 'o byams mgon thugs rje can// 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad kun//
ma yis tshig cing mtshan gyis phog/ mun par 'khyams nas ri yisanon// rlung gis khyer ba snying re rje// skyabs kyi dam pa bka' stsal latshal// zhes zhus pas/ derani mgon pos sku bstan te//
zhal gyi pad+marab phyi nas// spyan gyi gzimadangs kun la gzigs// lcags kyi dkyil nas bka' stsal pa// skyob pa'i dam pa 'di yin gyis// re rlabade dang khros pa yis// dum bu gsum pa/
ngas bshad kyis// legs par nyon la yid la zung// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje bade khros kyirgyud las/ gtam rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang de 'o//
mngon par bshad bya ba// kra shisamaNAl legs byas la/ ]tshul dang 'thun pa'i bum pa dgod// de yang chugatsang sba bodun blugs/ gzhan yang shing thog 'bras bu dang// mngar gyi rnam pa dang//
dri'i rnam pa dang/ rin po che'i mchog dang/ 'bru'i bye brag dang/ sman rnams blugs so// bum pa de'i mgrin pa dar sngon pos bkris te/ stong du bla re phub la gzhag go/ rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las/
sgrub rdzas kyi le'u ste gnyis ba'o// de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// sgrub byed rang rgyud dag pa yis// bskyed tshul rgyas sam bsdus kyang rung// hU~M las phyag na rdo rje ni// dbu
dwagasum mthing nag phyag bzhi mdzes// snyan che zhing mtshungs pa med// zhabs kyis rgya mtsho'i nang du yang// chusrin stsal pa'i stang du brdzis// g.yas g.yon dang po'i phyag gnyis
kyis// rdo rje gsor zhing dril chen rdung// mtha' gnyis drug pa zhaledu'adren// dbu gsum g.yas dkar rigs lngas brgyan// dbu g.yon dmar po sbrul gyis mdzes// zhal dbus mthing nag lcags lam
can// stong du ma kha' lding tshangs pa la// dpa' bo gdug pa dpung pa'i brgyan// rin chen lhun po'i rab la// stangs bcas zhum pa med par bzhugos// de ltar lha dang rab sbyangs// de nyid bstan
'pho ba'i yan lag gis// rang lus gos su gzhug par gyis// rdo rje bdaba'irgyud las/ lta sgom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'i/// de nas mngon par bshad bya ba//

sgo gsum sbyor ba shes pa yis// gsang ba'i snying po 'bum du bzlas// oM badzatsa sam+badut+taM ta ka ha na daha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ bcobargyad sngags kyi rgyal po 'di//ma 'byung mi 'byung 'byumi 'gyur// 'di
bzlas sngon dugrub par 'gyur// rtag tu mtshan ma bzang po 'byung// gzhan gyi gyoras 'ong mi 'ong// rang la nges par ston par 'gyur// bstan pa'i rimakha'akhruba'ikhrub// 'bod pas legs par brtag pa
skade nas/

[4]mngon par bshad bya ba// rten ni rdo rje'i 'od du bar// brtan pa 'phrotshad hu du 'bar// 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro// 'jig rten ma lus sbyangs nas kyang// slar lazigakhe nyidal bas sgra dang bcas te bangagasal
bar// brtan par gyur na spro bsdu bya// nor bde ba'i rgyud las/ mi'i bsam gtan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o///demasa mngon par bshad bya ba//mthingagi shog bu sngon la/ gas kyi 'khor
lo bris pa'i stong// bsrung ba'ising po legs bkodade/ gangaming 'gashasbyar ba gyis// de yang dra yis yongs bsgos te// sangs rgyas sems can nyud la stam// nganyid bum pa
la= mchod cing bzlas brjod gsol ba gdab// de nas tshes pa'i dus bzang la// rang ngam gzhan la brtags na// bar chad thams cud nyer zhi nas// tshe dpal bsod nams rgyas par
gyur// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las/ srung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//de nas mngon par bishad bya ba// 'gro ba dug gis gdungs pa la// gdug pa'i dbang chen lasogs pa/
'tshob 'di ltar 'byung bar gyur/ mo dga' sems 'phyo 'grosnying 'dod// nyam chung 'thibs dang ltas kyang ngan// yang yang na zhing bsams snyol 'ong// de ni klu yikhanodapa ste// tshor nas legs par
bcos na bzlog/ sa srin mo la 'di ltar gnod// lus snying sha 'phrig sha ro 'byung// sha bkra thor bu ngo yang 'gyur// de nas tshor nas bcos na bzlog/ sa bdag gnod na 'diltar 'gyur// gdong
'u// yang shin tu ldog 'gyur che/ na tsha'i zug rngu drag por 'gyur// res 'ga' bde ba ltar yang byed// skabs su thig le kho na'an/ de yang brtes bka' shes pas zlog/ gnyan gyi/
gnod pa 'di yin te// shin tun tsha'i tshabs kyang che/rkang lag ma'akhums drim ldog/ sha khrag lus nas mig kyang slong// kha yo sna yonus za// kha ya mi thubaganod pa za// chubur byunganamtshang
yang che/ tshor bsa mchog sprimakhagaces// gdon tshogs gzhan yang yun mi rtag/ pha mo tsam la sogs pa zlog/ kun la bsgrims te btsosan 'tsho// rdzobade ba'i rgyud las/ gzhan gyi
gnod pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/// de nas mngon par bshad bya la// dbang mol sogs thams cad l// mchod dang gtor mas mgu bar bya// ci 'dod pa yi rdzas
rnams sbyin// rten redab nas su legs par s// snyan pa'i tshig gis bsgo byas la// bum par nor bu rin chen gzhug/ mdzes pa'i dar sna 'bru yimadzod/ gang gi rten la sbas gyur na//
gnod pa rigs pa zhib 'gyur// jordzabad ba khros pa'i rgyud las zhi byed machod thabs kyi le'u stabargyad pa'o///de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ btsan dug gu gul gla/
rtsi dang// shudag shing kun mu zi drug/ gsang sngags bter sta lus la byug/ gu gul mkhrisag cing// sgog pa shu dgadrichen rnams// bdug pa byas te yang n bkru// gser g.yu byu ru mig
ma phug/ btsan dug ma bya'i mkhris pa bcas// bcangasan bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// rje bad ba'i skud las/ rten 'brelalas kyi le'u ste dgu ba'o///rje bde ba'i rgyud
las dum bu dang po bstan pa'o//des mtshon par bshadabyab// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir// drag sngags 'di dag brjod par bya'o// omAcha sod sod/ mAr Ni
bying bying/ mAr Nagasarlugs/ mAr Na nyalagul/mAr Nadun dun/mAr Namyosamyos/ mA ra Namyos khying a ril dza/ mi tshig sngangs te drag sngags 'di// dbugs ma 'o bar sgrub nas drang/ bum par bstis
sa rtags thob nas// 'khrungs samadakyusanadas khrub thob// sngags lagang ming snga byas nas// yungs kar gdug pa'i phur pa la// brjod de sa la sbyar gyur na// gang la bzlas pa bag
bar 'gyur// mabasgrubs lan cig brjod khas kyang// dngos grub thams dethob par 'gyur// ma 'byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags khros pa'i le'u
de nas mngon l bshad byab// rdzas bsag lha bskyod drag sngags bzlas// dgos pa tshang ba'i bum pa ste/ mi dmigs yaM las rin po che'i//
bum ba tshul dang 'thu bar bsam// de nas thaM dang laMsani// chu nas yi dkyil 'khor bsam/ lhabagoms khyad ban bum pa 'dzin// mdo s+sagu ste// de sasngags kyi 'od zer 'phros//
phyir 'phrosag dug lam lus srog 'od zer lcags kyi sgrub mar drang// bum par khro chu khol mar gyur// de 'thus pa kus pas gang gnodang// rdul du rlag ste dag par bsam//
brtsams pa'i las la tsom med// rje khros pa'i rgyud las/ bum pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcugacig pa'o///de nas mngonob 'bad byub//rdzas bsag lhakhasgoms 'khor bskor/
ro'os byi dug bya rog sgros// khru gang tsam gyi mtshan nyid la// 'chi bar byed pa'isnag tsha la// ltogs pa'i sgortsa g.yas pa yis// drag sngags mnyam pa'i re migabri// de nas mtshan mar gang
dmigs gzugs// kha dog rigs bzhi nyid du bya// de snying drag sngags re re dgodi/ maN+Dal gtsang ma dris byung sa te// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ljang// rma bya'i sgro yis brgya byas te// lta sgom
khyad par 'khe'o le 'dzin// 'khor le bsar ba'i rim pani// drag sngags mnyam pa'i 'khor lo bskor// sngagasani/ nA ga kramu ra NahU~M phaT/ gang bsams 'di la the tshoma med// rdo rje khros pa'i
rgyud las/ 'khor lo khros pa'ilesnyabcuganyis pa'o///de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas bsag lha bsom phupags// lcags samasang ldeng dugangashing lag/ sngags

grongs mnyamakha'i phur pa bsham// 'khor lo'i mtha'am bskor te dgod// lha bsgom khyadaparaphurab 'dzin// drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni// nagabadzrakI la ya mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ sngagasagrasazhas pa'i
phur pa bsham// bstsams pa'i las la the tshom med// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las phurapa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///de nas mngon pa bshad bya ba/ rdzas bsag lha/

bsgom sbyin sreg bya// gdug pa'i shing bu khru gang tshad// sngags kyi gras kyang mnyam par bya// sngon dmar skud pas rim gsum dkri// bar der 'khor lo'i srog rtsagacad// lag tu gri thogs drag sngags brjod/

nAg tikA che ge momA ra ya hU~M phaT/ rim par bslangs te g.yang gzhi khud// byang shar mtshams su rnam par gzhag/ de nas maN+Daladabus nyid du// hom khung brus te dug khragatug/nang du hom khug khrug par

byung 'khor lo gris gtubasaM thogs nas ni// grangs dang mnyam par bsreg par bya// ma de yugasasa'i khyim nas bslang/ lhabasgom khyad pa'i m dpung 'dzin// gsang sngags ba zlus pa mapa 'di// nA ga tsit+ta la
ro mA ra ya phaT/ bsregs nas las brtsams 'grub par 'gyur// rje rdzobade ba khros pa'i rgyud las/ ma dpung khros pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas mngon r bshad bya ba// rjes

bsag lhabasgom mtshan mgag zlas chu sbyin sramamam bo ba'i mgor// bsregs pa'i bral ba pasas byas la//gung yin nyid kyi sbyor ba bcas//lhabasgom khyad par ri rab 'dzin//drag staga'akhrus pa'i rim pa ni nAg snyam
b+ha yin// mnan byas chu srin kha ru bsgom//'di byas gang la bzlas pa bag/'di la the tshomimabya'o// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud laso//ri rab khros pa'ile/bcolnga pa'o/// deN+Dikhros pa'i bas
dum bu gnyis pa'o//de nas mngon pa bshad bya pa/glang bo'i bgabara'abrugabris//gang ming btsugs drag sngags bzlas//gnam lcags
ba bab pa bzlog par 'gyur// 'bru yi pad+ma'adab brgyad la//klu yib khrugasa rnams khris ba la// bstimanas drag sngags brgyabagyuran/ gnam mu dus su phebs par 'gyur// thod par a bris sngags kyis
bskor// gung yin btsug la sim pa la// drag sngags gang yin bzlas byas na// myur du 'grub par ga don mi za// srog chags 'tshogs bar gyur pa la// 'chi ba'i chu yis drag sngags bri//
'jigs byed bkug ste de la mchod// de nyid yungs kar sdum khong 'dabs/ gang la btags pa srung ba'i mchog/ rdo rje bang khros kyi rgyud las/ bu mo'i le'u stobanu drug
de nas de dag la 'kho gsu mngon bar dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das lamachod cing bstod nas rjes su yi rang ba phul ti mi snang bar gyur to// mnyam pa po
lagazhag pa'o/ do bde khros kyirgyud las/ sa su yi rang ba'i le'u sta bcu bdun pa'o// ku mchog tu gsang ba'i// dzAnakalas bsgyu'o//
